attitude.author: Winston Churchill
attitude.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.

attitude.author: Albert Einstein
attitude.text: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.

attitude.author: Marcus Aurelius
attitude.text: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.

attitude.author: John C. Maxwell
attitude.text: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.

attitude.author: Zig Ziglar
attitude.text: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

attitude.author: Lou Holtz
attitude.text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.

attitude.author: Brian Tracy
attitude.text: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.

attitude.author: Ralph Marston
attitude.text: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.

attitude.author: Walter Scott
attitude.text: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.

attitude.author: David Bailey
attitude.text: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.

attitude.author: Edwin Louis Cole
attitude.text: Attitude determines the altitude of life.

attitude.author: Aldous Huxley
attitude.text: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.

attitude.author: Khalil Gibran
attitude.text: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.

attitude.author: Hans Selye
attitude.text: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.

attitude.author: Wade Boggs
attitude.text: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.

attitude.author: Viktor E. Frankl
attitude.text: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of human freedoms - to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.

attitude.author: Thomas Jefferson
attitude.text: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.

attitude.author: Charles R. Swindoll
attitude.text: We cannot change our past. We can not change the fact that people act in a certain way. We can not change the inevitable. The only thing we can do is play on the one string we have, and that is our attitude.

attitude.author: William James
attitude.text: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.

attitude.author: Alicia Witt
attitude.text: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.

attitude.author: Venus Williams
attitude.text: Some people say I have attitude - maybe I do... but I think you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does - that makes you a winner right there.

attitude.author: Colin Powell
attitude.text: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.

attitude.author: Aeschylus
attitude.text: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.

attitude.author: Lou Ferrigno
attitude.text: The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel.

attitude.author: Oscar Wilde
attitude.text: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.

attitude.author: Earl Nightingale
attitude.text: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations.

attitude.author: Michael Jordan
attitude.text: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.

attitude.author: Elbert Hubbard
attitude.text: Character is the result of two things: mental attitude and the way we spend our time.

attitude.author: Loretta Young
attitude.text: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.

attitude.author: Simon Cowell
attitude.text: My attitude is, if someone's going to criticize me, tell me to my face.

attitude.author: Norman Vincent Peale
attitude.text: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.

attitude.author: John N. Mitchell
attitude.text: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.

attitude.author: John Cale
attitude.text: Time plays a role in almost every decision. And some decisions define your attitude about time.

attitude.author: George MacDonald
attitude.text: Attitudes are more important than facts.

attitude.author: Og Mandino
attitude.text: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.

attitude.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
attitude.text: If your ego starts out, 'I am important, I am big, I am special,' you're in for some disappointments when you look around at what we've discovered about the universe. No, you're not big. No, you're not. You're small in time and in space. And you have this frail vessel called the human body that's limited on Earth.

attitude.author: Frank Sinatra
attitude.text: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes.

attitude.author: W. Clement Stone
attitude.text: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.

attitude.author: Miley Cyrus
attitude.text: Pink isn't just a color, it's an attitude!

attitude.author: Bo Bennett
attitude.text: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.

attitude.author: Alan Watts
attitude.text: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.

attitude.author: Joel Osteen
attitude.text: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.

attitude.author: Joe Biden
attitude.text: Our future cannot depend on the government alone. The ultimate solutions lie in the attitudes and the actions of the American people.

attitude.author: Diane von Furstenberg
attitude.text: Attitude is everything.

attitude.author: Richard Pryor
attitude.text: When you ain't got no money, you gotta get an attitude.

attitude.author: Don Rickles
attitude.text: You know what's funny to me? Attitude.

attitude.author: Arthur Ashe
attitude.text: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.

attitude.author: William Wordsworth
attitude.text: What is pride? A rocket that emulates the stars.

attitude.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
attitude.text: The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them.

attitude.author: Billy Graham
attitude.text: It is not the body's posture, but the heart's attitude that counts when we pray.

attitude.author: Leonard Nimoy
attitude.text: I think it's my adventure, my trip, my journey, and I guess my attitude is, let the chips fall where they may.

attitude.author: J. Donald Walters
attitude.text: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.

attitude.author: Stephen Covey
attitude.text: Between stimulus and response, there is a space where we choose our response.

attitude.author: William Makepeace Thackeray
attitude.text: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.

attitude.author: Terry Bradshaw
attitude.text: Bad attitudes will ruin your team.

attitude.author: Irving Berlin
attitude.text: Our attitudes control our lives. Attitudes are a secret power working twenty-four hours a day, for good or bad. It is of paramount importance that we know how to harness and control this great force.

attitude.author: Barbara Corcoran
attitude.text: A complainer is like a Death Eater because there's a suction of negative energy. You can catch a great attitude from great people.

attitude.author: Jane Addams
attitude.text: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.

attitude.author: James Truslow Adams
attitude.text: The greatest discovery of my generation is that man can alter his life simply by altering his attitude of mind.

attitude.author: Lesley Gore
attitude.text: Really you just gotta keep chugging along and keep a positive attitude and get through all the problems. You gotta face them, otherwise you don't get through.

attitude.author: Rahm Emanuel
attitude.text: My attitude is govern as if you've run your last race. That's not to say I've run my last race, but govern with a liberation and a freedom; change your mind frame to operate that way.

attitude.author: Tig Notaro
attitude.text: People ask what my influences are, and for me, it's not always obvious. One of my biggest inspirations was Chrissie Hynde from the Pretenders. That's based on how she just does whatever she wants to do, and I love her attitude about everything. It bleeds over into my way of thinking and comedy.

attitude.author: Rirkrit Tiravanija
attitude.text: I'm ephemeral as much as I can be, so I started to think about the idea of not working. It's really about a change of attitude. It's not so much about stopping, but about re-thinking the meaning of one's production.

attitude.author: Buzz Osborne
attitude.text: If you take a band like Nirvana, their biggest hits are structurally the same as even a hair metal band's biggest hits. The structure's not different - the attitude was different. Except it really wasn't. It seemed a little more human.

attitude.author: Jesse Ventura
attitude.text: My attitude when I'm in Mexico is I wake up in the morning with nothing to do and I go to bed half done. I don't wear a watch. When I live down there, I do nothing according to time. I eat when I'm hungry and go to sleep when I'm tired.

attitude.author: El-P
attitude.text: A lot of the attitude I used to have about being from New York when I was younger just disappeared when I started to the rest of the world.

attitude.author: Graham Chapman
attitude.text: All ideas come about through some sort of observation. It sparks an attitude; some object or emotion causes a reaction in the other person.

attitude.author: Tom Wolfe
attitude.text: The attitude is we live and let live. This is actually an amazing change in values in a rather short time and it's an example of freedom from religion.

attitude.author: Grace Jones
attitude.text: I see myself as no color. I can play the role of a man. I can paint my face white if I want to and play the role of white. I can play a green, I can be a purple. I think I have that kind of frame and that kind of attitude where I can play an animal.

attitude.author: Clifford D. Simak
attitude.text: What do you mean by faith? Is faith enough for Man? Should he be satisfied with faith alone? Is there no way of finding out the truth? Is the attitude of faith, of believing in something for which there can be no more than philosophic proof, the true mark of a Christian?

attitude.author: Angela Ahrendts
attitude.text: Just because you're a luxury brand doesn't mean you have to have an attitude.

attitude.author: Michelle Zauner
attitude.text: I'm a huge fan of the Korean attitude toward service and infrastructure, which is shaped by a preference for speed and efficiency, values I truly yearn for in the US.

attitude.author: Collin Sexton
attitude.text: No matter the wins and losses, you can control your attitude. You can control you coming into work each and every day with the right attitude and wanting to get better and trying to get better.

attitude.author: Josh McDowell
attitude.text: Prayer is talking with God. God knows your heart and is not so concerned with your words as He is with the attitude of your heart.

attitude.author: Jeff Ross
attitude.text: I'm a big fan of Courtney Love. I love Hole and I love her acting and I love her attitude. I just hope I never meet her in a dark alley.

attitude.author: Bo Burnham
attitude.text: I know I'm probably digging for fresh fruit in the garbage, and as much as anyone, my attitude is, if stuff's sincere, it's gooey and boring and uninteresting. But it's no way to live.

attitude.author: Hayley Williams
attitude.text: I enjoy punk, the attitude as well as the music, but I don't feel like I have to be a carbon copy of it and invite all this controversy just to be punk rock.

attitude.author: William Lyon Mackenzie King
attitude.text: Regardless of what one's attitude towards prohibition may be, temperance is something against which, at a time of war, no reasonable protest can be made.

attitude.author: Dan Quinn
attitude.text: That attitude and toughness that we want to play with, that, to me, is the most critical thing.

attitude.author: Christian Louboutin
attitude.text: I mean, the shoe - there is a music to it, there is attitude, there is sound, it's a movement. Clothes - it's a different story. There are a million things I'd rather do before designing clothes: directing, landscaping.

attitude.author: Jonny Kim
attitude.text: I was told that with the right attitude, and with enough hard work, if you get up after every time you fail, you can amount to something and you can do positive work. You can leave a positive mark for our world, and that's what I aim to do.

attitude.author: Walter Dean Myers
attitude.text: Children have adopted a consumerist attitude - I dare you to entertain me.

attitude.author: Georg Baselitz
attitude.text: The artist is not responsible to any one. His social role is asocial... his only responsibility consists in an attitude to the work he does.

attitude.author: Rick Santelli
attitude.text: When you are facing the wilderness on your own, you have a totally different attitude to someone who works in government or who has a monthly cheque.

attitude.author: Kim Dotcom
attitude.text: I always thought of myself as more American than Americans when I was living in Germany, because I always had this attitude of can-do, and if you're successful, you can show it, which is a very un-German thing, you know.

attitude.author: Satish Kumar
attitude.text: If you can kill animals, the same attitude can kill human beings. The mentality is the same which exploits nature and which creates wars.

attitude.author: Yelena Baturina
attitude.text: The attitude of the business community towards investment in Austria and Germany has always been positive, as both the countries have earned their reputation as countries with a consistent economic environment.

attitude.author: Philip Treacy
attitude.text: There is no attitude required. The hat brings the attitude. And when people try on a hat they like, it is a bit of fun. It makes them laugh. You don't laugh when you put on a pair of shoes, but you do with a hat.

attitude.author: Grace Jones
attitude.text: I was born into a very religious family where everything was about setting the right example for the community and having to obey orders blindly. I felt that everyone was growing up in the world, except me. This is probably one of the reasons why I had such a rebellious attitude towards any form of authority.

attitude.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
attitude.text: Not every religion has to have St. Augustine's attitude to sex. Why even in our culture marriages are celebrated in a church, everyone present knows what is going to happen that night, but that doesn't prevent it being a religious ceremony.

attitude.author: Brian Littrell
attitude.text: A lot of people talk about the one-and-done attitude of college athletes, but if you look at the University of Kentucky, we do build winners.

attitude.author: Joel Osteen
attitude.text: Any of us can be happy and have a good attitude when everything is going our way. But I believe it's the real test of your character and of your faith to say, 'Things are not going our way, but I'm still being good to people; I'm still attending church; I still have a good attitude.'

attitude.author: Corey Taylor
attitude.text: I have very diverse tastes in music, and I don't, like, make distinctions between what I can't and can't listen to. In fact, I could never understand why anybody would do that in the first place. My attitude is, 'I can't make music if I don't like music.'

attitude.author: Amy Morin
attitude.text: Acting tough is all about developing an attitude and a persona that says, 'Look at how great I am.' But often, that tough exterior is meant to hide self-doubt. Mentally strong people invest more energy into working on their weaknesses rather than trying to cover them up.

attitude.author: The Weeknd
attitude.text: For me, bomber jackets are smart, but they are also street and have a lot of attitude.

attitude.author: Dan Marino
attitude.text: As a team, you need to come from behind every once in awhile just to do it. Good for the attitude. It makes it exciting. And when everybody knows you have to throw it... that makes it fun too.

attitude.author: Kevin Jorgeson
attitude.text: When you're climbing with someone who always sees the bright spot, even if there is no bright spot, that attitude is really helpful.

attitude.author: X. J. Kennedy
attitude.text: The attitude that poetry should not be analyzed is prevalent among many who consider themselves experts on children's literature. But I suspected that kids like to look closely at things and figure out what makes them go.

attitude.author: Andrew Forrest
attitude.text: We do need an attitude of leadership in our government which demonstrates faith in major population centres outside of Perth.

attitude.author: Terry Fox
attitude.text: I have a saddened and weakening attitude toward the media and press.

attitude.author: Marcel Duchamp
attitude.text: I became a librarian at the Sainte-Genevieve Library in Paris. I made this gesture to rid myself of a certain milieu, a certain attitude, to have a clean conscience, but also to make a living. I was twenty-five. I had been told that one must make a living, and I believed it.

attitude.author: Carrie Underwood
attitude.text: Being a part of SKECHERS is exciting. It is such a hip company with a great attitude and image.

attitude.author: Clara Zetkin
attitude.text: In individual industries where female labour pays an important role, any movement advocating better wages, shorter working hours, etc., would not be doomed from the start because of the attitude of those women workers who are not organized.

attitude.author: Muggsy Bogues
attitude.text: You've got to have the skills. You've got to have a great attitude because, if you don't, nobody will want to deal with you.

attitude.author: Pratyusha Banerjee
attitude.text: I ended my journey with 'Balika'... on a good note, but I've been hearing that I threw tantrums on the set and had an attitude problem.

attitude.author: Grandmaster Flash
attitude.text: What has happened is that to some degree they have taken an attitude where they don't listen to demos of diverse subject matters. They're looking for demos like the record the guy on the left just did.

attitude.author: Sally Kirkland
attitude.text: My attitude is always one of sensuality, aggressive enthusiasm and a kind of outrageousness in my expression.

attitude.author: Nia Long
attitude.text: I think Nina Simone has had an amazing journey. She was spicy and she had attitude and she didn't care, she wanted her money in a paper bag and don't mess with me and I've been doing some research on that so.

attitude.author: Leonard Baskin
attitude.text: I think it has other roots, has to do, in part, with a general anxiety in contemporary life... nuclear bombs, inequality of possibility and chance, inequality of goods allotted to us, a kind of general racist, unjust attitude that is pervasive.

attitude.author: Heidi Roizen
attitude.text: I used to fall into the trap of thinking that taking care of my husband and kids was more important than taking care of myself. Now I have a new attitude: You know when you're on an airplane and the manual tells you to put on your oxygen mask first and then help the person next to you? I feel the same way about my health.

attitude.author: Paul Young
attitude.text: There was that 'anything is achievable' attitude in the Eighties. Everything was very positive and gung-ho. Well, 'hedonistic' is the word they use a lot. We were all confident bordering on arrogant.

attitude.author: Walter Kirn
attitude.text: The fictionally correct have all the answers, and that's what's wrong with them. They're artistic technocrats. There's no dilemma so knotty, no question so baffling, that it can't be smoothly neutralized by dialing up the right attitude adjustment. Poor old Hemingway. If only he'd known.

attitude.author: Brandon Ingram
attitude.text: It could be the best defender or the worst defender. I have to have the attitude that I don't think anyone is going to deter me from getting to the basket. Maybe help defense can come over and affect it, but not the first guy.

attitude.author: G. Willow Wilson
attitude.text: For most inhabitants of the Arab world, the prevailing cultural attitude toward women - fed and encouraged by Wahhabi doctrine, which is based on Bedouin social norms rather than Islamic jurisprudence - often trumps the rights accorded to women by Islam.

attitude.author: David Cohen
attitude.text: My attitude is there are at least hundreds of interesting startups that are going to get going in every year.

attitude.author: Mark Spitz
attitude.text: The pool is terrible, but that doesn't have much to do with my record swims. That's all mental attitude.

attitude.author: Rain Dove
attitude.text: I always had this attitude of, 'They don't get to tell me how I live my life.'

attitude.author: Edwin Catmull
attitude.text: We need business leaders who have a respect for technical issues even if they don't have technical backgrounds. In a lot of U.S. industries, including cars and even computers, many managers don't think of technology as a core competency, and this attitude leads them to farm out technical issues.

attitude.author: Jesse Eisenberg
attitude.text: I tend to be pessimistic about everything: If things seem to be going good, I'm worried that it's going to end; if things are bad, then I'm worried that it's going to be permanent. It's not a very comfortable attitude to have all the time.

attitude.author: Kriti Kharbanda
attitude.text: I could have been insecure in 'Yamla Pagla'... if I wanted to be. With three actors who are amazing beyond belief and are a brand themselves, they don't even need me. They made sure that I was part of it. It's about the people whom you meet. They make you secure or insecure. It's their attitude. I have been very fortunate.

attitude.author: Imelda Marcos
attitude.text: I love everybody. One of the great things about me is that I have a very positive attitude.

attitude.author: Isla Fisher
attitude.text: I'm definitely attracted to other Australians; I have a laid-back attitude to life that I feel is very Australian; I love a good barbie.

attitude.author: Nancy Pearcey
attitude.text: In Gnosticism, the physical world did not ultimately matter - which meant physical suffering did not matter either. Seeking 'enlightenment' meant cultivating an attitude of detachment, even indifference.

attitude.author: Charice Pempengco
attitude.text: Beyonce is one of my inspirations. Her attitude, her style, her voice... she's perfect.

attitude.author: Taika Waititi
attitude.text: You have to let go of the control and allow things to develop. You need to have a flexible attitude, especially working with kids.

attitude.author: Alok Nath
attitude.text: I have tried making the roles that I have played in my career look different with my attitude, diction or my beahviour.

attitude.author: Greg Giraldo
attitude.text: The reality is I'm not this person with this driving 'get it done' attitude.

attitude.author: Charles Jencks
attitude.text: Like our attitude to love, truth and goodness, we seem to be confident about knowing what beauty is - certain, even dogmatic - until we think hard about the idea, whereupon all confidence flies away.

attitude.author: Mary J. Blige
attitude.text: I didn't know how to show my self love, and I didn't want anyone else to hurt me. So my tough girl attitude was like, 'I'm not having it.'

attitude.author: Evan Parker
attitude.text: Certain kinds of speed, flow, intensity, density of attacks, density of interaction... Music that concentrates on those qualities is, I think, easier achieved by free improvisation between people sharing a common attitude, a common language.

attitude.author: Christopher Timothy
attitude.text: I don't know whether having cancer has changed my attitude to life. I can't even say that now I live every day to the fullest I think I always have, really.

attitude.author: James Woods
attitude.text: My attitude about Hollywood is that I wouldn't walk across the street to pull one of those executives out of the snow if he was bleeding to death. Not unless I was paid for it. None of them ever did me any favors.

attitude.author: John McGahern
attitude.text: When I was in my 20s it did occur to me that there was something perverted about an attitude that thought that killing somebody was a minor offence compared to kissing somebody.

attitude.author: Srikumar Rao
attitude.text: If you have an ongoing relationship with a person, think of everything positive about that person that you possibly can and enter your interaction from that space. Ignore all the crap that used to drive you up the wall before. You will be amazed at what a change this attitude shift brings about.

attitude.author: Neil Diamond
attitude.text: I came back to performing with a different attitude about performing and myself. I wasn't expecting perfection any more, just hoping for an occasional inspiration.

attitude.author: David Choe
attitude.text: By nature, I'm a very self-destructive person, but all that happens is that I just get more successful every time I do it. Someday I'll come crashing down, so that's why I try to keep a good attitude about it all.

attitude.author: Meles Zenawi
attitude.text: An oversupply of national sentiment is not the problem in Somalia. The problem is a lack of it. The problem is an oversupply of sub-sub-clannish attitude.

attitude.author: Lindsey Stirling
attitude.text: If your mom asks you to do the dishes, do not pull out your pirate attitude. But if someone tells you you're not good enough, says your dreams are too lofty, or claims there is no room in showbiz for a dancing violinist - well then, by all means, pull out your eye patch, my friend, and take to the high seas.

attitude.author: Carroll Quigley
attitude.text: The traditional Christian attitude toward human personality was that human nature was essentially good and that it was formed and modified by social pressures and training.

attitude.author: Teddy Thompson
attitude.text: I like England more than I did when I left. It's become a bit of a better country in the last ten years, in the attitude of it. A bit more Americanized, which is both good and bad. At least when you order a cup of coffee they don't give you a hard time.

attitude.author: Jordin Sparks
attitude.text: That term's definitely got a negative aura to it, because people think a diva is somebody with an attitude who demands things all the time. Of course there is that type of diva, but my idea of a diva has always been a singer - whether male or female - who gets on that stage and captivates you with their presence and their voice.

attitude.author: Andrew Forrest
attitude.text: If you look hard at it, if you look hard at the bleeding heart attitude to always throw money at issues, throw money at problems, what you're in fact probably saying is you're exercising a prejudicism of low expectations.

attitude.author: Carlos Sainz Jr.
attitude.text: My Dad has given me a lot of advice, but this advice comes especially from the attitude point of view. He's never told me how to drive a car, how to do a corner, nothing like that. He believe this comes from the talent. You are born with it or you are not born with it.

attitude.author: Goldie
attitude.text: I use the same big studios that everybody else uses, but my attitude once inside is that of a total barbarian.

attitude.author: Thomas Griffith
attitude.text: Its attitude, which it has preached and practiced, is skepticism. Now, it finds, the public is applying that skepticism to the press.

attitude.author: Henry Mancini
attitude.text: Cancer... changed my whole work attitude.

attitude.author: CL
attitude.text: N.Y. is definitely one of my favorites. Love the culture, people, attitude and music, art, and fashion.

attitude.author: Claire Fox
attitude.text: Would it be preferable to argue for a fairer system whereby the unremarkable should be considered leadership material? With such an attitude, can we wonder why mediocrity is now a mark of Labour's hierarchy?

attitude.author: James Truslow Adams
attitude.text: Seek out that particular mental attribute which makes you feel most deeply and vitally alive, along with which comes the inner voice which says, 'This is the real me,' and when you have found that attitude, follow it.

attitude.author: S. Truett Cathy
attitude.text: I had to create some good work habits and attitude.

attitude.author: Clare Balding
attitude.text: Being made to feel like an irrelevant child was probably an asset. Benign negligence is not a bad parental attitude or at least a cross between a benevolent dictator and benign negligence - you should just let kids crack on with it.

attitude.author: Chuck Zito
attitude.text: I broke two knuckles in my right hand when I gave Jean-Claude Van Damme an attitude adjustment. I got nothing except a medical bill.

attitude.author: William Wyler
attitude.text: The trouble with Hollywood is that too many of the top people responsible for pictures are too comfortable and don't give a damn about what goes up on the screen so long as it gets by at the box office. How can you expect people with that kind of attitude to make the kind of great pictures that the world will want to see?

attitude.author: Jiah Khan
attitude.text: Sexy is attitude, but fitness for me is my dance. I dance two hours nearly every day. You break into good sweat, and it doesn't even feel like exercise. Apart from that, I enjoy Pilates.

attitude.author: Milos Raonic
attitude.text: Masculinity comes from your look, all the way down to your attitude. It's a big part of being a tennis player. Even though tennis is a fairly friendly sport, intimidation is still a big part of it.

attitude.author: Martin McDonagh
attitude.text: Though it may not seem like it, I never try to write about a place, per se; it's always, first and last, about story. Story is everything. Story and a bit of attitude.

attitude.author: Octavio Paz
attitude.text: The idea of modernity is beginning to lose its vitality. It is losing it because modernity is no longer a critical attitude but an accepted, codified convention.

attitude.author: Zig Ziglar
attitude.text: It will be disastrous when a leader or manager shows up with one attitude one day and treats people with a different attitude the next day.

attitude.author: Ian Mcewan
attitude.text: What reader wants to be told what attitude to strike?

attitude.author: Marcia Angell
attitude.text: There is something so biologically implausible that your attitude is going to cure a disease. There's a tremendous arrogance to imagine that your mind is all that powerful.

attitude.author: Walter Benjamin

attitude.author: Don Rickles
attitude.text: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude.

attitude.author: Sara Blakely
attitude.text: I failed the LSAT. Basically, if I had not failed, I'd have been a lawyer and there would be no Spanx. I think failure is nothing more than life's way of nudging you that you are off course. My attitude to failure is not attached to outcome, but in not trying. It is liberating.

attitude.author: Joel Edgerton
attitude.text: It's tricky. I've never been standing at the top of the tree with tons of money thrown at me. I've never really had a profile. So in a way I have this 'nothing to lose' attitude.

attitude.author: Freddy Adu
attitude.text: I just want to go in with the right attitude and from Day 1 make a difference.

attitude.author: Andrew Bogut
attitude.text: The American attitude is 'We're the best'. That's why the NBA guys who come from other countries, the Europeans, all sort of stick together away from the game.

attitude.author: Kate Bosworth
attitude.text: I just think that people take me a little more seriously as a brunette. I don't know if that's just because of a societal preconceived notion that all blondes are stupid, but it's a different kind of attitude.

attitude.author: Maurice Greene
attitude.text: You'd like more people to recognise what you do is special. But I take the attitude that the best thing I can do for my sport is to be the best at it. The best way people will come to recognise that track and field is a great sport is to see athletes excelling at it. Which is what I intend to do.

attitude.author: Etta James
attitude.text: Even as a little child, I've always had that comedian kind of attitude.

attitude.author: Roy Keane
attitude.text: I try and have a relaxed attitude and stay quite switched off until about an hour before kick-off.

attitude.author: Kathleen Hanna
attitude.text: Women didn't want to be on the stage with other women because they didn't want their bodies to be compared. They didn't want another female act opening for them because of this weird competitive and tokenistic attitude.

attitude.author: Nia Vardalos
attitude.text: What I wish I had, is that I wish I was a little more Greek, in that I wish I could lose my North American driven attitude and that I could be a little bit more poetic and laissez faire.

attitude.author: Parker Posey
attitude.text: My grandmother is this amazingly theatrical woman. She acted like a movie star, as far as looks and attitude, kind of like Susan Hayward.

attitude.author: Anne Hathaway
attitude.text: We assume that we've come so far as compassionate citizens of the world if we do choose to read the news, yet the attitude towards life can be one where we put blinders on and forget that there are civil wars going on. It's easy to forget that there are so many people starving to death every single day.

attitude.author: Jack Dee
attitude.text: The jokes are great but what really matters for a comedian is his performance, his whole attitude, and the laughs that he gets between the jokes rather than on top of the jokes.

attitude.author: Gary Locke
attitude.text: The U.S. tries to provide immigrants who grow up here with a world-class education and imbue them with the can-do attitude that has long defined American innovation.

attitude.author: Jack Kemp
attitude.text: Just as the left has to be more willing to question 'Government knows best,' the right has to rethink its laissez-faire attitude toward government.

attitude.author: Leon Panetta
attitude.text: Today, I think the attitude is that governing is not necessarily good politics, and the result is that it's much more partisan and much more divided.

attitude.author: Milan Kundera
attitude.text: The novelist teaches the reader to comprehend the world as a question. There is wisdom and tolerance in that attitude. In a world built on sacrosanct certainties the novel is dead.

attitude.author: Vera Wang
attitude.text: Design is about point of view, and there should be some sort of woman or lifestyle or attitude in one's head as a designer.

attitude.author: Nick Clegg
attitude.text: Liberalism is a really old British tradition and it has a completely different attitude towards the individual and the relationship between the individual and the state than the collectivist response of Labour, and particularly Old Labour, does.

attitude.author: Keith O'Brien
attitude.text: In Scotland over many years we have cultivated through our justice system what I hope can be described as a 'culture of compassion.' On the other hand, there still exists in many parts of the U.S., if not nationally, an attitude towards the concept of justice which can only be described as a 'culture of vengeance.'

attitude.author: Koo Stark
attitude.text: I was entirely natural and in many ways I have the same attitude now. I don't mourn the loss of my youth because I believe you should enjoy what you have while you have it.

attitude.author: Marlee Matlin
attitude.text: It was my father who instilled the 'never say no' attitude I carry around with me today, and who instilled in me a sense of wonder, always taking us on adventures in the car, never telling us the destination.

attitude.author: Michael Clarke Duncan
attitude.text: Whenever I'm having a bad day and have an attitude, I stay home. I keep it at home.

attitude.author: Aung San Suu Kyi
attitude.text: My attitude is, do as much as I can while I'm free. And if I'm arrested I'll still do as much as I can.

attitude.author: Carson Daly
attitude.text: I hope 'The Voice' has a fifteen-year run, don't get me wrong. But I come from nothing, and maybe it's the Irish in me, but my attitude is always like, 'They'll figure me out soon.'

attitude.author: Henry Louis Gates
attitude.text: We can revolutionize the attitude of inner city brown and black kids to learning. We need a civil rights movement within the African-American community.

attitude.author: Hollis Stacy
attitude.text: I think people feel threatened by homosexuality. The problem isn't about gay people, the problem is about the attitude towards gay people. People think that all gays are Hannibal Lecters. But gay people are sons and daughters, politicians and doctors, American heroes and daughters of American heroes.

attitude.author: Jack Dee
attitude.text: There were a few teachers who just did not like me because of my face. Once, I was told to stand in the corner until I cheered up. The attitude was, 'Oh, for God's sake, what's the matter with him?' But it's just a natural expression.

attitude.author: Jack Dee
attitude.text: I'm just part of a tradition of people who aren't pleased. I would never think anyone else who has the same attitude was getting it from me. I'd just think they're... sensible.

attitude.author: Vivienne Westwood
attitude.text: Britishness is just a way of putting things together and a certain don't care attitude about clothes. You don't care, you just do it and it looks great.

attitude.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
attitude.text: Today's youth are told to get rich or die trying and they really shouldn't take that attitude forward with them.

attitude.author: Ray Romano
attitude.text: Right after 'Raymond' I had a world-is-my-oyster attitude, but I found out I don't like oysters. I had this existential emptiness. 'What is my purpose? Who am I?' I had a big identity crisis.

attitude.author: Michael Haneke
attitude.text: Films for TV have to be much closer to the book, mainly because the objective with a TV movie that translates literature is to get the audience, after seeing this version, to pick up the book and read it themselves. My attitude is that TV can never really be any form of art, because it serves audience expectations.

attitude.author: Barbara Ehrenreich
attitude.text: If you can attribute your success entirely to your own mental effort, to your own attitude, to some spiritual essence that you have that is better than other people's, then that must feel pretty good.

attitude.author: Mark Wahlberg
attitude.text: And I tell you, having girls has made me a much better man. I have friends who are fathers, but they only have boys, and they have the same attitude toward women they always had, you know? And I don't play that... My girls, you mess with them? I will bury you underground.

attitude.author: Billy Corgan
attitude.text: Most of my arguments with musicians through the years have had more to do with their attitude about music, or their attitude about their own lives, or their personal responsibility. Music has never really been the big centerpiece of the fight.

attitude.author: Rob Zombie
attitude.text: But I think bands that rolled in with a big attitude, like they were some big deal, I just found that very strange.

attitude.author: Psy
attitude.text: Before 'Gangnam Style' I was not a good attitude artist.

attitude.author: Ariel Sharon
attitude.text: I cannot say that the attitude of the United Nations always is for the Israeli attitude. Israel, I think, has been under severe attacks by members of the United Nations many times.

attitude.author: Pauline Neville-Jones
attitude.text: When I first left university, I thought about going into the private sector. But I discovered when I went to interview that I could only have a career in the back office, or doing HR. The attitude was, 'My dear lady, you cannot possibly think about going on the board.'

attitude.author: Jessica Brown Findlay
attitude.text: I just really think every job I do, I get this gypsy attitude to money.

attitude.author: Dean Cain
attitude.text: My agent says that I'm a 'repeat business guy.' If you hire me to come do a movie, I'll be on time, know all my material, be ready to go, have a good attitude. I'm here to work, so I get hired over and over again by the same producers. If you just be a team player on set you can work so much more often.

attitude.author: Doug Flutie
attitude.text: Football is my profession now. I'm getting married in August... It's a new experience for me as someone just getting out of college. I still have the same attitude about football I always had. I play hard. I enjoy practice. I'd rather be throwing in passing drills than sitting around and watching TV.

attitude.author: Eddie Van Halen
attitude.text: On 'Van Halen,' I was a young punk, and everything revolved around the fastest kid in town, gunslinger attitude. But I'd say that at the time of 'Fair Warning,' I started concentrating more on songwriting. But I guess in most people's minds I'm just a gunslinger.

attitude.author: Gary Numan
attitude.text: I've always considered myself to be fiercely patriotic. I love Britain - its history and the down-to-earth attitude people have.

attitude.author: Diane Lane
attitude.text: I think fun is an important part of the entertainment industry, and it should be. Anybody who's not incorporating some of that into their work needs to take a break, go away, and have an attitude adjustment.

attitude.author: Robert Carlyle
attitude.text: In the late '70s, maybe just before I started, there was still an attitude that if you did film you didn't do TV and vice versa, but that's gone now.

attitude.author: Tomas Borge
attitude.text: Global political conditions make a direct American intervention difficult, but President Reagan's messianic and visceral attitude toward the Nicaraguan revolution could mean it will happen as an act of desperation.

attitude.author: Andy Cohen
attitude.text: I fell in love with Erica Kane the summer before my freshman year of high school. Like all red-blooded teen American boys, I'd come home from water polo practice and eat a box of Entenmann's Pop'Ems donut holes in front of the TV while obsessively fawning over 'All My Children' and Erica, her clothes, and her narcissistic attitude.

attitude.author: Joseph Kosinski
attitude.text: Listen, whatever makes the movie better. That's the attitude you have to have.

attitude.author: Lev Grossman
attitude.text: Becoming an author changes your attitude too. Once you see where books come from, and how they're made, they never seem quite as sacred again.

attitude.author: Charles Frazier
attitude.text: Hardboiled crime fiction came of age in 'Black Mask' magazine during the Twenties and Thirties. Writers like Dashiell Hammett and Raymond Chandler learnt their craft and developed a distinct literary style and attitude toward the modern world.

attitude.author: Youssou N'Dour
attitude.text: In the West, you have always associated the Islamic faith 100 percent with Arab culture. This in itself is a fundamentalist attitude and it is mistaken.

attitude.author: Francine Prose
attitude.text: I know a lot of Eastern Europeans, and because of what they have been through and what they have seen, they have an attitude where they are not easily fooled.

attitude.author: Malcolm Mclaren
attitude.text: I always said punk was an attitude. It was never about having a Mohican haircut or wearing a ripped T-shirt. It was all about destruction, and the creative potential within that.

attitude.author: Malcolm Mclaren
attitude.text: Sid Vicious began the age of participation in which everyone could be the artist. Sid proved that you don't have to play well to be the star. You can play badly, or not even at all. I endorsed that attitude. If you can't write songs, no problem - simply steal one and change it to your taste.

attitude.author: Michael Biehn
attitude.text: I saw 'Taxi Driver,' and 'Taxi Driver' kind of saved my life. The scene where Robert De Niro is looking at himself in the mirror saying, 'You talkin' to me? You talkin' to me? Who the hell else are you talkin' to?' That's the scene that changed my life by changing my attitude about acting.

attitude.author: Rob Sheffield
attitude.text: You can't beat the beehive for glam punkette attitude.

attitude.author: Julie Burchill
attitude.text: My second husband believed I had such a fickle attitude to friendship that each Friday he would update the list of my 'Top Ten' friends in the manner of a Top Of The Pops chart countdown.

attitude.author: Nicos Anastasiades
attitude.text: The attitude of the people proves that not only do we want to, but that we can succeed in pulling our country out of the difficult position it finds itself in. The banking system of our country will survive and grow.

attitude.author: Denise Mina
attitude.text: Even if people do wrong, we're social animals, so what can we do about stopping them doing the same things in future? Saying people are 'bad' or 'evil' is just an unwillingness to engage; an unwillingness to try to empathise. That sanctimonious attitude doesn't help anyone.

attitude.author: David Sanborn
attitude.text: In regard to music, I just think that it's always best to have an attitude of being a perpetual student and always look to learn something new about music, because there's always something new to learn.

attitude.author: Rufus Sewell
attitude.text: My feelings about my mortality are less selfish than they used to be. I used to affect a cavalier attitude to death; now I see it from my son's perspective.

attitude.author: Tionne Watkins
attitude.text: I had an attitude problem when I was a kid. I'm not gonna lie.

attitude.author: George Hamilton
attitude.text: While I put forth the suntan and the teeth and the cavalier attitude, I've survived under the worst of eras and times, and I've always had a good time doing it, because I never really took myself seriously, nor did I take life seriously because it is already terribly serious.

attitude.author: Iyanla Vanzant
attitude.text: Some of us pray demands. Some of us pray complaints. Some of us pray knowing, and some of us pray not knowing. But prayer is the attitude that you hold in your heart.

attitude.author: Michael Owen
attitude.text: If you're a goal scorer, you have to have a certain attitude. I'm very serious. My missus thinks I'm a bit weird. I'm cold, I don't have many emotions. It's very rare I cry.

attitude.author: Phife Dawg
attitude.text: I didn't really know what to expect, but I thought there aren't a lot of rap groups that can say they have a documentary done about them, so my attitude was like, 'Shoot, why not?' I'm sure there are a lot of people that would like to take our place. I felt like we should all embrace it.

attitude.author: Marian Keyes
attitude.text: Regardless of the gender of the highest wage earner, the balance of power in the relationship will suffer if the higher earner uses control of the purse strings as a system of reward and punishment. It will also suffer if the lower earner takes a chippy, haughty attitude to spending money they haven't actually generated themselves.

attitude.author: Tibor Fischer
attitude.text: It's true, some senior Hungarian writers are not known for their laughter. There is a strong Germanic influence - an attitude that if it's enjoyable it can't possibly be literature.

attitude.author: Tom Hodgkinson
attitude.text: What is required as we travel towards full unemployment is not new legislation but a gradual change of mental attitude, a shift in values. As our taste for idling grows, we will refuse to work for old-fashioned bosses who demand a five-day, 40-hour, nine-to-five type week, or worse.

attitude.author: Samuel R. Delany
attitude.text: I want to read about a character doing something fairly quiet where I can picture who the character is, and what their attitude towards the world is - which I'm a lot more interested in than what they do under the pressure of a gunfight.

attitude.author: Harvey Mackay
attitude.text: A smart manager will establish a culture of gratitude. Expand the appreciative attitude to suppliers, vendors, delivery people, and of course, customers.

attitude.author: Marina Abramovic
attitude.text: From the very early stage when I started doing performance art in the '70s, the general attitude - not just me, but also my colleagues - was that there should not be any documentation, that the performance itself is artwork and there should be no documentation.

attitude.author: Meg Rosoff
attitude.text: I've been fired five times for having a bad attitude.

attitude.author: Michel Houellebecq
attitude.text: You can't be a crazy rebel in the face of death, it's not a fitting attitude.

attitude.author: Malcolm X
attitude.text: America needs to understand Islam, because this is the one religion that erases from its society the race problem. Throughout my travels in the Muslim world, I have met, talked to, even eaten with people who in America would have been considered 'white,' but the 'white' attitude had been removed from their minds by the religion of Islam.

attitude.author: Max Stirner
attitude.text: Before the sacred, people lost all sense of power and all confidence; they occupy a powerless and humble attitude toward it. And yet no thing is sacred of itself, but by declaring it sacred, by my declaration, my judgment, my bending the knee; in short, by my - conscience.

attitude.author: Joe Greene
attitude.text: Donald Evans is a favorite person of mine. His worth ethic, his attitude and his dedication really set him apart.

attitude.author: Stacey Snider
attitude.text: For 'Fright Night,' we really want to convey the fun attitude of the movie and show the intensity of Colin Farrell as a predator. He's not a brooding vampire - he's dark and dangerous.

attitude.author: Rafael Moneo
attitude.text: I liked painting and drawing, and I liked humanities mainly - poetry, literature - this speculative attitude toward life.

attitude.author: Maurice Greene
attitude.text: You'd like more people to recognise what you do is special. But I take the attitude that the best thing I can do for my sport is to be the best at it. The best way people will come to recognise that track and field is a great sport is to see athletes excelling at it.

attitude.author: Moby
attitude.text: Many of my friends back in New York and elsewhere have a glib or dismissive attitude toward Los Angeles. It's a place of strip malls and traffic and not much else, in their opinion.

attitude.author: Frans de Waal
attitude.text: Experiments with animals have long been handicapped by our anthropocentric attitude: We often test them in ways that work fine with humans but not so well with other species.

attitude.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones
attitude.text: I grew up in a small, strictly-Catholic fishing village on the coast of Wales. The people there have a different attitude to life than those in Hollywood - people stick together more.

attitude.author: Heather Brooke
attitude.text: I trained as a journalist in America where paying sources is frowned upon. Now I work in the U.K. where there is a more flexible attitude.

attitude.author: Frank Welker
attitude.text: I like looking at the characters. Seeing them always brings up some voice or attitude. I am much more visual, and that works so much better than having someone tell me what the character is all about.

attitude.author: Jodhi May
attitude.text: People's attitude seems to be that if you don't have a television, you're not connected to reality - somehow you're not in reality. It's quite interesting, because I suspect that possibly it's the reverse.

attitude.author: Chris Jordan
attitude.text: I wasn't interested in politics. My attitude about it was, I can't make a difference no matter what I do. And the truth is, I don't even care enough to try.

attitude.author: Srikumar Rao
attitude.text: We have the ability to craft a life where we are completely fulfilled. We think it is dependent on outsiders, and to some extent it is, but it is much more dependent on the attitude we bring to life.

attitude.author: Emily Ratajkowski
attitude.text: I started modeling when I was - not older, but not 12. I have a mom who's a feminist - she's an English professor, an intellectual. She really gave me the equipment to understand that you can celebrate yourself without putting yourself down or needing to apologize for the way you look. I think that attitude is really crucial for a model.

attitude.author: Hope Solo
attitude.text: I have an attitude. It's what I do. I'm edgy. I have an attitude.

attitude.author: Joe Swanberg
attitude.text: I've done a lot of movies that don't have any music in them, and I've always sort of had a kind of wary attitude about music because it can be so manipulative, and also because with pop music, I feel like everybody kind of has their own relationship to songs.

attitude.author: Sophia Myles
attitude.text: I've spent a lot of time in L.A. and I love it. A lot of Brits can't stand the place, but I like the West Coast attitude and the way people celebrate success.

attitude.author: Nas
attitude.text: Man, me and Biggie were the biggest artists in New York. When he passed, I was so messed up. My attitude was messed up about him dying. There was an East-West thing back then, and I was in war mode.

attitude.author: Jessie J
attitude.text: My attitude goes back to my childhood. I used to audition for theatrical roles, and you can't stand out in a room full of ambitious eight-year-old girls by acting the wallflower. I realised then that I couldn't do things half-heartedly.

attitude.author: Sarah Parish
attitude.text: I'd love to look like my mum when I am her age. She taught ballet for years, and my attitude to exercise and fitness has definitely been influenced by her. She's 84 now, and I've watched how well she has aged, and a lot of that is to do with her fantastic posture.

attitude.author: Maria Bamford
attitude.text: I love festivals because they seem like more of an artsy, supportive attitude - which benefits a more theatrical performer sometimes with having theater and other non-club venues, as well as the audience being filled with other artists. It's nice to be with other comics, as usually at other road gigs, I'm solo for the most part.

attitude.author: Mario Van Peebles
attitude.text: If I or any other black can deliver at the box office, I'll get a lot of work. Too many young actors, regardless of their color, try to play an attitude on camera and fail to remember their job is to fit into an entertainment.

attitude.author: Vera Wang
attitude.text: Design is about point of view, and there should be some sort of woman or lifestyle or attitude in one's head as a designer. So my being able to reach the masses was something that meant a great deal to me - especially for women who could never wear Vera Wang.

attitude.author: Renzo Piano
attitude.text: In some way, people believe that if you are permeable, if you are a good listener, you don't have the quality of somebody with a firm attitude. This is what, fundamentally, I got from my mother.

attitude.author: Marianne Faithfull
attitude.text: There are so many myths out there about Marianne Faithfull, I had to, um, detach. But I can turn it on because Marianne Faithfull is really an attitude, you know.

attitude.author: Steve Howey
attitude.text: Getting into shape helped get me into a better mood, and when I'm in a better mood, I'm funnier. My general attitude is better.

attitude.author: Taylor Swift
attitude.text: I have so many indie bands on my iPod. What I don't really understand is the attitude that if a band is unknown, they're good, and if they get fans, then you move on to the next band.

attitude.author: Michael Moore
attitude.text: What really went wrong is that General Motors has had this philosophy from the beginning that what's good for General Motors is good for the country. So, their attitude was, 'We'll build it and you buy it. We'll tell you what to buy. You just buy it.'

attitude.author: Kerry King
attitude.text: I don't reflect much, unless I'm talking to the media. I have more of a 'Forward, march!' kind of attitude.

attitude.author: Jo Brand
attitude.text: My father was an engineer and my mother was a social worker, and they met as young socialists. That probably tells you everything you need to know about my attitude to money - I've never really been bothered about it.

attitude.author: Riteish Deshmukh
attitude.text: I think to take your shirt off, you need to have a great body and more than that, confidence and attitude. It's all related. A great body equals confidence, and confidence equals attitude. And when you put all three together, you get a Salman Khan! And that's not me.

attitude.author: Nadine Velazquez
attitude.text: I have a real taste for doing action roles. I starred in a movie called 'Blast,' which was my first action film, and I loved the fighting - I think I've got the build, the attitude and the look for it.

attitude.author: Wynton Marsalis
attitude.text: I'm not a person who writes really abstract things with oblique references. I look at abstraction like I look at condiments. Give me some Tabasco sauce, some ketchup, some mayonnaise. I love all of that. Put it on a trumpet. I've just got to have the ketchup and Tabasco sauce. That's my attitude about musical philosophy.

attitude.author: Caitlin Moran
attitude.text: The word 'spinster' tells you everything you need to know about our attitude of women who choose not to marry.

attitude.author: Grace Slick
attitude.text: There is an attitude that we should be able to have everything. No, you shouldn't be able to have anything. I'd like a helicopter, but I can't afford a helicopter, so I don't buy one. People are buying stuff they can't afford on credit. I bought my Ford hybrid with cash.

attitude.author: Vladimir Putin
attitude.text: If you want my personal attitude, I would tell you that I don't care about a person's sexual orientation.

attitude.author: Vladimir Putin
attitude.text: I have a very positive attitude to anyone who is protecting the environment, but it's inadmissible when people are using it as a means of promoting themselves, using it as a source of self-enrichment. I don't want to name any specific examples... but often, environmentalism is used to blackmail companies.

attitude.author: Johnny Vegas
attitude.text: From a certain age, I sort of accepted myself for what I was. And although to other people it was like nothing ever goes right, I had a really nice attitude that I'd inherited from my parents, and especially from my dad.

attitude.author: M.I.A.
attitude.text: At first, I found the music I was making really hard to find a home for. I felt like my attitude was really British, but not the actual sounds I was making. Back in 2003, when I made 'Galang,' there were no clubs that had an 'anything and everything' attitude.

attitude.author: Katrina Kaif
attitude.text: When you're walking at the airport, you're expected to smile at people because they know you... I find that tough. I'm only trying to protect myself. So I don't take my eyes off the floor. People can take that as attitude. But it's actually shyness. Yes, it is a bad habit. But it's a defense mechanism.

attitude.author: Melissa De Sousa
attitude.text: You have to have an attitude that nothing's gonna stop me. I think that's just my New York kind of attitude - survival of the fittest.

attitude.author: Carine Roitfeld
attitude.text: I am very surprised by someone like Alexander Wang. I am amazed how he is good with fashion, with business, with public relations himself, with an attitude in his clothes that is spoken immediately.

attitude.author: Carine Roitfeld
attitude.text: You lose attitude when you feel too comfortable, so I prefer to wear clothes that have a certain edge to them.

attitude.author: John Varvatos
attitude.text: A black suit can be classic and timeless and certainly for most occasions. But remember, it's not so much the color of suit as it is about the fit, cut, style, and, of course, attitude you have when wearing it.

attitude.author: Ricki-Lee Coulter
attitude.text: One day I looked in the mirror, and I wasn't happy. If you're not feeling good mentally, emotionally and physically, you're just a mess - and that's the point I felt like. It was a change in attitude and a shift in lifestyle. There's no crazy diet; I train six days a week, and I eat really well.

attitude.author: Ed Lee
attitude.text: What I learned with tech companies is I gotta give people room to experiment, and also to make what might later on be a mistake. This is the attitude I want to build within San Francisco - give some time to the tech community.

attitude.author: Miller Williams
attitude.text: For something to be useful to the spirit is not very valuable to get your covered wagon across the desert. We have adopted that attitude so thoroughly that any American father whose son tells him he wants to write poetry will be embarrassed.

attitude.author: Gerald Chertavian
attitude.text: You can learn what you want to learn through hard work. And a good employer will teach you what you want to learn as long as you show the right attitude and behaviors.

attitude.author: Henry Rollins
attitude.text: Everything I do, writing, touring, travelling, it all comes from the punk and hardcore attitude, from that expression - from being open to try things but relying on yourself, taking what you have into the battle and making of it what you will, hoping you can figure it out as you go. Make some sense of it.

attitude.author: Juliana Hatfield
attitude.text: From the beginning, I've always had a knack for catchy melodies. But I went through a period when I was trying to be rock n' roll and have a rock n' roll attitude. I was fighting my nature by trying to play really hard and sing really hard. But at a certain point, I realized that I loved syrupy pop music with tons of harmony.

attitude.author: Toni Servillo
attitude.text: Neapolitans are extremely empathetic, whereas the typical northern attitude is more about not showing or sharing your feelings.

attitude.author: Peter Abrahams
attitude.text: For me, personally, life in South Africa had come to an end. I had been lucky in some of the whites I had met. Meeting them had made a straight 'all-blacks-are-good, all-whites-are-bad' attitude impossible. But I had reached a point where the gestures of even my friends among the whites were suspect, so I had to go or be forever lost.

attitude.author: Max Stirner
attitude.text: Before the sacred, people lose all sense of power and all confidence; they occupy a powerless and humble attitude toward it. And yet no thing is sacred of itself, but by my declaring it sacred, by my declaration, my judgment, my bending the knee; in short, by my - conscience.

attitude.author: Michael Moss
attitude.text: It's not just a matter of poor willpower on the part of the consumer and a give-the-people-what-they-want attitude on the part of the food manufacturers. What I found, over four years of research and reporting, was a conscious effort... to get people hooked on foods that are convenient and inexpensive.

attitude.author: James E. Faust
attitude.text: What is worthy or unworthy on the Sabbath day will have to be judged by each of us by trying to be honest with the Lord. On the Sabbath day, we should do what we have to do and what we ought to do in an attitude of worshipfulness and then limit our other activities.

attitude.author: Andy Behrman
attitude.text: As no one knew much about my mental illness, a lot of people had the attitude that I had the capability to 'kick it' and get better instantly. This was the most frustrating attitude for me.

attitude.author: Shahid Kapoor
attitude.text: I am a Piscean, and they have a lovingly detached attitude towards life.

attitude.author: Sonakshi Sinha
attitude.text: There are actually no political aspirations. I think you need to have the right attitude and aptitude for it. I don't think I have the right aptitude for it. I think it is unfair to push somebody in that direction just because my father happens to be a politician.

attitude.author: Bella Thorne
attitude.text: I think the best advice came from Drew Barrymore, about always finding love in everything you do and keeping a positive attitude and being thankful.

attitude.author: Dolly Parton
attitude.text: I was born with a happy heart, and I try to keep a good attitude. It's not true that I'm happy all the time because nobody is, and we all go through our things.

attitude.author: Martin Jacques
attitude.text: After the Meiji restoration in 1868, Japan adopted an expansionist and colonial attitude towards its neighbours. It sought to identify itself with the West and looked down upon the Asian continent as backward and inferior. For most of the next 70 years, Japan was at war, mainly with its neighbours.

attitude.author: Els Borst
attitude.text: If I had been prime minister, I would have offered apologies to the Dutch Jewish community without hesitation. This would refer both to our government's attitude during the Second World War and to the very late postwar discovery that the restitution process had been poorly conceived.

attitude.author: Julie Klausner
attitude.text: I'm always excited when I make it on anyone's list - even if it's for affirmative action. My attitude is, 'Am I the token woman on this list? Because I'll take it.'

attitude.author: Tom Stoppard
attitude.text: If I had been asked to write 1,200 words for a newspaper tomorrow, on any subject, I would just do it rather than leave a white hole in the page. And I think it's a very healthy attitude to take to writing anything.

attitude.author: Debi Mazar
attitude.text: My mom had me at 16 and took me every place she went. I remember going on peace marches. She tried to take me to Woodstock - it was pouring rain. It was on my birthday, and I was crying so much in the car they turned the car around and dumped me at my grandmother's house... I had a little attitude.

attitude.author: Paul Hawken
attitude.text: It is possible for the assembly-line worker consigned to tightening the bolts on the transmission and the office worker who processes medical insurance claims to work with pride and efficiency, but it's not easy to maintain that attitude.

attitude.author: Bill Rancic
attitude.text: One by one, all of my college buddies had taken these nothing-special entry-level jobs, pushing papers for $18,000 or $21,000 a year (and hating the work besides), and I'd turn up my nose and tell them I wasn't about to get out of bed for anything less than $50,000. That was my line, my attitude.

attitude.author: Justin Tuck
attitude.text: Any time you have defensive ends going above you in the draft, when you know you put up numbers that were equal to better, you just have to use that as motivation. Whenever you're the underdog, you have to have the right attitude and just go out there and be yourself; just play.

attitude.author: Anthony Edwards
attitude.text: There are definitely roles within this industry that are industry-related, but to be a good actor, you really have to want to act first. At the same time, my goal was never to go to Hollywood to make movies. I think if you come here with that attitude, then you've missed a few steps.

attitude.author: Tony Stewart
attitude.text: I go into it with the attitude that I'm not going to look at my leg, and as soon as they get the wrapping off of it, I'm like, 'I've got to look.' It's like yelling at a dog going, 'Squirrel!' I cannot not look. And then I spend the rest of the time sitting there with a wet washcloth on my forehead trying to regain consciousness.

attitude.author: Theophilus London
attitude.text: I can pull off anything; I have the height and the attitude. The only thing I can't wear is a leotard, but I can wear anything else.

attitude.author: Wadah Khanfar
attitude.text: There is a very deep conviction in the heart of the people who work in al-Jazeera that if it changes its editorial line, it will very quickly lose its audience. Al-Jazeera has its own style; it has more than 3,500 employees, and I don't think anyone will have the attitude of changing it because they will lose.

attitude.author: Martin Rees
attitude.text: Given the scale of issues like global warming and epidemic disease, we shouldn't underestimate the importance of a can-do attitude to science rather than a can't-afford-it attitude.

attitude.author: Paul Tonko
attitude.text: As Americans, we have traditionally been the optimists sporting the 'can-do' attitude. But when it comes to addressing climate adaptation and resiliency, we seem to be more 'can't do' than 'can-do.'

attitude.author: Rebecca MacKinnon
attitude.text: There is clearly a constituency that appreciates the message that Google is sending, that it finds the Chinese government's attitude to the Internet and censorship unacceptable.

attitude.author: Ben Elliot
attitude.text: I have an issue with others ordering for me, and I spend far too long haranguing people that my choices are the best. I apologize for the amount of conversations I have ruined with this attitude.

attitude.author: Neneh Cherry
attitude.text: I'm quite a particular singer, and I need to feel like I can bite into the song, in a way, to make it my own. You want the challenge of the songs having some attitude.

attitude.author: Malcolm-Jamal Warner
attitude.text: People kind of have a misconception, because when someone calls me Theo and I correct them, say, 'No, my name is Malcolm,' they think I have an attitude about it and I don't want to be associated with the show.

attitude.author: Tristan MacManus
attitude.text: It can be easy to buy into anything. I would lose focus if I went with that attitude of wanting to be famous.

attitude.author: Ruth Prawer Jhabvala
attitude.text: First, I was so dazzled and besotted by India. People said the poverty was biblical, and I'm afraid that was my attitude, too. It's terribly easy to get used to someone else's poverty if you're living a middle-class life in it. But after a while, I saw it wasn't possible to accept it, and I also didn't want to.

attitude.author: Tom Wolfe
attitude.text: I can remember that on the shelves at home, there were these books by Thomas Wolfe. 'Look Homeward Angel' and 'Of Time and the River.' 'Of Time and the River' had just come out when I was aware of his name. My parents had a hard time convincing me that he was no kin whatsoever. My attitude was, 'Well, what's he doing on the shelf, then?'

attitude.author: Lisa Ann Walter
attitude.text: If wearing the Spanx helps you get looks, and you feel that energy and response, and you're rocking your body with confidence, that's still how you'll feel about yourself when you get home and take the Spanx off... If your attitude improves from the Spanx, wear the Spanx!

attitude.author: Jason Mraz
attitude.text: I think it's important and I think it's true that our life experience is going to be about our attitude, our thoughts, our beliefs, our speech and our actions. We can transform our life experience simply by changing our language.

attitude.author: Martha Beck
attitude.text: As a life coach, I love makeovers, from new clothes to surgery, pedicures to highlights. But redoing makes you feel better only if approached with the right attitude.

attitude.author: Kurt Busiek
attitude.text: You've got to leave the reader with more than just a name and a costume - they need to know who the character is, what they're like, what kind of attitude they have, what sort of role they play.

attitude.author: Tabatha Coffey
attitude.text: We have all met people that act 'old' or think a number makes them old, and I truly don't believe that is the case. If you have a good attitude toward aging, and you do what you can to live healthy and take care of yourself, I don't think the number matters.

attitude.author: Megan Hilty
attitude.text: I totally let myself indulge, but I make little deals with myself. If I have an extra cupcake, I'll run a couple of extra miles. I think it's all about balance and not getting into extremes with dieting and exercising. Having a healthy attitude is important, too!

attitude.author: Glen Duncan
attitude.text: Cheney, Rumsfeld - they were Shakespearean in their attitude of impunity.

attitude.author: Santiago Cabrera
attitude.text: I've never been in any country for more than four years, and I'm learning different languages all the time. It gives you a different attitude.

attitude.author: Susan Choi
attitude.text: I think 'Gatsby' is hobbled, in part, by its status as a Great American Novel. People kind of roll their eyes before they've even opened it, treat it with a 'been there, done that' attitude. I know I did. It took me years to re-open the novel and see how much I'd missed.

attitude.author: Mac DeMarco
attitude.text: I love Jonathan Richman - I love a lot of his music, and the thing I really like about him is his attitude. He seems very happy, and the way he performs is like, 'Don't worry, everybody, just get into it. I'm just having fun; I like when you guys are having fun.'

attitude.author: Rob Lowe
attitude.text: Some actors specialize in shooting weapons and punching people. Some have the market on playing buffoons cornered, others specialize in roles that require heavy makeup or outrageous wardrobe. Some trade exclusively in a post-ironic blase attitude.

attitude.author: Richie Allen
attitude.text: I'd like to get out of Philadelphia. I don't care for the people or their attitude, although they don't bother me or my play. But maybe the Phillies can get a couple of broken bats and shower shoes for me.

attitude.author: Rickie Fowler
attitude.text: It's great to be somewhat of a role model. I want to be a positive and good role model and lead by example and try to do the best I can. Playing good golf definitely draws attention, but I want to have a good attitude on the course and do the right things.

attitude.author: Todd Rundgren
attitude.text: Music is the way I understand how to communicate now, the way that I've learned how to communicate... but it will eventually have to go beyond that. You see, I've realised that music is not what keeps people involved - it's the attitude behind the music.

attitude.author: Andie MacDowell
attitude.text: I remember early on, in my very, very early days, I had a makeup artist tell me that I needed to get an attitude. I had no idea what he was talking about.

attitude.author: Eric Braeden
attitude.text: The directors I respect are the ones who have a collaborative attitude, who collaborate with actors.

attitude.author: Patricia Richardson
attitude.text: Part of the whole L.A. mentality that nothing really matters unless it's a success... is such a shallow and dangerous attitude to have.

attitude.author: Ted Cruz
attitude.text: The single biggest surprise about arriving to the Senate is the defeatist attitude here.

attitude.author: Jane Kaczmarek
attitude.text: I was never a glamour puss whose career was really based on a look or an attitude. I've been basically playing the same parts I am at 55 that I was at 35. I get cast as strong women, and that can be a mother or a judge or anything.

attitude.author: Robert Palmer
attitude.text: I'm not concerned that my stuff isn't extreme. I don't want to be heavy. I can't think of another attitude to have toward an audience than a hopeful and a positive one. And if that includes such unfashionable things as sentimentality, well, I can afford it.

attitude.author: Scott Turow
attitude.text: I trained as a writer before I became a lawyer. I was headed for a life as an English professor, but that just wasn't me. I'm not a scholar; I didn't have a scholar's attitude toward literature.

attitude.author: Michael Moriarty
attitude.text: I hate going to L.A. and dealing with the contempt people have for television and television actors. It's unbelievable the kind of attitude people take toward what is the most exciting medium we've got right now.

attitude.author: John Ortberg
attitude.text: Being deeply contented with God in my everyday life is a focused attitude. It is always available. It means practicing letting go of my obsession with how I'm doing. It means training myself to learn to actually be present with people, and seeking to love them.

attitude.author: John Ortberg
attitude.text: The most important criterion is this: hire someone whose character and humility and attitude you would like to have reproduced in your church and in yourself.

attitude.author: B. J. Daniels
attitude.text: I look at the NFL and see how the transition has gone at quarterback. I might be coming along at a good time. For me personally, this is about doing the same thing I've been doing at USF - just smile, have fun, enjoy the experience, keep a positive attitude and encourage my teammates. I like to feed off the people around me.

attitude.author: Alan Garner
attitude.text: My attitude is that if anybody of any age wants to read a book, let them, but I do think that no child would want to read 'Boneland.'

attitude.author: Ian Mckellen
attitude.text: I certainly don't disparage someone whose attitude towards their work is utterly different from mine - that's up to them.

attitude.author: Neal Asher
attitude.text: Gemmell's name guarantees a satisfying story and a thumping good read. I recommend all his heroic creations - 'Druss the axeman,' 'the Jerusalem man,' among others - but my favourite has to be 'Waylander': Clint Eastwood with a crossbow and the same 'Make my day, punk' attitude.

attitude.author: Karen Traviss
attitude.text: G.I. Joe has a heart and an attitude that feels right and familiar to me, so they could have ray guns, and they'd still feel more like real troops than many other franchises.

attitude.author: David Sanborn
attitude.text: In regard to music, I just think that it's always best to have an attitude of being a perpetual student and always look to learn something new about music, because there's always something new to learn.
