Don't dismiss something out of hand because you think it's either beneath you or outside of the realm of where your interests lie.

attitude.author: Ravi Teja
attitude.text: Audiences like me doing action and comedy. I am a jovial person and have been so from childhood. I like to laugh my way through my work, and that attitude reflects in my roles. Even women hate me doing rona-dhona roles. So I don't do emotional films.

attitude.author: Jennifer Armintrout
attitude.text: The attitude of, 'I will never self-publish,' coming from any author, indicates that they have never been in a position where it is their only option.

attitude.author: Jennifer Armintrout
attitude.text: When Jennifer Lawrence says it's 'dumb' to go hungry to make other people happy, she's saying it with the carefree attitude of a woman who probably will never have to make that choice to conform.

attitude.author: Al Jourgensen
attitude.text: I was stupid when I started: the epitome of bright-eyed and bushy-tailed. It was like, 'I get to live in L.A. and drive around in limos? Really?' I didn't realize I was owned. The more money gets pumped into you, the more you become a marionette. It made me a true redneck in attitude: I never wanted to wake up ever again feeling owned.

attitude.author: Chris Toumazou
attitude.text: The old university attitude of 'publish or perish' has changed. Students and academics are realising that institutions such as Imperial College are also wealth-generators. It is very satisfying to be in a university where you have the freedom to innovate and yet know that there is a path to translate your work into industry.

attitude.author: Mitch Kapor
attitude.text: Before I started a company, I was an employee with a bad attitude. I was always felt like, bosses are stupid, and people weren't well treated.

attitude.author: Peter Diamandis
attitude.text: Many have built their careers buttressing the status quo, reinforcing what they've already accomplished, and resisting the radical thinking that can topple their legacy - not exactly the attitude you want when trying to drive innovation forward.

attitude.author: Chris Gabrieli
attitude.text: I've spent enough time in the business community to know there are certain regulators who are very constructive in their approach - those who enforce the laws and who actually want to help you comply - and there are others who have a prosecutorial attitude.

attitude.author: Tom Lehman
attitude.text: I think that major championships are as much about attitude as they are anything else.

attitude.author: Leonard Susskind
attitude.text: Extra dimensional theories are sometimes considered science fiction with equations. I think that's a wrong attitude. I think extra dimensions are with us, they are with us to stay, and they entered physics a long time ago. They are not going to go away.

attitude.author: John Burdett
attitude.text: In essence, the Thai people are not materialistic at all. They're not in the least driven by the kind of ambition that drives us. The more I got to know them, and the more time I spent with them, the more I understood that this was a totally legitimate attitude to life, and why not?

attitude.author: Sebastian Thrun
attitude.text: I believe e-courses will eventually change people's attitude toward learning. Education will play an increasingly dominant role in people's lives. For people of all ages and all geographies.

attitude.author: Madison Smartt Bell
attitude.text: I have always had a mystical attitude toward inspiration. That's my nature.

attitude.author: Ashraf Barhom
attitude.text: There are many movies which come with an attitude of black and white. I am good and you are bad. And there are many movies that are also trying to see the reality as it is or to discover what really is behind the character or events.

attitude.author: Edie Campbell
attitude.text: Maybe the Burberry woman is undefinable! I think it's less about what she looks like and more about an attitude.

attitude.author: Roxane Gay
attitude.text: I think the world is ambivalent about feminism. So I can't blame college students. I think they're reflecting the greater culture's attitude toward feminism. So what I can do is, in ways that are appropriate, advocate for feminism and help the students learn what feminism is about.

attitude.author: Richard Flanagan
attitude.text: There's always been something deeply disturbing about the Abbott government's attitude to women.

attitude.author: Martin O'Malley
attitude.text: The attitude in Baltimore in 1999 was almost one of resignation, that our problems were bigger than our capacity to handle them.

attitude.author: E. F. Schumacher
attitude.text: Eagles come in all shapes and sizes, but you will recognize them chiefly by their attitudes.

attitude.author: Theodore Roosevelt
attitude.text: The reactionary is always willing to take a progressive attitude on any issue that is dead.

attitude.author: Meister Eckhart
attitude.text: When you are thwarted, it is your own attitude that is out of order.

attitude.author: Shaun White
attitude.text: Surfers have the most attitude.

attitude.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
attitude.text: You live in the image you have of the world. Every one of us lives in a different world, with different space and different time.

attitude.author: Teri Garr
attitude.text: If you get a diagnosis, get on a therapy, keep a good attitude and keep your sense of humor.

attitude.author: Candace Bushnell
attitude.text: The key to life is your attitude. Whether you're single or married or have kids or don't have kids, it's how you look at your life, what you make of it. It's about making the best of your life wherever you are in life.

attitude.author: Elizabeth Edwards
attitude.text: A positive attitude is not going to save you. What it's going to do is, everyday, between now and the day you die, whether that's a short time from now or a long time from now, that every day, you're going to actually live.

attitude.author: Joel Osteen
attitude.text: Keep a good attitude and do the right thing even when it's hard. When you do that you are passing the test. And God promises you your marked moments are on their way.

attitude.author: Jim Fowler
attitude.text: The biggest challenge is how to affect public attitudes and make people care.

attitude.author: William J. Brennan, Jr.
attitude.text: There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.

attitude.author: Edward Heath
attitude.text: Abhorrence of apartheid is a moral attitude, not a policy.

attitude.author: Irwin Shaw
attitude.text: My attitudes have changed, but somebody would have to read all my books to find out how they have.

attitude.author: William James
attitude.text: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome.

attitude.author: Marilu Henner
attitude.text: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.

attitude.author: Patrick Swayze
attitude.text: How do you nurture a positive attitude when all the statistics say you're a dead man? You go to work.

attitude.author: Damian Lewis
attitude.text: I've always had a 'Work hard, play hard' attitude to life - I still do - but sometimes you get involved in something that needs a calm, methodical approach.

attitude.author: Alfred Adler
attitude.text: It is one of the most effective attitudes of the neurotic to measure thumbs down, so to speak, a real person by an ideal, since in doing so he can depreciate him as much as he wishes.

attitude.author: Charles R. Swindoll
attitude.text: The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.

attitude.author: Earl Nightingale
attitude.text: Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us.

attitude.author: Doris Roberts
attitude.text: With my talent, I can make people laugh and give them another attitude about life. What a blessing that is for me.

attitude.author: Christian Louboutin
attitude.text: When a woman puts on a heel, she has a different posture, a different attitude. She really stands up and has a consciousness of her body.

attitude.author: David Byrne
attitude.text: Punk was defined by an attitude rather than a musical style.

attitude.author: John C. Maxwell
attitude.text: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.

attitude.author: Ai Weiwei
attitude.text: China and the U.S. are two societies with very different attitudes towards opinion and criticism. In China, I am constantly under surveillance. Even my slightest, most innocuous move can - and often is - censored by Chinese authorities.

attitude.author: Cliff Richard
attitude.text: But Jesus changes your attitude towards yourself and towards other people.

attitude.author: Zig Ziglar
attitude.text: You cannot tailor-make the situations in life but you can tailor-make the attitudes to fit those situations.

attitude.author: Pat Riley
attitude.text: Great effort springs naturally from great attitude.

attitude.author: Joyce Meyer
attitude.text: I'm only going to stand before God and give an account for my life, not for somebody else's life. If I have a bad attitude, then I need to say there's no point in me blaming you for what's wrong in my life.

attitude.author: Chevy Chase
attitude.text: I was always the guy getting kicked out of my classes at school for having an attitude problem.

attitude.author: Dolly Parton
attitude.text: Stop this attitude that older people ain't any good anymore! We're as good as we ever were - if we ever were any good.

attitude.author: Lady Gaga
attitude.text: Vanity can create a very cruel space for you if you don't know how to manage it.

attitude.author: Brian Tracy
attitude.text: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.

attitude.author: Bill Veeck
attitude.text: Every baseball crowd, like every theatre audience, has its own distinctive attitude and atmosphere.

attitude.author: Wade Boggs
attitude.text: Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but how we react to what happens, not by what life brings us but the attitude we bring to life.

attitude.author: Hermann Maier
attitude.text: As the time goes by, you change, your learn new things, your attitude is different. For the moment, I'm still enjoying ski racing so much that it would be difficult for me to think about ending my career.

attitude.author: Michael Jordan
attitude.text: I hope the millions of people I've touched have the optimism and desire to share their goals and hard work and persevere with a positive attitude.

attitude.author: Colin Powell
attitude.text: I think whether you're having setbacks or not, the role of a leader is to always display a winning attitude.

attitude.author: Dar Williams
attitude.text: If you're looking for can-do, earthy-crunchy attitude then you've got to go to Wisconsin.

attitude.author: Richard Branson
attitude.text: My general attitude to life is to enjoy every minute of every day. I never do anything with a feeling of, 'Oh God, I've got to do this today.'

attitude.author: Antony Sher
attitude.text: I have a Woody Allen Jewish attitude to life: that it's all going to be disastrous. That it hasn't all been that way is simply down to some random quirk of fate.

attitude.author: William James
attitude.text: Whenever you're in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude.

attitude.author: Brit Hume
attitude.text: There's a certain elitism that has crept into the attitudes of some in journalism, and it played out perfectly over the issue of these little American flag lapel pins.

attitude.author: Norman Vincent Peale
attitude.text: When you pray for anyone you tend to modify your personal attitude toward him.

attitude.author: Flip Wilson
attitude.text: Funny is an attitude.

attitude.author: Sidney Sheldon
attitude.text: I always spend time exploring the customs and attitudes of the countries I'm using for locations, and interviewing the people who live there. I've visited over 90 countries thus far.

attitude.author: Joyce Meyer
attitude.text: Individuals need to be willing to face truth about their attitudes, behaviors, even what we want out of life.

attitude.author: Heather O'Reilly
attitude.text: Coaches will eventually notice a great attitude, and they respect that.

attitude.author: Todd Tiahrt
attitude.text: I am shocked by the easy attitude of many in the media towards disclosing our Nation's secrets.

attitude.author: Maya Angelou
attitude.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.

attitude.author: Shawn Ashmore
attitude.text: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.

attitude.author: Amisha Patel
attitude.text: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.

attitude.author: Scott Hamilton
attitude.text: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.

attitude.author: Pat Riley
attitude.text: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.

attitude.author: Allen Klein
attitude.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.

attitude.author: Will Hurd
attitude.text: Life is hard. Life is difficult. Life is going to punch you in the gut. But when you change your attitude, you change your behavior. When your behavior changes, so do your results.

attitude.author: Sterling K. Brown
attitude.text: Always have an attitude of gratitude.

attitude.author: Mya
attitude.text: Positive energy and attitude is sexy to me.

attitude.author: Harold S. Geneen
attitude.text: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.

attitude.author: Jonny Kim
attitude.text: If I could talk to my younger self, I would just say that the path to great things is filled with a lot of stumbles, suffering, and challenges along the way. But if you have the right attitude and know that hard times will pass - and you get up each time - you will reach your destination.

attitude.author: Oprah Winfrey
attitude.text: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.

attitude.author: Joe Jamail
attitude.text: Your attitude will go a long way in determining your success, your recognition, your reputation and your enjoyment in being a lawyer.

attitude.author: Dalai Lama
attitude.text: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.

attitude.author: Dwayne Johnson
attitude.text: Attitude and enthusiasm play a big part in my life. I get excited about the things that inspire me. I also believe in laughing and having a good time.

attitude.author: Tommy Tuberville
attitude.text: Positive attitude plus effort equals performance.

attitude.author: Tom Stoppard
attitude.text: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.

attitude.author: Paul J. Meyer
attitude.text: When you view your world with an attitude of gratitude, you are training yourself to focus on the good in life.

attitude.author: Elie Wiesel
attitude.text: When a person doesn't have gratitude, something is missing in his or her humanity. A person can almost be defined by his or her attitude toward gratitude.

attitude.author: Paul Walker
attitude.text: Attitude is attitude, whether you're a West Coast gangster or East Coast gangster, you know?

attitude.author: Sam Houston
attitude.text: We now occupy the proud attitude of a sovereign and independent Republic, which will impose upon us the obligation of evincing to the world that we are worthy to be free. This will only be accomplished by wise legislation, the maintenance of our integrity, and the faithful and just redemption of our plighted faith wherever it has been pledged.

attitude.author: Paulo Coelho
attitude.text: Everybody is a political person, whether you say something or you are silent. A political attitude is not whether you go to parliament; it's how you deal with your life, with your surroundings.

attitude.author: Denis Waitley
attitude.text: The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.

attitude.author: Dale Carnegie
attitude.text: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

attitude.author: Duke Ellington
attitude.text: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never.

attitude.author: B. R. Ambedkar
attitude.text: Democracy is not merely a form of government. It is primarily a mode of associated living, of conjoint communicated experience. It is essentially an attitude of respect and reverence towards fellow men.

attitude.author: Patricia Neal
attitude.text: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.

attitude.author: Adriana Lima
attitude.text: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.

attitude.author: Amy Morin
attitude.text: Spending time with negative people can be the fastest way to ruin a good mood. Their pessimistic outlooks and gloomy attitude can decrease our motivation and change the way we feel. But allowing a negative person to dictate your emotions gives them too much power in your life. Make a conscious effort to choose your attitude.

attitude.author: Joan Lunden
attitude.text: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.

attitude.author: DeMarcus Cousins
attitude.text: You can call it what you want: bad attitude, immature. You can say, 'He's a thug.' But I'm a competitor.

attitude.author: Brit Hume
attitude.text: Fairness is not an attitude. It's a professional skill that must be developed and exercised.

attitude.author: Giovani Dos Santos
attitude.text: Things don't always go your way in football: there are always good and bad times. At the end of the day, you have to have a positive attitude and a strong mentality and not let any setbacks get you down. And that's what I've done - I've tried to keep my composure, even when things aren't going the way I'd like.

attitude.author: Steven Biko
attitude.text: Being black is not a matter of pigmentation - being black is a reflection of a mental attitude.

attitude.author: Ali Krieger
attitude.text: You can control two things: your work ethic and your attitude about anything.

attitude.author: Jennifer Hyman
attitude.text: I think that life is difficult. People have challenges. Family members get sick, people get older, you don't always get the job or the promotion that you want. You have conflicts in your life. And really, life is about your resilience and your ability to go through your life and all of the ups and downs with a positive attitude.

attitude.author: Richard P. Feynman
attitude.text: I thought one should have the attitude of 'What do you care what other people think!'

attitude.author: Kurt Cobain
attitude.text: There's nothing better than having a baby. I've always loved children. I used to work summers at the YMCA and be in charge of, like, 30 preschool kids. I knew that when I had a child, I'd be overwhelmed, and it's true... I can't tell you how much my attitude has changed since we've got Frances. Holding my baby is the best drug in the world.

attitude.author: Donna Karan
attitude.text: Age and size are only numbers. It's the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference.

attitude.author: Milan Kundera
attitude.text: Mankind's true moral test, its fundamental test (which lies deeply buried from view), consists of its attitude towards those who are at its mercy: animals. And in this respect mankind has suffered a fundamental debacle, a debacle so fundamental that all others stem from it.

attitude.author: Orison Swett Marden
attitude.text: It is the hopeful, buoyant, cheerful attitude of mind that wins. Optimism is a success builder; pessimism an achievement killer.

attitude.author: Agatha Christie
attitude.text: Crime is terribly revealing. Try and vary your methods as you will, your tastes, your habits, your attitude of mind, and your soul is revealed by your actions.

attitude.author: Marilyn Monroe
attitude.text: Sometimes, wearing a scarf and a polo coat and no makeup and with a certain attitude of walking, I go shopping or just look at people living. But then, you know, there will be a few teenagers who are kind of sharp, and they'll say, 'Hey, just a minute. You know who I think that is?' And they'll start tailing me. And I don't mind.

attitude.author: Jason Bateman
attitude.text: People have often asked if I'm gay because I don't go out of my way to spit and scratch and give people attitude.

attitude.author: Jeff Bezos
attitude.text: The special ops guys and the firefighters around the world have this great phrase. They say, 'Slow is smooth, and smooth is fast,' and that is true. Everything I've accomplished in my life has been because of that attitude.

attitude.author: Eddie Vedder
attitude.text: I think music is the greatest art form that exists, and I think people listen to music for different reasons, and it serves different purposes. Some of it is background music, and some of it is things that might affect a person's day, if not their life, or change an attitude. The best songs are the ones that make you feel something.

attitude.author: Ed Reed
attitude.text: Everyone has their own greatness. Whether you reach your own greatness depends on your environment, your structure, the company you keep and your attitude.

attitude.author: Christopher Hitchens
attitude.text: Solidarity is an attitude of resistance, I suppose, or it should be.

attitude.author: Amy Adams
attitude.text: I think a lot of times we don't pay enough attention to people with a positive attitude because we assume they are naive or stupid or unschooled.

attitude.author: George Blanda
attitude.text: It takes hard work, dedication, discipline and a positive attitude to get to the top - in business or in sports.

attitude.author: Jim Kelly
attitude.text: Never walk into a hospital crying. Have an attitude that you will make someone else's life better.

attitude.author: Richard Branson
attitude.text: My attitude has always been, if you fall flat on your face, at least you're moving forward. All you have to do is get back up and try again.

attitude.author: Virat Kohli
attitude.text: A fit body gives you confidence. And there's nothing more impressive than a great attitude, which you can wear on your sleeve. But you'll have to remember the difference between being rude and being confident.

attitude.author: Billy Idol
attitude.text: I don't think punk ever really dies, because punk rock attitude can never die.

attitude.author: W. Edwards Deming
attitude.text: The prevailing - and foolish - attitude is that a good manager can be a good manager anywhere, with no special knowledge of the production process he's managing. A man with a financial background may know nothing about manufacturing shoes or cars, but he's put in charge anyway.

attitude.author: Donald Johanson
attitude.text: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.

attitude.author: Dolly Parton
attitude.text: I walk tall; I got a tall attitude.

attitude.author: Umberto Eco
attitude.text: Religion has nothing to do with God. It's a fundamental attitude of human beings, who ask about the origins of life and what happens after death. For many, the answer is a personal god. In my opinion, it's religion that produces God, not the other way round.

attitude.author: Stefon Diggs
attitude.text: Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better.

attitude.author: Jon Jones
attitude.text: I believe I have the attitude of a champion and a winner, and I'm not apologetic for it.

attitude.author: Jesse Jackson
attitude.text: Today's students can put dope in their veins or hope in their brains. If they can conceive it and believe it, they can achieve it. They must know it is not their aptitude but their attitude that will determine their altitude.

attitude.author: Joyce Meyer
attitude.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.

attitude.author: Tom Brady
attitude.text: A lot of times I find that people who are blessed with the most talent don't ever develop that attitude, and the ones who aren't blessed in that way are the most competitive and have the biggest heart.

attitude.author: Jinder Mahal
attitude.text: Mentally, you can't expect positive things to start happening in your life with a negative attitude.

attitude.author: Greg Hardy
attitude.text: I've got a bad attitude.

attitude.author: Kyle Korver
attitude.text: It hasn't always been easy. There's a lot of hard moments. Sometimes you learn from the end of the bench. Sometimes you learn from injuries. Sometimes you learn the most through the hard things. If you can keep a good attitude and keep on working, eventually situations change, and you can put those things to use.

attitude.author: Sergio Ramos
attitude.text: We need the right attitude and the right motivation - that can decide the match above everything else.

attitude.author: Victor Hugo
attitude.text: Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees.

attitude.author: Gerald Chertavian
attitude.text: The ABC's are attitude, behavior and communication skills.

attitude.author: Karan Patel
attitude.text: I don't go by or change my attitude based on what people say. At the end of the day, they, too, are judging me from their perspective. I would rather be myself and let people accept me for what I am than be somebody who I am not, just because I want people's approval.

attitude.author: James Marsden
attitude.text: If you have fun and keep a good attitude, people want to work with you.

attitude.author: Aung San Suu Kyi
attitude.text: My attitude to peace is rather based on the Burmese definition of peace - it really means removing all the negative factors that destroy peace in this world. So peace does not mean just putting an end to violence or to war, but to all other factors that threaten peace, such as discrimination, such as inequality, poverty.

attitude.author: John Kennedy
attitude.text: I don't want to impugn the motives of my colleagues, but my attitude is, speaking just for me, you either believe in border security or you don't.

attitude.author: Karl Popper
attitude.text: No rational argument will have a rational effect on a man who does not want to adopt a rational attitude.

attitude.author: Gong Hyo-jin
attitude.text: Many big and small things happen in our lives, almost on daily basis, and I hope that everyone would not lose the trust that they have in themselves, and never lose positive attitude.

attitude.author: Richard M. DeVos
attitude.text: A positive atmosphere nurtures a positive attitude, which is required to take positive action.

attitude.author: Gail Porter
attitude.text: So long as you've got your friends about you, and a good positive attitude, you don't really have to care what everyone else thinks.

attitude.author: Seamus Heaney
attitude.text: At home in Ireland, there's a habit of avoidance, an ironical attitude towards the authority figure.

attitude.author: Lisa
attitude.text: To me, beauty is confidence. I think beauty comes from one's confident inner self and attitude. Make-up and styling are the cherries on top of your beautiful inner-self!

attitude.author: Stephen Moyer
attitude.text: Vampires are so old that they don't need to impress anyone anymore. They're comfortable in their own skin. It's this enigmatic strength that's very romantic and old-fashioned. I think it goes back to something of a Victorian attitude of finding a strong man who's going to look after his woman.

attitude.author: David Green
attitude.text: You need an attitude of service. You're not just serving yourself. You help others to grow up and you grow with them.

attitude.author: Steve Prefontaine
attitude.text: I have a positive mental attitude, and I think I'm divine, but I also think it takes a heck of a lot of blood, sweat and tears.

attitude.author: Octavio Paz
attitude.text: A society is defined as much by how it comes to terms with its past as by its attitude toward the future: its memories are no less revealing than its aims.

attitude.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
attitude.text: The purely agitational attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject.

attitude.author: Jenova Chen
attitude.text: Creativity is not talent but attitude.

attitude.author: Charles Revson
attitude.text: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.

attitude.author: Sania Mirza
attitude.text: Everyone has attitude, and I think everyone should have attitude. But I know I have attitude, but that's just, I think if you don't have attitude, it comes only with self confidence. So if you don't have self confidence, you won't have attitude, and I think there's a difference when you have attitude and when you have arrogance.

attitude.author: Magic Johnson
attitude.text: If somebody says no to you, or if you get cut, Michael Jordan was cut his first year, but he came back and he was the best ever. That is what you have to have. The attitude that I'm going to show everybody, I'm going to work hard to get better and better.

attitude.author: Maeve Binchy
attitude.text: Happiness is in our own hearts. I have no regrets of anything in the past. I'm totally cheerful and happy, and I think that a lot of your attitude is not in the circumstances you find yourself in, but in the circumstances you make for yourself.

attitude.author: W. Bruce Cameron
attitude.text: When we adopt a dog or any pet, we know it is going to end with us having to say goodbye, but we still do it. And we do it for a very good reason: They bring so much joy and optimism and happiness. They attack every moment of every day with that attitude.

attitude.author: Abhinav Bindra
attitude.text: My life's attitude is simple: 'Make the best of what you have got. And move to the next. Thank God for what is coming my way and enjoy it completely.'

attitude.author: Damon Dash
attitude.text: My delivery can be intense, but it's intense because I need to be heard. I know that people don't usually listen, as it relates to constructive criticism, without getting offended. So, I speak my mind with an attitude that I don't care if you get offended; I just want you to get the message.

attitude.author: Alan Mulally
attitude.text: You need to have a can-do attitude. There is always a way.

attitude.author: Yelena Baturina
attitude.text: I demand a lot from myself and reflect this attitude upon others: I consider it to be an important quality for a leader. I also think it is impossible to achieve success without persistence.

attitude.author: Jochen Zeitz
attitude.text: We should bring in an environmental attitude, and I think luxury should automatically be about sustainability and quality.

attitude.author: Bikram Choudhury
attitude.text: Negative attitude is nine times more powerful than positive attitude.

attitude.author: Miranda Kerr
attitude.text: When I pray, I always thank Mother Nature for all the beauty in the world. It's about having an attitude of gratitude.

attitude.author: Marilyn Ferguson
attitude.text: Achievers have an enabling attitude, realism, and a conviction that they themselves were the laboratory of innovation. Their ability to change themselves is central to their success. They have learned to conserve their energy by minimizing the time spent in regret or complaint. Every event is a lesson to them, every person a teacher.

attitude.author: Katherine Mansfield
attitude.text: Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different.

attitude.author: Rose Namajunas
attitude.text: You just keep a positive attitude no matter what comes in your way - challenges, roadblocks - don't let it faze you, and you can overcome anything.

attitude.author: Herm Edwards
attitude.text: I've always said that your attitude is your best friend and your worst enemy.

attitude.author: Wim Hof
attitude.text: Over time, we as humans have developed a different attitude towards nature and we've forgotten about our inner power.

attitude.author: Kevin Owens
attitude.text: I know Jim Cornette says the reason that I'm successful now is because I changed my attitude, and I must be listening to what people tell me now, and I used to not listen to him. But the thing is, I used to not listen to him or question his methods because I didn't agree with him, and I didn't share his vision.

attitude.author: Donald Knuth
attitude.text: Let us change our traditional attitude to the construction of programs. Instead of imagining that our main task is to instruct a computer what to do, let us concentrate rather on explaining to human beings what we want a computer to do.

attitude.author: Bethany Hamilton
attitude.text: Whatever your situation might be, set your mind to whatever you want to do and put a good attitude in it, and I believe that you can succeed. You are not going to get anywhere just sitting on your butt and moping around.

attitude.author: Ben Carson
attitude.text: We live in a country that used to have a can-do attitude, and now we have a 'what-can-you-do-for-me?' attitude, and what I try to do is find ways that we can develop common ground.

attitude.author: Eliza Dushku
attitude.text: There is definitely something sexy about a girl with an attitude and a pair of leather pants.

attitude.author: Mitchell Trubisky
attitude.text: Control what you can control. I can control my emotions, my attitude, my effort every day.

attitude.author: Michael Ramsey
attitude.text: Reason is an action of the mind; knowledge is a possession of the mind; but faith is an attitude of the person. It means you are prepared to stake yourself on something being so.

attitude.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee
attitude.text: In a spiritual sense, a positive attitude may help you get through chemotherapy and surgery and radiation and what have you. But a positive mental attitude does not cure cancer - any more than a negative mental attitude causes cancer.

attitude.author: Mohit Raina
attitude.text: A person should have positive attitude in his life and it will thus reflect on a healthy lifestyle.

attitude.author: Joyce Meyer
attitude.text: Watch out for the joy-stealers: gossip, criticism, complaining, faultfinding, and a negative, judgmental attitude.

attitude.author: Theodor Herzl
attitude.text: It goes without saying that the Jewish people can have no other goal than Palestine and that, whatever the fate of the proposition may be, our attitude toward the land of our fathers is and shall remain unchangeable.

attitude.author: Karl Lagerfeld
attitude.text: When I was a child I asked my mother what homosexuality was about and she said - and this was 100 years ago in Germany and she was very open-minded - 'It's like hair color. It's nothing. Some people are blond and some people have dark hair. It's not a subject.' This was a very healthy attitude.

attitude.author: Safra A. Catz
attitude.text: I like to say it's an attitude of not just thinking outside the box, but not even seeing the box.

attitude.author: Yani Tseng
attitude.text: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.

attitude.author: John McCarthy
attitude.text: If a person can be said to have the wrong attitude, there is no need to pay attention to his arguments.

attitude.author: Kgalema Motlanthe
attitude.text: I have a political attitude, but I'm certainly not a politician.

attitude.author: Stuart Chase
attitude.text: Attitude is your acceptance of the natural laws, or your rejection of the natural laws.

attitude.author: Carroll Shelby
attitude.text: I'm not going to take this defeatist attitude and listen to all this crap any more from all these people who have nothing except doomsday to predict.

attitude.author: Marjory Stoneman Douglas
attitude.text: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind.

attitude.author: Paul Valery
attitude.text: Our judgments judge us, and nothing reveals us, exposes our weaknesses, more ingeniously than the attitude of pronouncing upon our fellows.

attitude.author: Buddy Valastro
attitude.text: No matter what the recipe, any baker can do wonders in the kitchen with some good ingredients and an upbeat attitude!

attitude.author: Tulsi Gabbard
attitude.text: When a person thinks, I am a Christian, this other person is a Muslim, therefore he is my enemy, or I am a Muslim, this other person is a Hindu, therefore she is my enemy, they reveal their own lack of spiritual depth. No religion teaches this, and any understanding of any religion that adopts this divisive attitude proves itself false by doing so.

attitude.author: Imelda Staunton
attitude.text: Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.

attitude.author: Rush Limbaugh
attitude.text: The attitude of the Democrat Party is that wherever there are Republicans they are so bad, they are so discriminatory, they are so racist, they're so bigoted, they're just such reprobates that we can't afford to let them have any say whatsoever in what's happening.

attitude.author: Natalie Massenet
attitude.text: Always go into meetings or negotiations with a positive attitude. Tell yourself you're going to make this the best deal for all parties.

attitude.author: Ivan Illich
attitude.text: The compulsion to do good is an innate American trait. Only North Americans seem to believe that they always should, may, and actually can choose somebody with whom to share their blessings. Ultimately this attitude leads to bombing people into the acceptance of gifts.

attitude.author: Rick Pitino
attitude.text: Tackle the difficult things first in the morning; make changes in the way you network. Treat everyone with respect and dignity. This stops you from cynicism and negativity. End your day with that same attitude you started. Renew your contract with a day well completed.

attitude.author: Esme Creed-Miles
attitude.text: Now I'm strong: I can run fast, I can lift weights, and that in itself is quite empowering, to have that physical strength. It changes my whole mental attitude.

attitude.author: Jim Mattis
attitude.text: For whatever trauma came with service in tough circumstances, we should take what we learned - take our post-traumatic growth - and, like past generations coming home, bring our sharpened strengths to bear, bring our attitude of gratitude to bear.

attitude.author: Christina Applegate
attitude.text: I guess I've kind of had an attitude my whole life.

attitude.author: Christian Bale
attitude.text: I have this theory that, depending on your attitude, your life doesn't have to become this ridiculous charade that it seems so many people end up living.

attitude.author: Twiggy
attitude.text: I don't like it when people say, 'You're 45, so you should be wearing X and never Y.' For me, dressing is about attitude, not age.

attitude.author: Rihanna
attitude.text: More than anything, I like a jacket. You can do anything with a great jacket, the bigger the better. You can have any silhouette underneath. It gives you an attitude. It makes a gown look cool.

attitude.author: Eartha Kitt
attitude.text: A lot can be said with just a look, or the way the body moves. Each song is a different character. So each song takes on a different movement of the body. And the body has to go with the subject and the attitude that you have toward that subject.

attitude.author: Herb Kelleher
attitude.text: We will hire someone with less experience, less education, and less expertise than someone who has more of those things and has a rotten attitude. Because we can train people. We can teach people how to lead. We can teach people how to provide customer service. But we can't change their DNA.

attitude.author: Morris Raphael Cohen
attitude.text: Liberalism is an attitude rather than a set of dogmas - an attitude that insists upon questioning all plausible and self-evident propositions, seeking not to reject them but to find out what evidence there is to support them rather than their possible alternatives.

attitude.author: Quentin Bryce
attitude.text: Livelihoods and whole communities throughout the Murray-Darling Basin have been imperilled by the workings of drought, fire, flood, acid mud and human action over many decades. In the rescues and the cleanups and the long hauls, I see the same attitude over and again. People just rally and get on with it.

attitude.author: Jim Dine
attitude.text: My attitude towards drawing is not necessarily about drawing. It's about making the best kind of image I can make, it's about talking as clearly as I can.

attitude.author: Adore Delano
attitude.text: I think I'm versatile. I take good critique, I have a positive attitude, and I am I'm not delusional.

attitude.author: Pat Morita
attitude.text: I still have a young attitude.

attitude.author: Laurie Hernandez
attitude.text: I want to make sure I always show off my smile and have a positive attitude the whole time, whether it's during a performance, practice, or doing an interview.

attitude.author: Rebel Wilson
attitude.text: Even when I'm playing someone named 'Fat Amy.' I'm all about confidence and attitude.

attitude.author: Joel Osteen
attitude.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.

attitude.author: Jim Harbaugh
attitude.text: Have an attitude of gratitude.

attitude.author: Ellen G. White
attitude.text: A minister of Jesus Christ should not be regardless of his attitude. If he is the representative of Jesus Christ, his deportment, his attitude, his gestures, should be of that character which will not strike the beholder with disgust.

attitude.author: Clarence Thomas
attitude.text: My grandfather was a man, when he talked about freedom, his attitude was really interesting. His view was that you had obligations or you had responsibilities, and when you fulfilled those obligations or responsibilities, that then gave you the liberty to do other things.

attitude.author: Cody Garbrandt
attitude.text: We never quit. My mom instilled that attitude in us, that never quit, never surrender.

attitude.author: Son Heung-min
attitude.text: In every country I've gone to, if you smile at people, they are going to be happy. This is my attitude.

attitude.author: Freja Beha Erichsen
attitude.text: You can pull off anything if you have the right attitude. Being cool is whatever you think it is. Own your style.

attitude.author: Andrew Whitworth
attitude.text: No matter what job you have, you're in control of your attitude. That, to me, is my biggest focus every day - being on the energy bus.

attitude.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
attitude.text: Meekness implies a spirit of gratitude as opposed to an attitude of self-sufficiency, an acknowledgement of a greater power beyond oneself, a recognition of God, and an acceptance of his commandments.

attitude.author: Pim Fortuyn
attitude.text: Muslims have a very bad attitude to homosexuality, they're very intolerant.

attitude.author: Glenn Danzig
attitude.text: I was bringing my attitude as a regular person 'cause this is my attitude.

attitude.author: Neil Peart
attitude.text: To get nostalgic about other people's music, or even about your own, makes a terrible statement about the condition of your life and your prospects for the future. I have no patience with that kind of attitude, whether it's on radio or among friends.

attitude.author: Geddy Lee
attitude.text: I have such an extreme attitude about work, where I can just completely be derelict of my responsibilities and then when I am not derelict, I am completely indulged in it. I swing pretty wildly from the two extremes.

attitude.author: Joyce Meyer
attitude.text: Reproach is shame, blame, disgrace, disapproval and a disrespectful attitude toward yourself. When you're under reproach, your behavior shows it.

attitude.author: Marie Osmond
attitude.text: You can do everything you can to try to stop bad things from happening to you, but eventually things will happen, so the best prevention is a positive attitude.

attitude.author: George Wallace
attitude.text: It seems that other parts of the world ought to be concerned about what we think of them instead of what they think of us. After all, we're feeding most of them, and whenever they start rejecting 25 cents of each dollar of foreign aid money that we send to them, then I'll be concerned about their attitude toward us.

attitude.author: Pope Francis
attitude.text: There is a need for financial reform along ethical lines that would produce in its turn an economic reform to benefit everyone. This would nevertheless require a courageous change of attitude on the part of political leaders.

attitude.author: Gordon Gould
attitude.text: That attitude does not exist so much today, but in those days there was a very sharp distinction between basic physics and applied physics. Columbia did not deal with applied physics.

attitude.author: Christie Brinkley
attitude.text: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.

attitude.author: Trent Reznor
attitude.text: The idea of politics is just so uninteresting to me - I've never paid much attention to it. I don't believe things can really change. It doesn't matter who's president. Nothing really gets resolved. I don't know. I guess that's not the right attitude to take.

attitude.author: Joey Ramone
attitude.text: All punk is is attitude. That's what makes it. The attitude.

attitude.author: Martina Navratilova
attitude.text: Life is about challenges and how we face up to them and the attitude we take into every day life so hopefully we'll be able to motivate people to do more with their life.

attitude.author: Shilpa Shetty
attitude.text: I was always spiritual, even as a child. I was taught to pray, show gratitude. We had an attitude of gratitude. Even if life was ugly, bad or sad - we prayed.

attitude.author: Adam Savage
attitude.text: It's sort of a mental attitude about critical thinking and curiosity. It's about mindset of looking at the world in a playful and curious and creative way.

attitude.author: Diego Della Valle
attitude.text: Italian style is a natural attitude. It is about a life of good taste. It doesn't have to be expensive. Simple but with good taste. Luxury is possible to buy. Good taste is not.

attitude.author: J. R. Moehringer
attitude.text: Like the Earth, the Web is a less appealing place than it used to be. If I want attitude and arguing and meanness and profanity and wrong information screamed at me as gospel, I'll get in a time machine and spend Christmas with my family in 1977.

attitude.author: Wilfried Zaha
attitude.text: Just because I don't smile a lot, people think, 'Ah, yeah. He must have a bad attitude.' But if you don't know me, you don't know me. That was the problem. My face is just serious!

attitude.author: Marya Mannes
attitude.text: In aid, the proper attitude is one omitting gratitude.

attitude.author: Jeon Yeo-been
attitude.text: Hong Cha-young is the type who doesn't back down but breaks through fear and moves forward without hesitation. Her head-on,' break-through' attitude in life is similar to mine. But her speech, behavior, and reactions were thoroughly built for the character of Hong Cha-young.

attitude.author: Wilhelm Wundt
attitude.text: The attitude of physiological psychology to sensations and feelings, considered as psychical elements, is, naturally, the attitude of psychology at large.

attitude.author: Selena
attitude.text: If you try to come off as this big-time star with an attitude, people don't like that.

attitude.author: Dick Gregory
attitude.text: You know, I always say white is not a colour, white is an attitude, and if you haven't got trillions of dollars in the bank that you don't need, you can't be white.

attitude.author: Pat McGrath
attitude.text: My intention when I created Labs was that the people that used our products would be empowered to explore a fearless, daring attitude towards makeup - that's why we always write 'Use Without Caution' on everything we make.

attitude.author: Robert Lewandowski
attitude.text: Contracts are not a holy relic in football. You can like this attitude or not, but it's the truth. Sometimes you have to think about if it is meaningful to try out a new impulse.

attitude.author: W. Clement Stone
attitude.text: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With Positive Mental Attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.

attitude.author: Veronica Lake
attitude.text: I've reached a point in my life where it's the little things that matter... I was always a rebel and probably could have got much farther had I changed my attitude. But when you think about it, I got pretty far without changing attitudes. I'm happier with that.

attitude.author: John Sentamu
attitude.text: If the rights of civil partners are met differently in law to those of married couples, there is no discrimination in law, and if civil partnerships are seen as somehow 'second class' that is a social attitude which will change and cannot, in any case, be turned around by redefining the law of marriage.

attitude.author: Blac Chyna
attitude.text: I am just as comfortable in sweats and sneakers as I am in a dress and heels. Attitude is everything!

attitude.author: Walter Anderson
attitude.text: I am responsible. Although I may not be able to prevent the worst from happening, I am responsible for my attitude toward the inevitable misfortunes that darken life.

attitude.author: Nancy Pelosi
attitude.text: I do believe that during the Bush-Cheney administration, that Vice President Cheney set a tone and an attitude for the CIA.

attitude.author: Walter Pater
attitude.text: Not to discriminate every moment some passionate attitude in those about us, and in the very brilliancy of their gifts some tragic dividing on their ways, is, on this short day of frost and sun, to sleep before evening.

attitude.author: Sade Adu
attitude.text: I'm not anti-fashion, but I've always had a bit of a punk attitude. That's important, I think. I do my own thing.

attitude.author: Steven Berkoff
attitude.text: With the feminist movement - a good movement which I support - there's been more overt criticism of the male, an attitude that men are failing to understand the finer nature of women, failing to appreciate their needs, failing to support them, failing to be compassionate.

attitude.author: Steven Adler
attitude.text: I want to be in the big show, and to be in the big show, you have to practice. I have this attitude now that I'm going to take all the greatness I can. Nothing's going to stop me.

attitude.author: Molly Ivins
attitude.text: The only reason to have a positive mental attitude is that it makes life better. It doesn't cure cancer.

attitude.author: Jordan Larson
attitude.text: The smile helps me keep a positive attitude and go on to the next play.

attitude.author: Sourav Ganguly
attitude.text: Kohli is a huge addition to the side not just because of his batting but with his attitude as well. He lifts everyone on the field. There is so much passion in his cricket.

attitude.author: Norman Vincent Peale
attitude.text: Any fact facing us is not as important as our attitude toward it, for that determines our success or failure. The way you think about a fact may defeat you before you ever do anything about it. You are overcome by the fact because you think you are.

attitude.author: Betty White
attitude.text: I think it's your mental attitude. So many of us start dreading age in high school and that's a waste of a lovely life. 'Oh... I'm 30, oh, I'm 40, oh, 50.' Make the most of it.

attitude.author: Jose Saramago
attitude.text: The attitude of insolent haughtiness is characteristic of the relationships Americans form with what is alien to them, with others.

attitude.author: Baker Mayfield
attitude.text: You've got to have the same attitude each day. You've got to show up to work.

attitude.author: Donny Osmond
attitude.text: My father instilled in me the attitude of prevailing. If there's a challenge, go for it. If there's a wall to break down, break it down.

attitude.author: Beck
attitude.text: Art is the child of Nature; yes, her darling child, in whom we trace the features of the mother's face, her aspect and her attitude.

attitude.author: Boy George
attitude.text: My dad was very explosive, God rest his soul. He could fly off the handle like no one I've ever known, and I have definitely got that in my personality: that ability to sort of smash the house up and then say, 'Put the kettle on,' to have that kind of attitude of, 'Well, I'm OK now, so everybody else has got to be OK.'

attitude.author: Ray Guy
attitude.text: The old attitude toward newspapers was that they were completely disposable - today's newspaper is tomorrow's fish wrap.

attitude.author: Mario Vargas Llosa
attitude.text: Literature is dangerous: it awakens a rebellious attitude in us.

attitude.author: William James
attitude.text: Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity successful men act as though they have accomplished or are enjoying something. Soon it becomes a reality. Act, look, feel successful, conduct yourself accordingly, and you will be amazed at the positive results.

attitude.author: Jessie Baylin
attitude.text: I think leather pants are just better than jeans onstage; they give the performance a nice attitude, and they are also shockingly comfortable. Comfort is key.

attitude.author: Benny Green
attitude.text: Any time I need to get a serious attitude adjustment, I put on one of their records, and there are examples there for all time to keep us honest and keep us reaching; they'll never be eclipsed.

attitude.author: Kaetlyn Osmond
attitude.text: On the ice, I feel like I can become a different person, and the darker dramatics, the Black Swan, is confident: she's free to do whatever she wants, and that attitude helps in my skating. The White Swan is, I feel, more what I'm actually like off the ice: I'm a lot quieter, and if someone tells me to do something, I'll just do it.

attitude.author: Salman Khan
attitude.text: People are patronizing the theatres with renewed enthusiasm - there is an entire picnic-like attitude when families go out to see movies, which is a very good sign. They want to see larger-than-life characters on the big screen and not just watch movies on television or on DVDs.

attitude.author: Masaba Gupta
attitude.text: It's hard to tell if fashion will hold on to its 'exclusive' attitude, or change completely. Only time and Instagram will tell.

attitude.author: W. Averell Harriman
attitude.text: The war changed everybody's attitude. We became international almost overnight.

attitude.author: James E. Faust
attitude.text: All women have appealing features. I do not refer to model-type appeal, but rather that which comes from your personality, your attitude, and your expressions. I urge you to enhance the natural, God-given, feminine gifts with which you have been so richly blessed.

attitude.author: Nancy Cartwright
attitude.text: I will not get very far with this attitude.

attitude.author: Robert Kennedy
attitude.text: In truth, the world is now a seamless web from which no nation, large or small, young or old, can disassociate itself. Every attitude and every action of every nation can affect the welfare and security of every other nation around the globe.

attitude.author: Warwick Davis
attitude.text: My dad instilled in me a great sense of humor. I wasn't bullied at school because my outward attitude was confident, and that helps.

attitude.author: Joel Osteen
attitude.text: It's easy to get negative because you get beat down. You go through a few disappointments and it's easy to stay in that negative frame of mind. Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is a whole cliche, but your attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.

attitude.author: Friedrich St. Florian
attitude.text: The accounting of the sacrifice is, more than anything else, the attitude toward war memorials in our time.

attitude.author: Kate Moss
attitude.text: I'm not going to be horrible just for the sake of having attitude or make other people feel small just to make me feel bigger.

attitude.author: Jeanne Damas
attitude.text: For Parisian women, it's not about looks; it's not about style - for me, it's more about this beautiful city, culture, and lifestyle. It's more about attitude - style it your own way.

attitude.author: Richard Dean Anderson
attitude.text: Nothing. We're all friends and friendly. So when the cameras go down, depending on the mood or the nature of the material we're dealing with, there's usually a kind of a prevailing light attitude that's floating around.

attitude.author: Gary Chapman
attitude.text: In reality, relationships that are successful tend to take the attitude, 'How can I help you?' 'How can I enrich your life?' 'How can I be a better husband to you,' if it's a marriage.

attitude.author: Anushka Sharma
attitude.text: I do have moments when I feel insecure. I do have moments when I feel jealous, and that's normal. It's a very normal emotion. It's your action and your attitude and your reaction to that that is important.

attitude.author: Justin Thomas
attitude.text: My attitude is good because I'm a fierce competitor and I have all the confidence in the world that I can beat everybody else. That's my attitude.

attitude.author: Ed McMahon
attitude.text: There is no planning. On the night it is really great, it's euphoria and if it is not so great there is always tomorrow night. That was his attitude.

attitude.author: Shawn Michaels
attitude.text: The only thing you have to have is patience and an attitude that you aren't ever going to give up.

attitude.author: Sylvia Earle
attitude.text: As a child, I was aware of the widely-held attitude that the ocean is so big, so resilient that we could use the sea as the ultimate place to dispose of anything we did not want, from garbage and nuclear wastes to sludge from sewage to entire ships that had reached the end of their useful life.

attitude.author: Ekta Kapoor
attitude.text: I am very reactive and malleable. I have to figure out when to be hands on and hands off. If I am hands on all the time, I can't do too much. But my attitude works in a certain way. So the idea is to spread your personality, your attitude.

attitude.author: Paul Pierce
attitude.text: My brother was a huge Charles Barkley fan - my brother went to Miami. He played power forward, and he always used to tell me stories about Barkley and college. And I watched Barkley growing up. I loved what he brought to the game. His toughness and just his attitude, being as strong he was.

attitude.author: Emmylou Harris
attitude.text: Animals have a much better attitude to life and death than we do. They know when their time has come. We are the ones that suffer when they pass, but it's a healing kind of grief that enables us to deal with other griefs that are not so easy to grab hold of.

attitude.author: Jocko Willink
attitude.text: There are a lot of inaccuracies out there when it comes to the SEAL training process. You will see guys carrying logs around on television. They think that the hardest part about being on a SEAL team is getting through that training. The fact of the matter is, if you have a good attitude, that training is fun. I had a blast.

attitude.author: Bill Nelson
attitude.text: My attitude is, a monument, a statue, ought to signify unity instead of division.

attitude.author: Sally Hawkins
attitude.text: My parents have a strong work ethic, but their attitude to life, their philosophy, is: 'whatever makes you happy.'

attitude.author: Marc-Andre ter Stegen
attitude.text: It is important to have the attitude and self confidence to be Barca's goalkeeper, and that I've got.

attitude.author: Jason Day
attitude.text: Anything can happen, so you have to control your attitude and stay strong.

attitude.author: Russell Westbrook
attitude.text: My friends and I started that motto early in high school - that attitude, that mentality - from way back then: Want to go to Stanford? Why not? Want to play in the NBA? Why not?

attitude.author: Bessie Head
attitude.text: A discipline I have observed is an attitude of love and reverence to people.

attitude.author: Todd Phillips
attitude.text: There's a punk-rock attitude, clearly, to 'Hated.' There's even a punk-rock attitude to 'The Hangover,' I think. We start the movie with a Glenn Danzig song.

attitude.author: Hima Das
attitude.text: My attitude is different. And no one understands me the way my friends do.

attitude.author: Elliot Richardson
attitude.text: I thought I was going to be killed. The casualties were so heavy, it was just a given. I learned to take each day, each mission, as it came. That's an attitude I've carried into my professional life. I take each case, each job, as it comes.

attitude.author: Dalai Lama
attitude.text: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.

attitude.author: Charles R. Swindoll
attitude.text: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.

attitude.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo
attitude.text: One's appearance bespeaks dignity corresponding to the depth of his character. One's concentrated effort, serene attitude, taciturn air, courteous disposition, thoroughly polite bearing, gritted teeth with a piercing look - each of these reveals dignity. Such outward appearance, in short, comes from constant attentiveness and seriousness.

attitude.author: Lou Holtz
attitude.text: Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.

attitude.author: Trey Songz
attitude.text: I think clothes are very much a representation of your attitude and the way you feel. I really love to be dressed down, though.

attitude.author: Norm MacDonald
attitude.text: It got very tedious saying the same jokes in the same way with the same attitude.

attitude.author: Joyce Meyer
attitude.text: Hope is favorable and confident expectation; it's an expectant attitude that something good is going to happen and things will work out, no matter what situation we're facing.

attitude.author: Felicia Day

attitude.author: Bhavish Aggarwal
attitude.text: I learnt early that always being analytical is important for a business. Being analytical as an attitude is more important than just having the aptitude.

attitude.author: Colton Haynes

attitude.author: Walter Scott
attitude.text: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.

attitude.author: Pope Benedict XVI
attitude.text: Having a clear faith, based on the creed of the church is often labeled today as fundamentalism. Whereas relativism, which is letting oneself be tossed and swept along by every wind of teaching, look like the only attitude acceptable to today's standards.

attitude.author: Brendon Urie
attitude.text: I've always been that person: If it gets into my head, I've got to do it until I get it perfect - a perfectionist's attitude.

attitude.author: Gong Li

attitude.author: Allen Klein
attitude.text: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.

attitude.author: Billy Graham

attitude.author: Rory Gallagher

attitude.author: Dabo Swinney
attitude.text: No, we don't control who our parents are. We don't control what color we are. We don't control what home we are born into. But we control our attitude. We control our work ethic. We control our drive and our commitment.

attitude.author: Bo Bennett
attitude.text: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.

attitude.author: Margaret Sanger
attitude.text: Woman must have her freedom, the fundamental freedom of choosing whether or not she will be a mother and how many children she will have. Regardless of what man's attitude may be, that problem is hers - and before it can be his, it is hers alone.

attitude.author: Mick Mars
attitude.text: When I drank, I had a very different attitude towards my playing. It was sloppier but I kind of liked it that way. It was like the alcohol was telling my mind what to do.

attitude.author: Tobey Maguire
attitude.text: I just try to try to keep an attitude that I don't know what I'm doing. Not to the point where I'm beating myself up, but I just go in thinking that I have a lot to learn. And I hope I still have that attitude 30 years from now.

attitude.author: Terry Pratchett
attitude.text: There is a soak-the-rich attitude in the air, a feeling that if you have a lot of money you must have got it by some ghastly means. I can quite happily say there was never any family money. All the money we got was mine, just from writing books.

attitude.author: Madeleine M. Kunin
attitude.text: To make flexibility work, it is not only necessary to change our attitude about who is a good worker and who is not, but we have to train managers at all levels to recognize the difference between the number of hours worked and the quality of work produced.

attitude.author: Richard P. Feynman
attitude.text: I think that when we know that we actually do live in uncertainty, then we ought to admit it; it is of great value to realize that we do not know the answers to different questions. This attitude of mind - this attitude of uncertainty - is vital to the scientist, and it is this attitude of mind which the student must first acquire.

attitude.author: Abhinav Shukla
attitude.text: I am not an ambitious guy, I have a very laidback attitude; money for me is less important than self-respect and ideals.

attitude.author: Stephen Covey
attitude.text: If you want small changes in your life, work on your attitude. But if you want big and primary changes, work on your paradigm.

attitude.author: Manu Ginobili
attitude.text: If you take going to the bench as a demotion or something that's terrible, you start with a bad attitude.

attitude.author: Sara Blakely
attitude.text: I think failure is nothing more than life's way of nudging you that you are off course. My attitude to failure is not attached to outcome, but in not trying. It is liberating. Most people attach failure to something not working out or how people perceive you. This way, it is about answering to yourself.

attitude.author: Yousuf Karsh
attitude.text: There is a brief moment when all there is in a man's mind and soul and spirit is reflected through his eyes, his hands, his attitude. This is the moment to record.

attitude.author: Alan Watts
attitude.text: And the attitude of faith is the very opposite of clinging to belief, of holding on.

attitude.author: Jack White
attitude.text: I keep guitars that are, you know, the neck's a little bit bent and it's a little bit out of tune. I want to work and battle it and conquer it and make it express whatever attitude I have at that moment. I want it to be a struggle.

attitude.author: Big Boi
attitude.text: The music is first and foremost everything - no egos, no attitude, nothing - it's about the music.

attitude.author: Cassie Steele
attitude.text: I like my hair long, and I love my bangs. I love them because I can pin them back or keep the fringe with attitude.

attitude.author: Ludwig von Mises
attitude.text: Only one thing can conquer war - that attitude of mind which can see nothing in war but destruction and annihilation.

attitude.author: Steven Biko
attitude.text: Black Consciousness is an attitude of the mind and a way of life, the most positive call to emanate from the black world for a long time.

attitude.author: Earl Nightingale
attitude.text: Always keep that happy attitude. Pretend that you are holding a beautiful fragrant bouquet.

attitude.author: Caeleb Dressel
attitude.text: I've kind of developed an attitude where sometimes you've got to relax and you've got to go with the flow.

attitude.author: Tavi Gevinson
attitude.text: I think it was my mom's attitude about art and being part of the narcissistic digital generation or whatever that made me think anyone would care what I had to say about anything!

attitude.author: Francis Parker Yockey
attitude.text: Pessimism only describes an attitude, and not facts, and hence is entirely subjective.

attitude.author: Christian Louboutin
attitude.text: The higher the better. It's more about an attitude. High heels empower women in a way.

attitude.author: David Kirsch
attitude.text: I think that we all plateau, from fitness experts to regular folks at every fitness level. What that means is we need to change our exercise routine, food, and attitude.

attitude.author: Joan Collins
attitude.text: I think it has something to do with being British. We don't take ourselves as seriously as some other countries do. I think a lot of people take themselves far too seriously; I find that a very tedious attitude.

attitude.author: Ryan Stiles
attitude.text: I did standup for a lot of years, too, but when you come out as a standup, you get the feeling from a crowd - it's a kind of a 'make me laugh' attitude. But when you come out as an improvisor, they realize that they're suggesting everything you do. So they're already invested in the scene, and they actually want it to work.

attitude.author: Tom Cotton
attitude.text: I can assure you that I'm not very close to Hillary Clinton. I think she's disqualified herself from Commander-in-Chief by her cavalier attitude towards our nation's secrecy laws.

attitude.author: Kurt Cobain
attitude.text: I was looking for something a lot heavier, yet melodic at the same time. Something different from heavy metal, a different attitude.

attitude.author: E-40
attitude.text: I used to burn rubber at every light, mean mugging everything there was, cause that was my attitude.

attitude.author: Alan Shepard
attitude.text: The pilot looked at his cues of attitude and speed and orientation and so on and responded as he would from the same cues in an airplane, but there was no way it flew the same. The simulators had showed us that.

attitude.author: Joel Osteen
attitude.text: I wouldn't ever say if you're having tough times then there must be something wrong with you or your attitude. Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith. I encourage people to stay up, stay hopeful, stay faith-filled.

attitude.author: Angus Young
attitude.text: Nothing happened overnight. Every country we went into, we started at the bottom. We knew that because the music we were playing and the attitude we had, we knew we'd be at the bottom and have to work our way up.

attitude.author: Kimbal Musk
attitude.text: I had this attitude, that Silicon Valley obnoxious attitude, that I know what I'm doing, and the rest was going to be pretty easy.

attitude.author: Mariella Frostrup
attitude.text: I have a very childish attitude to books - a very non-analytic enthusiasm... like Alice falling down the chute.

attitude.author: Prince
attitude.text: You don't have to watch 'Gossip Girl' to have an attitude.

attitude.author: Ehud Barak
attitude.text: Israel always has a special filter to look at things, and that is the attitude toward Jews.

attitude.author: Joe Flaherty
attitude.text: I haven't watched 'Mad TV' a lot, but I have seen some stuff on there that is truly funny. You have to have some sort of attitude toward the subject, and they seem to have it. It depends on how much blood you want to draw.

attitude.author: Jean Piaget
attitude.text: I have always detested any departure from reality, an attitude which I relate to my mother's poor mental health.

attitude.author: Cheech Marin
attitude.text: To me, you have to declare yourself a Chicano in order to be a Chicano. That makes a Chicano a Mexican-American with a defiant political attitude that centers on his or her right to self-definition. I'm a Chicano because I say I am.

attitude.author: Paul Ryan
attitude.text: What matters to me is that I do what I think is right and I see, I'm a numbers guy, that's my attitude. I know we have a debt tsunami coming, we are bankrupting this country and I'm in a position where I can actually advance ideas to prevent that from happening. That's exactly what I should be doing.

attitude.author: Giorgio Armani
attitude.text: When I started Giorgio Armani in the mid-'70s, I realized that women needed a way to dress that was equivalent to that of men - something that would give them dignity, an attitude that would help them handle their work life.

attitude.author: Stephane Rolland
attitude.text: I love a woman in a tuxedo, or in a dress, who looks comfortable, relaxed, happy. I'd love to dress Daphne Guinness - she has exactly that attitude.

attitude.author: Ahmet Davutoglu
attitude.text: Turkey wants a policy of engagement exactly like President Obama's new approach. Policy of engagement, less confrontation, less tense attitude, especially in the region.

attitude.author: Arthur Compton
attitude.text: My first feeling about the paper and the attitude is that it is absurd.

attitude.author: Elbert Hubbard
attitude.text: We awaken in others the same attitude of mind we hold toward them.

attitude.author: Luis Enrique
attitude.text: I've been satisfied with everything since I arrived at Barca, and I'm pleased with the players' attitude.

attitude.author: Hamdi Ulukaya
attitude.text: Every small business will give you an entrepreneurial way of looking at things. I guarantee you that for every plant that closes, if you gave it to one small-business person in that community, he or she would find a way to make it work. The small-business attitude is you always find a way to make it work.

attitude.author: Elmore Leonard
attitude.text: When you are developing your style, you avoid weaknesses. I am not good at describing things, so I stay away from it. And if anyone is going to describe anything at all, it's going to be from the point of view of the character, because then I can use his voice, and his attitude will be revealed in the way he describes what he sees.

attitude.author: Ferguson Jenkins
attitude.text: Mental attitude and concentration are the keys to pitching.

attitude.author: Henry S. Haskins
attitude.text: Each experience through which we pass operates ultimately for our good. This is a correct attitude to adopt and we must be able to see it in that light.

attitude.author: Venus Williams
attitude.text: Some people say that I have an attitude- Maybe I do. But I think that you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does- that makes you a winner right there.

attitude.author: Marcel Duchamp
attitude.text: Dada was an extreme protest against the physical side of painting. It was a metaphysical attitude.

attitude.author: Kevin Hart
attitude.text: I love women with attitude.

attitude.author: Kourtney Kardashian
attitude.text: I know that, for me, I need to try to cover myself while breastfeeding so that no one snaps a picture. If this wasn't the case, I probably wouldn't mind as much because my son is my biggest concern. My attitude is, if someone sees a little somethin' somethin', don't look if you don't like it.

attitude.author: Steve Prefontaine
attitude.text: For me, running against the Poles and Czechs would be like running against high school kids. And I hate all this gung-ho, run-for-the-red-white-and-blue attitude that the AAU spouts. If that's important to some people, fine, more power to 'em. But, damn it, I wish they'd leave me alone to do what I want to do - run against the best.

attitude.author: Maj Sjowall
attitude.text: You get tough when you grow up unloved. People described me as a boyish girl - rather shy, but I didn't show it. I had an attitude. I was rather wild. I lied a lot because I knew the alternative was to be punished. As I got older I realised I didn't have to lie any more and it was a nice feeling. I could be myself.

attitude.author: Cynthia P. Schneider
attitude.text: Measuring success in cultural diplomacy - the use of education, creative expression in any form, or people-to-people exchange to increase understanding across regions, cultures, or peoples - is challenging. How does one quantify changes in attitude, abandoning stereotypes, or feeling empathy as a result of a performance, a film, a book?

attitude.author: Judy Sheindlin
attitude.text: A period of detention in a chilly upstate facility can be a great attitude adjuster.

attitude.author: Lawrence Eagleburger
attitude.text: We must advertise to U.S. business that we are there, that our attitude has changed, and that we care. When we are asked to help, we have to perform and provide the right advice.

attitude.author: Mark Cuban
attitude.text: Culture is very important to the Mavs. Your best player has to be a fit for what you want the culture of the team to be. He has to be someone who leads by example. Someone who sets the tone in the locker room and on the court. It isn't about who talks the most or the loudest. It is about the demeanor and attitude he brings.

attitude.author: Alex Tabarrok
attitude.text: I utterly reject the view that the Third World is doomed to poverty and starvation. Not only is this wrong, I think this attitude verges on the immoral, like thinking that slavery is an unalterable facet of the human condition so why bother doing anything about it?

attitude.author: James Cromwell
attitude.text: The attitude we have towards our personal pets as opposed to the animals that suffer under the factory farm is hypocritical and delusional.

attitude.author: Imelda Staunton
attitude.text: Having a child makes you strong and gives you chutzpah. It relaxed my attitude to the job; my center of focus shifted, which I think is very helpful, because even if you're not a very indulgent actor you spend a lot of time thinking about yourself. I don't think that is particularly healthy.
