beauty.author: Abraham Maslow
beauty.text: It is as necessary for man to live in beauty rather than ugliness as it is necessary for him to have food for an aching belly or rest for a weary body.

beauty.author: Pope Paul VI
beauty.text: Liturgy is like a strong tree whose beauty is derived from the continuous renewal of its leaves, but whose strength comes from the old trunk, with solid roots in the ground.

beauty.author: Kirti Kulhari
beauty.text: There's beauty in imperfection.

beauty.author: Michelangelo
beauty.text: Every beauty which is seen here by persons of perception resembles more than anything else that celestial source from which we all are come.

beauty.author: Edwin Way Teale
beauty.text: For the mind disturbed, the still beauty of dawn is nature's finest balm.

beauty.author: Martha Beck
beauty.text: Although beauty may be in the eye of the beholder, the feeling of being beautiful exists solely in the mind of the beheld.

beauty.author: Toni Morrison
beauty.text: At some point in life the world's beauty becomes enough. You don't need to photograph, paint or even remember it. It is enough.

beauty.author: Mike Krzyzewski
beauty.text: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.

beauty.author: Cheryl Burke
beauty.text: You have to embrace your body, whether it's curvy or whatever you may be. You have to embrace who you are. Beauty comes from the inside not out.

beauty.author: Thomas Kinkade
beauty.text: Everyone can identify with a fragrant garden, with beauty of sunset, with the quiet of nature, with a warm and cozy cottage.

beauty.author: Dolores del Rio
beauty.text: Take care of your inner, spiritual beauty. That will reflect in your face.

beauty.author: John Greenleaf Whittier
beauty.text: Beauty seen is never lost, God's colors all are fast.

beauty.author: Richard P. Feynman
beauty.text: Poets say science takes away from the beauty of the stars - mere globs of gas atoms. I, too, can see the stars on a desert night, and feel them. But do I see less or more?

beauty.author: Kiesza
beauty.text: Beauty has so many forms, and I think the most beautiful thing is confidence and loving yourself.

beauty.author: Xenophon
beauty.text: A horse is a thing of beauty... none will tire of looking at him as long as he displays himself in his splendor.

beauty.author: Marina and the Diamonds
beauty.text: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.

beauty.author: John Ruskin
beauty.text: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.

beauty.author: Stewart Udall
beauty.text: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth.

beauty.author: Rudyard Kipling
beauty.text: San Francisco is a mad city - inhabited for the most part by perfectly insane people whose women are of a remarkable beauty.

beauty.author: Park Bo-young
beauty.text: Honestly, Korean beauty standards are harsh. People are even putting pressure on non-celebrities to be super skinny, and the standards of thinness are just getting worse.

beauty.author: Michelle Visage
beauty.text: Live life and enjoy it. That's the real key to beauty!

beauty.author: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw
beauty.text: People believe that art and science are two distinct realms. It is far from the truth because, if you look at science from a microscope or from a different lens, you can see the beauty in science. It is very artistic.

beauty.author: Lily Tomlin
beauty.text: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?

beauty.author: Mary Wollstonecraft
beauty.text: Taught from infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison.

beauty.author: Katrina Kaif
beauty.text: I feel it is important not to get overly obsessed and overly carried away with just the physical aspect. There is more to beauty than just the physical appearance. You are also a complete person, and a woman should have an identity beyond just the way she looks.

beauty.author: Naomi Wolf
beauty.text: 'Beauty' is a currency system like the gold standard. Like any economy, it is determined by politics, and in the modern age in the West is is the last, best belief system that keeps male dominance intact.

beauty.author: Ruby Dee
beauty.text: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.

beauty.author: Dorothea Dix
beauty.text: The rose is the flower and handmaiden of love - the lily, her fair associate, is the emblem of beauty and purity.

beauty.author: Roberto Cavalli
beauty.text: I really admire a woman for her intelligence, her personality. Beauty is not enough.

beauty.author: Miranda Kerr
beauty.text: Everyone has a different beauty and different qualities and I think that women need to learn to love their qualities and be comfortable in the fact that everyone is different.

beauty.author: Halle Berry
beauty.text: Let me tell you something - being thought of as a beautiful woman has spared me nothing in life. No heartache, no trouble. Love has been difficult. Beauty is essentially meaningless and it is always transitory.

beauty.author: W. Somerset Maugham
beauty.text: Beauty is an ecstasy; it is as simple as hunger. There is really nothing to be said about it. It is like the perfume of a rose: you can smell it and that is all.

beauty.author: Tia Mowry
beauty.text: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising.

beauty.author: Samuel Daniel
beauty.text: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.

beauty.author: Oliver Platt
beauty.text: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

beauty.author: Shannon Tweed
beauty.text: I have beauty, intelligence, individuality, sensuality and sexuality.

beauty.author: Donald Norman
beauty.text: Beauty and brains, pleasure and usability - they should go hand in hand.

beauty.author: Hussein of Jordan
beauty.text: Jordan has a strange, haunting beauty and a sense of timelessness. Dotted with the ruins of empires once great, it is the last resort of yesterday in the world of tomorrow. I love every inch of it.

beauty.author: Ariana Grande
beauty.text: I like Aurora, 'Sleeping Beauty,' because she's just sleeping and looking pretty and waiting for boys to come kiss her. Sounds like a good life - lots of naps and cute boys fighting dragons to come kiss you.

beauty.author: Jean Genet
beauty.text: I recognize in thieves, traitors and murderers, in the ruthless and the cunning, a deep beauty - a sunken beauty.

beauty.author: Erin Heatherton
beauty.text: You really don't need to wear any make-up most of the time; keep your eyebrows the way they are, and find your own natural beauty signature.

beauty.author: Emily Ratajkowski
beauty.text: To me, 'sexy' is a kind of beauty, a kind of self-expression, one that is to be celebrated.

beauty.author: Tobey Maguire
beauty.text: I might have some character traits that some might see as innocence or naive. That's because I discovered peace and happiness in my soul. And with this knowledge, I also see the beauty of human life.

beauty.author: Carre Otis
beauty.text: We come in many different shapes and sizes, and we need to support each other and our differences. Our beauty is in our differences.

beauty.author: Phil Ochs
beauty.text: In such ugly times, the only true protest is beauty.

beauty.author: Thomas Fuller
beauty.text: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.

beauty.author: Joyce Meyer
beauty.text: Consider a tree for a moment. As beautiful as trees are to look at, we don't see what goes on underground - as they grow roots. Trees must develop deep roots in order to grow strong and produce their beauty. But we don't see the roots. We just see and enjoy the beauty. In much the same way, what goes on inside of us is like the roots of a tree.

beauty.author: Eartha Kitt
beauty.text: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that.

beauty.author: Tina Turner
beauty.text: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. I believe that a lot of how you look is to do with how you feel about yourself and your life. Happiness is the greatest beauty secret.

beauty.author: Michelle Phan
beauty.text: Makeup is not a mask that covers up your beauty; it's a weapon that helps you express who you are from the inside.

beauty.author: Lisa Joy
beauty.text: There's a kind of beauty to a skyscraper.

beauty.author: Margaret Cho
beauty.text: Just because you are blind and unable to see my beauty doesn't mean it does not exist.

beauty.author: D. H. Lawrence
beauty.text: The human soul needs actual beauty more than bread.

beauty.author: Donald Knuth
beauty.text: Everyday life is like programming, I guess. If you love something you can put beauty into it.

beauty.author: Baruch Spinoza
beauty.text: I would warn you that I do not attribute to nature either beauty or deformity, order or confusion. Only in relation to our imagination can things be called beautiful or ugly, well-ordered or confused.

beauty.author: William Wordsworth
beauty.text: The human mind is capable of excitement without the application of gross and violent stimulants; and he must have a very faint perception of its beauty and dignity who does not know this.

beauty.author: Lisa
beauty.text: To me, beauty is confidence. I think beauty comes from one's confident inner self and attitude. Make-up and styling are the cherries on top of your beautiful inner-self!

beauty.author: Kehinde Wiley
beauty.text: The beauty of art is that it allows you to slow down, and for a moment, things that once seemed unfamiliar become precious to you.

beauty.author: Sanam Saeed
beauty.text: That's the beauty of short films; their strength lies in delivering a message creatively and simply.

beauty.author: Jane Seymour
beauty.text: Beauty is a radiance that originates from within and comes from inner security and strong character.

beauty.author: Joanne Woodward
beauty.text: Sexiness wears thin after a while and beauty fades, but to be married to a man who makes you laugh every day, ah, now that's a real treat.

beauty.author: Jack London
beauty.text: I write for no other purpose than to add to the beauty that now belongs to me. I write a book for no other reason than to add three or four hundred acres to my magnificent estate.

beauty.author: Oscar Niemeyer
beauty.text: My work is not about 'form follows function,' but 'form follows beauty' or, even better, 'form follows feminine.'

beauty.author: Narendra Modi
beauty.text: The diversity of India, of our civilization, is actually a thing of beauty, which is something we are extremely proud of.

beauty.author: Denise Bidot
beauty.text: Being you is what defines real beauty.

beauty.author: Walt Whitman
beauty.text: The beauty of independence, departure, actions that rely on themselves.

beauty.author: Thomas Nashe
beauty.text: Beauty is but a flower, which wrinkles will devour.

beauty.author: Jonas Mekas
beauty.text: In a meadow full of flowers, you cannot walk through and breathe those smells and see all those colors and remain angry. We have to support the beauty, the poetry, of life.

beauty.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
beauty.text: When we recognise the virtues, the talent, the beauty of Mother Earth, something is born in us, some kind of connection, love is born.

beauty.author: James Baldwin
beauty.text: The South is very beautiful but its beauty makes one sad because the lives that people live here, and have lived here, are so ugly.

beauty.author: William Penn
beauty.text: In marriage do thou be wise: prefer the person before money, virtue before beauty, the mind before the body; then thou hast a wife, a friend, a companion, a second self.

beauty.author: L. Wolfe Gilbert
beauty.text: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.

beauty.author: George Gissing
beauty.text: For the man sound of body and serene of mind there is no such thing as bad weather; every day has its beauty, and storms which whip the blood do but make it pulse more vigorously.

beauty.author: Christina Rossetti
beauty.text: She gave up beauty in her tender youth, gave all her hope and joy and pleasant ways; she covered up her eyes lest they should gaze on vanity, and chose the bitter truth.

beauty.author: Rupi Kaur
beauty.text: Really, at the end of the day, the only thing you can control is yourself; the only person you can truly educate is yourself. You have to redefine what beauty is to you so you can't be affected by what people are saying.

beauty.author: John Kenneth Galbraith
beauty.text: There is certainly no absolute standard of beauty. That precisely is what makes its pursuit so interesting.

beauty.author: Ileana D'Cruz
beauty.text: You are a human being and are allowed to be imperfect, and you are allowed to be flawed. There is a lot of beauty in your imperfections, in your uniqueness.

beauty.author: Marcus du Sautoy
beauty.text: Mathematics has beauty and romance. It's not a boring place to be, the mathematical world. It's an extraordinary place; it's worth spending time there.

beauty.author: W. G. Sebald
beauty.text: There is a beauty in nature and culture that we no longer have access to. Those things you can't forget, you embroider... The further you tell, the further you travel from truth, which means, of course, that literature is a lie.

beauty.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
beauty.text: There is a beauty and clarity that comes from simplicity that we sometimes do not appreciate in our thirst for intricate solutions.

beauty.author: E. M. Forster
beauty.text: Nonsense and beauty have close connections.

beauty.author: Joseph Wood Krutch
beauty.text: If we do not permit the earth to produce beauty and joy, it will in the end not produce food, either.

beauty.author: Jeb Bush
beauty.text: Who among us has never looked up into the heavens on a starlit night, lost in wonder at the vastness of space and the beauty of the stars?

beauty.author: Jean Kerr
beauty.text: I'm tired of all this nonsense about beauty being skin deep. That's deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?

beauty.author: Said Nursi
beauty.text: The beauty of a finely worked object points to the beauty of the craftsmanship. The beauty of the craftsmanship points to the beauty of the name which was the source of the craftsmanship. The beauty of the name of the craftsman's art points to the beauty of the craftsman's attributes manifested in that art.

beauty.author: Tila Tequila
beauty.text: I think every person has their own identity and beauty. Everyone being different is what is really beautiful. If we were all the same, it would be boring.

beauty.author: David Hockney
beauty.text: The moment you cheat for the sake of beauty, you know you're an artist.

beauty.author: Karen Salmansohn
beauty.text: Cultivate the habit of zest. Purposefully seek out the beauty in the seemingly trivial. Especially in the trivial. The colors and shapes of the foods you eat. The shadows a vase makes on your table. The interesting faces of the people on the bus with you.

beauty.author: Antoine Arnault
beauty.text: We have received a heritage of craftsmanship, of aesthetics, of taste, of identity. Our brands have the beauty to preserve and perpetuate it.

beauty.author: Luis Alberto Urrea
beauty.text: There is beauty in our roots. Sometimes we think our roots are shameful, and people tell you that you're no good or your ancestors are no good or that you come from a neighborhood of no hope and terrible crime. But it's about the beauty of those places, and I carry that with me.

beauty.author: Donella Meadows
beauty.text: We don't need bigger cars or fancier clothes. We need self-respect, identity, community, love, variety, beauty, challenge and a purpose in living that is greater than material accumulation.

beauty.author: Kate Moss
beauty.text: You can be a pretty face, but if you're not a nice person, it just doesn't work. I'm not traditionally a beauty, but apparently people think I'm all right. If you're a nice person, it definitely helps.

beauty.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
beauty.text: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future.

beauty.author: Thomas Mann
beauty.text: Solitude gives birth to the original in us, to beauty unfamiliar and perilous - to poetry. But also, it gives birth to the opposite: to the perverse, the illicit, the absurd.

beauty.author: Barry Ritholtz
beauty.text: The beauty of diversification is it's about as close as you can get to a free lunch in investing.

beauty.author: Junichiro Tanizaki
beauty.text: Find beauty not only in the thing itself but in the pattern of the shadows, the light and dark which that thing provides.

beauty.author: Patrick Demarchelier
beauty.text: Beauty is in the character of a person. It's about having an interesting face and about what's inside. Anyone can take a good picture.

beauty.author: Francois Nars
beauty.text: I like beauty to be a bit edgy, not typical. For me, the only rule is looking good.

beauty.author: Anne Hathaway
beauty.text: The whole beauty of music is that it goes where your words won't let you.

beauty.author: Anne Bronte
beauty.text: Beauty is that quality which, next to money, is generally the most attractive to the worst kinds of men; and, therefore, it is likely to entail a great deal of trouble on the possessor.

beauty.author: Aldo Leopold
beauty.text: A thing is right when it tends to preserve the integrity, stability and beauty of the biotic community. It is wrong when it tends otherwise.

beauty.author: Robert Baden-Powell
beauty.text: My belief is that we were put into this world of wonders and beauty with a special ability to appreciate them, in some cases to have the fun of taking a hand in developing them, and also in being able to help other people instead of overreaching them and, through it all, to enjoy life - that is, to be happy.

beauty.author: Chandler Parsons
beauty.text: I like a girl with natural beauty.

beauty.author: Imelda Marcos
beauty.text: Filipinos want beauty. I have to look beautiful so that the poor Filipinos will have a star to look at from their slums.

beauty.author: Harold Ramis
beauty.text: Life doesn't care about your vision. Stuff happens, and you've just got to deal with it. You roll with it; that's the beauty of it all.

beauty.author: David Remnick
beauty.text: The world is a crazy, beautiful, ugly complicated place, and it keeps moving on from crisis to strangeness to beauty to weirdness to tragedy. The caravan keeps moving on, and the job of the longform writer or filmmaker or radio broadcaster is to stop - is to pause - and when the caravan goes away, that's when this stuff comes.

beauty.author: Pia Wurtzbach
beauty.text: Coming from a pageant title that celebrates diversity, I've come to appreciate all kinds of beauty.

beauty.author: Nancy Pelosi
beauty.text: The beauty of the Democratic Party is in the mix.

beauty.author: Pico Iyer
beauty.text: In many a piece of music, it's the pause or the rest that gives the piece its beauty and its shape. And I know I, as a writer, will often try to include a lot of empty space on the page so that the reader can complete my thoughts and sentences and so that her imagination has room to breathe.

beauty.author: Connie Britton
beauty.text: Beauty is about what's inside us, loving who we are and nurturing that. Outward beauty can really blossom from there.

beauty.author: Helen Baxendale
beauty.text: I want to age the way that life makes you age, because there's beauty in autumn and winter and I think people forget that.

beauty.author: Gilbert Baker
beauty.text: We needed something to express our joy, our beauty, our power. And the rainbow did that.

beauty.author: Andre Leon Talley
beauty.text: I like the idea of being warm and secure. That's what home should be. That you have a sense of warmth, security, love, and you love the things around you and surround yourself with beauty.

beauty.author: Aimee Mullins
beauty.text: True beauty is when someone radiates that they like themselves.

beauty.author: Joan Crawford
beauty.text: I have always known what I wanted, and that was beauty... in every form.

beauty.author: Juan Felipe Herrera
beauty.text: I want to take everything I have in me, weave it, merge it with the beauty that is in the Library of Congress, all the resources, the guidance of the staff and departments, and launch it with the heart-shaped dreams of the people.

beauty.author: Liya Kebede
beauty.text: I want to spend as much time as possible with my children, so I always like to keep my beauty and fashion routines effortless... but still chic!

beauty.author: Redd Foxx
beauty.text: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone.

beauty.author: Chelsea Cain
beauty.text: There's something about the Pacific Northwest, the scale of it, and the fact that not so long ago people came here and died getting here, and then died the first winter they were here. There's this breathtaking beauty, just a little bit of moss on the tree, just this little thread of danger, and the sinister. And I really like that.

beauty.author: Heart Evangelista
beauty.text: Happy Skin is all about natural beauty. They don't want you to wear something that's harsh on your skin and I want that as well.

beauty.author: Wallace Stevens
beauty.text: Death is the mother of Beauty; hence from her, alone, shall come fulfillment to our dreams and our desires.

beauty.author: Mark Hyman
beauty.text: Don't get me wrong, I admire elegance and have an appreciation of the finer things in life. But to me, beauty lies in simplicity.

beauty.author: Anne Lamott
beauty.text: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you.

beauty.author: Hannah Arendt
beauty.text: By its very nature the beautiful is isolated from everything else. From beauty no road leads to reality.

beauty.author: Devon Aoki
beauty.text: Everyone has their own insecurities, regardless of how you look or how people perceive you, but sometimes people give their insecurities too much power. Defining beauty is simply a matter of opinion. For me, real beauty has very little to do with the structure of someone's face or body.

beauty.author: Alexander McQueen
beauty.text: I find beauty in the grotesque, like most artists.

beauty.author: Daniel Burnham
beauty.text: Let your watchword be order and your beacon beauty.

beauty.author: Queen Latifah
beauty.text: Beauty is not just a white girl. It's so many different flavors and shades.

beauty.author: Galileo Galilei
beauty.text: Facts which at first seem improbable will, even on scant explanation, drop the cloak which has hidden them and stand forth in naked and simple beauty.

beauty.author: Dale Archer
beauty.text: Beauty is an asset, just like physical prowess, charisma, brains or emotional intelligence. The key with any gift is in the way that you use it. It doesn't define you as a person. Rather, it's an asset to be used judiciously and with an understanding of how it is just a small part of who you are.

beauty.author: Conrad Anker
beauty.text: I like to think that today is the best day of my life and tomorrow will be the next best day of my life. And if you think that way, you're living for the beauty of today.

beauty.author: Kyle Hill
beauty.text: A rainbow is the product of physics working for your appreciation of beauty.

beauty.author: Mac Miller
beauty.text: There's a lot of beauty in the world, so go hang out and go be a part of the solution rather than the problem.

beauty.author: Laurette Taylor
beauty.text: Personality is more important than beauty, but imagination is more important than both of them.

beauty.author: Orison Swett Marden
beauty.text: Do not waste time dreaming of great faraway opportunities; do the best you can where you are. Open your petals of power and beauty and fling out the fragrance of your life in the place that has been assigned to you.

beauty.author: Oscar Wilde
beauty.text: Beauty has as many meanings as man has moods. Beauty is the symbol of symbols. Beauty reveals everything, because it expresses nothing. When it shows us itself, it shows us the whole fiery-coloured world.

beauty.author: Gloria Reuben
beauty.text: The destruction of the natural beauty, the ecosystems, and the majesty of mountains affect us in ways we're not even aware of. Every time a mountain is beheaded, we chop off a little part of our souls.

beauty.author: John Keats
beauty.text: 'Beauty is truth, truth beauty,' - that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know.

beauty.author: Craig Bruce
beauty.text: Nothing surpasses the beauty and elegance of a bad idea.

beauty.author: Rachel Morrison
beauty.text: I find beauty in imperfection.

beauty.author: Simone Weil
beauty.text: Beauty always promises, but never gives anything.

beauty.author: Adnan Sami
beauty.text: Northeastern folk music influenced me from a very young age. Sachin Dev Burman is one of the inspirational musicians in Indian film music. The way he fused folk music with his signature style is amazing. So, I am aware of the beauty of northeast folk music.

beauty.author: Jennifer Garner
beauty.text: My mother is a big believer in being responsible for your own happiness. She always talked about finding joy in small moments and insisted that we stop and take in the beauty of an ordinary day. When I stop the car to make my kids really see a sunset, I hear my mother's voice and smile.

beauty.author: Henry James
beauty.text: It is art that makes life, makes interest, makes importance... and I know of no substitute whatever for the force and beauty of its process.

beauty.author: Alvin Ailey
beauty.text: From his roots as a slave, the American Negro - sometimes sorrowing, sometimes jubilant but always hopeful - has touched, illuminated, and influenced the most remote preserves of world civilisation. I and my dance theater celebrate this trembling beauty.

beauty.author: Ezra Taft Benson
beauty.text: The proud depend upon the world to tell them whether they have value or not. Their self-esteem is determined by where they are judged to be on the ladders of worldly success. They feel worthwhile as individuals if the numbers beneath them in achievement, talent, beauty, or intellect are large enough.

beauty.author: Sushant Singh Rajput
beauty.text: I despise women wearing too much makeup. It hides their actual beauty.

beauty.author: Emily Weiss
beauty.text: Sunscreen, in the world of beauty, is the ultimate in adulting.

beauty.author: Myles Munroe
beauty.text: Whenever I talk about the Bahamas and its beauty, I could never stop talking about my God, who has given us all of this beauty.

beauty.author: Hugh Hefner
beauty.text: The difference between Marilyn Monroe and the early Pamela Anderson is not that great. What's amazing is that the taste of American men and international tastes in terms of beauty have essentially stayed the same. Styles change, but our view of beauty stays the same.

beauty.author: Kevin McCloud
beauty.text: Every decently-made object, from a house to a lamp post to a bridge, spoon or egg cup, is not just a piece of 'stuff' but a physical embodiment of human energy, testimony to the magical ability of our species to take raw materials and turn them into things of use, value and beauty.

beauty.author: John Muir
beauty.text: When we contemplate the whole globe as one great dewdrop, striped and dotted with continents and islands, flying through space with other stars all singing and shining together as one, the whole universe appears as an infinite storm of beauty.

beauty.author: Johnny Depp
beauty.text: The beauty, the poetry of the fear in their eyes. I didn't mind going to jail for, what, five, six hours? It was absolutely worth it.

beauty.author: J. Paul Getty
beauty.text: The beauty one can find in art is one of the pitifully few real and lasting products of human endeavor.

beauty.author: Gordon Gee
beauty.text: The arts, quite simply, nourish the soul. They sustain, comfort, inspire. There is nothing like that exquisite moment when you first discover the beauty of connecting with others in celebration of larger ideals and shared wisdom.

beauty.author: Michelle Yeoh
beauty.text: For me, beauty comes from natural happiness. I think that a woman glows, and a man, even, when they're healthy and they're happy.

beauty.author: Sappho
beauty.text: Would Jove appoint some flower to reign, in matchless beauty on the plain, the Rose (mankind will all agree). The Rose the queen of flowers should be.

beauty.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
beauty.text: What finally is beauty? Certainly nothing that can be calculated or measured. It is always something imponderable, something that lies between things.

beauty.author: Jonathan Ive
beauty.text: There is beauty when something works and it works intuitively.

beauty.author: Tim Vine
beauty.text: Black beauty - he's a dark horse.

beauty.author: Rose Kennedy
beauty.text: I tell myself that God gave my children many gifts - spirit, beauty, intelligence, the capacity to make friends and to inspire respect. There was only one gift he held back - length of life.

beauty.author: Peggy Fleming
beauty.text: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks. This is the inner beauty of sports and competition, and it can serve us all well as adult athletes.

beauty.author: Jane Austen
beauty.text: To look almost pretty is an acquisition of higher delight to a girl who has been looking plain for the first fifteen years of her life than a beauty from her cradle can ever receive.

beauty.author: Jean Ingelow
beauty.text: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.

beauty.author: Gustave Courbet
beauty.text: Beauty, like truth, is relative to the time when one lives and to the individual who can grasp it. The expression of beauty is in direct ratio to the power of conception the artist has acquired.

beauty.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
beauty.text: The architect should strive continually to simplify; the ensemble of the rooms should then be carefully considered that comfort and utility may go hand in hand with beauty.

beauty.author: Northrop Frye
beauty.text: The pursuit of beauty is much more dangerous nonsense than the pursuit of truth or goodness, because it affords a stronger temptation to the ego.

beauty.author: Joel McHale
beauty.text: In prison, inmates sometimes use Cheetos and grape juice as makeup. I wouldn't use that beauty regimen around Britney Spears - she might lick your face off!

beauty.author: Lisa Bonet
beauty.text: What saddens me is the corruption of youth and beauty, and the loss of soul, which is only replaced by money.

beauty.author: Tyra Banks
beauty.text: Global warming will threaten our crops, so natural food will be scarce. Hourglass, curvy bodies will be the aspirational beauty standard, representing that those women have access to bounties of fulfilling yet healthy food, which means they are affluent.

beauty.author: Lindsay Lohan
beauty.text: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.

beauty.author: Prabal Gurung
beauty.text: To me, beauty is inclusion - every size, every color - that's the world I live in.

beauty.author: Serge Gainsbourg
beauty.text: Ugliness is in a way superior to beauty because it lasts.

beauty.author: Jane Smiley
beauty.text: I discovered that the horse is life itself, a metaphor but also an example of life's mystery and unpredictability, of life's generosity and beauty, a worthy object of repeated and ever changing contemplation.

beauty.author: Jonathan Van Ness
beauty.text: Self-care is the non-negotiable. That's the thing that you have to do. And beauty is the thing that can be the benefit of the self-care. Beauty is not the point. Beauty is just a cute side-effect from self-care.

beauty.author: Jessica Ennis-Hill
beauty.text: My idea of beauty is somebody that doesn't have to try too much, someone who is effortless and fresh.

beauty.author: Susan Sontag
beauty.text: The past itself, as historical change continues to accelerate, has become the most surreal of subjects - making it possible... to see a new beauty in what is vanishing.

beauty.author: Kathy Ireland
beauty.text: Beauty comes from the inside.

beauty.author: Claude Debussy
beauty.text: Beauty must appeal to the senses, must provide us with immediate enjoyment, must impress us or insinuate itself into us without any effort on our part.

beauty.author: Louise Nurding
beauty.text: I know people who've had a nose job, and they've walked out feeling a million dollars, and their confidence is tenfold. Good on them! Natural beauty comes in all different shapes and sizes, but if you think surgery would right something you have a problem with, then why shouldn't you do it?

beauty.author: Ana Tijoux
beauty.text: I think we live in a world where the most important thing is daily life: sharing a space with your family, making meals, being with your people. It's not only the idea of privacy, it's the beauty of the moment, at a time in the world when everything goes really fast - too fast.

beauty.author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand
beauty.text: An image of the Earth, its landscapes, directly affects people. The beauty of the Earth creates enormous emotion, and through that emotion, you can transmit knowledge and raise consciousness.

beauty.author: Euripides
beauty.text: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband.

beauty.author: Pearl S. Buck
beauty.text: Order is the shape upon which beauty depends.

beauty.author: John Milton
beauty.text: Beauty is nature's brag, and must be shown in courts, at feasts, and high solemnities, where most may wonder at the workmanship.

beauty.author: Sobhita Dhulipala
beauty.text: Miss Earth, to me, means a lot more than an international beauty pageant. It implies a larger than life celebration of spirit, beauty, passion, and betterment.

beauty.author: Khloe Kardashian
beauty.text: I think the beauty of growing up is not really knowing and figuring it out for yourself.

beauty.author: Michael Franti
beauty.text: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world.

beauty.author: Diane von Furstenberg
beauty.text: There's design, and there's art. Good design is total harmony. There's no better designer than nature - if you look at a branch or a leaf, it's perfect. It's all function. Art is different. It's about emotion. It's about suffering and beauty - but mostly suffering!

beauty.author: Jonathan Sacks
beauty.text: Part of the beauty of Judaism, and surely this is so for other faiths also, is that it gently restores control over time. Three times a day we stop what we are doing and turn to God in prayer. We recover perspective. We inhale a deep breath of eternity.

beauty.author: George Harrison
beauty.text: If I go to someplace like Switzerland, I find a lot of uptight people because they're living amongst so much beauty; there's no urgency in trying to find the beauty within themselves. If you're stuck in New York, you have to somehow look within yourself - otherwise, you'd go crackers.

beauty.author: Howard Carter
beauty.text: We were astonished by the beauty and refinement of the art displayed by the objects surpassing all we could have imagined - the impression was overwhelming.

beauty.author: Matthew Bourne
beauty.text: I had daydreamed through many performances of Swan Lake, thinking the dancing tutus only ever conveyed one aspect of swans: their beauty gliding on water. I wondered what it would be like to use male dancers and bring out swans' aggressive, muscular side.

beauty.author: Tina Knowles
beauty.text: I believe in the power of great clothing. It can evoke confidence, beauty, and a sense of glamour.

beauty.author: Jack Kerouac
beauty.text: I made myself famous by writing 'songs' and lyrics about the beauty of the things I did and ugliness, too.

beauty.author: James Beattie
beauty.text: And beauty immortal awakes from the tomb.

beauty.author: Vitruvius
beauty.text: Beauty is produced by the pleasing appearance and good taste of the whole, and by the dimensions of all the parts being duly proportioned to each other.

beauty.author: Rod Stewart
beauty.text: Fast cars like Porsches and Ferraris - they are things of beauty.

beauty.author: Frank Sinatra
beauty.text: I am a thing of beauty.

beauty.author: Robin Roberts
beauty.text: My mama told me in college, 'I love you, and you're God's child, but natural beauty will only take you so far.'

beauty.author: Alan Ball
beauty.text: Beauty is in the strangest places. A piece of garbage floating in the wind. And that beauty exists in America. It exists everywhere. You have to develop an eye for it and be able to see it.

beauty.author: Ernst Haas
beauty.text: All I wanted was to connect my moods with those of Paris. Beauty paints and when it painted most, I shot.

beauty.author: Stephen Hawking
beauty.text: Most sets of values would give rise to universes that, although they might be very beautiful, would contain no one able to wonder at that beauty.

beauty.author: Daniel Kaluuya
beauty.text: The beauty of any artwork is that it becomes the person that's watching it: What do you take out of it?

beauty.author: Chita Rivera
beauty.text: Beauty is not everything!

beauty.author: Spike Milligan
beauty.text: The experience of being in the Army changed my whole life; I never believed that an organization such as ours could ever go to war, leave alone win it. It was, as Yeats remarked of the Easter Rising, 'A terrible beauty.'

beauty.author: Ishmael Beah
beauty.text: We all find joy and radiance and a reason to move on even in the most dire of circumstances. Even in chaos and madness, there's still a beauty that comes from just the vibrancy of another human spirit.

beauty.author: Christian Louboutin
beauty.text: People say I am the king of painful shoes. I don't want to create painful shoes, but it is not my job to create something comfortable. I try to make high heels as comfortable as they can be, but my priority is design, beauty and sexiness. I'm not against them, but comfort is not my focus.

beauty.author: Fatema Mernissi
beauty.text: The woman with dark hair, wide hips, and a few extra pounds has always been the essence of beauty in Morocco.

beauty.author: Gustav Stickley
beauty.text: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea.

beauty.author: Kevyn Aucoin
beauty.text: Beauty is about perception, not about make-up. I think the beginning of all beauty is knowing and liking oneself. You can't put on make-up, or dress yourself, or do you hair with any sort of fun or joy if you're doing it from a position of correction.

beauty.author: Mark Barrowcliffe
beauty.text: The rainforest has an intense beauty that at times seems almost suffocating. The jungle is one twig short of impenetrable, and the greenery seems to crowd in on you with a sensation that has been described as akin to snow blindness.

beauty.author: Marcel Duchamp
beauty.text: I am still a victim of chess. It has all the beauty of art - and much more. It cannot be commercialized. Chess is much purer than art in its social position.

beauty.author: Liz Goldwyn
beauty.text: Sunscreen is my number one beauty product that goes on even when I am indoors.

beauty.author: Agnes Martin
beauty.text: When I think of art I think of beauty. Beauty is the mystery of life. It is not in the eye it is in the mind. In our minds there is awareness of perfection.

beauty.author: Grace Paley
beauty.text: In the end, long life is the reward, strength, and beauty.

beauty.author: Saul Leiter
beauty.text: I may be old-fashioned. But I believe there is such a thing as a search for beauty - a delight in the nice things in the world. And I don't think one should have to apologise for it.

beauty.author: Dolly Parton
beauty.text: I'm no natural beauty. If I'm gonna have any looks at all, I'm gonna have to create them.

beauty.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan
beauty.text: A person however learned and qualified in his life's work in whom gratitude is absent, is devoid of that beauty of character which makes personality fragrant.

beauty.author: Tobin Heath
beauty.text: I was always inspired by Brazilian football growing up. Those huge Nike campaigns, the Jogo Bonito campaigns that had Ronaldinho, that's the beauty of the game that I love.

beauty.author: Nadine Gordimer
beauty.text: Truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is.

beauty.author: Margaret Bourke-White
beauty.text: The beauty of the past belongs to the past.

beauty.author: Bretman Rock
beauty.text: I get to escape this crazy world that I live in. I think that's the true beauty of running.

beauty.author: Edward Gibbon
beauty.text: Beauty is an outward gift which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.

beauty.author: Sonia Rykiel
beauty.text: Knowing yourself, and learning to love yourself as you are, is the beginning of beauty. I think the most important thing is to show off what's most beautiful about you and to hide what's less beautiful.

beauty.author: Elizabeth Peyton
beauty.text: Romanticism is not just about being in a fixed state of endless beauty, because you can't live like that or live on that, that's what I've learnt.

beauty.author: Christian de Portzamparc
beauty.text: We need to rediscover the essence of the meaning of 'the use.' Architecture is, above all, here for a better living. Every gesture, every shape must be justified by various reasons that would reinforce their reason to be, their use, and will give more sense to their beauty.

beauty.author: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala
beauty.text: I think true love - love, wine and beauty, they better with age.

beauty.author: Alessandro Michele
beauty.text: There is something special about the beauty in the unclear, the ambiguity, the in-between that you can't totally recognise.

beauty.author: Saint Teresa of Avila
beauty.text: Nothing can be compared to the great beauty and capabilities of a soul; however keen our intellects may be, they are as unable to comprehend them as to comprehend God, for, as He has told us, He created us in His own image and likeness.

beauty.author: Bela Karolyi
beauty.text: Genetics is all about showcasing human beauty along with high-quality performance.

beauty.author: Sarah McLachlan
beauty.text: There's beauty everywhere. There are amazing things happening everywhere, you just have to be able to open your eyes and witness it. Some days, that's harder than others.

beauty.author: Kerry James Marshall
beauty.text: When you go to an art museum, the thing you're least likely to encounter is a picture of a black person. When it comes to ideas about art and about beauty, the black figure is absent.

beauty.author: Pablo Picasso
beauty.text: Art is not the application of a canon of beauty but what the instinct and the brain can conceive beyond any canon. When we love a woman we don't start measuring her limbs.

beauty.author: Conor Oberst
beauty.text: If the world could remain within a frame like a painting on the wall, I think we'd see the beauty then and stand staring in awe.

beauty.author: Ellen Hopkins
beauty.text: Nonfiction speaks to the head. Fiction speaks to the heart. Poetry speaks to the soul. It's the essence of beauty. The essence of pain. It pleases the eye and the ear.

beauty.author: Thelma Golden
beauty.text: The privilege I've had as a curator is not just the discovery of new works... but what I've discovered about myself and what I can offer in the space of an exhibition - to talk about beauty, to talk about power, to talk about ourselves, and to talk and speak to each other.

beauty.author: Raheem DeVaughn
beauty.text: Every flaw, scar, or mark you may have adds to your beauty.

beauty.author: Andrew Weil
beauty.text: A beautiful bouquet or a long-lasting flowering plant is a traditional gift for women, but I have recommended that both men and women keep fresh flowers in the home for their beauty, fragrance, and the lift they give our spirits.

beauty.author: Urs Fischer
beauty.text: Life is one long decay, no? There's a lot of beauty in it. Like the patina in an old city.

beauty.author: George Bancroft
beauty.text: Beauty is but the sensible image of the Infinite. Like truth and justice it lives within us; like virtue and the moral law it is a companion of the soul.

beauty.author: Shirley MacLaine
beauty.text: I wasn't afraid of getting old, because I was never a great beauty.

beauty.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar
beauty.text: Beauty is the disinterested one, without which the ancient world refused to understand itself, a word which both imperceptibly and yet unmistakably has bid farewell to our new world, a world of interests, leaving it to its own avarice and sadness.

beauty.author: Jean Paul Gaultier
beauty.text: I would like to say to people, open your eyes and find beauty where you normally don't expect it.

beauty.author: Eduardo Galeano
beauty.text: The history of soccer is a sad voyage from beauty to duty. When the sport became an industry, the beauty that blossoms from the joy of play got torn out by its very roots.

beauty.author: Cote de Pablo
beauty.text: I've seen the majestic beauty of nature and the overwhelming perfection of it. To me, there's nothing closer to God than that.

beauty.author: Eileen Ford
beauty.text: I feel that my ideas of beauty have been given very strong backing by Botticelli and a few others: Slender hands, long neck, long limbs - look at Nefertiti. She was very teensy-weensy with a long neck and wide-spaced eyes.

beauty.author: Pat McGrath
beauty.text: Social media has revolutionised how beauty is curated, captured, and consumed.

beauty.author: Timothy Morton
beauty.text: Kant described beauty as a feeling of ungraspability: this is why the beauty experience is beyond concept.

beauty.author: Abhinav Bindra
beauty.text: The beauty of having goals in life is that it drives you and when that is lost you lose a lot of meaning in life.

beauty.author: Pope Francis
beauty.text: When I was a seminarian, I was dazzled by a girl I met at an uncle's wedding. I was surprised by her beauty, her intellectual brilliance... and, well, I was bowled over for quite a while.

beauty.author: Tia Carrere
beauty.text: Beauty lasts five minutes. Maybe longer if you have a good plastic surgeon.

beauty.author: Karan Patel
beauty.text: My ideal woman would be someone with both beauty and intelligence. Someone who can hold her own in a conversation, gets along with my family and respects elders, loves children, and have a sense of humour as whacky as mine.

beauty.author: Hector Hugh Munro
beauty.text: I always say beauty is only sin deep.

beauty.author: Ann Demeulemeester
beauty.text: Beauty of mind creates freedom. Freedom of mind creates beauty.

beauty.author: H. P. Lovecraft
beauty.text: The cat is such a perfect symbol of beauty and superiority that it seems scarcely possible for any true aesthete and civilised cynic to do other than worship it.

beauty.author: Charles Baudelaire
beauty.text: Beauty is the sole ambition, the exclusive goal of Taste.

beauty.author: John Clayton
beauty.text: There is no racial or ethnic involvement in Thanksgiving, and people who may be very distant from the Christian system can see the beauty and the positive spirit that comes from the holiday.

beauty.author: Aasif Mandvi
beauty.text: I think Islam has been hijacked by the idea that all Muslims are terrorists; that Islam is about hate, about war, about jihad - I think that hijacks the spirituality and beauty that exists within Islam. I believe in allowing Islam to be seen in context and in its entirety and being judged on what it really is, not what you think it is.

beauty.author: Andre Gide
beauty.text: Through loyalty to the past, our mind refuses to realize that tomorrow's joy is possible only if today's makes way for it; that each wave owes the beauty of its line only to the withdrawal of the preceding one.

beauty.author: Dita Von Teese
beauty.text: My beauty icons are women whose images are self-created.

beauty.author: Sam Smith
beauty.text: I find short, fast romances romantic. There's a beauty to dark imagery.

cool.author: Walt Whitman
cool.text: Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.

cool.author: Deng Xiaoping
cool.text: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead - but aim to do something big.

cool.author: Mitch Hedberg
cool.text: Is a hippopotamus a hippopotamus, or just a really cool Opotamus?

cool.author: Kurt Cobain
cool.text: Rather be dead than cool.

cool.author: Steven Adler
cool.text: Nothing is cooler and more attractive than a big comeback, and that'll be me.

cool.author: Jay-Z
cool.text: I'm a mirror. If you're cool with me, I'm cool with you, and the exchange starts. What you see is what you reflect. If you don't like what you see, then you've done something. If I'm standoffish, that's because you are.

cool.author: Leonardo DiCaprio
cool.text: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual.

cool.author: Joyce Meyer
cool.text: It's so important to realize that every time you get upset, it drains your emotional energy. Losing your cool makes you tired. Getting angry a lot messes with your health.

cool.author: Richard M. Nixon
cool.text: I can take it. The tougher it gets, the cooler I get.

cool.author: John Ray
cool.text: Good words cool more than cold water.

cool.author: Thomas Jefferson
cool.text: Nothing gives one person so much advantage over another as to remain always cool and unruffled under all circumstances.

cool.author: George Fox
cool.text: Be still and cool in thine own mind and spirit.

cool.author: Marc Newson
cool.text: To create well I have to be in a good mood, happy and cool.

cool.author: Norman Cousins
cool.text: He who keeps his cool best wins.

cool.author: Peabo Bryson
cool.text: I think you create your own hipness.

cool.author: Celine Dion
cool.text: I've never been cool - and I don't care.

cool.author: Dave Chappelle
cool.text: I'm cool with failing so long as I know that there are people around me that love me unconditionally.

cool.author: Solomon Burke
cool.text: The secret was to just be cool, stay in God's graces, and work it out.

cool.author: Vanessa Hudgens
cool.text: Being cool is being your own self, not doing something that someone else is telling you to do.

cool.author: Elia Kazan
cool.text: Whatever hysteria exists is inflamed by mystery, suspicion and secrecy. Hard and exact facts will cool it.

cool.author: Kesha
cool.text: You don't have to carry a designer bag that costs more than a car to look cool.

cool.author: Selena Gomez
cool.text: Being cool, having a 'cool' energy is just not attractive to me.

cool.author: Angelina Jolie
cool.text: All women do have a different sense of sexuality, or sense of fun, or sense of like what's sexy or cool or tough.

cool.author: Mark Spitz
cool.text: I just tried to keep my cool and continue with my race plan: to win.

cool.author: Woodrow Wilson
cool.text: One cool judgment is worth a thousand hasty counsels. The thing to do is to supply light and not heat.

cool.author: Johnny Weir
cool.text: I suppose being fierce is a very good thing, and a very cool thing. But more than fierce, I think I'm a strong person and a strong individual. And that's what I take with me every day.

cool.author: Michelle Obama
cool.text: I never cut class. I loved getting A's, I liked being smart. I liked being on time. I thought being smart is cooler than anything in the world.

cool.author: Rufus Wainwright
cool.text: Being uncool is being pretty much the coolest you can be.

cool.author: Anthony Kiedis
cool.text: Sometimes life's so much cooler when you just don't know any better and all the painful lessons have not hammered your head open yet.

cool.author: Ashley Olsen
cool.text: I don't think of myself as hot or cool or anything, just a dork.

cool.author: Demetri Martin
cool.text: I think it would be cool if you were writing a ransom note on your computer, if the paper clip popped up and said, 'Looks like you're writing a ransom note. Need help? You should use more forceful language, you'll get more money.'

cool.author: Adam Brody
cool.text: And in a world without heroes, as the movie trailer voice-over guy might say, the slightly awkward can be slightly cool.

cool.author: Janet Jackson
cool.text: Competition is great. And as long as it's friendly and not a malicious thing, then I think it's cool.

cool.author: Jeremy London
cool.text: I don't need to hang out in a posse and try to act cool.

cool.author: Robert Pattinson
cool.text: Sometimes just when I say hello the right way, I'm like, 'Whoa, I'm so cool.'

cool.author: Adlai Stevenson I
cool.text: To act coolly, intelligently and prudently in perilous circumstances is the test of a man - and also a nation.

cool.author: Usher
cool.text: I'm a flamboyant type of guy, a cooler version of Liberace.

cool.author: Harry Styles
cool.text: I think you have to be cool to be a good flirt, and I don't think I'm very cool.

cool.author: Missy Elliott
cool.text: I want kids of this generation to see that everything is cool, that there's some kind of unity in hip-hop. We all found something that's really important to us, and music is all we've really got.

cool.author: Bonnie Raitt
cool.text: I never saw music in terms of men and women or black and white. There was just cool and uncool.

cool.author: Kelly Clarkson
cool.text: I'm cute - and God I hate that. Because that's not cool. I'm like your niece, and nobody wants to date their niece. It's the chubby cheeks. The whole reason people voted for me on American Idol is because I'm an everyday, normal girl.

cool.author: Adrian Edmondson
cool.text: A lot of people are obsessed with looking cool. They feel they have to look after their image.

cool.author: Barbara Kruger
cool.text: Prominence is cool, but when the delusion kicks in it can be a drag. Especially if you choose to surround yourself with friends and not acolytes.

cool.author: Cher
cool.text: Some years I'm the coolest thing that ever happened, and then the next year everyone's so over me, and I'm just so past my sell date.

cool.author: John Mayer
cool.text: I've never done anything because I thought it would look cool.

cool.author: Dave Barry
cool.text: The simple truth is that balding African-American men look cool when they shave their heads, whereas balding white men look like giant thumbs.

cool.author: Leslie Fiedler
cool.text: I have, I admit, a low tolerance for detached chronicling and cool analysis.

cool.author: Stephen Colbert
cool.text: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?

cool.author: Rob Corddry
cool.text: Apparently it's cool to watch The Daily Show.

cool.author: Channing Tatum
cool.text: I think all jocks have a sensitive side. It's just, will they show it to anybody? Will they let their guard down and stop being tough and the cool jock guy around their friends, or just relax? I don't know if it's best to say opening up, but just relax and really say what you're actually thinking, and not what you think people want to hear.

cool.author: Emeril Lagasse
cool.text: The cool thing is that now that people have made this evolution where cooking is cool, people are doing it on weekends, they're doing their own challenges. It's back to cooking. And it's real cooking.

cool.author: Martin Lawrence
cool.text: You can be cool and at the same time respect your woman, who will hopefully become your wife, who will hopefully become the mother of your kids. America needs to get back to family values.

cool.author: Jim Carrey
cool.text: Morgan Freeman is so class. He's so cool. He's so scary.

cool.author: Tony Dungy
cool.text: People look at me and see a calm, cool guy on the sidelines and I want them to know that my Christian faith affects my coaching and everything I do.

cool.author: Elena Kagan
cool.text: It was a very cool thing to be a smart girl, as opposed to some other, different kind. And I think that made a great deal of difference to me growing up and in my life afterward.

cool.author: Lenny Kravitz
cool.text: People see my photos and think I labor over my image and I'm this cool, brooding artist. But I'm just having fun with it.

cool.author: Ricky Skaggs
cool.text: Country's hip; it's cool music.

cool.author: Vin Diesel
cool.text: You get a timeless cool card in New York.

cool.author: Daniel Radcliffe
cool.text: The nerds are the ones that make the films and do loads of other really cool stuff in their life.

cool.author: Paul Walker
cool.text: When I was younger, the pressure was just being cool. I never thought of myself as a cool guy. I always thought of myself as more of the goofy guy.

cool.author: William H. Macy
cool.text: Everyone hooks up with George Clooney. He's a genuinely cool guy. He's using his powers for good.

cool.author: Brian Molko
cool.text: Placebo is music for outsiders, by outsiders and our gigs are like conventions of outcasts, which is cool.

cool.author: Beth Ditto
cool.text: All this fashion stuff - who's cool now - is just a bigger version of the cool kids versus the nerds.

cool.author: Kehlani
cool.text: I was in art school, and we had all these random classes. We'd listen to a lot of Bollywood. I'd listen to Spanish music - and I don't even speak Spanish, but Hector Lavoe is amazing - we listened to French music like Edith Piaf. She's tight. I like cool vocal inflections; I like cool sounds. I pretty much listen to anything I think is good.

cool.author: Scott Thompson
cool.text: In France, everyone speaks French 'cause they think it's cool. Gives 'em, gives 'em an excuse to smoke.

cool.author: Clyde Edgerton
cool.text: Because we men have been physically stronger and more arrogant, we've influenced much of the cool stuff of the world, like basing the definition of courage on what we do on battlefields rather than on the patience or endurance or tolerance necessary for a sometimes painful daily grind that includes small children.

cool.author: Ross Butler
cool.text: People in high school either feel like they're with the cool kids in a clique, or they're isolated - there's no in-between.

cool.author: Tyler, The Creator
cool.text: I'm like a big 10-year-old when I'm on stage. I just go up there and do whatever I think is cool at the moment.

cool.author: Selena
cool.text: What's really cool about our family is that we don't hold grudges, and I think that is what's been the key to the success. We get into our little disagreements, and whether we're right or wrong, we'll go and apologize. That's just the way we are.

cool.author: Adam Brody
cool.text: I have been in teen shows for years, so doing that stuff - kissing - is kind of commonplace and not a big deal. It was way more cool just because it was Meg Ryan.

cool.author: Derek Theler
cool.text: I wound up getting my degree in sports medicine and nutrition because I wanted to work in the medical field. But I wound up taking a trip to Los Angeles and decided being an actor sounds pretty cool, too.

cool.author: Britney Spears
cool.text: I do love Instagram, and my kids are with me, like, 24-7, so it's inevitable that they'll be on there. And honestly, I know it sounds weird, but I look up people all the time on it. Because I find people so interesting, and I'm curious about them. It's a gateway to meet new people. I think the whole concept of Instagram is really cool.

cool.author: Rupert Grint
cool.text: For me the stunts are so cool, they're one of my favourite things when we're doing the film.

cool.author: Masego
cool.text: I thought I was cool until I left the country. I went to Tokyo, and I was like, man, why am I wearing these jorts?

cool.author: Manny Montana
cool.text: When you're young, it's all about the society of school and being cool, but they don't understand that somebody can be different and live a different lifestyle and still be a regular person. I was the same way when I was a kid.

cool.author: Colin Hanks
cool.text: I didn't want to come up with some generic Johnny Bravo type name. I'm not that cool, so I might as well stick with my birth name.

cool.author: David Harbour
cool.text: The interesting thing about my career is for years I was trying to do that thing of getting in shape and looking cool - I would look at myself in camera angles and think how my chin looked the best and all this stuff. And I really couldn't get that much work.

cool.author: Andre Iguodala
cool.text: I used to be PlayStation only, but Xbox 360 is really cool, so we play 'Live' and 'Tiger.'

cool.author: Gigi Hadid
cool.text: High school is when I started to get my sense of fashion together. My queen was Candice Swanepoel, who is a friend of mine now, which is kind of funny, but in high school, I was obsessed. I love her street style: she is always in cool boyfriend jeans, boots, and an awesome coat, which is very much like what I wear.

cool.author: Finn Wolfhard
cool.text: It was cool when the Duffers assigned a list of movies to watch.

cool.author: JoJo Siwa
cool.text: I think going on tour, having lots of songs and music videos would be super cool.

cool.author: Trish Goff
cool.text: The bubble bowl! Yes, that made my career, and I should be grateful. I was stomping my feet when Garren was giving me that haircut. It's hard to say to a 17-year-old girl in 1993 that a bowl haircut was cool.

cool.author: Lukas Forchhammer
cool.text: Graham was my father's second name, so I took Graham because Lukas Graham sounded cool.

cool.author: Roseanne Barr
cool.text: I'm a farmer now, and it's fantastic. My goal is to be totally self-sufficient and grow everything that I eat. There's something about earning your dinner that's cool.

cool.author: Henry Rollins
cool.text: I wonder what it's like to be from a state that is spread across a few islands way out in the Pacific Ocean, only added to the United States in 1959. Not only that but to be the birthplace of America's first black president? Pretty cool, I bet.

cool.author: Sofia Richie
cool.text: My friend Chloe Bartoli is a really cool stylist. I've talked about fashion with her a lot over the years. And I love Rihanna - she's rad. Through modeling, I've gotten to know a lot of designers that are really cool. Stefano and Domenico of Dolce & Gabbana have been really sweet.

cool.author: Adrian Edmondson
cool.text: On stage, we just want to generate hysteria. We don't care about looking cool or posing.

cool.author: Ella Mai
cool.text: It's been cool to have my name mentioned when people say R&B is on the comeback and I'm the leading person. If you had told me at 16 that I would be that person - you're lying.

cool.author: Michelle Yeoh
cool.text: In a movie, that's the only time when you're allowed these kind of fantasies to be lived. Being able to look so cool and be able to fight five bad guys and take them down. When can you do that?

cool.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
cool.text: Death is staring too long into the burning sun and the relief of entering a cool, dark room.

cool.author: El-P
cool.text: Standing up for what you believe is right, as well as standing up for what you believe is funny, standing up for what you believe is cool. As we found each other and the music that we do, we get to live out all of those things. That's what Run The Jewels is: it's all of those aspects of our personality.

cool.author: Jonny Kim
cool.text: Controlled aggression, to me, is one of the most important traits to have. To have that social intelligence to know when to exert aggression in the military environment, and when to stay calm, cool, and collected.

cool.author: Tracy Morgan
cool.text: I have snakes, three sharks, moray eels, piranhas, five scorpions and a bird spider. All of them are predators. They are dangerous but it's cool to have strong and powerful pets.

cool.author: Zoe Kravitz
cool.text: I live in Brooklyn, in Williamsburg, so I just like to wander around. Williamsburg's such a cool little neighborhood community spot.

cool.author: Pat Benatar
cool.text: When you have girl children, they torture you! If at any moment of the day I ever think I'm remotely cool at all, which is hardly ever, I have two daughters who make sure that never happens. They say, 'Mom, you didn't really wear that?' And I say, 'Yes, and pretty much everyone saw it.'

cool.author: Amy Klobuchar
cool.text: I actually spoke at the christening of the USS Minnesota - it was a really, very cool submarine in Norfolk.

cool.author: Alan Walker
cool.text: I actually admire the Indian artiste 'Lost Stories.' He made a remix of my song 'Faded.' That is really good and cool because it actually represented Indian music. I just loved the song; it so unique.

cool.author: Lou Gehrig
cool.text: The ballplayer who loses his head, who can't keep his cool, is worse than no ballplayer at all.

cool.author: Coco Rocha
cool.text: To be honest, the thing is I don't really like clothes. I mean, it is cool, but I like tech. I am a tech girl. A secret nerd - there, I said it.

cool.author: Ashley Madekwe
cool.text: I throw a leather biker jacket over everything. It adds an instant downtown cool vibe and stops a look becoming too girlie. Bonus points if you wear it like a cape!

cool.author: Nat Wolff
cool.text: Paul McCartney and The Beatles in general are my idols. And I love Sting. I got to meet Sting. That was really cool. Dustin Hoffman is my favorite actor. Also, I think of Magic Johnson as an idol.

cool.author: Metro Boomin
cool.text: Wiz is a cool guy, humble guy, down to Earth guy. You would really think he was just a regular guy if you didn't know who he was. But he still has a superstar aura about him.

cool.author: Eiza Gonzalez
cool.text: I'm born and raised in Mexico. I only spent eight months in the States, but definitely English is a really big part of my life, and I love it. Thank God my mom put me in American school because I'm able to be working in the States, and it opens a lot more doors being half and not being only one. It's cool because I get to turn it on and off.

cool.author: David Longstreth
cool.text: Kanye has this discursive way of working, getting input from a range of people, that I thought was really cool.

cool.author: Jay-Z
cool.text: I've always believed in good music over bad music. I believe in two sorts of musics. And the lines that separate us, I don't believe in that. That's for people who need to easily define what they're hearing. Me, I'm cool with everything and anything I'm hearing that's music. It comes under one definition for me.

cool.author: Mikey Madison
cool.text: I got to spend a week with Lenny Kravitz while we were filming his arc, which was very exciting. This guy is so cool and amazing that beforehand I felt so uncool and nervous.

cool.author: Rick Bayless
cool.text: Chicago is a city of neighborhoods, and I love that. It's cool to have different foods from all over the world within a stone's throw of my house.

cool.author: Evanna Lynch
cool.text: Sometimes, the other characters are too normal and then you start to be brought back to reality but then Luna shows up and she is just so funny and cool and honest and slightly mad and she's all that matters. She is 100% true. She puts on no shows, because she is so comfortable with herself.

cool.author: Amine
cool.text: I don't know Prince's music like the back of my hand, but I was always a fan of him as an artist - just the way he was a person who did not care about what people thought and did his own thing and I thought that was so cool.

cool.author: Elizabeth Gilbert
cool.text: And we have a little herb garden, which survived the winter thanks to global warming. It makes me feel like a cool, old Italian housewife, that I kept my rosemary alive outside all winter.

cool.author: Steve Erickson
cool.text: Can anything be less cool than defending the motion picture academy?

cool.author: Orlando Jones
cool.text: In New York, people are pretty cool, and you don't catch a lot of grief. But in certain spots, man, it's over. If I stand in the same place for more than 20 minutes or 10 minutes or something, there'll be 40 people standing there, all screaming something different.

cool.author: Shepard Fairey
cool.text: If I spend time conceiving and making a piece of art, and somebody else sees that it has market value and replicates it in order to steal part of my market, then that's not cool.

cool.author: Colton Underwood
cool.text: My mom had me when she was 24, so I want to be a young, cool dad.

cool.author: Constance Marie
cool.text: Okay - before I even had a baby, I would dream of the day I could make ponytails on my kid. I don't know why. I somehow got it in my head that it would be such a cool thing.

cool.author: Jack Dangermond
cool.text: Cartography and geographic thinking are cool.

cool.author: Clive Owen
cool.text: Parenthood and family come first for me, and when I'm not working I'm cool with the Teletubbies.

cool.author: Blake Michael
cool.text: I'm a magician. I've learned to do some really cool tricks like levitating myself and melting forks.

cool.author: Amanda Shires
cool.text: The cool thing about Americana is that the genre is accepting of all types of music.

cool.author: David Grinspoon
cool.text: There's something cool about being involved in new missions to other planets.

cool.author: Rick Harrison
cool.text: I'm not that cool; I'm just a bookworm.

cool.author: Amy Macdonald
cool.text: My sister and I both used to wear matching clothes and now my mum, sister and I have the same bag which we all use even when together. Which probably doesn't look that cool.

cool.author: Lil' Kim
cool.text: But this is Miami, you can't come to Miami and not show any skin. You gotta show something. If you're all covered up in this heat, you're gonna make me pass out out just to look at you. It's sweaty in Miami-but the diamonds will keep me cool.

cool.author: Atif Aslam
cool.text: You are thinking about the music, about the mathematics of it. It's time-consuming and energy-consuming at the same time. That's why I take my time off, my family time, as inspirational. I cool off.

cool.author: Saweetie
cool.text: It's cool to go into the simplicity of fashion, but I'm a very colorful person.

cool.author: Denzel Curry
cool.text: Carol City has its hot moments, and it has its cool moments. If you were from one area of Carol City, people didn't mess with you.

cool.author: Daniel Bryan
cool.text: I didn't really grow up playing video games. I had an original Nintendo after the original Nintendo was cool.

cool.author: Declan Donnelly
cool.text: I've never massively minded not being cool.

cool.author: Christopher Miller
cool.text: What's really cool about LEGOs is that you can put a bunch of bricks on the table, and everybody will make something different. Everyone has different ideas, and some of them may seem crazy.

cool.author: Diane Kruger
cool.text: Orlando's a really cool guy. They hired him for 'Lord of the Rings' out of drama school. He's very new at this still and doesn't have a lot of experience. So we were in this together and we've tried to help each other out. We felt very equal which was good.

cool.author: Amy Bloom
cool.text: I was the kind of reader in smudged pink harlequin glasses sitting on the cool, dusty floor of the Arrandale public library, standing at the edge of the playground, having broken a tooth in dodge ball, and lying under my covers with a flashlight.

cool.author: Alessandra Ambrosio
cool.text: In the summer I wear shorts with a bright top and ankle boots or just sandals. I'll add a nice scarf, maybe a hat, some cool sunglasses. It's all about the accessories.

cool.author: David Tennant
cool.text: I've always been a geek and slightly awkward... slightly umm... I was never the cool kid at school.

cool.author: Gerrit Cole
cool.text: What I've been able to do is pretty cool, but there is a lot of room for improvement.

cool.author: Chris Brown
cool.text: I like low-maintenance girls, but at the same time, classy. She needs to take care of herself. But also be a girl who isn't afraid to get sweaty and play basketball, so it's cool if she's a tomboy.

cool.author: Cody Simpson
cool.text: The Wish Factory did a tremendous job and I am amazed at how closely the doll resembles me. The clothes are modeled off actual stuff I wear, which is pretty cool.

cool.author: Georgina Campbell
cool.text: I would love to say something really cool, because I did film studies. So, like, a Jean-Luc Goddard film - something like that. But I genuinely would love to be in 'Titanic.' I'm such a loser. That's, like, my childhood film. Like, I love it.

cool.author: James Hetfield
cool.text: We do this basically for ourselves. People appreciate it, which is cool, but I think they appreciate that we're doing it for ourselves. We're doing it our way, and how people like it is not up to us. We like it.

cool.author: Roxane Gay
cool.text: Pink is my favourite colour. I used to say my favourite colour was black to be cool, but it is pink - all shades of pink. If I have an accessory, it is probably pink.

cool.author: Cody Garbrandt
cool.text: As long as you are an active fighter, no, we're not cool.

cool.author: Tucker Max
cool.text: I try to explain to people that the only way to be cool is to be who you truly are, and the only way to live life is to do the things that you want to do and be the person that you want to be no matter who that is or what that is or how you have to do it. That's the only way you can be genuinely happy.

cool.author: Eva Chen
cool.text: I know how I shop and how I am inspired to buy things, and the majority of it is from Instagram. I look at people like Yasmin Sewell and Leandra Medine from the Man Repeller, as well as the countless models that have really cool street style, for inspiration all the time.

cool.author: CL
cool.text: In my point of view, bad girl is not a villain. Like, people in the United States use 'bad' as referring to something cool. So it means 'Cool girl.' I wish CL was like that.

cool.author: Taylor Momsen
cool.text: My legs are really long and that's cool apparently, but I'm totally klutzy. I mean, I'm like Bambi. I fall all over myself because I can't control my arms and my really long legs.

cool.author: Lorde
cool.text: My advice to young people wanting to make music and to be in this industry is to really spend your time making music. Make so much music you have no friends. Make music. Figure out what it is you love, and... because if you're making cool art, then everything else will fall into line.

cool.author: Sammi Giancola
cool.text: My dad was a huge Yankees fan, huge Jets fan - he's really into sports. He had all sorts of memorabilia and cool things around the house. I would always just sit and watch Yankees games with my dad. Growing up, I was just very involved with the Jets, Yankees and sports because of my dad.

cool.author: Lewis Hamilton
cool.text: It's a pretty cool feeling to be the person to knock down a barrier - just like the Williams sisters did in tennis or Tiger Woods in golf.

cool.author: Landon Donovan
cool.text: I grew up playing video games. And the cool thing about the EA Sports games is they took me through the whole motion-capture thing, where they put little sensors on my body so the video game really is me. It actually moves the way I move.

cool.author: Lucy DeVito
cool.text: I used to wear bandanas around my head and beaded necklaces that I had made myself. This was my 'cool' outfit that I was convinced would bring me attention.

cool.author: Donald Byrd
cool.text: They use all of the music that I did in the '50s, '60s and the '70s behind people like Tupac and LL Cool J. I'm into all that stuff.

cool.author: Emily Weiss
cool.text: Glossier is really for anyone who wants to embrace the present and live in the now. It's about embracing constant change and who you are at any given moment, and that's often someone who's imperfect - and that's cool.

cool.author: Tyrus
cool.text: Anybody that thinks hanging out with Snoop is fun, is cool, you're in for a rude awakening because he is the most down to earth, boring dude ever.

cool.author: Austin Butler
cool.text: Film and television are just different. Film is cool because it's a complete package. You know the beginning, middle, and end. You can plan it out more, which I like. But with television you get a new script every week, so it's constantly a mystery as to what you're going to be doing.

cool.author: Lance Gross
cool.text: I'd rate myself an 8. I do have my flaws, but I'm a cool dude. If I wasn't myself, I'd kick it with me. I'm a down-to-earth person and all around cool guy.

cool.author: Sylvester Stallone
cool.text: Crunches are much more effective than regular sit-ups because they specifically target your upper abdominal muscles rather than your hip muscles. If you're not used to them, they can cause soreness a day or two later, but it's a 'cool' soreness. A badge of honor.

cool.author: Coco Rocha
cool.text: If you are a new, upcoming designer, you've got to think of new, cool ways to make the industry look at you. Don't just get stuck in a rut, show your clothes, and be like, 'You should like this.'

cool.author: Kevin Hart
cool.text: You make yourself broad. You make yourself appealing. 'Hey, y'all, I'm cool with everybody.' That's my message.

cool.author: El-P
cool.text: You put a piece of music out, and it's not in your hands anymore, and that's cool with me.

cool.author: Chris Cubas
cool.text: Kansas City, well, part of the town's pretty cool, and part of the town is not. But it's gonna be that way no matter where you go.

cool.author: Nathan Fillion
cool.text: I think my printing to this day looks like the printing right out of a comic book. Actually, I always wanted to be in a comic book. I watched cartoons when I was a kid, too, and both comics and cartoons lit fire in my imagination. This realm holds a lot of interest for me, a lot of passion for me. So to be comic-ized, yeah, that's cool.

cool.author: Patrick Mahomes
cool.text: It's pretty cool just to see the support we have. It's unmatched, Kansas City and the Chiefs Kingdom, the support they have for us. For me to just kind of be in the community and see those people is always a good thing.

cool.author: Mac Miller
cool.text: I always thought I'd look corny in the type of rap video in the club with girls and all that type of stuff. I just didn't think I could really pull that off. We always think it's more fun and better just to go outside the box and to use our videos to show cool concepts.

cool.author: Donnie Yen
cool.text: There's a lot of thinking when you choreograph something. You're not just choreographing some bodies, arms, legs flying around to look cool. It's a lot more complicated and sophisticated. You also have to deal with the connection of the whole film, so when I choreograph, I think of the movement itself, the camera angles, the characters.

cool.author: Amber Liu
