cool.text: In f(x), when I'm doing K-pop, that's cool - that's our concept. But me, as a solo artist, I'm just me. I'm gonna wear my jeans, my Jordans, and I'm just gonna be a little stupid on stage.

cool.author: Cobie Smulders
cool.text: There's something cool about traveling when you're young. There's a sense of camaraderie. You learn more about yourself.

cool.author: Steve Lukather
cool.text: I don't believe that heavy strings make it all that much bigger-sounding. If anything, it can mess up your fingers, and you can get tendonitis, which is not cool.

cool.author: Cole Swindell
cool.text: I always say, 'If it looks good on a T-shirt, it would probably be a pretty cool title or cool song.'

cool.author: Kelly Clarkson
cool.text: I put on the Hank Williams and the Patsy Cline and the Rosemary Clooney on vinyl - I'm not trying to be some cool indie-rock person, I just love the way it sounds - and throw on a T-shirt and jeans. In Texas, we practically come out of the womb in jeans.

cool.author: Corbin Bernsen
cool.text: There's something cool, even on a philosophical level, about understanding the bigger picture and exploring faith, if you will, in a very real way. The more you delve into it and give into it, you just have to have faith. The more you invest in faith, wherever it takes you, some of those jagged edges become less sharp.

cool.author: Cody Rhodes
cool.text: It's damn exciting that without the biggest wrestling company in the world, I'm able to build a brand and be successful. It's hard to stay on top of it. I had to hire a staff. It sounds so silly. I had to hire a kid to do social media work for me. It's really cool.

cool.author: Mike White
cool.text: You watch stuff like 'The Real Housewives' and you start to think, 'We're all so vacuous! Is there any nobility to any of these people?' But then you look out into the world, and there are people who are doing cool stuff with their lives.

cool.author: Zoe Kravitz
cool.text: The one thing about art is you can't question it. Everyone is looking at everyone else to find out what's cool. No one knows what's cool.

cool.author: Rachel Nichols
cool.text: How come foreign accents are so sexy? If I say, 'I'm going to the store,' it sounds boring, benign and rudimentary. But if it's said with an accent, it sounds fundamentally cool.

cool.author: Finn Wolfhard
cool.text: Jonah Hill is super cool.

cool.author: Charlie Crist
cool.text: When I look at President Obama, I see a leader with a cool head, a caring heart and an open mind, a president who has demonstrated through his demeanor and through his deeds that he is uniquely qualified to heal our divisions, rebuild our nation and lead us to a brighter future together.

cool.author: Julia Butterfly Hill
cool.text: We live in a world that tells us not to care, to consume everything in sight. It tells us that being cool and being an individual actually means buying what everyone else is buying and doing what everyone else is doing.

cool.author: Claudio Reyna
cool.text: I hear good things about Xbox Live from some of my younger teammates. I think it would be fun to be able to challenge fans all over the world. It would be cool to be able to play some of my friends back home in the States. I'm looking forward to trying it.

cool.author: Zendaya
cool.text: What is cool today is not going to be cool tomorrow, and what wasn't cool yesterday is going to be cool tomorrow.

cool.author: Megan Rapinoe
cool.text: Our team, in general, is in a position where people look up to us, and kids look up to us. I embrace that, and I think I have a huge LGBT following. I think it's pretty cool, the opportunity that I have, especially in sports. There's really not that many out athletes. It's important to be out and to live my life that way.

cool.author: Claudia Winkleman
cool.text: Ads are cool.

cool.author: Justin Bieber
cool.text: It's cool when fans spend so much time making things for me. It means a lot.

cool.author: Nathan Chen
cool.text: That would be pretty cool being the first one to do the quint.

cool.author: Andre Benjamin
cool.text: Look at Scottish guys wearing kilts - you could look at them and laugh, but the way they carry themselves, how can you? You can wear some of the weirdest things and be cool. If you believe in it, that's what makes it cool.

cool.author: Taylor Swift
cool.text: If someone has a really great boyfriend or career, I think, it's cool that happens.

cool.author: Tina Fey
cool.text: Most of the time you're too busy to think about it. But every now and then you say, 'I work at 'Saturday Night Live,' and that is so cool.

cool.author: Cliff Chiang
cool.text: 'Paper Girls' in 1900 would be really cool. The girls could ride those old bicycles with the giant front wheel!

cool.author: Gigi Hadid
cool.text: Rag & Bone is a big part of my closet. I just really like how their jeans fit; I wear them a lot, and I think they make really cool staple pieces.

cool.author: Miranda Rae Mayo
cool.text: It's hard after a long day at work to still get your butt up and go to the gym, so classes are the best motivators for me, or if I have a trainer. I had a trainer for a while, and that was cool because you just show up, and they tell you what to do.

cool.author: Urmila Matondkar
cool.text: I'm quite cool about my sex symbol image. It's nothing to be proud of or ashamed of.

cool.author: Cody Bellinger
cool.text: Being the guy that some kids look up to is pretty cool.

cool.author: Tessanne Chin
cool.text: I think when you are a cool guy but also a hot guy, that makes you even more sexy.

cool.author: Colin Angle
cool.text: The reason it has taken so long for the robotics industry to move forward is because people keep trying to make something that is cool but difficult to achieve rather than trying to find solutions to actual human problems. Technology can be extremely expensive if you don't focus.

cool.author: Sasha Banks
cool.text: It's really cool, the opportunities that NXT brings. Who would ever thought that Jushin Liger would be in this company, Samoa Joe, Sami Zayn? It's crazy. Man, I don't know, bring anybody. I want to wrestle with everybody. Even I want to wrestle Jushin Liger, so I'm jealous.

cool.author: Virgil Abloh
cool.text: Kanye's the best. He really, really is. He's cool. And why we've always gotten along is because we can just sit down and talk about art.

cool.author: MO
cool.text: I really like FKA twigs. She's wonderful. She's so cool. Like, insanely cool.

cool.author: Orianthi
cool.text: I swear that he is an alien. There is something about his phrasing that is so unpredictable and cool. It makes you wonder where it came from. I wish I could play like that. I listen to Jeff Beck and think, 'Bloody hell!' The way that Jeff Beck and his band play together is just amazing. Yeah, those guys definitely come from another planet.

cool.author: Christina Milian
cool.text: I had a really great performance with Steven Tyler in the movie 'Be Cool.' I performed 'Cryin',' so we recorded the song beforehand. But I didn't get to meet him until I hit the stage with him, and we had a live performance with 30,000 people in the audience, and that was for the movie.

cool.author: Tom Anderson
cool.text: We didn't expect it to be cool, with people trading URLs instead of phone numbers.

cool.author: Coy Bowles
cool.text: You can be as creative as you want to and build all these cool projects, but ultimately, if they're not successful and you don't have the business structure in place, everything will flop.

cool.author: Ross Lynch
cool.text: As far as putting stuff on social media, I think Instagram is really cool because I like the visual aspect. You're taking pictures, and you can put a filter on them, and it's super creative.

cool.author: AJ Lee
cool.text: It wasn't cool that I didn't comb my hair and had books and wore glasses. It was never cool be a nerd and tomboy, and these days, it really is. And I'm like, 'You guys have no idea what I went through.' How many times my mother yelled at me to comb my hair.

cool.author: J. August Richards
cool.text: The cool thing for me is, I go to a lot of conventions - a lot of science fiction conventions like Comic-Con - and there are always a lot of attendants of color. And I think some people believe that black people or people of color are not into science fiction or hero shows or genre shows.

cool.author: Nyjah Huston
cool.text: A lot of hip-hop sounds the same... same thing with skateboarding. But if you see someone coming out here doing some tricks no one's done before that's really cool.

cool.author: Pusha T
cool.text: More than anything, Play Cloths has taken risks in regards to the pieces of clothing that we're even creating. We started out as straight T-shirts. It was just T-shirts and a couple cool things. Now, it's leisure pants, it's all types of clothing. We're evolving even with fashion trends on a super high level.

cool.author: Abby Martin
cool.text: People have a good reason to be afraid of tear gas, considering it's a banned agent of war under the 1993 Chemical Weapons Convention. Here's the catch - there's a clause in the treaty that includes an exception for domestic use. Yes, it's illegal for the U.S. military to use tear gas against ISIS, but cool to use against American citizens.

cool.author: Clemence Poesy
cool.text: I had a grungy period and looked like a tramp for a very long time - my mum really hated it! I destroyed her entire '70s wardrobe by putting studs into everything - I thought I was really cool. But it's good to experiment - I even had dreadlocks at one point.

cool.author: Lilla Crawford
cool.text: I have always liked Taylor Swift - there is just something about her that is very genuine and sweet. She also has naturally curly hair like me, so that's cool.

cool.author: Heather Morris
cool.text: You don't want to be too cool. But you don't want to be too dorky. Still, I find it so much better to see a guy at a club being a dork, and having fun, than trying to be sexy.

cool.author: Jay-Z
cool.text: You make your first album, you make some money, and you feel like you still have to show face, like 'I still go to the projects.' I'm like, why? Your job is to inspire people from your neighborhood to get out. You grew up there. What makes you think it's so cool?

cool.author: Avril Lavigne
cool.text: It's been really fun to see with each album when I change to see the fans of the show emulate my style and with the first record a lot of the kids in the crowd were wearing neck ties like I was and now you'll see a lot of girls with pink hair. It's cool, it's actually really neat.

cool.author: Thomas Middleditch
cool.text: I'm cool as a cucumber, baby.

cool.author: Amari Cooper
cool.text: I mean, I want to play, to be able to put up numbers to help my team win. Whatever I've got to do to do that, I'm cool with it.

cool.author: David Longstreth
cool.text: I think, for Solange, it was important to make a super-strong direct statement with 'A Seat at the Table,' and she thought 'Cool Your Heart' was kind of a summer jam that didn't really fit.

cool.author: John Legend
cool.text: My style is pretty clean, classic, and elegant, with some elements to make it a little funkier. If you see me on a normal day, I'm usually in a T-shirt and jeans, maybe with some cool sneakers, but I'm pretty basic.

cool.author: David Horsey
cool.text: The rap on Obama has been that he is a little too cool and aloof. The rap on Romney may be that he is just plain callous.

cool.author: Amy Macdonald
cool.text: I remember my mum playing 'Dancing In The Dark' and I thought it was cool.

cool.author: Elizabeth Gilbert
cool.text: That is who Barack Obama is - a person of admirable character - and that is who he has remained for me over these last four years. I have not agreed with his every decision, but never once have I seen him break his cool, lose his composure, or abandon his insightful perspective - even during the most serious and/or absurd national disasters.

cool.author: Ronan Keating
cool.text: I wanted to be Jon Bon Jovi and Bono. But I'm not that cool. I don't need to be. I'm not a rock star. I am who I am.

cool.author: Jade Thirlwall
cool.text: I find it really funny that men can always get away with being a ladies man. Everyone thinks it's really cool. But a girl can't really date boys all the time because everybody looks down on her. I think boys get away with things so much easier.

cool.author: Jordan Burroughs
cool.text: It's always been a battle for me between personal goals and wanting to be able to share the success I've had with my family. And I guess as I've gotten older, I've kind of realized, you know, you can do all these cool things, but if you don't have people in your life to share it with, what's the point?

cool.author: David Lynch
cool.text: I didn't watch much TV as a kid and I don' t watch it now. I don' t find anything beautiful or unique to the medium, and the only thing you can do on TV that you can't do in film is make a continuing story - which is so cool!

cool.author: Courtney Barnett
cool.text: Artists thrive off each other, and when you see other people doing cool stuff, it inspires you to do cool stuff.

cool.author: Till Lindemann
cool.text: I'm not a big hip-hop fan, but I respect all kinds of music and some of them are really cool.

cool.author: El-P
cool.text: You can always get something cool out of a collaboration - you can always have a moment - but meeting someone that you want to collaborate with continuously, that's a different thing.

cool.author: Dominic Monaghan
cool.text: I think a lot of young kids at school are very conscious of trying to keep credibility in case they kind of stand out in a crowd and get bullied by trying to stay cool and stuff. And my whole thing, all the way through school, was I was just a goof... I didn't care.

cool.author: Dan Smith
cool.text: The Backstreet Boys posted a cover of our single 'Good Grief.' It was so cool, and they reached out to us, saying, 'When you're in town, come to the show.'

cool.author: Cody Simpson
cool.text: Actually, I did get to help very much in the design of the Cody doll. I made sure the clothes were cool and everything.

cool.author: Ed Sheeran
cool.text: I met Bill Clinton; he's a very nice guy. Yeah, Bill Clinton's cool.

cool.author: David Mixner
cool.text: My family lived off the land and summer evening meals featured baked stuffed tomatoes, potato salad, corn on the cob, fresh shelled peas and homemade ice cream with strawberries from our garden. With no air conditioning in those days, the cool porch was the center of our universe after the scorching days.

cool.author: Matthew McConaughey
cool.text: There's a gap between what I want to do, what I do on camera, and what gets edited. Right? So the goal is to try and close the gaps. What's the biggest compliment is if I read a review and it's exactly what I wrote down in my diary before ever filming it. That's really cool. That's the biggest signifier of closing the gaps.

cool.author: Anat Cohen
cool.text: I'm helping people think the clarinet is cool.

cool.author: Jensen Huang
cool.text: Obviously the thing that's cool about games - a basketball game is just a basketball game. The thing about video games is that each different video game can be in a completely different genre.

cool.author: CM Punk
cool.text: I think you could split my fans up just like any other guy's fans. Some of them are cool, and some of them are obnoxious. But it's the variety that makes it great.

cool.author: Creed Bratton
cool.text: I do love to walk around in New York because people will notice me, smile, but they never bother anyone. New Yorkers are very cool. I love New York.

cool.author: Lil Uzi Vert
cool.text: Mike Jones, Ying Yang Twins, then a little later, Wiz Khalifa and Meek Mill, too. It was the repetitive stuff with Mike Jones when he would give out his number, and I also like his style. Back then, actually, I still think du-rags, grillz, and stuff like that are cool.

cool.author: Clive Barker
cool.text: I wanted to fold into the 'Hellraiser' narrative something about the guy - the Frenchman Lemarchand - who made the mysterious box, which raises Pinhead. I figured, 'Well, what would have happened to him?' He might well have been taken to Devil's Island, and I thought that would be a pretty cool place to start the movie.

cool.author: Dakota Fanning
cool.text: Courtney Love is really cool and funny. I would like to meet Julia Roberts and Cameron Diaz. I think I could play their daughters.

cool.author: Charlie Cox
cool.text: You can have the most emotional moment as an actor, ever, and many people would be like, 'Okay, cool. What's next?' You land one punch in a fight scene, and everyone is like, 'Yeah!'

cool.author: Nathan Chen
cool.text: I really enjoy traveling to... I went to Spain. That was really cool. Japan was really cool. France was really cool.

cool.author: Rick Harrison
cool.text: I want to make coin collecting cool again.

cool.author: Amy Lee
cool.text: I love contrast in music. Being inspired by classical, actually - in high school especially - classical and metal both, I remember having this cool realization that they are really similar. It's just different instrumentation.

cool.author: Britney Spears
cool.text: Justin Timberlake is everything, and what more could you want in a person? He's funny. He's cute. He's great. He just understands. I get him and he gets me, and that's cool.

cool.author: Marshawn Lynch
cool.text: I'm cool with my body, I love my body. I wouldn't trade it for no other body.

cool.author: J. Cole
cool.text: Touring is very routine. You get to the city, you go to the hotel, you got to be at the hotel by a certain time - it's very routine. I'm not a very structured person, so when I get some structure, it's cool; it's good for me.

cool.author: Corbin Bleu
cool.text: Everyone is different, but I'm not standoffish at all. I'm not one of those people who prefer to write a note. I'll walk right up to you and ask you out! Even if the answer's no, I'm totally cool with it.

cool.author: Finn Wolfhard
cool.text: It's really cool when the thing you are working on as a small team gets embraced by millions, but in the end, it's about your character and the script and your director and the rest of the cast and crew.

cool.author: Coco Rocha
cool.text: I always think that some of those moms who are rocking cool fashion looks while walking their little babies in a stroller is just the bomb. You don't have to, all of a sudden, have to transition into 'mom' outfits from the '90s just because you became a mom.

cool.author: George Saunders
cool.text: The cool parts - the parts that have won Dubai its reputation as 'the Vegas of the Middle East' or 'the Venice of the Middle East' or 'the Disney World of the Middle East, if Disney World were the size of San Francisco and out in a desert' - have been built in the last ten years.

cool.author: Cobie Smulders
cool.text: I actually kind of prefer working with an ensemble. It's just cool to be surrounded by such great people.

cool.author: Miranda Otto
cool.text: I think you go through a period as a teenager of being quite cool and unaffected by things.

cool.author: Tom Peters
cool.text: 'In Search of Excellence' - even the title - is a reminder that business isn't dry, dreary, boring, or by the numbers. Life at work can be cool - and work that's cool isn't confined to Tiger Woods, Yo-Yo Ma, or Tom Hanks. It's available to all of us and any of us.

cool.author: David Krumholtz
cool.text: It's really cool to know that you've put something together that isn't for a particular audience. It's so often that a TV show can really only speak to one sect of the population, and this really is something that appeals to a worldwide fan base. People who are into the pursuit of knowledge. Their reaction has meant the world to us.

cool.author: Andy Biersack
cool.text: For someone like me, music is all I've ever thought about - playing big shows, and then, when you take something that is based around your music and put it in a completely different medium, it's a really interesting and cool emotion to watch.

cool.author: Billie Eilish
cool.text: I don't want people at my shows to come out and say, 'I just saw a cool show.' I want them to say, 'I had fun at the show.' I want it to be a collaborative thing and be part of the audience and have them be part of me. I try to interact with everyone there and have them be equal to me because they are.

cool.author: Corbin Bernsen
cool.text: The minute my hair went, I shaved it. Thank God it became kind of cool. I just have really big ears.

cool.author: Jazmine Sullivan
cool.text: I'm cool with where I'm at. It's certain things I wanna do to be better, but I'm good.

cool.author: Cody Rhodes
cool.text: I'm not capable of being in a group where I'm not the leader. I did it once earlier in my career with Legacy, and that was cool because I was young and green and a rookie in the industry, but now no more.

cool.author: Finn Wolfhard
cool.text: I get recognized on the street and stuff, which is cool but it's also weird.

cool.author: Amber Mark
cool.text: 'Lose My Cool' is the second track on my EP dedicated to a stage in the grieving process. This track represents anger. I really bottled a lot up after my mother passed, and one day, I couldn't handle it anymore and just exploded on all of my friends and family. It was a very passive way of dealing with things, not very healthy.

cool.author: Ron Rivera
cool.text: One thing my dad's always told me about leadership is when all hell's breaking loose, everyone's looking at you to see how you're handling it. If you're frantic and out of control, they're going to be frantic and out of control. If you're calm, cool and collected and doing the right things, they'll follow you.

cool.author: Zac Hanson
cool.text: It's cool to have critical success because it's always nice for your peers to say, 'Good job.' But who cares about them?

cool.author: Amine
cool.text: I loved growing up in Portland because I'm not from L.A. or New York or Chicago or some cool city... It was a very regular suburban life.

cool.author: John Burroughs
cool.text: England is like the margin of a spring-run: near its source, always green, always cool, always moist, comparatively free from frost in winter and from drought in summer.

cool.author: Cole Swindell
cool.text: Being a big Braves fan, Turner Field would be cool to play a show at.

cool.author: Zoe Kravitz
cool.text: I don't really go out, 'go out' that much anymore. I live in Brooklyn, in Williamsburg, so I just like to wander around. Williamsburg's such a cool little neighborhood community spot.

cool.author: Neil Blumenthal
cool.text: Nothing creates cool like scarcity.

cool.author: Gabriel Iglesias
cool.text: The Ford Flex is a really, really cool car. You get inside and you have so much headroom and it's really comfortable to drive and it's real techy inside. You look at the screen and it's blue and you've got all kinds of controls. Everything is digital.

cool.author: Christopher Mintz-Plasse
cool.text: I never got a chance to take advantage of 'Superbad' at school because I graduated before it came out, so I never got to use any of my fame to pick up girls and go to cool parties.

cool.author: Dave Mustaine
cool.text: I've never believed in singing about Satan and thinking he's cool, because he's not.

cool.author: Lucas Hedges
cool.text: When I was in high school, I tried too hard to be cool and to impress people, but playing all these different characters has helped me find myself again.

cool.author: Marcus Buckingham
cool.text: People buy pads all the time, because they want to write stuff down. We're never going to get away from paper, ever. People like writing; that's why more people are writing more real thank-you notes now - not just to stand out, but because there's something about pen to paper, about holding something cool in your hands.

cool.author: Vanilla Ice
cool.text: To me, a critic is some loser who has no idea... someone with an opinion. We all have opinions. No offense, but what makes them dictate what is cool and what is not.

cool.author: Charles Oakley
cool.text: I'm cool with whatever. I'll just keep eating my bread, sipping my soup and serving my time. But the chicken is going to lay some more eggs one day.

cool.author: Christina Milian
cool.text: My real last name is Flores, and Milian is actually my mom's maiden name. So it's not made up, which is cool; it runs in the family. And it actually worked out better for my career to have the last name Milian, because Flores kept me in a little box, and no one really associated me with the last name Flores.

cool.author: Alessia Cara
cool.text: It's amazing: it's so cool being from Brampton, Ontario, and being able to travel the world and being embraced by so many countries.

cool.author: Matthew Hussey
cool.text: We live in a world of social media, dating apps, online profiles where everyone is portraying themselves in 2D, trying to look cool. Portray yourself in three dimensions.

cool.author: Maxine Peake
cool.text: When I was a little girl, there was this unbelievably cool female bus driver who'd work near us. I remember thinking I'd like to be her when I grew up.

cool.author: Masashi Kishimoto
cool.text: I like the way Quentin Tarantino creates a scene using a series of close-ups or showing very cool images of a person or people walking on some ordinary street in slow motion. I wish I could achieve that kind of slow-motion effect in manga, but it's rather difficult to draw; the only things we can play with are tones of black and white.

cool.author: Jesse Plemons
cool.text: I will say, I'm a great, great, great grandson of Stephen F. Austin. He founded Austin, Texas, which is kind of cool.

cool.author: Natasha Henstridge
cool.text: The nude scenes were a little eerie and I felt a bit odd. Yeah, when the camera scanned up my body, I said to my friend, 'Now, that's a close-up.' I mean, you see every inch of my body. But I'm okay with it and so it was cool.

cool.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
cool.text: Satan will advocate that it is cool to doubt spiritual gifts and the teachings of true prophets.

cool.author: Alvin Lee
cool.text: They have decided to tour under the name of Ten Years After which I don't think is very cool. To be honest, they have had to do that as it's the only way they can get any work.

cool.author: Julian Casablancas
cool.text: If the choice is between doing something supercool and having no one hear it and doing something equally cool and tricking people into putting it on the radio, I don't think the second option is some big sellout.

cool.author: Brenton Thwaites
cool.text: Hugh Jackman really inspired me as a kid. He's a cool Aussie guy who works very hard, and he's a fantastic actor. Obviously, he keeps really fit. He seems like he's happy acting. Who knows if he really is, but he gives you that impression.

cool.author: Donna Strickland
cool.text: McMaster had an engineering physics program and... one of the parts of it was lasers and electro-optics and I just said, 'Now doesn't that sound cool. I just got to do that.'

cool.author: Nathan Myhrvold
cool.text: For relatively modest amounts of sulfur dioxide injected into the atmosphere, you could easily cool Earth by 1% or more, if you want.

cool.author: Chuck Klosterman
cool.text: In Fargo, they say, well, that's a job. How well do you get paid? For example, for this book I was written about in Entertainment Weekly, and it was kind of cool because my mom asked me if Entertainment Weekly was a magazine or a newspaper.

cool.author: Blake Griffin
cool.text: Slow motion goes one of two ways. It either makes it look really, really cool, or it makes it look really, really bad.

cool.author: Christopher Daniels
cool.text: It's cool to see wrestling fans that are also comic book creators sort of put their fandom on the page, and then take that fandom and put it on the screen.

cool.author: Simon Helberg
cool.text: It's not the coolest thing in the world to be walking around humming the Taylor Swift song. It's not as cool to be singing along with the number one song in the country as it is to be the jaded, indifferent hipster who wants to turn you on to something that nobody else is talking about.

cool.author: Kevin Sussman
cool.text: I had done enough TV stuff before 'The Big Bang Theory.' I had done enough to sort of appreciate how awesome everybody is on 'The Big Bang Theory,' how nice and cool everybody is.

cool.author: Winona LaDuke
cool.text: I wanted to get out of Ashland, and I thought it would be pretty cool to go to school in the East. So I asked my guidance counselor what Ivy League schools were. And I applied to Harvard, Yale and Dartmouth - that was it. My guidance counselor told me I wouldn't get into an Ivy League school. So as my act of resistance, that's all I applied to.

cool.author: Alissa White-Gluz
cool.text: Often the 'lead' of a classical song will have something really cool to its melody that - even though it might be a violin or something doing it in the song - I end up wanting to try something like that with my voice.

cool.author: David Furnish
cool.text: I was neeeever a cool kid.

cool.author: Tobias Forge
cool.text: I'm a big fan of a lot of prog music. As a record collector as well, I won't throw anybody or any band under the bus, but a lot of the records are fun to collect, are not necessarily very good. There are a lot of prog bands out there that it's a really cool record, but it's, like, not really there.

cool.author: Katy Perry
cool.text: I grew up not really having anything, so the idea that I can take care of my family and my friends now is a really cool bonus.

cool.author: Shia LaBeouf
cool.text: I've been in fights, but that doesn't make me cool or like a tough guy or more interesting actor, I'm not proud of it.

cool.author: Xander Schauffele
cool.text: I hate to say it... but, yeah, I mean, our class has always been really strong, and I always joke with my buddies saying it's not cool to be 23 and on the PGA Tour anymore since everyone that's been 22, 23, 24, they're all winning.

cool.author: David Costabile
cool.text: I feel like I've gotten so lucky and gotten to do such cool things with such cool folks. It's really great. You definitely want that momentum to keep going, for sure.

cool.author: Cindy Wilson
cool.text: I had my hair down for a long time. I shaved my head, you know, a couple of years ago. And, then, I started to wear my hair short, and I thought that was cool. But, at the same time, I never want to put rules down on me and say, 'OK, I do this for this and this for that.' I just don't like rules. I don't.

cool.author: Christy Romano
cool.text: The cool part about working for Disney is that they've allowed me to be a change agent.

cool.author: Mary-Kate Olsen
cool.text: Our career is a dream. I mean, we get to act, travel around the world, and meet cool people. What's not to love!

cool.author: Tila Tequila
cool.text: I joined MySpace in September 2003. At that time no one was on there at all. I felt like a loser while all the cool kids were at some other school. So I mass e-mailed between 30,000 and 50,000 people and told them to come over. Everybody joined overnight.

cool.author: Christina Ricci
cool.text: Every night I fell asleep to a different Beatles album. So I'm very familiar with the Beatles; Ringo was my favorite Beatle until I grew up and then changed. I made the switch over to George Harrison just in time to regain my cool.

cool.author: Taika Waititi
cool.text: We all have to remember that New Zealand is built on these kind of people who are rebels and renegades, people doing it their own way, fighting for freedom, and braving the elements. I think it's cool to celebrate that.

cool.author: Amanda Bynes
cool.text: I feel like people start to believe things that people say about them and start to think they're really important. If you have a family that is down to earth and cool, I don't see how you can be like that.

cool.author: Grace VanderWaal
cool.text: I think there's a misconception about the industry, that you have to change who you are to look 'cool' in order to succeed, and that's just not true.

cool.author: Kristen Stewart
cool.text: I really, specifically, love acting, and I think it's a really cool thing to be really indulgent and follow that. I have a lot of ambitions in life, but for the next few years, I just want to be an actor. That's a lucky opportunity, and that drives me to want to be good at that.

cool.author: John Singleton
cool.text: It's cool for me because I'm a director, but I'm also a teacher. I'm a lover of cinema, and I love working with people who are hungry and have the energy to really do better work.

cool.author: Luke Evans
cool.text: Living in New Zealand, it's like a different world - it is a different world. It's very, very cool.

cool.author: David Coverdale
cool.text: When certain bootleg companies started off and they would take maybe ten per cent of whatever they got and help fuel new bands, which I'm cool with, I think that's a good idea. Most of the record companies are not doing that.

cool.author: E-40
cool.text: Communication, that keeps everything cool. Not holding anything back, you got to tell each other what's on your mind, that's really it. Otherwise when one gets mad at one, it can burst and you just let it out and it can just come out wrong.

cool.author: Kenny Omega
cool.text: The Bullet Club has sort of become this pop-culture phenomenon. You don't even have to like wrestling or follow our product, and you can wear a Bullet Club shirt, and it's cool.

cool.author: Aneurin Barnard
cool.text: I remember watching 'A Streetcar Named Desire' when I was quite young, I was about 12, or 13, and I watched it, thinking, 'Wow. That is pretty cool. I'd like to do something like that.'

cool.author: Chrissy Teigen
cool.text: So many models have cool boyfriends.

cool.author: Norm MacDonald
cool.text: With the computer and stuff, the difference between a rich guy and a poor guy, to me, is nothing. Because I don't like big houses, I don't drive a car, so you know, I just live in a small apartment and I have my computer, which is really cool.

cool.author: Zayn Malik
cool.text: I'm a massive fan of Drake, and we walked right past him. He's too cool to be clapping One Direction though.

cool.author: Christopher Moore
cool.text: I really don't think of my work in terms of a genre. I think of it in terms of what I want to say, what I think is cool, and what I'm good at.

cool.author: James Blunt
cool.text: I think I was lucky to be a little older when I became famous. But still, the shock of the world starting to treat you in a weird way... I had come from the army, where we had to deal with life or death, and suddenly, people were asking whether you were cool or not. I have never cared about whether I'm cool.

cool.author: Rob Gronkowski
cool.text: I've always been a fan of football, always watched the NFL and it's great to always sit back wherever I can this year. You sit back and enjoy the games, pop a little sports drink - not any pop or soda - lay back, watch the games. It's always cool to see how the games go down and just enjoy them.

cool.author: Christopher Miller
cool.text: That was the political reality of 1987: Saxophones made you cool. That's real! That really happened in our society!

cool.author: Richard Burton
cool.text: Let's have days and days of brilliant clarity, etched and limpid, cool and surgical.

cool.author: David Crosby
cool.text: I have a pretty clear picture of the whole weight of my life, and there are things that I've done that are good, and I'm proud of them. There are things that I'm really not proud of, and that they, you have to look at me with a perspective, and I try really hard to do that, to keep from thinking I'm cool and ever so smart.

cool.author: Lando Norris
cool.text: I saw MotoGP on TV first, before I saw F1 and other types of car racing. It's what I got more into. It was cool, there was good, exciting racing.

cool.author: Trombone Shorty
cool.text: Whenever we can, we try to talk to students. If I can, I'll invite kids from a school to a sound check and take questions from them. I want to show them it's cool to play the trombone. Kids are influenced by what's accessible to them. It's hard for kids to be introduced to music other than what they see on TV and video.

cool.author: Caeleb Dressel
cool.text: I was super insecure in middle school; I didn't tell anyone I swam because it wasn't the cool sport to be doing.

cool.author: David E. Sanger
cool.text: I did think that it'd be truly cool to be a foreign correspondent, and it was. There is a degree of freedom - and the right to roam the earth on somebody else's nickel.

cool.author: Brianna Hildebrand
cool.text: A lot of superheroes today are a little self-righteous, and what's cool about 'Deadpool' is that he seems like a guy that you could meet at the 7-Eleven down the street.

cool.author: Ruben Fleischer
cool.text: I have a music-video background, and I feel like the responsibility of a music-video director is to do something that hasn't been done before in a really cool visual way. So much innovation has come in filmmaking through music videos.

cool.author: Christine and the Queens
cool.text: In real life, I feel tiny and quite embarrassed all the time. But when people come up to me in France and want to talk to Christine, it's okay. It's cool. Because they're really talking about themselves, their own Christines.

cool.author: Christopher Guest
cool.text: I started on the clarinet. I was going to a music school - my mother took me - and the guy said, 'What do you want to play?' I said the drums, and my mother said, 'No, you don't. You don't want to play the drums.' So I said, 'Maybe the trumpet would be cool.' And my mother said, 'I don't think so.' And then the clarinet was handed to me.

cool.author: Alison Mosshart
cool.text: The crazy colors tend to wash out so quick. Basically, it ensures that you never wash your hair, so it starts to do some cool stuff.

cool.author: Stacey Dooley
cool.text: When I first arrived in Cambodia, I found it very buzzy and very happening. It seemed like quite a cool place, and everyone, tourists and locals, seemed to be in good spirits!

cool.author: Anh Do
cool.text: This mum comes up, she's got a five-year-old kid and she says, 'Can he have your autograph, you are his favourite person in the whole world.' I thought, 'How cool is that? I've got five-year-old fans,' and as I'm signing this autograph, the mum goes, 'Yeah, yeah, you're by far the best Wiggle.'

cool.author: Anthony Gonzalez
cool.text: The Internet is getting so big, and people are inventing so many amazing things and new experiences. I never thought 'Coco' would have a VR game, and it was very cool to experience. I remember throwing a paper airplane even though there wasn't actually anything in my hand.

cool.author: David Cross
cool.text: I'm of the mindset that most people who have kids are, which is, 'Hey, I want another me. I like me. I'm pretty cool, and I've got really great ideas, and the way I think is the right way to think. Let's put another one of me out there.' So I'll have kids one day.

cool.author: Noah Centineo
cool.text: High school was cool, man. I went to a public school for my first two years, and then I went and did independent study. I was, like, taken out of it. So I didn't have a normal one.

cool.author: Anthony Doerr
cool.text: In my early 20s, a friend and I worked for a few months on a sheep farm in New Zealand. Working with ewes, I learned a lot about the power of wool - how it keeps you cool when you're hot, warm when you're cold, dry when you're wet.

cool.author: Simu Liu
cool.text: I auditioned for 'Crazy Rich Asians' four times and it was very, very hard for me to not get it, because it was like, these 'Crazy Rich Asians' people were the cool kids and I was the one being left out.

cool.author: Christopher Meloni
cool.text: It is a weird feeling to have people go, 'Hey Chris' like they know me. But, number one, 99 percent of my experiences have been really cool. People couldn't be nicer and more positive.

cool.author: Harrison Barnes
cool.text: Coach Kerr is cool, I got a chance to spend a lot of time with him and talk to him not only about basketball, but adjusting to the Bay Area as well as his experiences and my experiences.

cool.author: Ashley Greene
cool.text: Yeah, I get to fight in 'Eclipse.' My trainer is teaching me MMA right now. So. Cool.

cool.author: Aly Michalka
cool.text: I love HBO and Showtime, especially Showtime. I'm a huge 'Dexter' fan, and I love 'Weeds.' That would be cool to do a recurring role on a show like that.

cool.author: Ciara
cool.text: I think cool moments like winning a Grammy deserve a nice little party where you really soak it in and not have to work and stuff. I do remember throwing a party on that Grammy night, but it was work.

cool.author: Alyson Hannigan
cool.text: I've had a career where people still remember all these shows I've been on. It's quite cool; I just want to do stuff that people like.

cool.author: Clark Gregg
cool.text: I was really sad after 'The Avengers' when I realized I was not going to have a part in 'Thor 2' or 'Captain America: The Winter Soldier.' But I'm not arguing with my fantastic plane and my really cool car.

cool.author: Erica Mena
cool.text: I'm definitely that crazy, sexy cool girl.

cool.author: Lauren Conrad
cool.text: I'm obsessed with the 1920s, everything from the style to the lifestyle. It was a really cool era.

cool.author: Edd China
cool.text: Mustangs are bags of fun too, and they're pretty practical too so they're a good option if you're looking for a cool car. They don't have many cup holders, but Mustang drivers don't seem to care too much.

cool.author: Ice T
cool.text: Being cool is when you win, you don't get too happy; and when you lose, you don't get too mad.

cool.author: Xzibit
cool.text: Restless' was cool. I wish I had more time to put it together.

cool.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin
cool.text: The downright fanatic is nearer to the heart of things than the cool and slippery disputant.

cool.author: Clara Mamet
cool.text: I wrote two plays before I was cast on 'The Neighbors.' They actually got published, which was cool.

cool.author: Dylan McDermott
cool.text: Style is innate to who I am. My father gave me a picture the other day. I must have been about seven, and I had on wing-tip shoes and some cool pants. I thought, 'Wow!'

cool.author: Robert Sheehan
cool.text: I never aspired to be in a band, but being onstage is a very cool feeling. It's like you're the lord of the room. It's hard to croon and run around doing big scissor kicks while also trying to play, though. I'm still mastering that.

cool.author: Nikki Giovanni
cool.text: For most of my life, I've thought of myself as pretty cool.

cool.author: John Lasseter
cool.text: I loved animation and cartoons, even when it was not cool when you were in high school. I raced home to see the Bugs Bunny cartoons.

cool.author: Jimmy Page
cool.text: The one person who's disappeared out of the business is the A&R man. Because the listener at home becomes the A&R man. He's the one who chooses what tracks he wants on the album. And that's cool.

cool.author: Jessica Biel
cool.text: My Barbies were usually naked. Once, I took their heads off, cut their hair, drew on their short, spiky hair with some markers, then stuck the heads on Christmas lights. Every year, we'd string our tree with those Barbie heads. It looked demonic. My parents were so cool - they saw it as a form of self-expression.

cool.author: Cheryl Cole
cool.text: I love Prince Harry. Good looking and a bit of a rebel. Me and his dad are as thick as thieves and I knew Harry before I knew his dad so we've met a few times. I think he's amazing. And I think you can relate to him because he's made mistakes. He's cool.

cool.author: Tom Waits
cool.text: As a kid, I did want to be an old-timer, since they were the ones with the big stories and the cool clothes. I wanted to go there. Now, I guess I want to bring that with me and go back in time.

cool.author: Taysom Hill
cool.text: It's cool to be a role model.

cool.author: Frank McCourt
cool.text: Kids all want to look cool, as if knowledge is a great burden, but they're always looking around. They remember.

cool.author: Ashley Scott
cool.text: I was training more learning how to scuba dive which I'd never done which was really, really, really cool.

cool.author: Howie Dorough
cool.text: It's so cool to hear these DJs and younger artists that are coming around be like, 'Wow, we love your music.'

cool.author: David Cassidy
cool.text: My music was never considered cool, but I've always felt that connection with the audience.

cool.author: Geraldine Brooks
cool.text: Sydney in the 1960s wasn't the exuberant multicultural metropolis it is today. Out in the city's western reaches, days passed in a sun-struck stupor. In the evenings, families gathered on their verandas waiting for the 'southerly buster' - the thunderstorm that would break the heat and leave the air cool enough to allow sleep.

cool.author: Lee Konitz
cool.text: Labels don't mean anything to me. I'm trying to play as passionately as I'm able to. If they want to call that cool, that's fine. Just spell the name right, is the formula.

cool.author: Steven Sinofsky
cool.text: It's not cool to have your name in print when it's not the truth.

cool.author: Alexandra Daddario
cool.text: It's cool to be a female character who gets to be really strong and tough.

cool.author: Christina Milian
cool.text: I've always loved Jennifer Lopez, and I think, as an entertainer, she is a great example of a strong woman that is also very levelheaded and cool and produces her own content.

cool.author: Ciara
cool.text: I think it's really cool to embrace the pain of something that may have hurt you and be able to express it through music.

cool.author: Chuck Inglish
cool.text: The Cool Kids are Chicago. Me being from Michigan is a part of that dynamic.

cool.author: Edwin Catmull
cool.text: Are the Simpsons cool? They are, and that is crude 2D animation.

cool.author: Labrinth
cool.text: Different cultures produce a different 'cool.' And your perception of 'cool' changes depending on where you are.

cool.author: William Henry Bragg
cool.text: Whenever we warm our hands by the fire, we allow the energy radiated by the fire to quicken up the movements of the atoms of which the hands are composed. When we cool any substance, we check those movements.

cool.author: David Crystal
cool.text: What turns teenagers on more than the Internet these days? If you can get a language out there, the youngsters are much more likely to think it's cool.

cool.author: NLE Choppa
cool.text: Stevie Wonder, he was in a party. They introduced me to him. I didn't know that he had like a accent... or that is just how he talks. He was real cool. Kinda chopped it up... It was cool, good experience.

cool.author: Michael Buble
cool.text: Look at Neil Diamond. Was he the cool guy? No, he was the housewives' guy. He didn't try to be what he wasn't. He just did what he did - made great music, was a good entertainer, nice-enough guy.

cool.author: David Cage
cool.text: When we talk about technology, often, we talk about the fact that it's going to be cool; it's going to do all these things for us. But at the same time, technology will deeply change our societies.

cool.author: Kaley Cuoco
cool.text: I think we all have different moods - a nerd one day and cool the next. I think everyone has an inner geek, and I know I definitely do.

cool.author: Kaya Scodelario
cool.text: I was incredibly shy and insecure as a child. I was bullied. I was dyslexic. I had an immigrant single parent. I was the opposite of that kind of ideal, cool girl thing.

cool.author: Jaden Smith
cool.text: It's good to be happy and tell us how cool your life is and how awesome you are on social media. That's great because it inspires other people to be happy, too. But a lot of times, people are trying to be happy in the wrong ways - with money or with different things that are not true happiness.

cool.author: Aljamain Sterling
cool.text: I think it's huge to set a good example. Whether you like it or not, as a professional athlete you are always going to be projected out into that spotlight of judgement. People are always going to judge every single thing we do and I think it's cool to just be real with yourself.

cool.author: Alison McGhee
cool.text: It's very cool to be short, very cool. When I was in eighth grade, and the height I am now, I would just look at the cute little short girls and think, 'If only, if only.'

cool.author: Alvin Lee
cool.text: We used to play the underground clubs like the UFO, and Middle Earth, and they were great because they would have on things like a poet, string quartets, and then a rock band! It was kinda cool!

cool.author: Quentin Crisp
cool.text: Manners are love in a cool climate.

cool.author: Walt Mossberg
cool.text: Whether you are a consumer, a hardware maker, a software developer or a provider of cool new services, it's hard to make a move in the American cellphone world without the permission of the companies that own the pipes.

cool.author: Rex Orange County
cool.text: I've been able to do a lot of cool things. That's always the dream for any artist.

cool.author: Amanda Bynes
cool.text: I have actor friends, but they're not famous. I feel like if you're an actor or - famous, you have to overly prove that you're a normal, cool person.

cool.author: Chrissy Teigen
cool.text: Anything I get to wear to the Met Ball is huge. I'm not a fashion girl, so it's cool to be dolled up and have those diamonds where they send armed guards with you.

cool.author: Buzz Osborne
cool.text: I don't want to stay underground for just the cool people.

cool.author: Maz Jobrani
cool.text: As a Middle Eastern male, I know there's certain things I'm not supposed to say on an airplane in the U.S., right? I'm not supposed to be walking down the aisle, and be like, 'Hi, Jack.' That's not cool. Even if I'm there with my friend named Jack, I say, 'Greetings, Jack. Salutations, Jack.' Never 'Hi, Jack.'

cool.author: Daron Malakian
cool.text: In the Middle East in the summertime, to keep cool, a lot of people sleep on the rooftops.

cool.author: Hunter Schafer
cool.text: It's cool how to see how my creative juices have shown themselves when they're not being used for 'Euphoria' every day. I'm trying to find a new rhythm as to how I'm going to externalize my artistic energies. It's a moment of re-formation.

cool.author: Christopher Daniels
cool.text: I still, to this day, get people talking about Curry Man; for a character that hasn't wrestled, technically, since 2008. So, it's cool to think that that part of my career is still respected and enjoyed and it's awesome.

cool.author: Dakota Fanning
cool.text: I think sometimes people can get lost in the bigger special effects, science fiction, robot stuff, and those are cool and fun to watch, too, but I think it's so important to sometimes step back and watch something that's about life and human interaction.

cool.author: Hulk Hogan
cool.text: All of a sudden, Hulk Hogan has become retro. Hulk Hogan has become cool again. So to come out and to hear how loud the fans are. To hear how loyal the fans are, it's truly overwhelming. I just can't believe I've been reborn in the WWE.

cool.author: Taika Waititi
cool.text: I'd loved 'Iron Man,' you know, with a passion. I thought that was the most fresh, cool thing, in terms of superhero movies, that I'd seen in a long time.

cool.author: Kim Gordon
cool.text: You can't be a strong or cool woman and be represented except in a harsh way, looking mean and cold and hard. It's like reverse sexism.

cool.author: Ally Brooke
cool.text: I love Doritos - the nacho flavor. The Cool Ranch is good; it's a good second.

cool.author: Afrojack
cool.text: You're going to be way happier doing what you actually love and finding other people that love the same thing than doing something that other people love so you're just cooler and you have cool friends.

cool.author: David Faustino
cool.text: I just want to bend fire. You know, it'd be cool to throw some fire to a couple of old agents, the ex wife.

cool.author: Klay Thompson
cool.text: The cool thing about Snapchat is you can get a lot of news on there now. There's CNN, ESPN, and I find myself reading the most random articles. I don't know how it actually benefits me, but it's interesting. I like to stay up on current events, so I have to give kudos to Snapchat: they've done a good job of that. But I'm on there way too much.

cool.author: Jerry Doyle
cool.text: I was 35 years old and in a position to take a shot at whatever I wanted to try. The Air Force said I was too old to fly fighter jets. I thought about becoming a fishing boat captain, before deciding that acting seemed pretty cool.

cool.author: Ty Dolla Sign
cool.text: My dad put me with all the greatest people. It definitely helped me now, because I know so much more about music and composition. It's cool. I love Pops. I'm super thankful for everything he's done to help my career.

cool.author: Brit Morin
cool.text: I really love laser-cutting. I do a lot of laser-cut jewelry and laser-etched stationery. I'll even etch my food sometimes. You can download an image online and etch it onto a tortilla or a brownie. It's so cool to meld the digital and analog worlds together.

cool.author: Patrick Rothfuss
cool.text: I never set out to become 'famous.' I mean, when you're 14 you think 'I'm gonna become a writer and people will want my autograph and that'll be cool,' but you grow up and you learn that's just not how the world works. I resigned myself to the fact that I would probably never be published and if I did it probably wouldn't be a big deal.

cool.author: Zendaya
cool.text: I realized that if I don't like something, I can change it. If I don't feel comfortable with something, then I have a voice to say it's not cool.

cool.author: Zoey Deutch
cool.text: My signature look is an eighties baby doll dress, combat boots with colorful socks sticking out, and then mounds of jewelry. I love silver and turquoise. I go to Montana every winter, so I hunt around for cool pieces there.

cool.author: Chrystia Freeland
cool.text: When you think of technological revolution, you probably think of geeks in cool coastal spaces like the Google campus, or perhaps of math wizards on Wall Street. But one source of rural prosperity is the adoption of radical new technologies - and a consequent surge in productivity.

cool.author: Justin Verlander
cool.text: Growing up, I played 'Ken Griffey, Jr. Baseball' and just whatever I could get my hands on. When I was really young, I was a big fan of Mario and that type of stuff. I still play videogames now, so it was really cool for me to be able to play as myself on '2K6' or '2K7,' I believe it was, when I was a rookie.

cool.author: Ramy Youssef
cool.text: Stand-up is cool. In stand-up, you get to learn about yourself if you do it from a thoughtful place.

cool.author: Roger Allam
cool.text: I listened to a clip someone had put up of me singing 'I Am What I Am' in the musical 'La Cage aux Folles.' I thought I was absolutely dreadful. It's like when you see photos of yourself at parties - at the time you thought you looked so cool and glamorous but you just look a bit drunk.

cool.author: Rainn Wilson
cool.text: I really wanted to do something positive on the Internet. I wanted to try to get young people talking about, thinking about, life's big questions-make it cool and OK to wonder about the heart, the soul and free will and God and death and big topics like that, big human topics.

cool.author: Ciara
cool.text: It's one thing to really dream and have a vision and want all these cool things, but it's a whole other thing when you actually have wisdom and understand things. Then you can truly make the best decisions.

cool.author: Alber Elbaz
cool.text: If you take something out of the freezer, it's cold, but what happens when it melts? It's a cool party, a cool person, a cool collection. What does that mean? I'm more interested in things that are uncool, things that have a certain individuality, a certain soul, a certain longevity, emotion, fragility.

cool.author: Dylan McDermott
cool.text: My dad was kind of a pool shark and had a Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin thing going on. I've always been fascinated by the fifties because of him. There was a hip, cool, anything-goes atmosphere back then, but looking good was still a priority.

cool.author: A.J. Styles
cool.text: You just remember back when you were watching as a kid and going, 'Man, Sting's so cool,' and now I'm wrestling the guy. It's breathtaking.

cool.author: Clark Gregg
cool.text: The cool thing about directing is, whatever cool thing works in the scene, it's still making the episode be a great story, and everyone's working toward that goal, so it doesn't much matter where it's coming from.

cool.author: Masaba Gupta
cool.text: Anxiety is a trap; it's not a trend to be followed. It's not supposed to be cool, it's meant to be fixed.

cool.author: Robert Eggers
cool.text: When I was younger, I used to think it was kind of cool to abuse actors mentally, but I really disagree with that now.

cool.author: Christopher Meloni
cool.text: But when you're a working actor - and that's what you keep saying in your head, how blessed you are to have a job - and you are working with heavyweights, working with the best guys in TV, it's pretty cool. Exhausting, but cool.

cool.author: Christopher Wylie
cool.text: I've had people say, 'Oh you've made whistleblowing cool.' But it's really not. It's a good thing to do. And it's the right thing to do. But it's arduous and difficult, particularly if you are going up against something that's really powerful and political.

cool.author: Sasha Banks
cool.text: It's really cool to see how many people try to imitate me or wear my stuff. I get a lot of Instagram videos of people doing my entrance. I think that's so cool. To see the variety of people, little girls, guys, doing it. I never really thought that would happen. It's amazing.

cool.author: Lady Gaga
cool.text: I'm doing everything that I can, working with experts, really studying the statistics to figure out a way we can make it cool or normal to be kind and loving.

cool.author: Zack Snyder
cool.text: People always come up to me now and say, 'Watchmen' is the best superhero movie ever made.' I'm always saying 'That's super cool. That's nice of you to say.' But it happens now, more and more and more than it did when it first came out.

cool.author: Richie Sambora

cool.text: But by reframing the learning process and focusing on the cool end goal, the fear of failure is often taken off the table, and learning just comes more naturally.

cool.author: John Krasinski
cool.text: My main focus is to always try to be myself first, and then, hey, if I wear a cool jacket, that's a bonus.

cool.author: Graham Elliot
cool.text: I'm a traditionalist, so for me, black coffee is cool.

cool.author: Magnus Scheving
cool.text: You think aerobics is not a cool sport? I think you are wrong. It requires amazing discipline - flexibility, fitness, knowledge. And you have to do it with a big smile on your face. Also, I once performed in front of 10,000 screaming women. I tell you something, I'd rather do that than kick a ball around in front of a few men.

cool.author: Marley Dias
cool.text: Dressing in an androgynous way, mixing up the masculine and feminine, blurring those boundaries - I'm cool with that. No one should ever be limited by stereotypes of gender, just as no one should ever be limited by stereotypes of race.

cool.author: Chris Evans
cool.text: I feel like my style's always been influenced by 'less is more.' The coolest styles are kind of simple and classic, like a white T-shirt and jeans. Maybe you have a cool belt and cool shoes, but everything else you keep simple.

cool.author: Son Heung-min
cool.text: I love Korean rice and Korean food in general. Korean barbecues are cool - there's a table with a hole in it with fire coming through, and we throw meat on it.

cool.author: DanTDM
cool.text: Everyone experiences bullying at some point - there are always older kids who think it's cool to pick on the younger kids.

cool.author: Meek Mill
cool.text: It's cool when people know you more, but I like people to treat me regular when they see me. I take pictures. I don't really be big on people looking at me.

cool.author: James Charles
cool.text: Makeup is an art form for me. It's a form of expression, and it's such a cool way to get my creative juices flowing.

cool.author: Bella Hadid
cool.text: I'm not trying to be this cool girl. If you're trying to be something you're not, it's slowly going to bite you in the butt.

cool.author: F. Sionil Jose
cool.text: November is auspicious in so many parts of the country: the rice harvest is already in, the weather starts to cool, and the festive glow which precedes Christmas has began to brighten the landscape.

cool.author: Gigi Hadid
cool.text: My biggest thing about being a role model is whatever I'm preaching, I'm practicing. If I'm telling people I'm boxing and then I'm eating a burger tonight, it's because I am. I'm not cheating and eating a salad and then being like, 'Yeah! Burgers are cool!'

cool.author: Jim Beaver
cool.text: I thought being in the wheelchair might be kind of limiting for me as an actor. It turned out cool in a lot of ways. Of course, at the end of the day, I can get up out of the chair and go home, but I'm very acutely aware that most people can't, so I try to give the situation that depth.

cool.author: Colin Angle
cool.text: It's going to be interesting to see how society deals with artificial intelligence, but it will definitely be cool.

cool.author: Michelle Branch
cool.text: I think its so cool that you can pick up the guitar and create something that didn't exist 5 minutes ago. You can write something that no ones ever heard before. You have music at your fingertips.

cool.author: Alan Walker
cool.text: I keep my face covered during concerts. That's just something that is part of me, an artist, and I think it's a cool concept and look. It is really inspired by my love for video games, especially with the videogame 'Watchdog' that I love.

cool.author: Aidy Bryant
cool.text: It feels very cool to be part of a girl gang.

cool.author: Wilt Chamberlain
cool.text: With all of you men out there who think that having a thousand different ladies is pretty cool, I have learned in my life I've found out that having one woman a thousand different times is much more satisfying.

cool.author: Lupe Fiasco
cool.text: Reggae, oh man. It's the ultimate music. The positivity. The musicality. The whole cultural expressionism of it. The danceability. Just the cool factor. The melody factor. Some of it comes from a religious place. If there were a competition of who makes the best religious music, it would definitely be the Rastafarian reggae.

cool.author: Frank Ocean
cool.text: The Internet made fame wack and anonymity cool.

cool.author: Vaani Kapoor
cool.text: I'd like to believe that I'm chic yet cool and casual.

cool.author: Marc Jacobs
cool.text: Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I've never been cool, but I've felt cool. I've been in the cool place, but I wasn't really cool - I was trying to pass for hip or cool. It's the awkwardness that's nice.

cool.author: Tyka Nelson
cool.text: I love to perform, to give glory to God with my own brand of funky gospel music. I think it's my mission to show people that God, that Jesus, can be cool.

cool.author: Naomi Osaka
cool.text: Japanese culture? I kind of love everything about it. I love the food. Everyone's really nice. There's just a lot about Japan that's really cool.

cool.author: Craig David
cool.text: I recognise life is like a magnet. Positive and negative are on the opposite sides of the magnet. You can try to cut the negative part off, but it's still there. When you accept both of them, it's like, 'You know what? Don't get too identified with success or too identified with failure - just be cool with them.'

cool.author: Paul Walker
cool.text: There's a time and place for everything, but as I get older, I like finding those human moments and really connecting. Maybe I'm not as cool as I once was.

cool.author: Ernest Hemingway
cool.text: When I am working on a book or a story, I write every morning as soon after first light as possible. There is no one to disturb you, and it is cool or cold, and you come to your work and warm as you write.

cool.author: Sunny Singh
cool.text: I'd like to believe that my face is very versatile and I can play the uber cool guy as well as the sexy hunk with equal ease.

cool.author: Prince
cool.text: Technology is cool, but you've got to use it as opposed to letting it use you.

cool.author: Satchel Paige
cool.text: If your stomach disputes you, lie down and pacify it with cool thoughts.

cool.author: Lil Durk
cool.text: I worked with Ty Dolla Sign, YG, Nipsey Hussle, Metro Boomin - I build relationships, and I try to stay afloat with everyone who is hot or cool, period.

cool.author: Matthew McConaughey
cool.text: There aren't many things that are universally cool, and it's cool not to litter. I'd never do it.

cool.author: Jacques Prevert
cool.text: An orange on the table, your dress on the rug, and you in my bed, sweet present of the present, cool of night, warmth of my life.

cool.author: ASAP Rocky
cool.text: I represent the kids who come from nothing but who understand it all and love it all. That's what I represent - those are the cool kids, you know, the kids of tomorrow, because who would've known that I'd be who I am today? We are the kids of tomorrow.

cool.author: Stjepan Hauser
cool.text: If we just stick to one kind of music, our creativity is limited. We wanted to extend the audience for the cello, especially the younger people, and to show them how cool and how powerful and how diverse the cello can be.

cool.author: Jawed Karim
cool.text: It wasn't like I wanted to be the next Marc Andreessen, but it would be cool to be in the same place.

cool.author: Future
cool.text: I try to look cool. I strategize. Sometimes it's like - that's part of the strategizing, to make it seem like I don't think about it.

cool.author: Peter Marino
cool.text: I believe that women would crawl across broken glass to get a cool pair of shoes.

cool.author: Zayn Malik
cool.text: I am a bit of a bad boy. I have tattoos and I mess around. That's part of my image, so it's cool.

cool.author: Robert Downey, Jr.
cool.text: I read the script for Wonder Boys, and I said that was almost perfect, it was so classy, cool and funny. It's a really specific thing. We stuck to it, it turned out good and a lot of people liked it.

cool.author: Eddie Van Halen
cool.text: Music is for people. The word 'pop' is simply short for popular. It means that people like it. I'm just a normal jerk who happens to make music. As long as my brain and fingers work, I'm cool.

cool.author: Owen Wilson
cool.text: You can think of Hollywood as high school. TV actors are freshmen, comedy actors are maybe juniors, and dramatic actors - they're the cool seniors.

cool.author: Suga
cool.text: I arranged 'DT Suga,' which I previously used in lyrics, backwards. 'DT' is D Town and refers to my hometown. I like the meaning, and it sounds cool when I say it, so I think I'll continue using this name when I work externally. I also like how the mixtape came out in August.

cool.author: Romeo Santos
cool.text: My dad is Dominican, my mother's Puerto Rican, and I got into bachata at the age of 10 or 11. When I started listening, it had a reputation for being music for hick people. I thought that had to be changed. I was born and raised in the Bronx, and I knew you make something cool if you're cool.

cool.author: Ja Rule
cool.text: Jail is definitely not cool. Education is.

cool.author: Noel Gallagher
cool.text: You've got to be strong enough for love. It's very easy to be cool and cynical. It's very difficult to just let yourself go and be in love. You've got to be strong enough for that.

cool.author: Tom Felton
cool.text: I would miss months of school and then return with bright blond hair. Needless to say, there was bullying. I wasn't beaten up daily, but there was name-calling and jealousy. You have to bear in mind that 'Harry Potter' wasn't cool. I wasn't part of the 'Terminator' franchise.

cool.author: Mike Tyson
cool.text: I'm a Muslim, but I think Jesus would have a drink with me. He would be cool. He would talk to me.

cool.author: Adela Florence Nicolson
cool.text: I shall go the way of the open sea, to the lands I knew before you came, and the cool ocean breezes shall blow from me the memory of your name.

cool.author: Stella Maxwell
cool.text: A perfect handbag is both functional and stylish. Of course you want to look cool, but you also want a bag that is going to work with you, not against you.

cool.author: Eiza Gonzalez
cool.text: I can have an accent and not have an accent, so it's really cool. I can play with it. I can be very Sofia Vergara, too, so it's really cool.

cool.author: Riz Ahmed
cool.text: Trajectories aren't linear. Life's just a roller coaster. If you're getting a chance to do cool stuff, and it's varied stuff, just enjoy it. I guess I'm a believer in the randomness of life rather than it being a linear trajectory or an arc, a consistent smooth arc, towards anything.

cool.author: Canelo Alvarez
cool.text: I have to stay calm, cool, and collected.

cool.author: Nick Kroll
cool.text: I wish I was a cool guy and could drink coffee black, but I put almond milk and raw cane sugar in it.

cool.author: Mark Zuckerberg
cool.text: My goal was never to make Facebook cool. I am not a cool person.

cool.author: Phil Hellmuth
cool.text: Oakley's sunglasses are hot and I feel a little extra cool when I wear them.

cool.author: Cuco
cool.text: It's cool to be in your feelings, and it's cool to be sad, and it's cool to feel all of these things.

cool.author: Vonda Shepard
cool.text: James Ralston, my guitar player, has performed with Tina Turner for about 22 years. Jim Hanson on bass has played with Johnny Cash, Rodney Crowell and Bruce Springsteen, and they're fantastic musicians and amazing singers they get a really cool vocal sound together.

cool.author: Conan O'Brien
cool.text: Keep cool my babies.

cool.author: Rihanna
cool.text: More than anything, I like a jacket. You can do anything with a great jacket, the bigger the better. You can have any silhouette underneath. It gives you an attitude. It makes a gown look cool.

cool.author: Slash
cool.text: So when I got to be about 13 or 14, I started listening - even though my parents music was way cool - to contemporary hard rock at that time, which was Aerosmith, Cheap Trick, Black Sabbath, AC/DC, Ted Nugent and all that, and that's just where I came from.

cool.author: Sebastian Vettel
cool.text: I remember my first test in F1. After five laps, I came back to the pits and tried to play it cool - 'Oh yeah, I'm fine, I'm on top of this' - but I was completely lost.

cool.author: Clive Barker
cool.text: We live in the Age of the Next New Thing; we're assaulted day and night by tastemakers telling us what the next hit will be, the next style, the next cool.

cool.author: James Cleverly
cool.text: Being hip, being popular, being cool, that's really easy. Until you have to make tough decisions. And when you have to make tough decisions, that veneer of coolness comes off real quick.

cool.author: Narada Michael Walden
cool.text: White people couldn't do black music back in the day because they weren't funky or bad enough. They weren't from the ghettoes, but hip-hop and R&B changed all of that because white kids want to be down with it. They wanted to learn it so they studied the culture. It's kind of a cool thing because we shouldn't be so separate.

cool.author: Wong Kar-wai
cool.text: For 'Chungking Express,' the way we shot the film was all handheld and with all this existing light, and that became very popular. Everybody thought it was cool.

cool.author: Lena Waithe
cool.text: To be yourself is truly a revolutionary act, and I think more and more people should try it, because it's gotten me a pretty cool life.

cool.author: Bridgit Mendler
cool.text: The cool thing about doing a voice-over into a different language is that you get to bring the character of your own culture into it.

cool.author: Miranda Lambert
cool.text: Long intros are cool because there's a little bit of anticipation, you know?

cool.author: Aaron Sorkin
cool.text: With 'The Social Network,' I got into it at first because frankly I thought there was a cool courtroom drama to be had with the intellectual properties. And then what further drew me in was that the most extraordinary social networking device ever created was created by the world's most antisocial person. I liked that story.

cool.author: Peter Hitchens
cool.text: Donald Trump is a symptom, not a disease. The disease is the death of real political conservatism: a cool, intelligent reluctance to believe that all change is good, a love for the established, the particular, and the well-worn.

cool.author: Julian Baggini
cool.text: When you try to cool down hot emotions, what tends to happen is that you end up either repressing them or losing them altogether. Neither is desirable. Without emotion, much social interaction loses its meaning or changes for the worse.

cool.author: Johnny Gargano
cool.text: Johnny Wrestling, to me, isn't just a cool nickname or a fun thing for the crowd to chant. To me, it's a state of mind, and it's just who I am. I first stepped foot in a wrestling ring when I was 8 years old.

cool.author: Peggy Whitson
cool.text: One of the things I think is really cool that we're testing on board the International Space Station is the water reclamation system.

cool.author: Jaylen Brown
cool.text: I think it's becoming cool to have mental toughness or to meditate. It's a thing, but I don't think people really understand the value of it.

cool.author: Gregory Isaacs
cool.text: When people hear the name Gregory Isaacs, I want dem to think of 'Night Nurse' and 'Red Rose For Gregory' and 'The Cool Ruler.' I love it when somebody comes up to me and say, 'I love your songs.'

cool.author: Gord Downie
cool.text: I think you have to show people it's cool and fun to work together. It's your obligation. If you can't do it, who can you expect to do it?

cool.author: Daniel Ricciardo
cool.text: Getting past my early 20s, I feel a bit more maturity and responsibility about that stuff. You get a good feeling from doing something good. You see a kid and you make his day, you realise the power of it. Whereas before, I was like, 'That's cool, whatever.' But now, that's what I'm most appreciative of.

cool.author: Morgan Wallen
cool.text: I didn't want to act like I'm too cool for school or anything like that.

cool.author: Freja Beha Erichsen
cool.text: You can pull off anything if you have the right attitude. Being cool is whatever you think it is. Own your style.

cool.author: Rupert Brooke
cool.text: The cool kindliness of sheets, that soon smooth away trouble; and the rough male kiss of blankets.

cool.author: Nora Ephron
cool.text: Summer bachelors, like summer breezes, are never as cool as they pretend to be.

cool.author: Luke Bryan
cool.text: It's pretty cool to see how far music can take you.

cool.author: Mae Jemison
cool.text: For me, it was really a childhood dream coming true. It's sort of where the fantasy led reality, and then I got to be on the Starship Enterprise anyway. And the cool thing was - is I was the only person on this bridge who had actually been in space.

cool.author: Tom DeLonge
cool.text: It's actually cool to be positive and optimistic and idealistic. It's cool to see yourself doing beautiful, great things.

cool.author: Dick Gregory
cool.text: It's cool to be healthy.

cool.author: Tinashe
cool.text: As a person, I have a lot of different sides to me, and I genuinely just embrace them. I don't think, 'Oh, I gotta put on my cool face now!'

cool.author: O'Shea Jackson, Jr.
cool.text: Ice Cube's the coolest dad. A lot of parents - a lot of kids do not think their parents are cool. Oh, no. My dad's cool... You know, I was born in 1991. That's when 'Boyz n the Hood' came out. So I've always see him on TV. I don't see everybody else's dad, you know. So I've always had a sense of, you know, he's cool. He's in the light.

cool.author: Chuck Liddell
cool.text: I was in 'The Postman Always Rings Twice' with Jack Nicholson. That was fun. I think I made, like, $33 or something. I got to miss a whole day of school, and when you're a little kid, that's cool.

cool.author: Mandira Bedi
cool.text: Insulting people doesn't make you brave, bold, cool or courageous.

cool.author: Steve Carell
cool.text: Maybe the coolest people are the ones who don't care about being cool.

cool.author: Sly Stone
cool.text: Sunday school don't make you cool forever.

cool.author: Stacey Farber
cool.text: I think it's cool to be smart, and I think it's sexy to be smart.

cool.author: Billie Eilish
cool.text: I think everybody deserves an equal amount of appreciation whether how old they are, but I mean, I'm cool with the praise. I'm good.

cool.author: Jurgen Klopp
cool.text: The challenge is to stay cool enough to handle the pressure in the moment so that you can succeed in the future.

cool.author: William H. McRaven
cool.text: Keep your cool, even when those around you can't.

cool.author: J. Cole
cool.text: Rhyme patterns are nothing without meanings to the words. A lot of rappers can do those flows, but the raps aren't really about anything - which is cool sometimes, but to have the flow and the message is one of my favorite things.

cool.author: Tyga
cool.text: I try to be cool with everybody, but sometimes, everybody just has different personalities, motives, and different characters.

cool.author: Mike Rowe
cool.text: At the risk of being glib, I would say if you really want to make America great again, you have to make work cool again.

cool.author: Burt Reynolds
cool.text: Paul Newman is the personification of cool.

cool.author: Ice Cube
cool.text: 'Boyz-n-the-Hood' was actually supposed to be written for Eazy's group. He had a group out in New York called Home Boys Only, called HBO. One of them looked like LL Cool J. Eazy wanted to write a song for them, a street song, like what we were doing on the mix tapes. So when I wrote it, it was too West Coast for them.

cool.author: Kevin DeYoung
cool.text: The Heidelberg Catechism is like a refreshing bath with cool gospel water.

cool.author: David Lynch
cool.text: I love Bob Dylan. Who doesn't? He tapped into some kind of vein and it keeps on keeping on. There's nobody like him. He's unique, and just... way out cool.

cool.author: Nyjah Huston
cool.text: I mean, really, skateboarding is just going out and having fun with your friends and filming cool tricks and challenging yourself and just really just having a good time. That's what skateboarding really is.

cool.author: Sebastian Stan
cool.text: Sometimes it's okay to give yourself a pat on the back and say, 'That was cool. That made me feel good.'

cool.author: Forrest Griffin
