cool.text: I like deer. They're kinda cool.

cool.author: Mikey Day
cool.text: After 'David Pumpkins,' a lot of people were sending me pictures dressed up like David Pumpkins and the skeletons, and videos of kids reenacting the sketch, doing the skeleton choreography. It was really cool to see yourself out there in the pop culture of the world.

cool.author: Pat McAfee
cool.text: I have dreams and aspirations of taking a stroll down the ramp at a pay-per-view setting. Everybody has those dreams as a kid, and that'd be really cool.

cool.author: Michael Dell
cool.text: I've been fascinated with technology since I was a boy banging around on my father's adding machine. Back then I'd type in an equation, the device made some cool noises, and out came my answer. I was hooked.

cool.author: Julian Treasure
cool.text: Let's define listening as making meaning from sound. It's a mental process, and it's a process of extraction. We use some pretty cool techniques to do this. One of them is pattern recognition.

cool.author: Dusty Rhodes
cool.text: Terry Funk. Any time I got to wrestle with him, it was cool. Superstar Billy Graham was another one.

cool.author: Aaliyah
cool.text: If you want to go to the mall, you have to take security. But it's always cool. The kids are amazing.

cool.author: Neil Young
cool.text: It's cool to go places where working people are happy.

cool.author: Ted Nugent
cool.text: Vegetarians are cool. All I eat are vegetarians - except for the occasional mountain lion steak.

cool.author: Nikki Sixx
cool.text: Reflecting back, we all make mistakes; we all go through our stuff - relationships, financial, all kinds of stuff - and if you can grow from that and pass that message on, it's a pretty cool thing.

cool.author: Rickie Fowler
cool.text: I don't want to be just known for the way I dress. I want to be known for how I play, how I treat people, and how I am as a role model. I don't just want to be, 'He dresses cool' or 'He dresses crazy.' You're going to have lovers and haters. I want my golf game to be the main thing.

cool.author: Ovid
cool.text: The high-spirited man may indeed die, but he will not stoop to meanness. Fire, though it may be quenched, will not become cool.

cool.author: Lewis Hamilton
cool.text: I relate my life a lot to 'Cool Runnings,' the movie.

cool.author: Michael Connelly
cool.text: In a daydream sort of way, I think it would be pretty cool to direct a movie. But I have been on movie and TV sets and know it is hard work. I like directing it in my mind. It is easier.

cool.author: Millie Bobby Brown
cool.text: I'm keeping the pixie. I hope I inspire people... it's really cool to have short hair.

cool.author: Anne Hathaway
cool.text: I think fashion is a lot of fun. I love clothes. More than fashion or brand labels, I love design. I love the thought that people put into clothes. I love when clothes make cultural statements and I think personal style is really cool. I also freely recognize that fashion should be a hobby.

cool.author: Shawn Bradley
cool.text: I want to be the kind of guy people will look at and say, 'Hey, he'd be a cool guy to have as a friend.'

cool.author: Reinhard Bonnke
cool.text: A God of fire is the only one there is. Our God is not like an iceberg but like a forest fire. He is never compared to the moon with its cool glow but rather to the sun, radiating warmth. He dwells in the light of the rising sun. Whatever he does shines brightly and is carried out with burning desire and a blazing purpose.

cool.author: Alan Stern
cool.text: Pluto is still active four and a half billion years into its history. It was expected that small planets like Pluto would cool off long ago and not still be showing geological activity. Pluto is, in fact, showing numerous examples of geological activity on a massive scale across the planet.

cool.author: Jay-Z
cool.text: Racism is taught in the home. We agree on that? Well, it's very hard to teach racism to a teenager who's listening to rap music and who idolizes, say, Snoop Dogg. It's hard to say, 'That guy is less than you.' The kid is like, 'I like that guy, he's cool. How is he less than me?

cool.author: Stanley Druckenmiller
cool.text: I think old people like Hillary Clinton and I shouldn't try and be cool with social networks, you know; maybe she should leave that stuff up to Chelsea.

cool.author: Issa Rae
cool.text: I used to love being the class clown. I loved to make jokes and make people laugh. There was a set of students who would find it funny. But the cool students were like, 'Eeew!'

cool.author: Victoria Justice
cool.text: Someone once told me that something they really liked about me was that they thought that I was really down to earth and not high-maintenance. I think that was cool. It's important to stay grounded.

cool.author: Dustin Milligan
cool.text: It's like Canada is the little brother to the United States and one day they are going to show the world they're just as cool as their successful big brother.

cool.author: Burl Ives
cool.text: The cool wind blew in my face and all at once I felt as if I had shed dullness from myself. Before me lay a long gray line with a black mark down the center. The birds were singing. It was spring.

cool.author: D'Angelo
cool.text: Coming up, the music of my era was very conscious. I grew up on Public Enemy, and it was popular culture to be aware. People were wearing Malcolm X T-shirts and Malcolm X hats. It was a very cool thing to know who Malcolm X was. It was all in the lyrics. It was trendy to be conscious and aware.

cool.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic
cool.text: Jose Mourinho is a big star... he's cool.

cool.author: Bianca Belair
cool.text: It's really cool to just be able to do what you love alongside the person that you love.

cool.author: John Cena
cool.text: At my age, I'm not trying to score cool points. I'm just excited when I can speak to younger members of our audience in the WWE. I just get to be a superhero to kids, but I'm not trying to be on the cutting edge of style or anything like that. Once you reach that point of deprivation, you don't mind it.

cool.author: Ann Makosinski
cool.text: What I kind of want to spread as my message to all kinds of youth that I get to reach out to is, you can do cool stuff; you've just got to put in time and be dedicated.

cool.author: Natalia Lafourcade
cool.text: No, I don't want them to remove my scar. Scars are cool.

cool.author: Tom Hardy
cool.text: Fame and stuff like that is all very cool, but at the end of the day, we're all human beings. Although what I do is incredibly surreal and fun and amazing and I'm really grateful for it, I don't believe my own press release, do you know what I mean?

cool.author: Joe Alwyn
cool.text: When your dad comes back from a faraway land with bows and arrows and spears wrapped up in a carpet... that's cool.

cool.author: Jeff Bezos
cool.text: People will visit Mars, they will settle mars, and we should because it's cool.

cool.author: Tom Hanks
cool.text: Tweeting is like sending out cool telegrams to your friends once a week.

cool.author: Charlie Weber
cool.text: I surround myself with some pretty cool people, and we all have a great time together, and so I just like to hang out with the people I love and see what happens. We always have a good time.

cool.author: Willow Smith
cool.text: If you don't like me, if you like me; both are equally cool. I send love and positive energy to all those people in their lives. I hope they find where they're meant to be.

cool.author: Cardi B
cool.text: Me and my mom are pretty cool. My mother's Caribbean, and she gets a little spicy, and I get a little spicy back.

cool.author: Trey Parker
cool.text: If we have a great idea, we'll go, 'Oh, this could be a cool movie.' Or really for us, it's more like, 'Oh, this is a really bad idea. Let's do this. This seems really stupid.'

cool.author: Rebel Wilson
cool.text: When I was younger I did karate and martial arts, and I think it's really cool for girls to have those kinds of abilities.

cool.author: Aurora
cool.text: Bob Dylan and Leonard Cohen. They're my biggest heroes. I love everything about Leonard Cohen: his lyrics and his voice. He seems like a really clever man, and Bob Dylan does as well. He's just really cool.

cool.author: Brian Ferneyhough
cool.text: When I left Europe in 1987 I did so with the thought that my relevance as a composition teacher would benefit from a certain cool distance to certain tendencies I had been observing for several years with increasing disquiet.

cool.author: Rick Harrison
cool.text: There's only so much stuff you can buy. I have to retail the stuff. Stuff that's really really weird - it's cool, but who are you going to sell it to? I do collect some stuff. In the end, I have to run a business.

cool.author: Zooey Deschanel
cool.text: I went to Northwestern because I had gone to a really nontraditional high school. I was like, 'It'd be cool to have a traditional college experience.' Then I was like, 'Oh, but none of these people understand what's cool about me. My specialness is not appreciated in this place.'

cool.author: Ma Huateng
cool.text: At Tencent, we may be businessmen, but we are still chasing our IT, our science. We are still striving to create something really cool, trying to create things we couldn't even imagine without our new technologies. I am still clinging to this enthusiasm.

cool.author: Troye Sivan
cool.text: Someone actually asked me once if I used coming out as a publicity stunt. It's cool that we live in a time when being gay could be seen as helping your career.

cool.author: Young M.A
cool.text: There are people who try to judge. I'm cool with that. I don't care what nobody say - the only thing that can defeat hate is love.

cool.author: Metro Boomin
cool.text: I like my name. If somebody wants to call me Leland, that's cool.

cool.author: Amber Liu
cool.text: I haven't said this yet, but my goal for this 'Beautiful' album is not to say, 'I'm beautiful,' or, 'OK, I'm so cool.' This is, honestly, an album written for the listeners.

cool.author: Lily James
cool.text: I saw this cool interview with Amy Adams from when she did 'Enchanted' and played a princess, and when kids came up to her with no make-up and ripped jeans on, she said, 'I'm off duty. I'm an off-duty princess', and I thought that was quite sweet.

cool.author: Amiri Baraka
cool.text: 'Griot' is a French word which means, you know, really, literally, 'cry.' You know, like the town crier. You know, they come in and say, you know, 'It's nine o'clock; everything is cool.' You know, 'President Bush is a fool.' I mean, stuff like that just to tell you. But for the kind of, the African thing is called djali.

cool.author: Daron Malakian
cool.text: I guess you'd say I'm a gearhead. It's not just guitars; I have five or six drum sets, a bunch of keyboards... It's like Guitar Center exploded, and all the cool stuff dropped in my backyard. I'm a really lucky guy, I have to admit.

cool.author: Stevie Nicks
cool.text: My generation fought very hard for feminism, and we fought very hard to not be labeled as you had to have a husband or you had to be in a relationship, or you were somehow not a cool chick.

cool.author: Charlie Puth
cool.text: I've always weaseled my way into Grammy parties to network and everything, but now I have a legitimate reason to be there - it's so cool.

cool.author: Masashi Kishimoto
cool.text: Perfect heroes are cool, but no one can really empathize or identify with them.

cool.author: Amine
cool.text: I don't really think much of any songs I put out like I know... I think they're good, that's why I'm putting them out. But like I don't ever try to expect anything, so even with 'Caroline' or 'Red Mercedes,' I just put them out and hope for the best and people kind of gravitate towards them and I guess that's pretty cool and that's a blessing.

cool.author: Heidi Klum
cool.text: Sure, climbing Mount Everest would be cool, but that's something I would now like to do as a family. Big experiences like that I don't want to have on my own anymore. I want to share them.

cool.author: Cody Walker
cool.text: Remember that no matter how cool you think you may be, you're not cool enough to look down on anyone... ever.

cool.author: Rachel Nichols
cool.text: What woman doesn't want to go out there and kick some butt? I did it with a sword in 'Conan,' I did it with a crossbow in 'G.I. Joe,' and I've got my multi-tool and my super-suit in 'Continuum.' It's really a release, and it's quite cool.

cool.author: Bill Gates
cool.text: I went to a public school through sixth grade, and being good at tests wasn't cool.

cool.author: Franka Potente
cool.text: I think working with Johnny Depp was very intimidating. It was my fault though. I mean he's a total cool nice, nice guy, but I was just so, I don't know, overpowered by his presence. Like he's a very mystic person. He's older so I never really warmed up around him. I was so stiff.

cool.author: Nathan Chen
cool.text: I began skating in the official practice venue of the 2002 Games. It was a huge Olympic atmosphere with Apollo Ohno sitting on the wall every day when I walked into the rink. That was really cool and very inspiring to see.

cool.author: Dominic Monaghan
cool.text: The term 'geek' for me is like you having a passion, interest in something that is unabashed and you don't care if people think it's not cool. You think it's cool and that's your thing.

cool.author: Lewis Thomas
cool.text: Survival, in the cool economics of biology, means simply the persistence of one's own genes in the generations to follow.

cool.author: Colby Covington
cool.text: All these guys that want to act tough and act like they're hard in the street, that's cool, man. I'm glad you want to act hard, and your emotions are driving crazy, but you need to get out of your feelings, nerds.

cool.author: Raphael Varane
cool.text: I am a shy, quiet and cool guy in life. And I am no different on the pitch.

cool.author: Tyler, The Creator
cool.text: To me, Sid Vicious is cool. Super chill.

cool.author: Jimmy Garoppolo
cool.text: Just like my agent had told me, Tom Brady is a really cool, down to earth guy.

cool.author: Chuck Inglish
cool.text: I think writers just can't come up with any new words for what we're doing, because we're not 'retro-' anything. Like, in 'Gold and a Pager,' we're not talking about what was current - pagers were cool to us, but they never stopped being cool; people just stopped using them.

cool.author: Colin Trevorrow
cool.text: We live in a cult of the upgrade right now. There's always something around the corner that will make whatever you think is cool right now feel obsolete.

cool.author: Zoe Kravitz
cool.text: I like to wear shoes that are cool but also practical. The same goes for bags. Your bag is a big deal in New York. You can't just carry around a little clutch, because you don't have a car or anywhere to stash things during the day, so you need to carry your whole life with you. That's why I like big, chunky bags with lots of compartments.

cool.author: Zac Posen
cool.text: Don't worry about what's cool and what's not cool. Authenticity is what's cool.

cool.author: Helen Garner
cool.text: I suppose there must be idiots who dream of signing deals with publishers while fully intending to drink martinis in cool bars or ride around on skateboards. But the actual writers I know are experts in neurotic self-torture. Every page of writing is the result of a thousand tiny decisions and desperate acts of will.

cool.author: Amanda Seyfried
cool.text: The funny thing is, the girls that I'm always up against for roles are pretty nice and cool, like Emma Watson. She's awesome.

cool.author: Chris Martin
cool.text: I don't mind not being cool.

cool.author: Kanye West
cool.text: In today's world, having money has allowed people who are extremely uncool to think that they're cool and carry it like that. People who really are cool and people who really are artists and have ideas have to literally turn in their cool card to society just to make it past the age of 28.

cool.author: Carli Lloyd
cool.text: Comic-Con is really cool. It's different. I like to people-watch. I like to see the costumes.

cool.author: Lil B
cool.text: When I was growing up, man, I didn't know myself. I was striving for respect. Trying to be cool for the girls. I wasn't the biggest dude and I'm a nice guy.

cool.author: Roger Goodell
cool.text: To me, what I love about the draft is; first, you see the young men who are realizing their dreams that they've worked so hard for. That's a pretty cool thing. You saw the emotion from some of these guys the other day. And then, the second thing is this total sense of hope and optimism. And, I think that's great for everybody.

cool.author: R-Truth
cool.text: I met Tupac pretty much right after he did the movie 'Juice,' so he was already with Digital Underground, but he was on his own rise at this time. He was very humble, down to earth, a very cool guy.

cool.author: Gervonta Davis
cool.text: Having a belt is cool, but I'm trying to do more in the sport.

cool.author: Ronnie Radke
cool.text: I think sober is the new black. That's the cool thing now. I'm trying to make it the cool thing.

cool.author: Terry Bradshaw
cool.text: When Brian told me he grew up in New Mexico, I told him I thought it is cool that people from other countries play football. He corrected me on my geography and agreed to sit down with me anyway.

cool.author: Mark Manson
cool.text: I was a big party guy in my twenties, and kind of a playboy as well. I adopted a lot of values and goals that were fairly superficial and, in many cases, self-destructive. They looked cool and sounded sexy on the surface, but underneath, there was no real meaning going on, just a lot of escapism.

cool.author: Lance Gross
cool.text: Working with Angela Bassett is by far the best. I've watched and admired her for years. I'm very intrigued by her work. She's so cool. I still call her 'Mom' when I see her.

cool.author: Rozonda Thomas
cool.text: When I met T-Boz and Left Eye, they were buying jeans that were a size 38. Three little cute girls dressed like boys was cool back then. Our style was cartoonish but fly at the same time.

cool.author: Tommy Bond
cool.text: I noticed that this defense attorney is a very, very intelligent man, and he's very cool and he's very knowledgeable, and I think that personally I'd like to have an attorney like him.

cool.author: Grimes
cool.text: In America there's lot of cool cities, but in Canada there's, like, well, Vancouver, Toronto and Halifax may be cool, but they're so expensive. Montreal is the only city that's affordable but also has buses and culture.

cool.author: Henry Rollins
cool.text: I once asked Ozzy Osbourne, truly one of my favorite people in the world, if he was cool with singing Black Sabbath songs year after year, whether he was performing with Black Sabbath or out on a solo tour. He said it was great.

cool.author: Stella McCartney
cool.text: I think the reality is that, for me, real fur is extraordinarily old fashioned. I think you look old. Even if you're 20, and you've got a real fur coat, you just look like an old, unaware, unconscious being on the planet. It's not relevant, it's not sexy, it's not fashionable, and it's not cool.

cool.author: Khalid
cool.text: I feel like baggy pants are cool.

cool.author: Dante Basco
cool.text: You have to understand, when you're 15 and you're doing this Steven Spielberg movie with megastars - Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts - you know you want to be cool. I don't know how cool I'm going to look with my belly button out!

cool.author: Luke Combs
cool.text: Sometimes people are looking for, 'What's the next Tesla car? What's this really cool, super-specific thing that people are going to want?' But I try to be just like a Ford truck. They sell a lot more Ford trucks than they do Tesla cars.

cool.author: Donna Strickland
cool.text: As for me, I want to have fun while I'm working. Now not everyone thinks physics is fun, but I do. I think experimental physics is especially fun, because not only do you get to solve puzzles about the universe or on Earth, there are really cool toys in the lab.

cool.author: Daryl Hall
cool.text: I definitely dislike pomposity and artifice. I hope that I'm not that. Once I write a song, it belongs to the world, and the way people perceive it, it's cool.

cool.author: Adam Cole
cool.text: There's so many cool things that happen, where you want to kind of sit back and smell the roses and say, 'Wow, this is awesome!' But then you're already thinking a mile ahead about what the next landmark is, what the next goal is.

cool.author: Carlos Ruiz
cool.text: I have some really cool memories here in Philly, and I thank you for the support. These are great fans, and I think when you play hard and when you do your best to win, they appreciate that. It was fun to be part of this organization and play for this city. I really enjoyed the time I was here.

cool.author: Serena Williams
cool.text: I've thought it would be cool to have a baby young. You know, be my road dog - like my dogs, they travel the world - but there's always something you have to give up for success. Everything comes at a cost. Just what are you willing to pay for it?

cool.author: Ashley Madekwe
cool.text: A light cotton cami is always great to stay cool.

cool.author: Tracy Morgan
cool.text: Cool is the enemy of funny. You can't be cool and be funny at the same time. Only Eddie Murphy could do that.

cool.author: Britney Spears
cool.text: I used to be a cool chick but I'm not anymore.

cool.author: Machine Gun Kelly
cool.text: I don't think having a conservative mind in 2012 is a cool thing.

cool.author: Will Cuppy
cool.text: Aristotle was famous for knowing everything. He taught that the brain exists merely to cool the blood and is not involved in the process of thinking. This is true only of certain persons.

cool.author: Evangeline Lilly
cool.text: I just like short hair on women; I think it's cool.

cool.author: Boots Riley
cool.text: This idea of 'cool capitalism' is still capitalism. It doesn't matter if Elon Musk quotes Nas.

cool.author: Roger Federer
cool.text: I don't need to come back to Wimbledon every year because I can't live without it. I'd be totally cool without tennis.

cool.author: Mads Mikkelsen
cool.text: I've been watching 'Walking Dead' with my son, and there is absolutely nothing in there I find shocking, but it's cool, and I like it.

cool.author: Fab Moretti
cool.text: Julian is a very humble guy, so he might not say this, but he never lived with John Casablancas. John Casablancas is a very cool guy. But Julian is a very self-sufficient person. He worked as a bartender, just like everyone else worked.

cool.author: Myles Kennedy
cool.text: Though rock is not the force that it once was in America, it still has a loyal fan base that always seems to continue regardless of what popular culture deems as the 'cool thing.'

cool.author: Rey Mysterio
cool.text: It was just so cool to put on my uncle's masks and wrestle with him. I knew that's what I wanted to do. I wanted to be a part of this world.

cool.author: Tommy Lee
cool.text: I'm really a cool, mellow guy. I'm not as crazy as everybody thinks.

cool.author: Rupi Kaur
cool.text: My parents didn't allow me to do all the things the cool kids could do. I was quiet, reserved, and at some points, taken complete advantage of simply because of my sex and gender. For a while, in high school, I was so deep into self-hate.

cool.author: Tate McRae
cool.text: I'll be a wreck for the simplest things in life, and just not affected by cool things.

cool.author: Sania Mirza
cool.text: On the tennis court, one needs a cool temperament, tremendous ball sense, reflexes, speed, hand-eye co-ordination, power, timing and peak physical fitness. Off the court, the player and support team need skills in planning, execution, travel, an ability to raise funds when needed, and several other talents.

cool.author: Dean Ornish
cool.text: One of the reasons I'm excited by what visionary Elon Musk has done with the Tesla is to show that you can reduce global warming and drive a powerful, fun car. A cool car helps make a cooler planet.

cool.author: Rodney Crowell
cool.text: My father took me to see Hank Williams on December 14th, 1952. I was two years and four months of age. And I remember a little cool eddy of hair hitting my cheek, and I remember the smell of his hair oil, and I remember the mingling tonality of the small talk before the show started. Those are my memories.

cool.author: Romesh Ranganathan
cool.text: I've had a Hindu upbringing. There's a lot about it I think is cool. Temples are amazing. It's a nice vibe when people are praying. And there's lots about it where I understand why they believe those things. But I'm not practising.

cool.author: Steve Gleason
cool.text: If we have a purpose in life beyond being a cog in the human machine, mine is to help inspire people and that's pretty cool. I would like to motivate the world.

cool.author: Aquaria
cool.text: If everyone's rocking the same cool, hard-to-find fabrics, they might not be as cool and hard to find as you think.

cool.author: Elon Musk
cool.text: I would like to fly in space. Absolutely. That would be cool. I used to just do personally risky things, but now I've got kids and responsibilities, so I can't be my own test pilot. That wouldn't be a good idea. But I definitely want to fly as soon as it's a sensible thing to do.

cool.author: Halston Sage
cool.text: I would love to be in a Nicholas Sparks movie. And Scarlett Johansson inspired me. I think it's cool when women are able to kick butt.

cool.author: Lindsay Lohan
cool.text: My mom is very close to me, and it has been really cool having a mom that's closer to my age because she can go out with me and stuff.

cool.author: Playboi Carti
cool.text: I feel like I have something to prove. I'm just not this cool fashion kid that be around ASAP Rocky.

cool.author: Jimmy O. Yang
cool.text: I don't read in Chinese very well. Google Translate helps with that. It's cool that I can upload a photo and translate the text from it.

cool.author: David J. C. MacKay
cool.text: Electric cars are really very cool. Air-source heat pumps are great.

cool.author: David Hewlett
cool.text: 'Pin' was a creepy little movie that I starred in back when I was cool and thin and had so much hair I didn't know what color to dye it.

cool.author: Ron Atkinson
cool.text: I think that was a moment of cool panic there.

cool.author: Chloe Sevigny
cool.text: It's hard to encapsulate my inspiration because there are so many different looks, but I think it's just like, sexy girl you see walking down the street in a cool outfit. A lot of eyelet, a lot of leather, playing with the hard and the soft, the good and bad inside of us all.

cool.author: Charo
cool.text: I'm so stupid because I refuse to think that I'm getting older. I get up in the morning, and it's like, 'La, la, la, I'm so pretty.' I still mingle with a lot with young people. I even go to college campuses to talk to them because I know how they think. They don't think I'm boring, either. They think I'm cool, but I want them to think I'm hot!

cool.author: Flying Lotus
cool.text: Whenever it gets a little cold in L.A., it gives me an excuse to light my fireplace. You could stare at that joint for, like, a cool two hours. It's entrancing.

cool.author: Warren Spector
cool.text: For me, the cool thing is doing things that could only be done in gaming.

cool.author: Taylor Swift
cool.text: I don't ever feel like the cool kid at the party, ever. It's like, 'Smile and be nice to everybody, because you were not invited to be here.'

cool.author: Tyler Joseph
cool.text: It's a funny thing. I'll be in my home town of Columbus at a restaurant or something, and the waiter maybe asks, 'What do you do?' and I say, 'Oh, I'm in a band... Twenty One Pilots,' and he'll say, 'Cool, I'll check it out. I never heard of them.' And then I say, 'In September we're playing the Schottenstein Center,' and it's like, 'What?!'

cool.author: Guillermo Diaz
cool.text: I'm just a big old nerd. I'm not that cool guy at all.

cool.author: Frank Ocean
cool.text: The idea of recognising your strengths and using them in as versatile a way as you can is cool to me.

cool.author: Thomas Middleditch
cool.text: Twitter is maybe the worst thing. It's cool when you can tweet out your show and be like, 'Hey, come see my show,' or 'Check out this Kickstarter,' but it's also this weird 140-character vehicle for insidiousness.

cool.author: Stephen Curry
cool.text: The last game I played in college was in the NIT against St. Mary's. That was the first time I had come to the Oakland area. So, the last game I played in college and the first game of my NBA career were out here in the Bay Area. It's pretty cool.

cool.author: Dwayne Johnson
cool.text: 'Be Cool' was a defining movie for me.

cool.author: Celine Dion
cool.text: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool.

cool.author: Chadwick Boseman
cool.text: There are some stories I want to tell that I think it'd be cool to see an African-American dude do.

cool.author: Larry Ellison
cool.text: It's surreal to think that I own this beautiful island. It doesn't feel like anyone can own Lanai. What it feels like to me is this really cool 21st-century engineering project, where I get to work with the people of Lanai to create a prosperous and sustainable Eden in the Pacific.

cool.author: William Henry Hudson
cool.text: Now that we are cool, he said, and regret that we hurt each other, I am not sorry that it happened.

cool.author: Chad Gilbert
cool.text: Nowadays, people get tattoos so easily, to look cool and only for fashion.

cool.author: Y'lan Noel
cool.text: A lot of times, black people were extremely cool, and that's how we've been commodified in TV and film. But now we're starting to see an upswing of material where we're like, 'It's cool to be quirky and weird and smart.'

cool.author: Amanda Shires
cool.text: 'Eve's Daughter' - that's like, 'Make way, women are cool.' I feel like it's my responsibility to try and do at least a little bit for my own daughter.

cool.author: Michael Welch
cool.text: I know some actors feel classes are not cool or they create negative public relations, but I continue to crave the story just beyond my reach. To grasp that brass ring I need to continue to fine-tune my talents.

cool.author: Ryan Reynolds
cool.text: Making a mix CD - albeit slightly old school - is generally a pretty cool gift and something I like to receive, or giving someone a book that moved you. Writing an inscription inside makes it even better.

cool.author: LZ Granderson
cool.text: Insecurity is a natural part of human nature, and there are times we feel our stories are not worth telling, so we turn to the people we admire for strength. If we dress like someone everyone thinks is cool, perhaps we'll be seen as cool.

cool.author: Linus Torvalds
cool.text: No-one has ever called me a cool dude. I'm somewhere between geek and normal.

cool.author: Ed Sheeran
cool.text: Everyone knows almost everything about me. I make it very clear that I'm cool with people knowing all my personal life through my songs.

cool.author: David Longstreth
cool.text: What Joanna and Solange and Kanye all had in common was a mental image of what the sound is supposed to be. As a collaborator, my goal has to be to help them get toward that mental image. That was cool.

cool.author: Richard Belzer
cool.text: The number one job for me is to make people laugh. If I can also make people think, then that's a cool thing.

cool.author: Trae Young
cool.text: My hair is different than a lot of people's. I like my hair. I like the fade. I like the little design I have. I'm cool with it. Obviously my hair is thin on top, so it looks like a bald spot, but I really could care less.

cool.author: Ross Lynch
cool.text: When I was younger, I always wanted to be a musician, a performer and an entertainer - but I never thought about becoming a poster or anything like that. It's pretty cool.

cool.author: Takeoff
cool.text: Before we were Migos, we were called Polo Club and wore them thangs. It was cool back then, but now it's whack.

cool.author: Steven Brust
cool.text: All literature consists of whatever the writer thinks is cool. The reader will like the book to the degree that he agrees with the writer about what's cool.

cool.author: Chelsea Handler
cool.text: I've always had a big personality. I was trickier as a kid. I behaved erratically instead of consistently. I would have tons of friends, and then I would have no friends. I'd be with the cool girls, then the uncool girls. I migrated from group to group because I was bored or people got bored with me. I was very intense.

cool.author: Dylan McDermott
cool.text: Honestly, I'm cool with everyone, and people pick up on that. I'd say, 'I'm not gay, but it's all good.' It's kind of like going to Paris when you don't know the language; some Americans get into trouble over there, but I'm just like, 'Sorry, I don't speak French.'

cool.author: Astro
cool.text: I wasn't the cool kid in school, but I wasn't the lame one. I knew I wasn't cool, so I called myself lame, and that's what made me cool in front of the cool kids.

cool.author: Moneybagg Yo
cool.text: A lot of people think I'm cocky or arrogant but I'm really just chill and cool and humble.

cool.author: Max Martin
cool.text: I've never been cool.

cool.author: Meg White
cool.text: I met Drew Barrymore in New York and she said she liked the band. That was really cool. I grew up on her.

cool.author: Zoe Kravitz
cool.text: Hollywood is like a really sad, grown up version of high school where people get labeled as 'cool,' 'not cool,' 'jock,' 'bombshell,' 'quirky'... it's like a caste system. You're either in, or you're out.

cool.author: iJustine
cool.text: 'The Vampire Diaries' is my favorite show, so being on it was cool. I really wanted to be on all of my favorite shows, so I was on 'The Vampire Diaries', 'Law and Order', and 'House.'

cool.author: Emma Chamberlain
cool.text: I've always been the one who struggled financially, so now it's so cool that I can make my own money and do whatever I want with it.

cool.author: Simon Spurr
cool.text: Even though it's not a widely appreciated yarn, any suit made from a mohair-wool blend travels exceptionally well. The retention of the mohair fiber bounces back and minimizes any creasing that occurs whilst traveling. Mohair also breathes really well, keeping you cool or warm, and is therefore extremely versatile.

cool.author: Selena Gomez
cool.text: My perfect guy wears converse, is totally laid back, and doesn't worry about being cool.

cool.author: Richard Corliss
cool.text: In the movies, every crazy old fart needs a cool old car. Jack Nicholson drove a spiffy yellow 1970 Dodge Challenger two-door in 'The Bucket List.' In 'Gran Torino,' the cranky pensioner played by Clint Eastwood not only owned a 1972 GT Sport, he also used to build cars like that at the Ford plant.

cool.author: Jim Rash
cool.text: I think what's cool about a body-switching movie is, 'The grass is always greener:' the idea that someone else has a better life than I do.

cool.author: Alexander Ovechkin
cool.text: Fifty is a pretty cool number.

cool.author: Chester Bennington
cool.text: It's cool to be a part of recovery. This is just who I am, this is what I write about, what I do, and most of my work has been a reflection of what I've been going through in one way or another.

cool.author: Les Claypool
cool.text: I liked the name Frog Brigade because it lent itself to a lot of cool imagery with the whole frog thing.

cool.author: Rutina Wesley
cool.text: I'm in a comic book now. That was cool. That's something that I'm still sorta reeling about, 'cause I read comics as a kid. Someone drew me, and actually did a pretty good job!

cool.author: Amy Grant
cool.text: Come Christmas Eve, we usually go to my mom and dad's. Everybody brings one gift and then we play that game when we all steal it from each other. Some are really cool, others are useful and some are a bit out there.

cool.author: Sean M. Carroll
cool.text: A full understanding of what happens in our everyday lives needs to take into account what happened at the Big Bang. And not only is that intrinsically interesting and just kind of cool to think about, but it's also a mystery that is not given much attention by working scientists; it's a little bit underappreciated.

cool.author: Orlando Bloom
cool.text: I used to ride motorbikes and drive cars like everything was a racetrack; it was ridiculous. It wasn't because I thought it was cool; it was just because I loved living on the edge. But I've chilled.

cool.author: Faith Salie
cool.text: No longer is a geek identifiable by a pale complexion, black-rimmed glasses, a bowling shirt that says 'Nerd World Order.' No, geeks are everywhere. And they're cool!

cool.author: Ali Fazal
cool.text: Now, there doesn't have to necessarily be a white man in the lead role. That's the way forward. That's diversity. It's cool if an Indian is playing the lead role in a Hollywood project, and we should be proud of this.

cool.author: Amos Lee
cool.text: The cool thing about being a songwriter, or a writer, I guess, in general, you can take on a lot of different things, experience a lot of different things, just by writing about them.

cool.author: Macaulay Culkin
cool.text: I have no control over people's perceptions of me at all and that's one of the things I decided very early on is that I can't control the way other people think of me. All I can do, especially when it comes to my career is go out there and do cool unique kinds of things.

cool.author: Michael McIntyre
cool.text: Now I almost overly embrace how weird I am, how I look and how oddly camp I am. It's almost too honest for me because I harboured ambitions to be quite a cool, good-looking guy.

cool.author: Colin Angle
cool.text: The ideal vacuum cleaner would be one you never see. It needs to not just be a cool gadget, but a product that cleans your floor correctly. I can imagine people having a cupboard full of robots that only come out when you need them to fulfil a specific purpose.

cool.author: David Droga
cool.text: Beanbags and softball matches and a cool Twitter handle doesn't make young people want to work at your office.

cool.author: Morten Harket
cool.text: For a lot of fans from the early days, they probably had issues they were A-ha fans, because it probably wasn't 'cool.'

cool.author: Amanda Palmer
cool.text: The world needs actual excitement and emotion more than it needs cool people.

cool.author: John Cusack
cool.text: I remember once acting really cool on a bus with this girl named Stephanie. When I got home, I realized that I had a really big zit on my forehead. If you have acne problems, you really shouldn't be acting like Don Juan.

cool.author: Gigi Hadid
cool.text: Fashion is really a place where every other industry connects, whether it's music or acting. At the end of the day, everyone is going to walk the red carpet and be interested in the fashion side of it. I think that's really cool because as a model, you get to connect with a lot of different worlds.

cool.author: Gerard De Nerval
cool.text: When the soul drifts uncertainly between life and the dream, between the mind's disorder and the return to cool reflection, it is in religious thought that we should seek consolation.

cool.author: Ryan Tedder
cool.text: The cool thing about writing music, writing anything, is that once you publish it, it's there forever.

cool.author: Nancy Gibbs
cool.text: A good president needs a big comfort zone. He should be able to treat enemies as opportunities, appear authentic in joy and grief, stay cool under the hot lights.

cool.author: Meek Mill
cool.text: I don't rely on catchphrases or really like sing-along. I just do whatever I feel. Whatever the beat makes me say, I do that and I run with that. It's been working for me, so I'd be cool with that.

cool.author: Natascha McElhone
cool.text: I first met my husband when I was 15. He was very cool, in a band, all that kind of thing, but he took a long time to grow up. Our paths crossed again 10 years later, and after about two weeks I knew that was it. I'm glad I met him when I did, even though I was fairly young. Because I think sometimes you can crystallise into singledom.

cool.author: Ben Barnes
cool.text: I always looked really young for my age. And once I hit 23, 24 and 25, I was then allowed to play the cool 18-year-olds and stuff.

cool.author: Julia Butterfly Hill
cool.text: I can hold space for people who think I'm a nut job. It's cool. But I know from my own experience what I experienced. I know what I learned. I know what I saw. I know what I heard.

cool.author: Britt Robertson
cool.text: I was 11 and watching soap operas with my mom, and I thought it would be cool to be an actor. I thought soap operas was going to be the dream at the time - it's obviously now not the dream, but I think soap operas are really cool. Maybe I'll go back to that.

cool.author: Kaley Cuoco
cool.text: I wouldn't say I was bullied, but I was definitely a bit of an outcast. It was more the kids thinking I thought I was cool. I started homeschooling in fifth grade, and I was much happier.

cool.author: Jay Kay
cool.text: I may be the prat in the hat, that's cool, but I drive an Aston Martin DB5.

cool.author: Corbin Bleu
cool.text: I am a very open, social, friendly person, and when it comes to people approaching me and asking for an autograph, I am totally cool with doing any of that. It's a lot of fun.

cool.author: Abbi Jacobson
cool.text: We just sort of thought a Web series would be a cool thing to be able to send to our parents to show them that we were, in fact, actually doing comedy.

cool.author: Kevin Plank
cool.text: The best merchants in the world aren't the ones predicting what's cool next; we're the ones dictating what's cool next.

cool.author: Dhani Harrison
cool.text: One interviewer asked me: 'How do you feel that you've betrayed your father?' That wasn't really very cool.

cool.author: George Clinton
cool.text: The key to looking good in a cape is the way you take it off. You should look like those sword-fighting people, the Three Musketeers. Taking it off, swinging it, that's what makes it cool.

cool.author: Till Lindemann
cool.text: I would love to make a really cool Spanish song, definitely.

cool.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.
cool.text: I haven't took no punishment. There's nothing cool about taking punishment.

cool.author: Claudia Winkleman
cool.text: Facebook, I'm learning, is like a man. You have to be smiley and fun and witty but sometimes you have to play it cool and just ignore it for a couple of hours.

cool.author: Kimiko Glenn
cool.text: I was born and grew up in Phoenix, and I left there when I was 17 to go to Interlochen Arts Academy - a boarding school in Michigan - for a year, and then I went to college for a year at The Boston Conservatory and landed the 'Spring Awakening' tour midway through my freshman year, which was pretty cool.

cool.author: Jennifer Garner
cool.text: In my teens, I was never part of the cool crowd.

cool.author: Noah Wyle
cool.text: A cameo in 'Doctor Who' would be kind of cool to have on my filmography.

cool.author: Charlie Trotter
cool.text: I never considered Miles Davis a perfectionist; I always considered him as an excellence-ist, where deviation is actually kind of cool.

cool.author: Amy Jackson
cool.text: It makes no difference to my family where one comes from as long as we make each other happy. They are pretty cool like that.

cool.author: Sunny Hostin
cool.text: I'm cool under pressure. Cool as a cucumber, actually, eerily so. My friends and family comment on it. I think I get it from my father, the quintessential smooth operator.

cool.author: Dean Ambrose
cool.text: While it's cool to think ghosts exist, I don't want to see one.

cool.author: Chris Evert
cool.text: I was labeled at a young age - Miss Unemotional, Miss Cool, and that would carry over to my press conferences.

cool.author: David Leitch
cool.text: You can sometimes break rules in comics that you can't necessarily break in cinema. It's fun to find something cool in a comic and then try and find a way to break the same rule in another medium.

cool.author: Jerry Saltz
cool.text: Summer is a great time to visit art museums, which offer the refreshing rinse of swimming pools - only instead of cool water, you immerse yourself in art.

cool.author: Tom Brady
cool.text: When the NBA adopted their uniform that they had to wear, I thought that was very interesting. And you see the way NBA players dress: It's very cool.

cool.author: Brittany Snow
cool.text: I've worn my share of leopard pink boots to premieres or belts the size of cars. I thought my pink leopard boots were so cool.

cool.author: Oneohtrix Point Never
cool.text: For so many people, it's very hard to feel okay with success, because success is not cool. It supposedly tarnishes your thing; it ruins little pockets of scenes and the self-importance that comes from thinking you're the only people in your town that are doing something.

cool.author: Sid Waddell
cool.text: He's as cool as a prized marrow!

cool.author: Steve Jones
cool.text: I couldn't care less about what people think of me! I do what I do, and I don't care about what other people think is cool. I don't care about image!

cool.author: John McEnroe
cool.text: I like John McCain, or he seems like a cool guy in a lot of ways. I don't agree with a lot of his policies, but he still seems like a cool guy.

cool.author: Soulja Boy
cool.text: I hate it when people come up to me on trains and ask 'Are you Soulja Boy?' If people want pictures or autographs, that's cool, but I don't like the dumb questions.

cool.author: Cliff Chiang
cool.text: One of my earliest jobs drawing was 'Wonder Woman: Our Worlds At War,' with Phil Jimenez, which was a really cool jaunt through her history. I got to draw this two-page spread that was set in the Golden Age.

cool.author: El-P
cool.text: It's pretty cool being 40 and having your blow-up moment.

cool.author: Charli XCX
cool.text: I used to worry about being cool. Now I realize that I genuinely don't care.

cool.author: AJ Lee
cool.text: It's the most gratifying thing to have young girls telling me, 'I love that you do a photo shoot in pants and a button up shirt, and you still look cool.'

cool.author: Abhijit Banerjee
cool.text: If there can be films about why hockey (and not just cricket) is cool, there can be a film or two about the virtues of honest, hard work.

cool.author: Amber Stevens
cool.text: Middle school was my most awkward stage. I switched schools after the sixth grade after having gone to the same school for six years with the same group of 40 kids. It was a shock. I reinvented myself. I experimented with different styles, different groups of friends, and different types of music and not knowing how to be cool.

cool.author: Drake
cool.text: Me and my dad are friends. We're cool. I'll never be disappointed again, because I don't expect anything anymore from him. I just let him exist, and that's how we get along.

cool.author: Kathleen Hanna
cool.text: Feminism rotates between backlash and interest. And the cool thing about the Internet is that it's allowing women more access to their own history. Part of the problem before the Internet was that we didn't know which books to read. Someone had to tell you.

cool.author: Millie Bobby Brown
cool.text: I'm cool with people dressing up as Eleven for Halloween. I definitely want to open my door and give them candy.

cool.author: Simon Rex
cool.text: It was a lot of fun doing 'Felicity.' She had just won the Golden Globe, and she was huge at the time, but she was like the nicest girl ever. As a guest star on a show, you get on the set and you feel out of place, but she was so nice to me and really cool.

cool.author: Rich Paul
cool.text: We used to say, There's nothing cool about being a dummy.

cool.author: Dominic Monaghan
cool.text: My parents are pretty cool people.

cool.author: Amanda de Cadenet
cool.text: I'd like to interview Rita Ora - I think she's really cool.

cool.author: Christopher Atkins
cool.text: I thought that would be kind of cool, to make a bad guy look sympathetic.

cool.author: Taylor Lautner
cool.text: I'm not the biggest motorcycle fan - they're cool and a lot of fun, but they're scary as well!

cool.author: Channing Tatum
cool.text: Someone who doesn't take herself too seriously and can be a goofball. Because everyone's a nerd inside, I don't care how cool you are.

cool.author: Mark Zuckerberg
cool.text: My friends are people who like building cool stuff. We always have this joke about people who want to just start companies without making something valuable. There's a lot of that in Silicon Valley.

cool.author: Rosemarie DeWitt
cool.text: I know more about 'Moana' and 'Coco' these days than I do about anything hip and cool like 'Black Mirror'.

cool.author: Alfred Enoch
cool.text: When I was, like, 10, I decided it would look really cool, so I pretended I was British. And I've been doing that ever since.

cool.author: Kate Nash
cool.text: When I first started, in 2006, it was an exciting time. Independent, cool, weird artists were being successful, and magazines were writing about them, and people were getting played on radio that were, like, really good.

cool.author: Vanilla Ice
cool.text: And all the zig-zags and lines in my hair? I used to do that myself. I just thought it was cool that you could actually do that with your hair.

cool.author: Tim Kaine
cool.text: I have a sort of Catholic-slash-Calvinist view of human nature, but every day I meet somebody who is doing cool things. So people get you out of your solitude and do things that exceed your expectations every day.

cool.author: Daniel Ricciardo
cool.text: Formula One was just cool. I loved racing, all types of racing, but from a young age, Formula One was the noise and everything, and that's what I was drawn to. I already knew when I was younger, the coolest guys are in F1... not that NASCAR drivers aren't cool, but that was always what I had in my head!

cool.author: Jared Goff
cool.text: Taylor Swift is cool. And I like her music. She's a great performer, and she's fun to listen to at times.

cool.author: Johnny Depp
cool.text: I suppose the only thing at 50 you can really start to look forward to is just total irresponsibility. As you get older, you can just sit in a chair, wear anything you want, you know you can walk down; old people dress cool. You know they wear sweatpants. The elderly have it down.

cool.author: Issa Rae
cool.text: Black and awkward is the worst, because black people are stereotyped as being anything but awkward in mainstream media... Black people are always portrayed to be cool or overly dramatic, anything but awkward.

cool.author: Spider Robinson
cool.text: Now that I finally have the time for it, this web surfing stuff turns out to be as interesting and fun and addictive as you've all been telling me. Zipping from link to link, chasing an idea across the noosphere, sucking up information like a killer whale - way cool.

cool.author: Nora Fatehi
cool.text: My favourite place in the 'Bigg Boss 9' house was sky lounge, where the cool group would go and chill.

cool.author: Ja Rule
cool.text: Being incarcerated is truly very serious, and it has changed my life to such an extent that breaking the cycle has become my sole focus. Jail is definitely not cool. Education is.

cool.author: Michael Fassbender
cool.text: There's no point in swanning through and being cool as a breeze in every scene. It's not really that interesting. Even if you're a superhero.

cool.author: Frank Black
cool.text: They're a different generation, those kids; kids that are under the age of twelve. They're not that impressed by rock music, you know what I mean? They're like, it's cool and everything, but whatever. They're just as impressed by YouTube.

cool.author: Joseph Butler
cool.text: The private interest of the individual would not be sufficiently provided for by reasonable and cool self-love alone; therefore the appetites and passions are placed within as a guard and further security, without which it would not be taken due care of.

cool.author: Eileen Pollack
cool.text: Success in math and the hard sciences, far from being a matter of gender, is almost entirely dependent on culture - a culture that teaches girls math isn't cool and no one will date them if they excel in physics.

cool.author: Tim Cook
cool.text: Virtual reality sort of encloses and immerses the person into an experience that can be really cool but probably has a lower commercial interest over time. Less people will be interested in that, but there are some really cool areas there for education and gaming that we have a lot of interest in.

cool.author: Zoe Kravitz
cool.text: It's superficial that people think I'm cool because I wear certain clothes and I have tattoos. The funniest part is, when they get to know me, they're always surprised by how nerdy I am.

cool.author: Burnie Burns
cool.text: If somebody's in the community doing cool stuff, we'll hire them.

cool.author: Grace Potter
cool.text: I'm from Vermont, where to be stylish and cool is to have a dirty pair of hiking boots and know how to change a tire, hang drywall, and bale hay. Those people are my home, and every time I come home, it reminds me that there's something to be said for being in the spotlight, but it can never be a whole part of me.

cool.author: Emir Kusturica
cool.text: My purpose is to make a movie to make you warm. To give you some heat. Now, this rational world has become a place where only what is cool is good. Do you cut the movie on the basis of the beat of modernity or the basis of the beat of your own heart?

cool.author: Peter Buck
cool.text: Almost all the fans I meet are pretty cool people. They're intelligent and tend to think about things a bit more than your average rock'n'roll fans: sensible people I wouldn't mind having a drink with.

cool.author: Mary-Kate Olsen
cool.text: Australia is so cool that it's hard to even know where to start describing it. The beaches are beautiful; so is the weather. Not too crowded. Great food, great music, really nice people. It must be a lot like Los Angeles was many years ago.

cool.author: Martin Gore
cool.text: I don't know if it's cool to say this anymore, but I grew up listening to Gary Glitter. A majority of his songs were in that shuffle-blues beat, and I think that's probably why I tend to write like that.

cool.author: Mark Rober
cool.text: One of the things that always appealed to me about Nasa was we were always doing cool stuff that no-one's done before.

cool.author: Cole Swindell
cool.text: I want to be somebody, a person, first that people remember, but also, I want music that I release to still be around. I don't want it to just be cool for a second and be gone.

cool.author: Kirstin Maldonado
cool.text: I think it's cool to do a summer outdoor show because, growing up, like, those were always the shows and the concerts that I would get to see, where I would be sitting on the grass with my friends and hanging out, and it was such a moment.

cool.author: Peter Hedges
cool.text: I feel cool when I say I live in Brooklyn.

cool.author: Thomas Massie
cool.text: I'd say I'm a true conservative. Liberals have got a monopoly on protecting the environment, or all the cool technology, and I don't think we should cede that territory.

cool.author: Jay-Z
cool.text: Growing up, politics never trickled down to the areas we come from. But people from Obama's camp, and Obama himself, reached out to me and asked for my help on the campaign. We've sat and had dinner, and we've spoken on the phone. He's a very sharp guy. Very charming. Very cool.

cool.author: CL
cool.text: I'm not against being beautiful or sexy or anything, but I have this 'cool' image that I want to keep.

cool.author: Chandler Riggs
cool.text: I met Porter Robinson in, like, 2016 at Shaky Beats after one of his sets. Me and my friends ran backstage really quickly to try and get him as he was going to his trailer. We said 'Hi' really quick, and it was the best 30 seconds of my life; it was amazing. Getting to meet artists like that that have changed my life is super, super cool.

cool.author: Charlie Puth
cool.text: What's cool about the beatboxing is I was so afraid to sing in front of my peers, my parents, anybody. I just wouldn't do it. So in sixth grade, I would turn to beatboxing because it made me feel better. Like, I can beatbox 'Drop It Like It's Hot.' Doing that a bunch of times eventually gave me the confidence to sing in front of people.

cool.author: Bill Kaulitz
cool.text: I think it would be so cool to meet Rihanna, 'cause she's so sexy.

cool.author: Amber Liu
cool.text: With anything new, if it's weird or cool, it will catch people's attention. But slowly, that new thing, if it catches on, it becomes a trend itself.

cool.author: Charli D'Amelio
cool.text: I feel like no one really gets to see, but, people are always talking about how they think our family dynamic is pretty cool.

cool.author: Ben Carson
cool.text: When I entered high school I was an A-student, but not for long. I wanted the fancy clothes. I wanted to hang out with the guys. I went from being an A-student to a B-student to a C-student, but I didn't care. I was getting the high fives and the low fives and the pats on the back. I was cool.

cool.author: Kristin Armstrong
cool.text: I think, as most of us do, I put such high expectations on myself that this spills over onto other people. And not everyone is wired this way. Some people can shrug expectations off their shoulders like a cardigan, remaining cool and breezy. Others wear them like a parka with a stuck zipper, hot and stifling.

cool.author: Frank Miller
cool.text: I thought Daredevil was kind of cool because he couldn't do anything. I mean, he's blind. It wasn't that he could fly. His major power was an impediment. So I was intrigued. When I took over he was kind of like Spider-Man-lite, but I was able to project a lot of my Catholic imagery onto it. And I'd always wanted to do a crime comic.

cool.author: Aaliyah
cool.text: I know that people think I'm sexy and I am looked at as that. It is cool with me. It's wonderful to have sexy appeal. If you embrace it, it can be a very beautiful thing.

cool.author: Paul Rudd
cool.text: I think there's something kind of good about growing up in a place you know is not the cool place to be. I think it's good for your head.

cool.author: Angelina Jolie
cool.text: Just be a cool grandpa who's creative, and hang out and tell stories and read a book in the library.

cool.author: Finn Wolfhard
cool.text: Meeting Ryan Reynolds was really cool, and Blake Lively.

cool.author: Jordan Burroughs
cool.text: As wrestlers, we're not trying to hurt or damage physically our opponent. All we're trying to do is score points and get our hands raised, so I think that's where we differ from the UFC, but I think that also the way in which we could address each other could be cool from a competitive spirit.

cool.author: Emile Hirsch
cool.text: We want to do for 'Hamlet' what Baz Luhrmann did for 'Romeo and Juliet' in terms of like a really cool kind of re-imagining.

cool.author: David Lauren
cool.text: Wearable technology is a big trend, and a lot of people have been trying to figure out how to take it from band or bracelet to clothing. We thought it'd be cool to make a shirt that can monitor your body measurements.

cool.author: Ramin Djawadi
cool.text: What's so cool about 'Light of the Seven' - and what I love about 'Game of Thrones' - is you never know what's going to happen.

cool.author: Connor Franta
cool.text: Making YouTube videos while I was in school, I was fortunate enough not to really have any negative repercussions from it. I had a lot of positive feedback from my friends, who thought they were great and thought they were funny and that what I was doing was really cool.

cool.author: Aisha Tyler
cool.text: My parents were vegetarians. I'd show up at school, this giant black kid, with none of the cool clothes and a tofu sandwich and celery sticks.

cool.author: Ava Max
cool.text: Guys like to gaslight us, and it's not cool. And it happens so much; it's happened to me in relationships. It's happened to me where I have been cheated on, and I felt so sad and angry, like it wasn't my fault, but that was because the person was gaslighting me into thinking it was my fault.

cool.author: Marc Newson
cool.text: Yeah, my dream would be to work for 6 months and then have 6 months to play, just snowboarding, surfing, and going to cool places to listen and be alone and kinda chill out.

cool.author: Shinichiro Watanabe
cool.text: In 'Space Dandy,' I'm trying to challenge myself and do stuff I haven't done before. I'm aiming for a really funny, cool, and crazy creation.

cool.author: Cody Bellinger
cool.text: It was really cool coming back here to Chase Field. I played here in high school and went to a lot of games as a kid.

cool.author: Paul Walker
cool.text: I'm Brian a lot more than I'm Paul Walker, which is awesome. When I hear, 'Hey Paul Walker!' my hair stands up on the back of my neck. It's uncomfortable. But when I hear, 'It's Brian!' it's cool. I like Brian.

cool.author: Kendrick Lamar
cool.text: Sometimes you have the trends that's not that cool. You may have certain artists portraying these trends and don't really have that lifestyle, and then it gives off the wrong thing. And it becomes kinda corny after awhile. It's really about keeping hip-hop original and pushing away the corniness in it.

cool.author: Peter Baynham
cool.text: It feels quite cool, in a mad way, to be someone who skulks about in the shadows.

cool.author: Aaron Neville
cool.text: Beyonce is cool, and she can really sing.

cool.author: Norman Reedus
cool.text: You can't not look cool with a crossbow.

cool.author: Craig Robinson
cool.text: I grew up on the South Side of Chicago, north Beverly. It was cool, everybody's cool on the block.

cool.author: Baron Davis
cool.text: Delaware is not like Hollywood. But Delaware is cool. All you really need is a gym and a couple good places to eat and a movie theater.

cool.author: Constance Zimmer
cool.text: I have this obsession with really cool, old books.

cool.author: Cody Rhodes
cool.text: I always tried to stand out as a ref. I wore a long-sleeve black Under Armour t-shirt so that you knew I was the cool ref as opposed to the old dude.

cool.author: Maria Sharapova
cool.text: I think it's so cool to be tall. Even when I'm not wearing heels people tell me I'm tall and I always take it as a complement. The good thing is I can always see everybody in the room.

cool.author: Prince
cool.text: Music is music, ultimately. If it makes you feel good, cool.

cool.author: Chris Evans
cool.text: I really like women who get emotional about babies and puppies. I've met some incredibly cool women who are tough, but the woman you marry should have a really soft side.

cool.author: Hayden Christensen
cool.text: I love my mother Ali so much. I'm a momma's boy. I just have a very cool mom. It's not as though I had any say in the matter. I'm just really fortunate. She's the most kind, loving, giving woman.

cool.author: Randy Pausch
cool.text: Pretty much any time I got a chance to do something cool, I tried to grab for it, and that's where my solace comes from.

cool.author: David Lee
cool.text: My first project was to build an ionization gauge control circuit for Professor Edgar Everhart's Cockcroft-Walton accelerator. In those days, vacuum tubes were the active components in electronic circuits. I can still recall the warm orange glow of the vacuum tube filaments and the cool blue glow of the thyratron tubes.

cool.author: BJ the Chicago Kid
cool.text: Living my life socially means there is a swagger to how I dress, walk; it's not about being 'cool,' it's just being me - that's understanding your place and your center - that's what swagger is, and I guess that's where the soul comes from.

cool.author: Michael J. Massimino
cool.text: Astronauts cannot pick their nicknames and can only get their nicknames from other astronauts. Any astronaut who tries to give himself a cool nickname will regret it by getting just the opposite from his astronaut friends.

cool.author: Elon Musk
cool.text: I'm glad to see that BMW is bringing an electric car to market. That's cool.

dreams.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
dreams.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

dreams.author: Colin Powell
dreams.text: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.

dreams.author: Paul Valery
dreams.text: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

dreams.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
dreams.text: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.

dreams.author: Walt Disney
dreams.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

dreams.author: Carl Jung
dreams.text: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.

dreams.author: Jesse Owens
dreams.text: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.

dreams.author: Anatole France
dreams.text: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.

dreams.author: James Dean
dreams.text: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.

dreams.author: Henry David Thoreau
dreams.text: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.

dreams.author: T. E. Lawrence
dreams.text: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.

dreams.author: Oscar Wilde
dreams.text: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.

dreams.author: Vincent Van Gogh
dreams.text: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.

dreams.author: Zhuangzi
dreams.text: I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky; then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of being a butterfly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am a man?

dreams.author: Edgar Allan Poe
dreams.text: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.

dreams.author: Mike Tyson
dreams.text: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.

dreams.author: Mitch Hedberg
dreams.text: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.

dreams.author: Tupac Shakur
dreams.text: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.

dreams.author: Carl Sandburg
dreams.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.

dreams.author: William Butler Yeats
dreams.text: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

dreams.author: Langston Hughes
dreams.text: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.

dreams.author: Yoko Ono
dreams.text: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.

dreams.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
dreams.text: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.

dreams.author: Dalai Lama
dreams.text: Sleep is the best meditation.

dreams.author: Joel Osteen
dreams.text: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.

dreams.author: Christopher Reeve
dreams.text: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.

dreams.author: Roy Orbison
dreams.text: I close my eyes, then I drift away, into the magic night I softly say. A silent prayer, like dreamers do, then I fall asleep to dream my dreams of you.

dreams.author: Eugene Ionesco
dreams.text: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.

dreams.author: Ernest Hemingway
dreams.text: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

dreams.author: John Barrymore
dreams.text: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.

dreams.author: Malcolm Forbes
dreams.text: When you cease to dream you cease to live.

dreams.author: Joseph Campbell
dreams.text: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.

dreams.author: Edgar Cayce
dreams.text: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.

dreams.author: Janet Jackson

dreams.author: Florence Griffith Joyner
dreams.text: I love working with kids, talking with them and listening to them. I always encourage kids to reach beyond their dreams. Don't try to be like me. Be better than me.

dreams.author: Sylvia Plath
dreams.text: Mother believed that I should have an enormous amount of sleep, and so I was never really tired when I went to bed. This was the best time of day, when I could lie in the vague twilight, drifting off to sleep, making up dreams inside my head the way they should go.

dreams.author: Gary Numan
dreams.text: If I thought that any of this was pre ordained, then it takes away any kind of incentive to struggle, or to put up with things, to reach for those impossible dreams, all those dramatic things.

dreams.author: David Lauren
dreams.text: Ralph Lauren is about creating stories, creating concepts that consumers want to live in. We are about creating dreams.

dreams.author: Connor Franta
dreams.text: Never think you can't do something. I definitely never thought I could write a book, and even after I started writing it, I was like, 'Oh my God, how am I gonna write a book?' Just set your sights high and reach for the stars. Go live your dreams, and never think you can't.

dreams.author: Rudy Ruettiger
dreams.text: Face life's obstacles and never give up on your dreams.

dreams.author: Les Brown
dreams.text: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.

dreams.author: Cody Simpson
dreams.text: I hope that my journey inspires kids from all around the world to pursue their passions and work hard for their dreams.

dreams.author: Amandla Stenberg
dreams.text: Within months after reading the novel 'The Hunger Games,' I went from telling my mom that I could see myself as this character to actually getting the role. My mother reminds me that if I could manifest such an important role just because I wanted it so much, all of my dreams are possible.

dreams.author: Mark Ruffalo
dreams.text: What is happiness other than a negotiation between reality and your dreams? It's understanding that you give up something for something else. I feel like that's been how I've been trying to be happy, although in my DNA there's more of a depressed person.

dreams.author: Luka Modric
dreams.text: I can make my football dreams come true with Tottenham, and that is why all my thoughts and also my future is with this club.

dreams.author: Clive Cussler
dreams.text: If ever a car was created by designers with dreams of grandeur, it had to be the 1958 Buick Limited: the heftiest, highest-priced and most opulent monster ever to hit the street in the '50s.

dreams.author: Maya Angelou
dreams.text: I never expected anyone to take care of me, but in my wildest dreams and juvenile yearnings, I wanted the house with the picket fence from June Allyson movies. I knew that was yearning like one yearns to fly.

dreams.author: Clarence Seedorf
dreams.text: Everyone dreams of playing for Madrid, but we all know that it can be life or death.

dreams.author: David Copperfield
dreams.text: I try to help people realize their dreams by using magic to tell stories that educate, move, and inspire.

dreams.author: Ada Hegerberg
dreams.text: I remember, when I was young, I had idols who inspired me to go for my dreams, and I just want to give the same back.

dreams.author: Chantal Sutherland
dreams.text: I've lived out many of the dreams I had as a little girl, back when I was riding my pony, mucking stalls, feeding cows, aspiring to finally become a professional jockey and racing in stakes races on a worldwide stage.

dreams.author: Kurt Warner
dreams.text: I want people to know that you can chase your dreams no matter where you are in your life, and it can work out. I know. It happened to me.

dreams.author: Kate Micucci
dreams.text: Doing voices in animated movies has been one of my dreams. You get to go and act, and you don't have to put on makeup.

dreams.author: Marc Randolph
dreams.text: As entrepreneurs, or artists, or just people with dreams, the worst thing you can do is get so caught up in planning the perfect idea that you never get around to actually... well, doing it. I call this building castles in your mind.

dreams.author: Damien Chazelle
dreams.text: I've always wanted to make movies that are fever dreams.

dreams.author: Lake Bell
dreams.text: While marriage is historically associated with dire obligation and clipped wings, I've found that it actually liberates you to take on adventure and achieve your dreams. I like to call my husband 'my person.' Find your 'person,' and you can do anything!

dreams.author: Zendaya
dreams.text: 'Shake It Up' definitely teaches kids about the importance of reaching for your dreams and setting high goals. It also teaches great lessons about friendship and family.

dreams.author: Peter Arno
dreams.text: Tell me about yourself - your struggles, your dreams, your telephone number.

dreams.author: Marjorie Liu
dreams.text: I don't want to give people the wrong advice to follow their dreams no matter what, because it's not fun to be a starving artist. But on the other hand, life is short, and if you are burning with a passion to do something, then do it. Work hard, study hard at it, and don't give up.

dreams.author: R. L. Stine
dreams.text: I've never dreamed of a story idea. I have such boring dreams.

dreams.author: Erin Morgenstern
dreams.text: I have absurdly vivid dreams.

dreams.author: Memphis Depay
dreams.text: What's my secret? I don't have a secret - you just have to work every day on your dreams.

dreams.author: Darell Hammond
dreams.text: 'Our Dream Playground' is a new online project planner designed to help you build the playground of your dreams. It's a free resource, brought to you 'KaBOOM!,' offering step-by-step instructions to help you bring play to the kids in your community.

dreams.author: Arianna Huffington
dreams.text: I've always been fascinated by dreams - mine are so vivid. I went through a period in my 20s when I wrote down my dreams every morning. Then life intervened, and I stopped doing it.

dreams.author: Shimon Peres
dreams.text: Count the dreams of your mind; if the numbers of the dreams exceeds the number of achievements, you are young.

dreams.author: A Boogie wit da Hoodie
dreams.text: I was inspired to shoot 'Look Back at It' in a high school because I'm like a voice of the youth. When the youth sees me in a classroom, I want them to be inspired to accomplish their dreams. I was just like them in a classroom at one point. It all starts in a classroom.

dreams.author: Mike Birbiglia
dreams.text: Dopamine is a chemical released in your brain and your body when you sleep that paralyzes your body so you don't act out your dreams.

dreams.author: Corey Hart
dreams.text: This may sound strange but I had dreams as a kid of doing exactly what I ended up doing in my life.

dreams.author: Ross Perot
dreams.text: Most new jobs won't come from our biggest employers. They will come from our smallest. We've got to do everything we can to make entrepreneurial dreams a reality.

dreams.author: Kofi Kingston
dreams.text: My mom worked her way all the way up; she has a doctorate in anthropology. Imagine doing that while having three kids. It's just amazing. She provided the best possible example in terms of chasing your dreams.

dreams.author: Gary Johnson
dreams.text: I had my freedom, and I had my comfortable life, but I couldn't accept the fact that the politicians were making it increasingly difficult for my kids and millions of others to achieve their dreams as I had achieved mine. So, in 2012, I ran for president.

dreams.author: James E. Faust
dreams.text: In my long life I have found peace, joy, and happiness beyond my fondest hopes and dreams. One of the supreme benedictions of my life has been my marriage to an elect daughter of God. I love her with all my heart and soul.

dreams.author: Manny MUA
dreams.text: Don't let anyone stop you from doing what you are doing, from your dreams and what you want to do.

dreams.author: Wale
dreams.text: I'm fortunate enough to be living my dreams and a lot of other peoples' dreams.

dreams.author: Flo Rida
dreams.text: With my charity Big Dreams For Kids, I believe the more you give, the more you receive.

dreams.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
dreams.text: For me they are no different, reality and dreams.

dreams.author: Christina Aguilera
dreams.text: My parent's divorce and hard times at school, all those things combined to mold me, to make me grow up quicker. And it gave me the drive to pursue my dreams that I wouldn't necessarily have had otherwise.

dreams.author: Ludivine Sagnier
dreams.text: I'd say people recognize me, but having children recognize me is the best. It is a very special thing. Suddenly you feel like you have the power to make the children's dreams come true, and it's better than anything else.

dreams.author: John Mayer
dreams.text: My fear is that I go up to the girl of my dreams and say 'I'm sorry, but I've got to say hello to you,' and she slides the stool back and gets up and walks away, saying, 'Not for me, Bub. I don't want anything to do with you.'

dreams.author: Neneh Cherry
dreams.text: Both my parents were working-class and had dreams of making the world a better place. It's pretty powerful, being able to reflect back their beliefs.

dreams.author: Jeff Mangum
dreams.text: I'm very influenced by the circus. A lot of the dreams that I have, I'm in the circus.

dreams.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
dreams.text: I tell kids to pursue their basketball dreams, but I tell them to not let that be their only dream.

dreams.author: Alexander Ovechkin
dreams.text: Anyone who plays in the NHL dreams to win the Stanley Cup and I dreamed as well to be one of them and raise the cup in Washington and bring it home to Moscow and celebrate with my friends and my parents.

dreams.author: McKayla Maroney
dreams.text: If you're following your dreams, you're doing something you love and that you believe in yourself for.

dreams.author: Rajkummar Rao
dreams.text: I knew that I was just one of those actors who came to Mumbai to achieve their dreams. I knew that nobody would welcome me with open arms and auditions were the only way to get a chance.

dreams.author: Kriti Kharbanda
