dreams.text: I'm anything but a small-town girl. I have big, big dreams, and I plan on making them happen.

dreams.author: Leonard Cohen
dreams.text: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.

dreams.author: Liza Minnelli
dreams.text: I've said it before, but it's absolutely true: My mother gave me my drive, but my father gave me my dreams. Thanks to him, I could see a future.

dreams.author: Katori Hall
dreams.text: Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you.

dreams.author: Dede Gardner
dreams.text: Everyone has a salary. Everyone has hopes and dreams for where they can invest their money. Everyone wants to do the best they can with it, and they don't want to be subjected to any sort of predatory lending.

dreams.author: Victor Hugo
dreams.text: Our life dreams the Utopia. Our death achieves the Ideal.

dreams.author: Marian Anderson
dreams.text: When you stop having dreams and ideals - well, you might as well stop altogether.

dreams.author: Edward Moore
dreams.text: I am rich beyond the dreams of avarice.

dreams.author: Letitia Wright
dreams.text: If I can be of inspiration to anyone to go after their goals and their dreams, then I feel like I'll be satisfied with that.

dreams.author: Henry David Thoreau
dreams.text: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.

dreams.author: Harriet Tubman
dreams.text: In my dreams and visions, I seemed to see a line, and on the other side of that line were green fields, and lovely flowers, and beautiful white ladies, who stretched out their arms to me over the line, but I couldn't reach them no-how. I always fell before I got to the line.

dreams.author: Isaac Newton
dreams.text: We are certainly not to relinquish the evidence of experiments for the sake of dreams and vain fictions of our own devising; nor are we to recede from the analogy of Nature, which is wont to be simple and always consonant to itself.

dreams.author: Alan Jackson
dreams.text: When I was in high school, I don't know that I really had big dreams.

dreams.author: Barack Obama
dreams.text: There are millions of Americans outside Washington who are tired of stale political arguments and are moving this country forward. They believe, and I believe, that here in America, our success should depend not on accident of birth, but the strength of our work ethic and the scope of our dreams.

dreams.author: Thiago Silva
dreams.text: I think that humility is key to succeed and conquer your dreams.

dreams.author: Nikos Kazantzakis
dreams.text: Throughout my life my greatest benefactors have been my dreams and my travels; very few men, living or dead, have helped me in my struggle.

dreams.author: Elizabeth Bishop
dreams.text: The armored cars of dreams, contrived to let us do so many a dangerous thing.

dreams.author: Moza bint Nasser
dreams.text: I have lived with my husband more than I have with my parents... I live beside him, and know his worries, his hopes, and his dreams for his nation. We believe that things happen by design, not in an arbitrary way. And we believe it is our duty to make things happen.

dreams.author: Patrice Motsepe
dreams.text: Education is at the heart of achieving your dreams.

dreams.author: Samaire Armstrong
dreams.text: It's a really scary thing, having your dreams come true and seeing everything you ever wanted happening, getting the attention for it and then not knowing how to handle it properly.

dreams.author: Bill McCartney
dreams.text: Big dreams create the magic that stir men's souls to greatness.

dreams.author: Stephanie Labbe
dreams.text: Even coming from small towns, the biggest dreams are possible.

dreams.author: Spike Lee
dreams.text: It has been my observation that parents kill more dreams than anybody.

dreams.author: Lorraine Hansberry
dreams.text: Seems like God don't see fit to give the black man nothing but dreams - but He did give us children to make them dreams seem worthwhile.

dreams.author: David Copperfield
dreams.text: Dreams are illusions, and we can't let go of them because we would be dead.

dreams.author: Paul Walker
dreams.text: Ever since I was a kid, I wanted to be a marine biologist. As you go through the grind and the distraction of a career, it's easy to lose sight of your dreams.

dreams.author: Vladimir Nabokov
dreams.text: Genius is an African who dreams up snow.

dreams.author: Gus Kahn
dreams.text: I'll see you in my dreams.

dreams.author: Michael B. Jordan
dreams.text: My dreams are huge, man. I dream all day every day. Do I want to get into restaurants one day? Yeah! Do I want to get into hospitality and have my own hotels? Yeah, I do!

dreams.author: Dolly Parton
dreams.text: A lot of dreams can turn to nightmares... if you don't really work them.

dreams.author: Bryce Harper
dreams.text: If you don't have dreams, you don't have a life.

dreams.author: Cardi B
dreams.text: I was always scared to follow my dreams because if I follow my dreams and I fail, I can't dream about it anymore. It's easier to settle for less.

dreams.author: Garrett McNamara
dreams.text: It really is never too late, it really is never too early to figure out your goals and dreams and what you love.

dreams.author: Roberto Baggio
dreams.text: I believe to have shown that, at times, the impossible can become possible. It all depends on how much each and every one of us believes in our dreams, in our strength, and in our determination.

dreams.author: Shannon Sharpe
dreams.text: There is a reason they called it chasing your dreams and not walking after them.

dreams.author: Steve Winwood
dreams.text: The percentage you're paying is too high priced While you're living beyond all your means And the man in the suit has just bought a new car From the profit he's made on your dreams.

dreams.author: Christopher Nolan
dreams.text: I have been interested in dreams, really since I was a kid. I have always been fascinated by the idea that your mind, when you are asleep, can create a world in a dream and you are perceiving it as though it really existed.

dreams.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
dreams.text: As I live and am a man, this is an unexaggerated tale - my dreams become the substances of my life.

dreams.author: Zendaya
dreams.text: One of my dreams is to walk down the runway during Fashion Week!

dreams.author: Aaron Rodgers
dreams.text: I'm fulfilling my dreams that I had as a kid every single day. That's why I'm trying to enjoy it so much.

dreams.author: Joshua Chamberlain
dreams.text: But we can hold our spirits and our bodies so pure and high, we may cherish such thoughts and such ideals, and dream such dreams of lofty purpose, that we can determine and know what manner of men we will be, whenever and wherever the hour strikes and calls to noble action.

dreams.author: Linton Kwesi Johnson
dreams.text: At the end of the day, life's about realising one's human potential. I don't know if I've realised mine, but I've certainly gone a long way towards realising some goals and some dreams.

dreams.author: Jane Goodall
dreams.text: When I look back over my life it's almost as if there was a plan laid out for me - from the little girl who was so passionate about animals who longed to go to Africa and whose family couldn't afford to put her through college. Everyone laughed at my dreams. I was supposed to be a secretary in Bournemouth.

dreams.author: Neil Gorsuch
dreams.text: Ours is the job of interpreting the Constitution. And that document isn't some inkblot on which litigants may project their hopes and dreams.

dreams.author: Chris Kyle
dreams.text: When I grew up, I only had two dreams. One was to be a cowboy and another was to be in the military. I grew up extremely patriotic and riding horses.

dreams.author: apl.de.ap
dreams.text: You also have to surround yourself with people who have the same dreams and values as you do.

dreams.author: Virgil van Dijk
dreams.text: You need to have dreams, you need to go for it, otherwise why would you be a footballer?

dreams.author: Alain Wertheimer
dreams.text: We're in the business of selling pleasure. We don't sell handbags or haute couture. We sell dreams.

dreams.author: W. H. Auden
dreams.text: Learn from your dreams what you lack.

dreams.author: Jourdan Dunn
dreams.text: Happiness is making your dreams come true.

dreams.author: Adelaide Anne Procter
dreams.text: Dreams grow holy put in action.

dreams.author: William Butler Yeats
dreams.text: In dreams begins responsibility.

dreams.author: Alice Walker
dreams.text: If you want to have a life that is worth living, a life that expresses your deepest feelings and emotions and cares and dreams, you have to fight for it.

dreams.author: Channing Tatum
dreams.text: You have the dreams that you want, and then you have to do other jobs until you can get to that dream.

dreams.author: Heart Evangelista
dreams.text: The inner confidence in knowing who you are, believing in your dreams, and following your heart, is what make you radiate from within.

dreams.author: Magic Johnson
dreams.text: I motivate others by making sure that they understand to go after their dreams and don't let anyone tell you you can't. If you are motivated enough and put the work in that you can achieve anything in life that you set your mind to.

dreams.author: Anthony Browne
dreams.text: Stories come to me in mysterious ways, more like dreams than reasoned creations.

dreams.author: Andy Ruiz Jr.
dreams.text: As long as you pray and believe in your dreams, anything is possible.

dreams.author: Neri Oxman
dreams.text: Binaries aside, we are the products of our relationships with our identities - cities we have built, bodies we have embraced, kindred souls we've cherished, our memories, our dreams, the fears we hide, the pain we hold - identities that cannot be reduced to a collection of labels.

dreams.author: Alison Goldfrapp
dreams.text: Good dreams are better than films or books.

dreams.author: Marya Mannes
dreams.text: The curse of the romantic is a greed for dreams, an intensity of expectation that, in the end, diminishes the reality.

dreams.author: Shimon Peres
dreams.text: My greatest mistake is that my dreams were too small.

dreams.author: Harry Chapin
dreams.text: Good dreams don't come cheap, you've got to pay for them and If you just dream when you're asleep this is no way for them to come alive... to survive.

dreams.author: Hank Williams
dreams.text: Folk songs express the dreams and prayers and hopes of the working people.

dreams.author: Hugo Pratt
dreams.text: He's dreaming with his eyes open, and those that dream with their eyes open are dangerous, for they do not know when their dreams come to an end.

dreams.author: Frank McCourt
dreams.text: You sail into the harbor, and Staten Island is on your left, and then you see the Statue of Liberty. This is what everyone in the world has dreams of when they think about New York. And I thought, 'My God, I'm in Heaven. I'll be dancing down Fifth Avenue like Fred Astaire with Ginger Rogers.'

dreams.author: Luke Bryan
dreams.text: Just really, really believe in what you're trying to do. Don't let people alter that. Let people advise you and lead you down paths to make smart business decisions. But trust your instinct and trust that overwhelming drive that made you put all your dreams and everything on the line.

dreams.author: Demetri Martin
dreams.text: But what I was going to say was, I just figured I'm going to go boldly in the direction of my dreams, say it as Thoreau would say, and just see where it takes me.

dreams.author: Winnie Madikizela-Mandela
dreams.text: You build dreams, you build castles in the air, and you hope that at least part of that will be realized, even under apartheid.

dreams.author: Tim Walker
dreams.text: When I was at college, the idea of fashion was more immediate to me, whereas art photography, the depth of it, was a different thing. Storytelling - fanciful storytelling - can only be told through fashion photography. It's the perfect way to play with fantasy and dreams.

dreams.author: Pat Buchanan
dreams.text: The bipolar world of the Cold War is history. The new world order, however, is not the One World dreamed of by Wilsonian idealists. It is a Balkanizing world where race, tribe, culture and creed matter most, and democracy is seen not as an end in itself but as a means to an end - the accretion of power by one's own kind to achieve one's own dreams.

dreams.author: Amy Jo Johnson
dreams.text: My mom taught me to go after my dreams. I have this faith in myself that I must have gotten from her.

dreams.author: Queen Latifah
dreams.text: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.

dreams.author: Leonard Lauder
dreams.text: A visionary is someone who can see the future, or thinks he sees the future. In my case, I use it and it comes out right. That doesn't come from daydreams or dreams, but it comes from knowing the market and knowing the world and knowing people really well and knowing where they're going to be tomorrow.

dreams.author: Harlan Ellison
dreams.text: Success is to bring into existence, in adult terms, your childhood dreams.

dreams.author: Amanda Lindhout
dreams.text: You have a responsibility to move your dreams forward, no matter what.

dreams.author: Carl Jung
dreams.text: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.

dreams.author: Samuel Johnson
dreams.text: The world is seldom what it seems; to man, who dimly sees, realities appear as dreams, and dreams realities.

dreams.author: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark
dreams.text: I mean, every child at one stage dreams of being a prince or a princess.

dreams.author: Amy Heckerling
dreams.text: Hollywood is the dream factory, and no one dreams about older women.

dreams.author: Gilda Radner
dreams.text: Dreams are like paper, they tear so easily.

dreams.author: Jennifer Holliday
dreams.text: I am, you know, really fighting for myself and my life. And I think the message that I could give to anybody is that it's never too late to start your life again and dream new dreams.

dreams.author: Guion Bluford
dreams.text: I chased my dreams. In the end, find what gets you excited and chase it.

dreams.author: Pat McAfee
dreams.text: I have dreams and aspirations of taking a stroll down the ramp at a pay-per-view setting. Everybody has those dreams as a kid, and that'd be really cool.

dreams.author: Fab Moretti
dreams.text: Maybe we'll never reach that perfect zenith you imagine in your dreams, but I sure as hell will die trying.

dreams.author: Siouxsie Sioux
dreams.text: My dreams are of water. And my nightmares.

dreams.author: Jensen Huang
dreams.text: I'm the product of my parents' dreams and aspirations.

dreams.author: John Travolta
dreams.text: As you get older, you have to force yourself to have new dreams. For instance, I've been flying for 37 years, but now teaching others to fly is interesting for me. Sometimes you have to find new angles on life to keep you interested, like sharing successes and inspiring and helping others.

dreams.author: Frank Vogel
dreams.text: You reach for the stars and you work your butt off to achieve your dreams. If you fall short, you fall short, but you say you gave it your best.

dreams.author: Kris Jenner
dreams.text: There's a lot of people that have great ideas and dreams and whatnot, but unless you're willing to work really, really hard, and work for what you want, it's never going to happen.

dreams.author: Suze Orman

dreams.author: Andrew Gotianun

dreams.author: Anh Do

dreams.author: Joe Jonas
dreams.text: I've accomplished a lot, but I still have more dreams that I want to achieve.

dreams.author: Drew McIntyre
dreams.text: All I want is wrestling to grow while living my dream, and if I can help, then that's beyond my dreams.

dreams.author: Dorothy Bush Koch
dreams.text: Know thyself. Remain steadfast. Follow your dreams. These are great directives and perfectly fitting for graduates. But reality is that achieving dreams takes a solid education - education that remains elusive for too many Americans.

dreams.author: Kim Edwards
dreams.text: I lived for two years in Odawara, a castle town an hour outside of Tokyo, near the sea. It's a beautiful place, and I drew on my experiences there when writing 'The Lake of Dreams.'

dreams.author: Jean Genet
dreams.text: Worse than not realizing the dreams of your youth, would be to have been young and never dreamed at all.

dreams.author: Stephen Colletti
dreams.text: It's hard because people always say, 'Follow your dreams,' but it's not a perfect world, and things don't always work out. But you've just got to work hard, and you can't take things for granted.

dreams.author: Sigmund Freud
dreams.text: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.

dreams.author: Nicolas Cage
dreams.text: One day, one of my dreams is to someday get to do Nemo in '20,000 Leagues Under the Sea.'

dreams.author: Louis Aragon
dreams.text: O reason, reason, abstract phantom of the waking state, I had already expelled you from my dreams, now I have reached a point where those dreams are about to become fused with apparent realities: now there is only room here for myself.

dreams.author: Peter Landesman
dreams.text: Our brains have this habit of quilting dreams from the fabrics of our lives. As a filmmaker, I get to do it for a living.

dreams.author: Conan O'Brien

dreams.author: Edwidge Danticat
dreams.text: I wanted to raise the voice of a lot of the people that I knew growing up, and this was, for the most part, poor people who had extraordinary dreams but also very amazing obstacles.

dreams.author: Roop Durgapal

dreams.author: Jonas Salk
dreams.text: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.

dreams.author: Robert Klein
dreams.text: In the fifties I had dreams about touching a naked woman and she would turn to bronze or the dream about hot dogs chasing donuts through the Lincoln Tunnel.

dreams.author: Zora Neale Hurston
dreams.text: It is one of the blessings of this world that few people see visions and dream dreams.

dreams.author: Ray Bradbury
dreams.text: If you dream the proper dreams, and share the myths with people, they will want to grow up to be like you.

dreams.author: John Lasseter
dreams.text: Today, among little girls especially, princesses and the romanticised ideal they represent - finding the man of your dreams - have a limited shelf life.

dreams.author: Sania Mirza

dreams.author: Kofi Kingston
dreams.text: Do everything in your power to make sure you achieve your dreams.

dreams.author: Royce Gracie

dreams.author: Damien Chazelle
dreams.text: There something to be said for having even unrealistic dreams. Even if the dreams don't come true - that, to me, is what's beautiful about Los Angeles. It's full of these people who have moved there to chase these dreams.

dreams.author: Amanda Crew
dreams.text: I have mixed feelings about how fast things are changing as a result of technology. There's no denying that through technology there are amazing things being created that help people with diseases or help people's dreams come true. But there's also this obsession. Social media is the most dangerous of them all.

dreams.author: Jon Huntsman, Sr.
dreams.text: Integrity is critical to our lives - and to our dreams of achievement. We must remember that without integrity, nothing else matters and that with integrity, nothing else matters.

dreams.author: Ben Barnes
dreams.text: I only remember the end of my dreams, like waking up at a steering wheel, or falling.

dreams.author: Sherry Argov
dreams.text: Men secretly respect a woman who is strong, has confidence and has dreams of her own. There's nothing more attractive to a man than a woman who has dignity and pride in who she is.

dreams.author: Lorenz Hart
dreams.text: Wide awake I can make my most fantastic dreams come true.

dreams.author: Madison Cawthorn
dreams.text: A tragic car accident put me in a wheelchair and dashed my hopes and dreams for the future.

dreams.author: Taylor Swift
dreams.text: I'm not really that girl who dreams about her wedding day.

dreams.author: John Berger
dreams.text: The human imagination... has great difficulty in living strictly within the confines of a materialist practice or philosophy. It dreams, like a dog in its basket, of hares in the open.

dreams.author: Lee Min-ho
dreams.text: For many people, the age of 20 is when they first reach adulthood, and it's a time full of ideals and dreams. But when I was 20, a lot of misfortune came along. I spent a year in the hospital and couldn't move, and I was forced to think a lot.

dreams.author: Maya Angelou
dreams.text: Those of us who submitted or surrendered our ideas and dreams and identities to the 'leaders' must take back our rights, our identities, our responsibilities.

dreams.author: Stephen LaBerge
dreams.text: In most of our dreams, our inner eye of reflection is shut and we sleep within our sleep. The exception takes place when we seem to awake within our dreams, without disturbing or ending the dream state, and learn to recognize that we are dreaming while the dream is still happening.

dreams.author: Nancy Pelosi
dreams.text: I say to my colleagues never confine your best work, your hopes, your dreams, the aspiration of the American people to what will be signed by George W. Bush because that is too limiting a factor.

dreams.author: Alfred Stieglitz
dreams.text: Beautiful dreams - if the world were more beautiful they would come true - But the world is relentless & cruel - people are - they must be, I suppose, or they could not live.

dreams.author: Susan L. Taylor
dreams.text: We don't have an eternity to realize our dreams, only the time we are here.

dreams.author: LL Cool J
dreams.text: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.

dreams.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca
dreams.text: For all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.

dreams.author: Lemmy
dreams.text: All my dreams came true. There's not many people that can say that. I mean, most people have to work in a job they hate all their lives, and I can't imagine that.

dreams.author: Nick Cannon
dreams.text: You have to be vigorous. That's the only way you are going to get it because everybody has dreams and everybody has goals, but the only people who achieve them are the ones that go after it and don't take no for an answer.

dreams.author: Arijit Singh
dreams.text: Singing for a documentary that benefits the underprivileged remains one of my biggest dreams.

dreams.author: Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy
dreams.text: An Academy Award nomination is stuff dreams are made of.

dreams.author: Sarah Louise Delany
dreams.text: In our dreams we are always young.

dreams.author: Denis Waitley
dreams.text: You have all the reason in the world to achieve your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.

dreams.author: Henning Mankell
dreams.text: What differentiates us from animals is the fact that we can listen to other people's dreams, fears, joys, sorrows, desires and defeats - and they in turn can listen to ours.

dreams.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
dreams.text: New Year's Day. A fresh start. A new chapter in life waiting to be written. New questions to be asked, embraced, and loved. Answers to be discovered and then lived in this transformative year of delight and self-discovery. Today carve out a quiet interlude for yourself in which to dream, pen in hand. Only dreams give birth to change.

dreams.author: Nafessa Williams
dreams.text: When you follow your dreams, you encourage other people to follow theirs.

dreams.author: Christine Taylor
dreams.text: It's not like I had big dreams to go to California and become an actor. I loved doing my shows at school and community theater, and I probably would have settled in New York because it was closer. I was going to go to NYU.

dreams.author: P. V. Sindhu
dreams.text: There will be many obstacles in the pursuit of your dreams. I had long hours of training, balancing studies and badminton.

dreams.author: Pico Iyer
dreams.text: American dreams are strongest in the hearts of those who have seen America only in their dreams.

dreams.author: Max Beerbohm
dreams.text: We must stop talking about the American dream and start listening to the dreams of Americans.

dreams.author: Steven Adler
dreams.text: I always knew that we were going to be successful and accomplish and succeed at our dreams. There was never a doubt in my mind. When we were recording 'Appetite For Destruction', we all knew.

dreams.author: Jenny Zhang
dreams.text: Mothers have always held such symbolic weight in determining a person's worth. Your mother tongue, your motherland, your mother's values - these things can qualify or disqualify you from attaining myriad American dreams: love, fluency, citizenship, legitimacy, acceptance, success, freedom.

dreams.author: Paracelsus
dreams.text: The dreams which reveal the supernatural are promises and messages that God sends us directly: they are nothing but His angels, His ministering spirits, who usually appear to us when we are in a great predicament.

dreams.author: Barbara Kingsolver
dreams.text: People's dreams are made out of what they do all day. The same way a dog that runs after rabbits will dream of rabbits. It's what you do that makes your soul, not the other way around.

dreams.author: Judd Nelson
dreams.text: Catcher in the Rye had a profound impact on me-the idea that we all have lots of dreams that are slowly being chipped away as we grow up.

dreams.author: Michaela Coel
dreams.text: 'Chewing Gum Dreams' should make you look twice at the girl shouting on the bus and not just cuss her off from your life.

dreams.author: Eric Lindros
dreams.text: You have to dream dreams to live dreams.

dreams.author: John Tesh
dreams.text: We never want to go into a tour and play 15 songs and say 'Enjoy.' We have messages: Number 1, follow your dreams. If I can do it, you can do it. Number 2, give your life to something. We say, 'Volunteer and add seven years to your life.' You can have your own personal ministry. The message we have is 'What do you stand for?'

dreams.author: Brittany Murphy
dreams.text: My dreams and aspirations when I was a child for as long as I can remember was to be an entertainer.

dreams.author: Dan Pena
dreams.text: All you need is the desire, passion, and will to fulfil your dreams!

friendship.author: Marcel Proust
friendship.text: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.

friendship.author: Helen Keller
friendship.text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.

friendship.author: Khalil Gibran
friendship.text: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.

friendship.author: Albert Schweitzer
friendship.text: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.

friendship.author: Thomas Aquinas
friendship.text: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.

friendship.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
friendship.text: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.

friendship.author: Walter Winchell
friendship.text: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.

friendship.author: William Butler Yeats
friendship.text: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met.

friendship.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
friendship.text: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.

friendship.author: Oscar Wilde
friendship.text: True friends stab you in the front.

friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
friendship.text: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.

friendship.author: Oprah Winfrey
friendship.text: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.

friendship.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
friendship.text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.

friendship.author: Charles R. Swindoll
friendship.text: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.

friendship.author: Baltasar Gracian
friendship.text: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.

friendship.author: Euripides
friendship.text: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.

friendship.author: Henry Ford
friendship.text: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.

friendship.author: Jim Morrison
friendship.text: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.

friendship.author: Aristotle
friendship.text: A friend to all is a friend to none.

friendship.author: Charles Darwin
friendship.text: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.

friendship.author: Elie Wiesel
friendship.text: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

friendship.author: Anais Nin
friendship.text: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.

friendship.author: Bill Watterson
friendship.text: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.

friendship.author: Henry David Thoreau
friendship.text: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.

friendship.author: Walt Whitman
friendship.text: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.

friendship.author: Abraham Lincoln
friendship.text: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?

friendship.author: Margaret Walker
friendship.text: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.

friendship.author: Hubert H. Humphrey
friendship.text: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.

friendship.author: Mencius
friendship.text: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.

friendship.author: Leo Buscaglia
friendship.text: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.

friendship.author: Muhammad Ali
friendship.text: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.

friendship.author: C. S. Lewis
friendship.text: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.

friendship.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
friendship.text: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it.

friendship.author: Herodotus
friendship.text: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.

friendship.author: Plutarch
friendship.text: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.

friendship.author: Elbert Hubbard
friendship.text: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.

friendship.author: Octavia E. Butler
friendship.text: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.

friendship.author: George Washington
friendship.text: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.

friendship.author: Ulysses S. Grant
friendship.text: The friend in my adversity I shall always cherish most. I can better trust those who helped to relieve the gloom of my dark hours than those who are so ready to enjoy with me the sunshine of my prosperity.

friendship.author: Virginia Woolf
friendship.text: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.

friendship.author: Toni Morrison
friendship.text: She is a friend of mind. She gather me, man. The pieces I am, she gather them and give them back to me in all the right order. It's good, you know, when you got a woman who is a friend of your mind.

friendship.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
friendship.text: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.

friendship.author: John Leonard
friendship.text: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.

friendship.author: Henri Nouwen
friendship.text: When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives means the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand.

friendship.author: Thomas Fuller
friendship.text: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.

friendship.author: Socrates
friendship.text: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.

friendship.author: Paramahansa Yogananda
friendship.text: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends. That magnet is unselfishness, thinking of others first; when you learn to live for others, they will live for you.

friendship.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
friendship.text: A friend is a gift you give yourself.

friendship.author: Chanakya
friendship.text: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests. This is a bitter truth.

friendship.author: Marlene Dietrich
friendship.text: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.

friendship.author: John D. Rockefeller
friendship.text: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.

friendship.author: Emily Dickinson
friendship.text: My friends are my estate.

friendship.author: Epicurus
friendship.text: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.

friendship.author: Henry Van Dyke
friendship.text: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.

friendship.author: William Blake
friendship.text: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.

friendship.author: William Penn
friendship.text: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.

friendship.author: Alice Walker
friendship.text: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.

friendship.author: Benjamin Franklin
friendship.text: Be slow in choosing a friend, slower in changing.

friendship.author: King Solomon
friendship.text: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend.

friendship.author: Washington Irving
friendship.text: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.

friendship.author: Theophile Gautier
friendship.text: It is difficult to obtain the friendship of a cat. It is a philosophical animal... one that does not place its affections thoughtlessly.

friendship.author: Black Kettle

friendship.author: Gilbert Parker

friendship.author: Sallust

friendship.author: Laura Riding
friendship.text: Because most people are not sufficiently employed in themselves, they run about loose, hungering for employment, and satisfy themselves in various supererogatory occupations. The easiest of these occupations, which have all to do with making things already made, is the making of people: it is called the art of friendship.

friendship.author: Bradley Chicho
friendship.text: The friendship we share grows amidst the craggy rock pond; reeds of water spray fireflies scented with bonfires.

friendship.author: Bradley Chicho
friendship.text: The joys of friendship inert the heart and fizzy home bouncing jubilantly with laughter-buttered love.

friendship.author: Bradley Chicho
friendship.text: Plunderous is the palate I gift to you, openly I hug the universe of our friendship expanding its outer limit.

friendship.author: Bradley Chicho
friendship.text: Blunders, no, only friendship binds us to honesty - attracting crypts of mushrooms in the wake of our snowboards.

friendship.author: Shimon Peres

friendship.author: Eric Massa

And, actually, there's nothing in the game of baseball that hasn't happened to me.

friendship.author: Salman Rushdie

And I like you and I don't want to compromise our friendship.'

friendship.author: Sebastian Faulks

friendship.text: In romance, we feel the need to zoom in and expound on our partner's foibles in intimate detail; in friendship, we tend to do the opposite, avoiding confrontation through fear, lethargy or both.

friendship.text: Sustaining true friendship is a lot more challenging than we give it credit for.

friendship.author: Stephen Kinzer
friendship.text: Allowing a friend to careen toward self destruction is not friendship. That is a habit the United States needs to break as it pursues a richer and more deeply supportive relationship with Israel.

friendship.author: Brooke Elliott
friendship.text: Friends confront each other sometimes, and sometimes the friendship lasts, and sometimes it doesn't.

friendship.author: Jared Kushner
friendship.text: The only things that are really permanent are love, family, friendship, and that is a lesson. At the end of the day, that's really what it boils down to. The rest of it is just stuff.

friendship.text: Prosecutors say it would be next to impossible to get one teen to testify in court that another had slipped him or her a copied disc at lunchtime. And besides, isn't sharing music a time-honored part of teen friendship?

friendship.text: I'm friends with Taylor Swift, and I am tired of people asking me questions about our friendship. When I post a picture of us on Instagram, I'm posting a picture of me and my friend.

friendship.author: Linda Ronstadt
friendship.text: I got to sing with Placido Domingo... I got to sing with Aaron Neville, who is one of my favorites. Got to sing with Brian Wilson, one of the great high tenors. And Ricky Skaggs, a bluegrass tenor. I'm also proud of my musical friendship with Emmylou Harris.

friendship.author: Joanna Lumley
friendship.text: I don't think men are that attracted by glamour. I think women are attracted by glamour. I think men are attracted by a sense of friendship.

friendship.author: Rob Reiner
friendship.text: When I read 'Stand By Me,' it was like, 'This is a look back at the same time period when I was growing up, and it was about kids, but it really felt like what it was like to have those powerful feelings of friendship at age 12.' That's what got to me.

friendship.author: Jessye Norman
friendship.text: I am deeply spiritual; I revel in those things that make for good - the things that we can do to shed a little light, to help place an oft-dissonant universe back in tune with itself... Long live art, long live friendship, long live the joy of life!

friendship.author: Jessye Norman
friendship.text: I have enjoyed most particularly reading the correspondence between Gustav Mahler and Richard Strauss. The genuine friendship, competitiveness and support that thread through their communications are life lessons for us all.

friendship.author: Evangeline Lilly
friendship.text: Around the time I graduated from high school, I decided better to underachieve and have friendship than to overachieve and be alone.

friendship.author: Martin Freeman
friendship.text: I think people just like seeing friendship. I think people like seeing people who just drive each other up the wall, but at same time, can't live without each other.

friendship.author: Martin Freeman
friendship.text: I think what 'The Hobbit' and Middle-earth deal in are quite universal and timeless themes of honour and love and friendship... so they're things that do resonate with people.

friendship.author: Susan Glaspell
friendship.text: As I grow older, I think friendship between women is a thing to cherish.

friendship.author: Max von Sydow
friendship.text: No doubt, the most important thing in my career was my time with Mr. Bergman, with whom I worked in so many films and also in so many stage productions, so it was a continuous working relationship and also a friendship, of course, that lasted for so many years.

friendship.author: Li Keqiang
friendship.text: China-Africa relationship has a long history and is full of vitality. Since the 1950s and 1960s, our common historical experiences have brought China and Africa together, and we have forged deep friendship in our joint struggle during which we have supported each other in times of difficulty.

friendship.author: Bidzina Ivanishvili
friendship.text: Restoration of friendship with Russia, our biggest neighbor, is necessary for our peace and economy.

friendship.author: Stephen Pagliuca
friendship.text: I gave Mitt Romney some donations for his campaign because he was a friend, and friendship came first. I've always been a Democrat, and I've had different views than Mitt Romney. I'm not Mitt Romney, and I think people will realize that when they meet me out there.

friendship.author: Lennon Parham
friendship.text: From the Twitter responses we got with 'Best Friends Forever' and the small feedback we are getting as the show is meted out, I think people are seeing themselves in the show and enjoying seeing female friendship portrayed in the way it really is.

friendship.author: Dolly Wells
friendship.text: We want 'Doll & Em' to be something we're proud of. We'd love to do another series, but it's not the be-all and end-all. Our friendship is the be-all and end-all.

friendship.author: Dolly Wells
friendship.text: I love 'Curb Your Enthusiasm' and 'Extras' and also 'The Trip.' That had all the nuances of friendship and finding things out about their lives without it being too much plot-driven.

friendship.author: Douglas Brinkley
friendship.text: If Reagan had intelligence information that showed that the upheaval in Egypt is actually Democratic in spirit, then he would have, I believe, turned his back on Mubarak, even though there's a long friendship between the United States and Egypt.

friendship.author: Hanya Yanagihara
friendship.text: I think for a lot of people, friendship is a relationship that gets devalued once they move on to what people consider to be more important relationships: once you find a partner or when you have kids.

friendship.author: Jeff Lemire
friendship.text: To me, Green Arrow in the past, what people loved about Oliver Queen pre-New 52 was his relationships with other heroes. Like his friendship with Green Lantern, his animosity with Hawkman, his romance with Black Canary - these are all the things that sort of defined him.

friendship.author: Apollonius of Tyana
friendship.text: I feel friendship towards philosophers, but towards sophists, teachers of literature, or any other such kind of godforsaken people, I neither feel friendship now, nor may I ever do so in the future.

friendship.author: Elizabeth Bibesco
friendship.text: Friendship is a difficult, dangerous job. It is also (though we rarely admit it) extremely exhausting.

friendship.author: Michael Foreman
friendship.text: My book 'Ali Pasha' tells the true story of a young sailor Henry Friston, who, in the hell-fire of battle, forms an unusual friendship.

friendship.author: Najib Mikati
friendship.text: I have a friendship with Hezbollah, and I also have contacts outside of Lebanon, but it doesn't mean I follow anyone's agenda.

friendship.author: Samantha Harvey
friendship.text: It's quite difficult to write about female friendship without it seeming to be a very niche subject. It's a difficult balance.

friendship.author: Laura Leighton
friendship.text: I think 'Pretty Little Liars' is going to be hugely popular for adults, for kids, for girls, for guys, you know, something for everyone to look at, and the stories are going to be great. There's suspense every week. The friendship is really fun to watch. I think it's going to have something for everybody.

friendship.author: Stacey D'Erasmo
friendship.text: The knot of intimacy at the center of 'Ten Thousand Saints' is the friendship between Teddy McNicholas and Jude Keffy-Horn.

friendship.author: Kaley Cuoco
friendship.text: I firmly believe, only because I've been doing this for so long, every show takes three years. 90% of them don't get three years. It just does. It takes a long time to build a community, build a friendship with your characters. It's hard for people to grasp on and make them care about you.

friendship.author: Jay Parini
friendship.text: I came to know Gore Vidal in the mid-1980s, when I was living in southern Italy, virtually a neighbour, and our friendship lasted until his death in 2012. Needless to say, he was a complicated and often combative man.

friendship.author: Chris Raschka
friendship.text: Whether it's music, loss of something, loneliness or friendship - if that emotion is heightened in some way and painted to fit in between the covers of 32 pages, that can become a picture book.

friendship.author: Irvin D. Yalom
friendship.text: I'm a compulsive reader of fiction. I fell in love with novels when I was a teenager. My wife Marilyn and I... our initial friendship began because we are both readers. I've gone to sleep almost every night of my life after having read in a novel for 30 or 40 minutes. I'm a great reader of fiction and much less so of non-fiction.

friendship.author: Steve Capus
friendship.text: Stretching back nearly three decades, Brian Williams and I have forged an enduring friendship. It all began in 1986 at WCAU-TV in Philadelphia and has resulted in a set of noteworthy experiences, amazing successes, and a bunch of trips to NASCAR speedways.

friendship.author: Pete Hamill
friendship.text: In 1962, I wrote a series about 42nd Street called 'Welcome to Lostville.' One result was that the young Bob Dylan read it and invited me to his first concert at Town Hall; the result was a kind of friendship that years later led to my liner notes for 'Blood on the Tracks.'

friendship.author: Hillary Clinton
friendship.text: America is stronger because of President Obama's leadership, and I'm better because of his friendship.

friendship.author: Cory Booker
friendship.text: I know Donald Trump. I've met him; I know his family. I have love and friendship and affection for his family members. But I'm going to work very hard to ensure that he is not our president.

friendship.author: Angela Merkel
friendship.text: There is a lot that binds Germany to Turkey, and even if we have a difference of opinion on an individual matter, the breadth of our links, our friendship, our strategic ties, is great.

friendship.author: Martin McGuinness
friendship.text: Whenever people reach out the hand of friendship towards me, I am not going to refuse that hand.

friendship.author: Tzipi Livni
friendship.text: There is a mutual interest between Israel and the United States of America. It is more than friendship - it is friendship plus mutual interest, and it is bipartisan.

friendship.author: Winnie Holzman
friendship.text: I loved the whole idea, first of all, of what friendship is. Very often, there are people that somehow you don't know how to declare that you are their friend, but you are their friend. That happens in a lot in high school. And outside of high school.

friendship.author: Diane English
friendship.text: I don't think it's more important to preserve female friendship than a marriage. But I think that there's a place for female friendship that's really important in the lives of all the women I know. As I've gotten older, it's become much more important to me.

friendship.author: Lynn Davies
friendship.text: I believe the friendship of the Games still exists. There is a tremendous camaraderie and atmosphere at the Olympic and Commonwealth Games - where else could you go and sit down and have breakfast with a Russian weightlifter, an East German sprinter, and an Indian fencer and talk about different cultures and problems?

friendship.author: Katee Sackhoff
friendship.text: Seth Green, he and I are trying to figure out how this all came about. Because we don't remember what came first, the chicken or the egg, no pun intended. But I don't remember what came first, 'Robot Chicken' or our friendship, because we've known each other for so long.

friendship.author: John Glenn
friendship.text: If you go to the Air and Space Museum in Washington, you can see the burn patterns on Friendship 7.

friendship.author: Mother Angelica
friendship.text: When our weaknesses affect health and friendship, we are very much aware of their existence.

friendship.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson
friendship.text: Obviously, when you're up against somebody you don't like there's extra motivation, but I don't think any person going for an Olympic gold is going to put friendship first.

friendship.author: Katherine Kelly
friendship.text: Maybe having to pretend to be in love with someone and then jump into bed with them breaks the ice very quickly; friendship follows fast.

friendship.author: Carole King
friendship.text: Everybody understands friendship, and friendship is different than love - it's a different kind of love. Friendship has more freedom, more latitude. You don't expect your friend to be as you think your friend should be; you expect your friend just to love you as a friend.

friendship.author: Eugene Ionesco
friendship.text: When I was nine, the teacher asked us to write a piece about our village fete. He read mine in class. I was encouraged and continued. I even wanted to write my memoirs at the age of ten. At twelve I wrote poetry, mostly about friendship - 'Ode to Friendship.' Then my class wanted to make a film, and one little boy suggested that I write the script.

friendship.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
friendship.text: When people have compassion, friendship, and unity, they speak and think in a constructive way to ensure national independence and prosperity.

friendship.author: Reuven Rivlin
friendship.text: A friendship between Germany and Israel didn't always seem natural.

friendship.author: Jesse Ball
friendship.text: I probably like being isolated more than many people do, but I'm lucky to have the friendship of many fine people, and they keep me from becoming very isolated. The world of my mind is certainly a populated and warm place, too. It's difficult for me to become too isolated with such resources.

friendship.author: Bill Medley
friendship.text: The friendship I had with Elvis began to take shape in 1968 when I was recording in Memphis. I'd record during the day, and Elvis would send one of his guys over to bring me to Graceland at night. Everything you've heard about Graceland during Elvis's glory days is true and then some.

friendship.author: Deborah Tannen
friendship.text: Much of my work over the years has developed the premise that women's styles of friendship and conversation aren't inherently better than men's, simply different.

friendship.author: Sam Brownback
friendship.text: When the Taiwan Relations Act passed in 1979, our biggest concern was preventing the use of military force against Taiwan. Little did we know that our friends on Taiwan could so effectively use the space created by our friendship to revolutionize their political system.

friendship.author: Pope Benedict XVI
friendship.text: I realized that everything I had to do I could not do on my own, and so I was almost obliged to put myself in God's hands, to trust in Jesus who - while I wrote my book on him - I felt bound to by an old and more profound friendship.

friendship.author: Toni Collette
friendship.text: The potential strength of female friendship and the bonds that can be formed, especially over a lifelong relationship, is very profound.

friendship.author: Ernie Banks
friendship.text: My theme is, 'The spirit of friendship is the balance of life.' Not money. Not the World Series. It's friendship. The relationships I have with people, that's enough to keep me happy.

friendship.author: Donald Trump
friendship.text: We will seek friendship and goodwill with the nations of the world - but we do so with the understanding that it is the right of all nations to put their own interests first.

friendship.author: Poppy Delevingne
friendship.text: I love all girl squads. I'm all for, like, girl power and friendship, and I'm all about that.

friendship.author: Diane Lane
friendship.text: I've heard stories of people, even celebrities that have gone online, pretended to be someone they weren't, and conducted a 5-year friendship via e-mail. Then, they got married because they really love each other from all that communication.

friendship.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri
friendship.text: Our way is straight and clear - the building up of a socialist democracy at home, with freedom and prosperity for all, and the maintenance of world peace and friendship with all nations abroad.

friendship.author: Kim Philby
friendship.text: Friendship is the most important thing of all.

friendship.author: Sam Hunt
friendship.text: I have two or three guys that I'm really close to. We have a great friendship, and I think that helps our songwriting relationship. It's hard to start... with new people and cover the ground that I've covered with those guys.

friendship.author: Mohit Chauhan
friendship.text: Friendship formed in the glamour industry comes with mutual benefits, which is nice, but it is not the real deal.

friendship.author: Ruth Ware
friendship.text: I really enjoy writing about female friendship. It's an endlessly interesting dynamic for me.

friendship.author: Betty Gilpin
friendship.text: Female friendship... I think you have friendships that come and go, and then there are ones that the girl becomes a part of your bones.

friendship.author: Roman Abramovich
friendship.text: Our friendship was based on my payouts. That wasn't a friendship when - as, for example, it's me, my friends, we are friends for many years, and it doesn't matter for me what the position is, where they work; we simply are friends. And with Mr. Berezovsky, our friendship was based on my payoffs.

friendship.author: Ari Graynor
friendship.text: It is mind-boggling to me that there are so few movies about female friendship, considering women make up half the movie-going population.

friendship.author: Jes Macallan
friendship.text: When I was first pitched the show, I was like, 'Oh, God, a soapy show called 'Mistresses.'' But it wasn't that at all. It wasn't a bunch of women pulling guns on each other and stabbing each other in the back. We really have a core friendship.

friendship.author: Ana Ivanovic
friendship.text: There's really not much friendship between the girls on tour. There's so much rivalry and jealousy, so everyone just hangs out in their own camp. In the locker room and players' lounge, you can feel the jealousy.

friendship.author: Lawrence Osborne
friendship.text: The orchid's association in Chinese culture with such virtues as elegance, good taste, friendship, and fertility goes all the way back to Confucius himself, who was said to have a particular attachment to the flowers.

friendship.author: Franklin Foer
friendship.text: As the 2016 campaign has graphically illustrated, Trump doesn't treat rivals gently. Testifying before a congressional committee in 1993, he began with his rote protestations of friendship.

friendship.author: Lee Hsien Loong
friendship.text: The Chinese go around with lollipops in their pockets. They have aid. They have friendship deals. They build you a Prime Minister's office or President's office or Parliament House or Foreign Ministry. For them, trade is an extension of their foreign policy.

friendship.author: Carrie Brownstein
friendship.text: That's so rare in the world of TV or film to have a genuine friendship turn into something that people watch, that people relate to. That's so unique.

friendship.author: Dee Rees
friendship.text: With friendship, it's hard sometimes - you don't outgrow your friends, but you do question how people are friends to you in different ways and how it's okay to cultivate other relationships outside of that.

friendship.author: Gavin Creel
friendship.text: The most real thing of all, the only thing any of us wants, is to matter to somebody. To feel and share love, even on a friendship level or as deep as a romantic one. Who doesn't want that?

friendship.author: Lauren Jauregui
friendship.text: I rekindled a friendship I hadn't had in a long time, and I was reminded of all the parts of me that had left. I was like, 'Wow, I love to paint and to write and to be outside.'

friendship.author: Diego Luna
friendship.text: I started to work when I was really young. For me, friendship is work, and work is friendship. Those who are next to me and that have been there for a long time are those who can work with me, play football with me, and go watch a film with me.

friendship.author: Diego Luna
friendship.text: Acting is about communicating, reacting, and sharing - and friendship is about all of those things, too.

friendship.author: Mitchell Zuckoff
friendship.text: I've remained in touch with more than a dozen descendants of Gremlin Special survivors, victims, and rescuers. I treasured my friendship with Earl Walter Jr., the lead paratrooper who jumped into the valley to protect the survivors.

friendship.author: Ronald D. Moore
friendship.text: There are some good space battles in some of the later series, but that wasn't why you were tuning in every week. You were tuning in every week because Spock was a fascinating character. Because his friendship with Kirk was profound and really unusual.

friendship.author: Danny K. Davis
friendship.text: I've enjoyed a great friendship and relationship and have a tremendous amount of affinity for both the Clintons... and I'd like to keep it that way.

friendship.author: Jacqueline Woodson
friendship.text: Friendship is such an important thing to me, and I feel like the people who I love and help keep me whole - I can't imagine a life without them.

friendship.author: Michaela Coel
friendship.text: The first time I got into astrology was being in New York. I was like, 'Oh, this is a real thing here!' Now, I'll Google what your sign is and what my sign is to see the predictions of friendship, and I find that really cool. But that's the most I know.

friendship.author: Jason Mitchell
friendship.text: I want people to have learned from me. When you watch movies that we grew up on, they teach you life lessons about friendship, brotherhood, integrity, but it's still funny and something you can watch as a family. I want to bring that back to our culture in general.

friendship.author: Jenna Wortham
friendship.text: Matching tattoos don't ensure the longevity of a friendship, any more than any other mutual hardship.

friendship.author: Tina Knowles
friendship.text: I not only enjoy a really great friendship with both my girls but also a close mother-daughter bond as well.

friendship.author: Lidia Bastianich
friendship.text: When you sit down to eat at a table, you are ready to take in nourishment - we all need to eat to live. Even in primal tribes, people ate together. It's the opening for friendship.

friendship.author: Stephanie Coontz
friendship.text: Marriage is generally based on more equality and deeper friendship than in the past, but even so, it is hard for it to compensate for the way that work has devoured time once spent cultivating friendships.

friendship.author: Angourie Rice
friendship.text: I've often been told that I'm a 30-year-old trapped in a teenager's body. I don't know how I feel about that, but I'll take it, I guess. I'm definitely mature, and I'm the one that takes care of everyone in my friendship group.

friendship.author: Robert Hilburn
friendship.text: As soon as I started working at the 'Los Angeles Times,' people warned me not to get too close to artists because it could make it difficult to review their work, and you can never really tell if the 'friendship' is genuine.

friendship.author: Ian Harding
friendship.text: My social media world is detached from my friendship world. I'll have friends in real life that I don't follow on social media, because I don't really look at social media as the way of connecting to friends. For me, social media is like a business tool.

friendship.author: Michelle Dean
friendship.text: I've come, even as a feminist, to dread the phrase 'female friendship,' because it tends to signal overdetermined relationships.

friendship.author: Phoebe Waller-Bridge
friendship.text: There's nothing that makes me cry and laugh more than stories about friendship.

friendship.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd
friendship.text: Saks helps to empower women through how they look and feel - and Bumble wants to give all women a platform to connect with other empowered women, whether that's in dating, friendship, or business.

friendship.author: Katharine Viner
friendship.text: My friendship with the great actor and director Alan Rickman did not have a particularly auspicious start.

friendship.author: Tanya Saracho
friendship.text: Write about your experiences! When I moved to L.A., I didn't have any friends, and the office janitor was the person who I saw the most. He would always come in at around 10:00 P.M., and I would still be at my desk, so I wrote a play about a first-year TV writer and the friendship that she developed with the janitor. Our stories matter.

friendship.author: Johnny Flynn
friendship.text: What's quite nice about this whole folk movement is that it's born out of genuine friendship. And nobody's infringing on anybody's space.

friendship.author: Jason Reynolds
friendship.text: The truths are universal: Every kid knows fear. Every kid knows family and friendship. Loss, love, laughter. Everything else is just detail.

friendship.author: Rumaan Alam
friendship.text: That a friendship ends doesn't mean it was weak from the outset; that it ends says nothing about its importance.

friendship.author: Sheila Heti
friendship.text: I find that when I'm in a relationship, I'm just so 'in it,' you couldn't even call it an art; it's such embroilment. With a friendship, you can choose a little bit more how to behave. You can be guided more.

friendship.author: Gail Honeyman
friendship.text: I wanted to show platonic friendship between men and women, because I think it is underutilised in fiction.

friendship.author: Mustard
friendship.text: Don't let this music industry or any industry come between friendship. Just stay focused on your goals.

friendship.author: Paul Heyman
friendship.text: My off-camera friendship with Brock Lesnar has always been different than my off-camera friendship with CM Punk. But I could not tell you that I am closer to either one of them or either one of them is closer to me. It's just a different relationship.

friendship.author: Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador
friendship.text: We are going to extend our frank hand to seek a relation of friendship - I repeat - of cooperation with the United States.

friendship.author: Emma Healey
friendship.text: There are lots of things going on for teenagers, with exam stress, changing friendship groups, becoming independent, and all those hormone changes affecting you.

friendship.author: Yvonne Orji
friendship.text: You turn 'Insecure' on, and you see a sea of brown. You see at the core of it a strong friendship between two brown-skinned girls.

friendship.author: Aquaria
friendship.text: I think everyone is always so surprised to see the friendship that I have with The Vixen. We are very supportive of each other.

friendship.author: Ben Rhodes
friendship.text: Following one of the most violent conflicts in human history, the United States and Japan built a deep and abiding friendship - an alliance that has underwritten unprecedented economic growth and security in the Asia Pacific for half a century. It is an alliance based on mutual interests and shared values and the ties between our people.

friendship.author: Jonathan Franzen
friendship.text: I don't think I could live with someone that I didn't have an intellectual friendship with.

friendship.author: Becky Albertalli
friendship.text: My book, 'Simon vs. the Homo Sapiens Agenda,' is a gay love story. It's also a story about friendship. Quite honestly, it's also probably a 320-page product placement for Oreos.

friendship.author: Bilawal Bhutto Zardari
friendship.text: I criticized Nawaz Sharif's personal friendship with Modi, but my point has been that there should be good and friendly ties between India and Pakistan at state level. But friendship between these two leaders hasn't turned into a friendly relationship between the two states.

friendship.author: Susanna Fogel
friendship.text: So many of my favorite stories, in any medium, are about friendship. Those relationships are so often just as emotional and complex as any romantic or family dynamics, and yet there's a dearth of resonant, grounded films about platonic bonds in American films.

friendship.author: Susanna Fogel
friendship.text: It's been increasingly hard to make small stories about female friendship, and, definitely, those stories don't have any shot of getting a theatrical release.

friendship.author: Juergen Teller
friendship.text: I like friendship.

friendship.author: Marcel Wanders
friendship.text: I am quite familiar with Dubai and its design scene. I have been a regular visitor for more than 10 years. It is hard to name an area where hospitality, friendship, culture, ambition, and beauty are so highly regarded.

friendship.author: Mauro Ranallo
friendship.text: There would be no Mauro Ranallo in MMA, or maybe even period, to be truly honest with you... without Bas Rutten's friendship, mentorship, and just belief in my talents.

friendship.author: Arca
friendship.text: When I met Bjork, I felt like it was a friendship first; it was like an oxygen you get from a person you only can exist with symbiotically. It's one of the most beautiful relationships I've had. She is incredible.

friendship.author: Regina King
friendship.text: It's kind of crazy to think that I've now been divorced longer than I was married, but I appreciate the journey, because it brought my ex and I back to a friendship that helped us become great co-parents.

friendship.author: Tara Stiles
friendship.text: Friendships naturally shift over life. We have different friends for different times in our lives, and sometimes it's not the best idea to hang on to a friendship to try to make it work if it's an unhealthy connection.

friendship.author: Prabhas
friendship.text: Friendship is a personal issue, and it should remain that way.

friendship.author: Dan Smith
friendship.text: Most friendship groups will have someone who starts a new relationship, and you just don't see them for four months. And that's always kind of sad, almost like an inverted break up. I guess the ideal situation is that whoever the new partner is can be subsumed into the friendship group.

friendship.author: Roberto Firmino
friendship.text: Everybody knows that Coutinho is a great footballer - here in England, they call him 'The Magician.' He made his decision to join Barcelona, but every time we meet and play for the Selecao, we have a good chat and maintain that friendship. He is an exceptional guy and one of the best friends football has given me.

friendship.author: Roberto Firmino
friendship.text: Whenever there is a new song out, we'll sometimes try to rehearse a celebration so when one of us scores a goal, we can celebrate it together. I find this a nice thing between team-mates to show the friendship between us, and I try to do this whenever I can.

friendship.author: Samuel Eto'o
friendship.text: When I was growing up, I thought everything was a life of friendship, respect, and sharing. But I discovered that unfortunately, you have people who aren't behaving in the same way but have hatred.

friendship.author: Greg Sestero
friendship.text: 'The Disaster Artist' isn't really about 'The Room.' It's about friendship and how dreams can come true.

friendship.author: Kartik Aaryan
friendship.text: My characters have never waged a war against any gender. They are all about friendship and being loyal to your friends.

friendship.author: Joseph Parker
friendship.text: It's business inside the ring, but outside it, it's friendship and brotherhood. I try to do that with all my opponents.

friendship.author: Samoa Joe
friendship.text: My relationship with Shinsuke - I mean, he's a tremendous guy, we've maintained our friendship for well over a decade, and he's one of those incredible, rare, once-in-a-lifetime athletes whose ability transcends international border, which is something that's not often able to be done.

friendship.author: Farhan Akhtar
friendship.text: 'Dil Chahta Hai' is not the first film about friendship. 'Lakshya' is not the first film about war and coming of age.

friendship.author: Rana Daggubati
friendship.text: Most of the things in your life are not in your control - the family you are born into, the parents, and the siblings you have. It is only friendship and love that you create for yourself in this lifetime.

friendship.author: Mike Portnoy
friendship.text: I love the Dream Theater guys dearly and have a long history, friendship, and bond that runs incredibly deep with them - it's just that I think we are in serious need of a little break.

friendship.author: Naveen Andrews
friendship.text: I still have a great friendship with my eldest son's mum. She's my mate. We have this wonderful son who's 6 ft. 3, gorgeous, and I'm his dad. I've not been a total failure.

friendship.author: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain
friendship.text: I think friendship in football is a massive part of the team.

friendship.author: Govinda
friendship.text: No one works with an actor or a director for friendship.

friendship.author: Petr Cech
friendship.text: Once you're on the pitch, you play for your team, and you want to win. During the year, you can play against friends - you can play against big friends and close friends - but once you are on the pitch, this friendship goes away, and you just focus on winning the game.

friendship.author: Noah Centineo
friendship.text: What I love about 'Save Me Tonight' is that it came to be through friendship. It was a perfect scenario for friends to come together and create.

friendship.author: Frankie Avalon
friendship.text: I think about growing up back in Philly. It was about friendship with the guys and having a distant crush on some gal. And when you finally got the nerve to take her out on a date, you went to her parents' house with a shine on your shoes, took her to the movies, and got her home nice and early.

friendship.author: Beanie Feldstein
friendship.text: You can be really romantic and put a lot of effort into friendship.

friendship.author: Beanie Feldstein
friendship.text: My favorite thing about 'Superbad' is it values male friendship.

friendship.author: Dominic Raab
friendship.text: Of course, the E.U. were never going to welcome Brexit. Some sour grapes were inevitable. That's why we worked hard to leave on positive terms, extending the arm of friendship.

friendship.author: Duff McKagan
friendship.text: I saw some really amazing stuff with Axl. We worked really well together. We were good friends. And I hope to perhaps have that friendship back one day, although it's not something I wait around for.

friendship.author: Elias
friendship.text: I haven't expressed this too much in public, but I have a friendship to a degree with Bruce Springsteen.

friendship.author: Dakota Meyer
friendship.text: I think every relationship has its ups and downs. I think that's a part of whether you're married or whether you're in friendship or in business, right? They all have their ups and downs, and I think it's just a normal part of life.

friendship.author: Urijah Faber
friendship.text: It's kind of a weird thing when you've been at the top of a division you've been in your entire career to kind of take a backseat because of friendship.

friendship.author: Indya Moore
friendship.text: I think 'Pose' is unique in that it's not just a trans story - it's about family. It's about love. It's about friendship and acceptance and really deconstructing humanity, and the ethical side of that, with how we treat people who are different than us.

friendship.author: Jordan Burroughs
friendship.text: I've become close with Masoud Esmaeilpour and consider him a friend. We send each other messages from time to time on Instagram, checking in to see how the other is doing. Whenever I see him, he's always a gentleman, giving me tips about my next opponent. There is a tremendous amount of respect in our friendship.

friendship.author: Michael McDonald
friendship.text: My friendship with The Doobie Brothers never really changed. We're all still good friends, and I really admire those guys a lot.

friendship.author: Rajiv Gandhi
friendship.text: We are committed to the development of friendship and good neighbourly relations with Pakistan. I believe that Prime Minister Benazir Bhutto shares this commitment.

friendship.author: Rajiv Gandhi
friendship.text: In every democracy, it is the people's will that is supreme. We should translate the intense yearning of the people of India and Pakistan for friendship into meaningful measures of cooperation in every walk of life.

friendship.author: Shankar Mahadevan
friendship.text: I want to sing of humanity, friendship, what's happening to the Earth and the like.

friendship.author: Sunita Williams
friendship.text: It's - I mean, the Olympics, what is it? It's an international competition to foster friendship and - and competition across - across the planet, and I think that's exactly what the International Space Station is.

friendship.author: Steve Lukather
friendship.text: Henley's one of my favorite singers. I've maintained a friendship with Don over the years.

friendship.author: Caroline Flack
friendship.text: Love comes in all different shapes and forms - from friendship and sisters and mums - and as I've got older, I've definitely learned that some of my happiest times have been when I've been on my own.

friendship.author: Ksenia Sobchak
friendship.text: In the end, believe me, there will be no friendship between Trump and Putin.

friendship.author: Ksenia Sobchak
friendship.text: I want to show a new vector of policy that will be there when I will become a president. And my vector is friendship with America and friendship with European Union.

friendship.author: Sushma Swaraj
friendship.text: I served as the chairman of the India-Israel Parliamentary Friendship Group for three years, during which I also had the pleasure of visiting Israel.

friendship.author: Mel Giedroyc
friendship.text: There are different types of double act: the classic dumb-and-dumber, like Morecambe and Wise; the good cop/bad cop, where one's a bit spiky and the other's daft. Sue Perkins and I take what we might call the Ant and Dec approach: the double act came out of our friendship.

friendship.author: Andy Muschietti
friendship.text: As much as 'It Chapter One' is a movie about friendship and the power of unified belief, the second part is more about trauma.

friendship.author: Theodore Zeldin
friendship.text: I'm constantly astounded by the way people talk so openly to someone they don't know. They clarify in their own minds what is important to them, discover another person has similar problems, and create trust and even a friendship.

friendship.author: Martha Nussbaum
friendship.text: I think ageing is challenging, surprising, fun, and full of friendship, so that is the approach I'll take, objecting to the stigmatization of ageing in so many modern societies.

friendship.author: Katie Piper
friendship.text: The world is more competitive and social media drives this. It's woman against woman when it comes to appearance, possessions and friendship circles.

friendship.author: Akshaye Khanna
friendship.text: Politics has friendship, enmity, intrigue and even humour.

friendship.author: John Carter Cash
friendship.text: Rick Rubin and my father had a great friendship and it's because of it that the work my dad did at the end of his life was created - that he felt creativity and invigorated again, even though he was being consumed by frailty.

friendship.author: Keren Woodward
friendship.text: We wouldn't ever sit down and pretend that our friendship didn't fall apart back in the late '80s. It wasn't like there was a massive bust-up. We just drifted apart.

friendship.author: Keren Woodward
friendship.text: When you've known someone for so long you never lose that friendship.

friendship.author: Keren Woodward
friendship.text: The group has always been based on friendship and a certain attitude.

friendship.author: Sudeep
friendship.text: If you aren't respected by someone, how can the friendship with them be valued?

friendship.author: Tom Anderson
friendship.text: MySpace gives our members the ability to reach such an incredible range of people and have direct contact with them. I'm not sure how that devalues friendship so much as it expands the range of potential friends you can have.

friendship.author: Tom Anderson
friendship.text: The connection between someone in Leeds and a comedian in Los Angeles would probably never happen if it weren't for MySpace, so it enables friendship and connection far more than it limits it.

friendship.author: John Rzeznik
friendship.text: I've met very lonely people who have 10,000 friends on Facebook. And it's just not real. We've set up this artificial society in cyberspace. And that's supposed to be a community, like a real community. It's supposed to be where people go to get solace or friendship or have fun.

friendship.author: Roddy Llewellyn
friendship.text: Of course I took advantage of the publicity that surrounded my friendship with Princess Margaret.

friendship.author: Israel Houghton
friendship.text: I met Adrienne Bailon a bit over two years ago, we worked together and became friends. Our circles connected and we remained good friends. From a friendship, as two single adults we have very recently begun to explore a dating relationship.

friendship.author: Robert Christgau
friendship.text: My experience of what a loving relationship is like rings true with a lot of people I meet. I have a theory that the people you meet, one way you choose them, is their suitability for you in that particular matter. Attitudes toward friendship and marriage are in many cases closely aligned.

friendship.author: Robert B. Weide
friendship.text: Somehow I got a hold of an address for Vonnegut shortly after making the Marx Brothers film. Vonnegut wrote back, saying that he had seen the Marx brothers film and loved it. That became the foundation of our friendship: old movies and comedies.

friendship.author: Geert Wilders
