friendship.text: All who consult on doubtful matters, should be void of hatred, friendship, anger, and pity.

friendship.author: Dalai Lama
friendship.text: My aim is to create a happy society with genuine friendship. Friendship between Tibetan and Chinese peoples is very essential.

friendship.author: Omarion
friendship.text: I think in order to really create something special, it has to be built on some foundation. And I think friendship is a good foundation you could always tap back on if you don't agree. So for me, it's not dating, it's more so friendship.

friendship.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle
friendship.text: Advocating for yourself in the context of friendship starts with choosing the right people to be part of your inner circle.

friendship.author: Eleanor Robson Belmont
friendship.text: Never be afraid to meet to the hilt the demand of either work, or friendship - two of life's major assets.

friendship.author: Jenna Wortham
friendship.text: Best-friend tattoos require so much prep work, which adds to their legitimacy. First, a friendship must be deep enough to warrant the rite; then the perfect symbol must be found to forge the bond.

friendship.author: Brooks Adams
friendship.text: One friend in a lifetime is much; two are many; three are hardly possible. Friendship needs a certain parallelism of life, a community of thought, a rivalry of aim.

friendship.author: Samuel Johnson
friendship.text: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions.

friendship.author: Rochelle Aytes
friendship.text: 'Mistresses' is about the lives of four women, each going through different versions of infidelity. Their longtime friendship is what gets them through extremely challenging times.

friendship.author: Courteney Cox
friendship.text: I've got some great guy friends. They can start out as crushes. But when you realize something isn't going to happen, you make a choice whether or not the friendship is worth it. And it usually is. Then you can laugh about the fact that you used to have a crush on him or he had one on you.

friendship.author: Chris Claremont
friendship.text: Like 'Uncanny X-Men,' 'New Excalibur' is the story of people thrown together by fate and wild circumstance who find their way to true and lasting friendship.

friendship.author: Anne Lamott
friendship.text: My parents, and librarians along the way, taught me about the space between words; about the margins, where so many juicy moments of life and spirit and friendship could be found. In a library, you could find miracles and truth and you might find something that would make you laugh so hard that you get shushed, in the friendliest way.

friendship.author: Thiruvalluvar
friendship.text: To embrace the whole world in friendship is wisdom. This wisdom is not changeable like the flowers that bloom and fade.

friendship.author: Zendaya
friendship.text: 'Shake It Up' definitely teaches kids about the importance of reaching for your dreams and setting high goals. It also teaches great lessons about friendship and family.

friendship.author: Juan Antonio Samaranch
friendship.text: Throughout its history, the international Olympic Committee has struggled to spread its ideal of fraternity, friendship, peace and universal understanding.

friendship.author: Richard Attias
friendship.text: Sport is one of the few spaces where people can learn about different cultures in a spirit of trust and friendship.

friendship.author: Peyton List
friendship.text: You can never maintain a friendship if you don't tell the truth, even if it hurts.

friendship.author: Wes Streeting
friendship.text: When I was at a tough inner-city school, drama gave me a friendship group. It's been so core to who I am and given me such confidence later in life.

friendship.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
friendship.text: What sweetness is left in life, if you take away friendship? Robbing life of friendship is like robbing the world of the sun. A true friend is more to be esteemed than kinsfolk.

friendship.author: apl.de.ap
friendship.text: Our first conversation went like: 'So, what do you do in the Philippines for fun?' 'Well, I like to rap and breakdance.' And Will was like, 'What?? Me too!' That sparked our friendship and from then on, we were inseparable.

friendship.author: Jane Harrison
friendship.text: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.

friendship.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing
friendship.text: The most deadly fruit is borne by the hatred which one grafts on an extinguished friendship.

friendship.author: Sheikh Hasina
friendship.text: Maintenance of good relations with the neighbours, friendship to all, malice to none is the policy I pursue throughout my life.

friendship.author: Aristotle
friendship.text: Perfect friendship is the friendship of men who are good, and alike in excellence; for these wish well alike to each other qua good, and they are good in themselves.

friendship.author: Rahul Dravid
friendship.text: What drew me towards team sport were the camaraderie and friendship. The chance to celebrate victory and success with a group of other people is something I have enjoyed doing.

friendship.author: Henry Ward Beecher
friendship.text: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one.

friendship.author: Sam Allardyce
friendship.text: One of my best friendships dwindled in the pub business - we still talk, but it challenged that friendship too much - and that taught me to go into football and find people that I can have good relations with but without being overly friendly.

friendship.author: Rachel Simmons
friendship.text: When girls can be honest with each other, they can make mistakes on their own terms and discover through experience - and not through knee-jerk adult intervention - what a healthy friendship should look like.

friendship.author: Greg Graffin
friendship.text: In the family, in interpersonal relationships, even in friendship, faith is tremendously important. If you have a partner who you believe is a good person, then it is your duty to have faith in them until the end, despite the fact that they might have done some bad things. And you have to support and believe in your children.

friendship.author: Andrew Lincoln
friendship.text: There is nothing like mortal fear to galvanize a friendship.

friendship.author: David Hepworth
friendship.text: Anyone born in the year 1950 who grew to fancy themselves as a soulful 18-year-old bought 'Songs of Leonard Cohen' upon its original release in 1968. For many of them, it was the beginning of a lifelong friendship.

friendship.author: Amanda de Cadenet
friendship.text: I think that the friendship that women share is so powerful. In fact, there's nothing quite like it. People talk about mother-child bonds, but I would argue that female friendship bond is also in a league unto its own.

friendship.author: Solange Knowles
friendship.text: When you think back in history about producers and artists or writers who've had good synergy, a lot of times they date, or they're married, or there's a friendship and a kinship.

friendship.author: Shehbaz Sharif
friendship.text: CPEC is an epoch-making project going to put Pakistan-China friendship and their economic cooperation to new heights.

friendship.author: Joachim Low
friendship.text: One win more, one defeat more. There are other important things: family, friendship, values.

friendship.author: Zhang Ziyi
friendship.text: When two people first meet, they can only have a very ordinary kind of friendship. But when you begin to understand each other, when you get close to them, you discover that you're suddenly eager to know him or her even better.

friendship.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
friendship.text: Sweet is the scene where genial friendship plays the pleasing game of interchanging praise.

friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
friendship.text: Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed.

friendship.author: Charles R. Swindoll
friendship.text: It's the most exciting thing to watch God work when I've asked him about something, to listen to him and watch him work. It's like this friendship, and it just grows and grows and grows and grows.

friendship.author: Neil Bush
friendship.text: Kuwait has been a strong partner to the United States, and the royal family has maintained an enduring and sincere friendship with my family for generations.

friendship.author: Alain de Botton
friendship.text: Where is instruction in relationships, in the management of career, in the raising of children, in the pursuit of friendship, in the wise approach to anxiety and death? All this sort of stuff I craved to learn about when I was a student and down to this day.

friendship.author: Russell Crowe
friendship.text: Meg Ryan is a beautiful and courageous woman. I grieve the loss of her companionship but I've not lost the friendship. We talk all the time and that was what our connection was about. She has a wonderful mind and we just like a chat.

friendship.author: Mel Giedroyc
friendship.text: People are used to seeing me with Sue but for Sue and me, the most important thing is always going to be our friendship. We were mates at university - very close mates - long before we did any telly. The work is like a nice little cherry on the cake.

friendship.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee
friendship.text: My message to the people and rulers of Pakistan is, 'As neighbours, we want peace and friendship and cooperation with you so that together we can change the face of South Asia.'

friendship.author: Sheila Heti
friendship.text: Usually, you don't have commitment promises in a friendship. Usually, it just grows.

friendship.author: Mae Whitman
friendship.text: I had a friend where it turned out that she hated my guts, all through our friendship. I thought she was my best friend, and then, in high school, she turned on me and had sordid affairs with all of the people that I'd dated. It was less hurtful because I was in high school, so it was more like, 'What's wrong with you? Gross!'

friendship.author: William Hazlitt
friendship.text: There are no rules for friendship. It must be left to itself. We cannot force it any more than love.

friendship.author: Holly Willoughby
friendship.text: On 'I'm A Celebrity' it's important to have chemistry and to have a friendship as a starting point you can grow from.

friendship.author: Mortimer Adler
friendship.text: Aristotle uses a mother's love for her child as the prime example of love or friendship.

friendship.author: Gord Downie
friendship.text: Bob Rock taught me a lot. His friendship has taught me a lot about what you should expect from a recording session and, more importantly, how you shouldn't expect anything less than absolute joyousness. You should feel great. You should feel 14 to be doing it. It's true and it's rare.

friendship.author: Karrueche Tran
friendship.text: Longevity in friendship is very important and one of the keys to the foundation of a happy life.

friendship.author: Suzanne Brockmann
friendship.text: The lust and attraction are often a given in a romance novel - I want to dig into the elements of true friendship that form a foundation for a solid, gonna-last-forever romantic relationship.

friendship.author: Jane Green
friendship.text: Going through an illness and then death of a close friend has changed my attitudes to friendship enormously.

friendship.author: Carol Alt
friendship.text: There was really no friendship in modeling, though a certain amount of warmth comes from running into models you know on shoots, because you end up in so many unfamiliar places, from Alaska to Africa.

friendship.author: Colin Morgan
friendship.text: The big, big block in the Arthur/Merlin friendship is the status issue, that Merlin is the servant and Arthur is royalty, and in that time, princes did not socialize with their servants; that wasn't the done thing. It just so happens that their relationship, their friendship, is strong: they have been through the thick and the thin of it all.

friendship.author: William Hazlitt
friendship.text: To be capable of steady friendship or lasting love, are the two greatest proofs, not only of goodness of heart, but of strength of mind.

friendship.author: Liz Truss
friendship.text: We want a fully comprehensive trade deal that reflects our deep, ongoing relationship, the friendship between our two countries, the fact that Australians want to come and live and work in Britain, and Brits want to come and live and work in Australia.

friendship.author: Yolanda Hadid
friendship.text: Establishing a friendship after divorce takes great effort and a lot of swallowing of your pride and ego.

friendship.author: Elbert Hubbard
friendship.text: It may happen sometimes that a long debate becomes the cause of a longer friendship. Commonly, those who dispute with one another at last agree.

friendship.author: Tyronn Lue
friendship.text: Dealing with LeBron is like a friendship. Coaching, but he understands that I am the boss, and I am going to call the shots, and he is fine with that.

friendship.author: Hector Hugh Munro
friendship.text: The sacrifices of friendship were beautiful in her eyes as long as she was not asked to make them.

friendship.author: Farhan Akhtar
friendship.text: Friendship brings in a lot of honesty and trust into any relationship, especially a marriage.

friendship.author: Woodrow Wilson
friendship.text: I have long enjoyed the friendship and companionship of Republicans because I am by instinct a teacher, and I would like to teach them something.

friendship.author: Rodrigo Duterte
friendship.text: Let me be very clear: my friendship with my friends ends where the interest of the country begins.

friendship.author: Austin O'Malley
friendship.text: Show me a genuine case of platonic friendship, and I shall show you two old or homely faces.

friendship.author: Alison McGhee
friendship.text: I suppose, the natural outgrowth about writing about two friends, it becomes about their friendship, and the complexities of it, and the way personality plays off each other, and what they each like to do, separately and together.

friendship.author: Sam Houston
friendship.text: Texas, with her superior natural advantages, must become a point of attraction, and the policy of establishing with her the earliest relations of friendship and commerce will not escape the eye of statesmen.

friendship.author: Li Keqiang
friendship.text: When it comes to Pakistan, the first word that comes to the mind of the Chinese is 'iron brother.' To us Chinese, Pakistan is always a trustworthy friend who is as solid as iron. Actually, Chinese netizens refer to Pakistan as 'Iron Pak.' This testifies to the strength of China-Pakistan friendship.

friendship.author: Marlo Thomas
friendship.text: When I was growing up, my mother was always a friend to my siblings and me (in addition to being all the other things a mom is), and I was always grateful for that because I knew she was someone I could talk to and joke with, and argue with and that nothing would ever harm that friendship.

friendship.author: Agnes Varda
friendship.text: I enjoy the time passing. I think it's a privilege to be in friendship with time.

friendship.author: Chester A. Arthur
friendship.text: As is natural with contiguous states having like institutions and like aims of advancement and development, the friendship of the United States and Mexico has been constantly maintained.

friendship.author: Christina Milian
friendship.text: My mom and I always had a great bond. It was always a natural friendship bond since early on. My mom was 18 when she had me.

friendship.author: Steven Van Zandt
friendship.text: Rock n' roll as a genre is different from pop and hip hop: it is about bands, and that for me suggests brotherhood, family, friendship and community.

friendship.author: Niki Lauda
friendship.text: There is no friendship out there. When you race, you have to fight. That's it.

friendship.author: Hayao Miyazaki
friendship.text: Watching John Lasseter's films, I think I can understand better than anyone that what he's doing, is going straight ahead with his vision and working really hard to get that vision into film form. And I feel that my understanding this of him is my friendship towards him.

friendship.author: Christopher Moore
friendship.text: For me, 'Lamb' started out as a further exploration of the phenomenon of faith and the responsibility of a messiah that I touched on in 'Coyote Blue' and 'Island of the Sequined Love Nun,' but it ended up being an exploration of the true meaning of sacrifice, loyalty, and friendship.

friendship.author: Charles Peguy
friendship.text: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love.

friendship.author: Frank Sinatra Jr.
friendship.text: Before the State of Israel became a reality, Sinatra was a strong supporter, knowing that Jews were being denied access to the Holy Land. Sinatra met and had a friendship with Israel's first Prime Minister David Ben-Gurion. Ben-Gurion gave Sinatra a beautiful Old Testament bible that was a proud possession that my father kept all his life.

friendship.author: James Lapine
friendship.text: I am thrilled to receive the Sondheim Award from the wonderful Signature Theatre. I have already received the invaluable gift of over twenty-five years of collaboration and friendship with Steve. Now I get to have his award, too!

friendship.author: Eamon de Valera
friendship.text: The part which American friendship played in helping us to win the freedom we enjoy in this part of Ireland has been gratefully recognized and acknowledged by our people.

friendship.author: Charles Caleb Colton
friendship.text: Friendship, of itself a holy tie, is made more sacred by adversity.

friendship.author: Christopher McCulloch
friendship.text: The biggest direct influence on my career is Ben Edlund, who gave me my first real professional break and, through his friendship and example, turned me into a writer and a more critical thinker in general.

friendship.author: John Cho
friendship.text: The key to doing 'Harold and Kumar' movies is you make it earnest. Primarily what we do is make Harold and Kumar's relationship and friendship believable, and we don't actually work on being that funny.

friendship.author: Eugene Kennedy
friendship.text: Friendship is something whose depth fits human aspirations and fulfills human possibilities. It has heft to it, as a gold-piece does and a gambling chip does not.

friendship.author: Francis Marion Crawford
friendship.text: No one person can possibly combine all the elements supposed to make up what everyone means by friendship.

friendship.author: Deborah Sampson
friendship.text: November 11, 1802, I arrived at Judge Patterson's at Lisle. This respectable family treated me with every mark of distinction and friendship, and likewise all the people did the same. I really want for words to express my gratitude.

friendship.author: Dirk Kempthorne
friendship.text: In my public service, I treasure my friendship with law enforcement officers. I admire what they do and support them in every aspect of their job. I have always looked upon law enforcement officers as my friends.

friendship.author: Michael Dirda
friendship.text: I find that the Amazon comments often are exceptionally shrewd and insightful, so I'm not going to diss them. But you don't really have any guarantees that what you're reading wasn't written out of friendship or spite.

friendship.author: Scott Moir
friendship.text: It's an interesting partnership that we have, friendship, whatever you want to call it. We don't even know what to call it. But we know that it's special and we're celebrating that.

friendship.author: Tyne Daly
friendship.text: Sweat makes good friendship cement.

friendship.author: William Hazlitt
friendship.text: The dupe of friendship, and the fool of love; have I not reason to hate and to despise myself? Indeed I do; and chiefly for not having hated and despised the world enough.

friendship.author: La India
friendship.text: I told God, 'I don't want a man. I don't want more gold albums. The only thing I want is the love, friendship, and presence of my mother.' And God gave it to me.

friendship.author: Jonathan Edwards
friendship.text: Sincere friendship towards God, in all who believe him to be properly an intelligent, willing being, does most apparently, directly, and strongly incline to prayer; and it no less disposes the heart strongly to desire to have our infinitely glorious.

friendship.author: Christopher Knight
friendship.text: To some it may be a thrill to be known, to me it's a thrill to start a friendship even up.

friendship.author: Marquis de Lafayette
friendship.text: I experience for the American officers and soldiers that friendship which arises from having shared with them for a length of time dangers, sufferings, and both good and evil fortune.

friendship.author: Jean Cocteau
friendship.text: I have lost my seven best friends, which is to say God has had mercy on me seven times without realizing it. He lent a friendship, took it from me, sent me another.

friendship.author: Juan Antonio Samaranch
friendship.text: Our philosophy precedes from the belief that sport is an inalienable part of the educational process and a factor for promoting peace, friendship, cooperation and understanding among peoples.

friendship.author: Anita Brookner
friendship.text: Accountability in friendship is the equivalent of love without strategy.

friendship.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
friendship.text: What men have called friendship is only a social arrangement, a mutual adjustment of interests, an interchange of services given and received; it is, in sum, simply a business from which those involved propose to derive a steady profit for their own self-love.

friendship.author: E. W. Howe
friendship.text: It may be a cold, clammy thing to say, but those that treat friendship the same as any other selfishness seem to get the most out of it.

friendship.author: Sophie Swetchine
friendship.text: The ideal friendship is to feel as one while remaining two.

friendship.author: Thomas Jefferson
friendship.text: Friendship is but another name for an alliance with the follies and the misfortunes of others. Our own share of miseries is sufficient: why enter then as volunteers into those of another?

friendship.author: E. W. Howe
friendship.text: The little trouble in the world that is not due to love is due to friendship.

friendship.author: Sallust
friendship.text: To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship.

friendship.author: Debra Messing
friendship.text: I come from the New York theatre world, and I have a lot of gay male friends, so this friendship of Will and Grace's isn't such a stretch.

friendship.author: Lincoln Chafee

friendship.author: John Woo

friendship.author: Max Jacob
friendship.text: Friendship is inexplicable, it should not be explained if one doesn't want to kill it.

friendship.author: Henry Walter Bates
friendship.text: They took their meals together; and it was remarked on such occasions, when the friendship of animals is put to a hard test, that they never quarrelled or disputed the possession of a favourite fruit with each other.

friendship.author: Mortimer Adler
friendship.text: Conjugal love, or the friendship of spouses, can persist even after sexual desires have weakened, withered, and disappeared.

funny.author: Groucho Marx

funny.author: Abraham Lincoln
funny.text: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.

funny.author: Margaret Mead

funny.text: What's another word for Thesaurus?

funny.text: It's funny, because what happens to me when I read a script, when something grabs hold of me, I start getting these flashes of people or places or things or images.

funny.text: During the Great Depression, when people laughed their worries disappeared. Audiences loved these funny men. I decided to become one.

funny.text: Japanese people have a funny habit of abbreviating names.

funny.text: I think being funny was a coping mechanism because I was always the new kid in school.

funny.text: Confidence is a funny thing, and sometimes that's all you need is just that little bit to elevate you to the next level.

funny.author: Patty Smyth
funny.text: It's funny. You travel all over the world, and you wind up with a guy from your hometown.

funny.author: Amber Heard
funny.text: I get a stack of scripts, like, once a month, and most of the time, you find these placeholder girls that are there to provide a bounce for the male character. So we know he's funny because she's serious and she's mad at him. We know he's strong because she needs saving. So really, her job is to validate this personality trait of our hero or male.

funny.author: Quentin Crisp
funny.text: Life was a funny thing that happened to me on the way to the grave.

funny.author: Will Rogers
funny.text: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.

funny.author: Anthony Anderson
funny.text: I realized my family was funny, because nobody ever wanted to leave our house.

funny.text: A romantic comedy has to be funny and make you think about life; but the obstacle that has to be overcome is key.

funny.author: Joe Rogan
funny.text: Phil Hartman was brilliant, and Dave Foley is a really funny guy. Phil Hartman was actually even funnier offstage than he was onstage because he would say nasty things. Dave Foley's very funny, very witty guy, very quick.

funny.author: Rachel McAdams
funny.text: I watched a lot of soap operas like 'General Hospital' and 'Days Of Our Lives.' When it came to movies, my parents were quite strict. They would watch 'Flash Dance' but wouldn't let us see the whole film because Jennifer Beals' character was a stripper. It was so funny when I finally saw the whole film. I thought she was a ballerina!

funny.author: Catherine McCormack
funny.text: It's funny, I listen to friends who talk about back when they were 14, eight, 16, whatever, as if it was yesterday. Me, I've no idea what I did. It's all a blur, I'm afraid.

funny.author: Andrew Schulz
funny.text: A joke is just a paintbrush. It takes someone funny to paint something beautiful.

funny.author: Ann-Margret
funny.text: Music ignited a fiery, pent-up passion inside Elvis and inside me. It was an odd, embarrassing, funny, inspiring, and wonderful sensation.

funny.author: Larry Dixon
funny.text: I never thought I'd live this long. It sounds funny because I still think of myself as a kid.

funny.author: Paul Epworth
funny.text: One of the funny things of being a producer, you have these fleeting, intense relationships with people, and they go off to global megastardom, and you don't see them.

funny.author: Peter Farrelly
funny.text: I do know this: When somebody has to look great on the screen, that's the death of funny.

funny.author: Faith Hill
funny.text: This may sound funny, but I feel my most beautiful when I'm clean, fresh out of the bath. I don't have to be dressed up. I could be in comfy clothes at home hanging out with my family.

funny.author: Chris Rock
funny.text: Show me one guy or woman as funny as Rodney Dangerfield or as good as George Carlin, Richard Pryor, Bill Cosby, or Joan Rivers. There are a lot of good comics out there, no doubt, but as far as the quality of the comics goes, I think what you have is a bunch of situational comics.

funny.author: Milos Forman
funny.text: Memories are doing funny things to us.

funny.author: Jimmy O. Yang
funny.text: When a Spanish actor does an accent, that's sexy. When Peter Sellers did a French accent in 'Pink Panther,' that's funny - he got nominated for a Golden Globe. How come whenever an Asian actor does an accent, he's stereotyping?

funny.author: Franchesca Ramsey
funny.text: It's just not funny to disrespect other people's beliefs, backgrounds, cultures, or identities when those are deeply rooted in longstanding oppression. Jokes that punch down on marginalized people require no creativity because they've existed since the beginning of time. It's like telling a knock-knock joke and believing you're Richard Pryor.

funny.author: Christina Baker Kline
funny.text: My parents are a bedrock. And I have three complex, strong, and funny sisters who inspire and sustain me.

funny.author: Evanna Lynch
funny.text: People like her because she's like a breath of fresh air. Because in the fifth book it gets so dark and Harry's always cross and then every time Luna comes in all the tension goes and she makes you laugh because she's so funny and really honest. I don't know how much I'm like her, there are some similarities but I'm more determined than her.

funny.author: Iliza Shlesinger
funny.text: I grew up in a bit of a vacuum. And as a kid, you see 'Monty Python's Flying Circus' and you're like, 'Oh, it's a cartoon.' There's mixed media. It's funny, and there's stop-motion. But as an adult, you figure it out, how the entire underpinnings of their comedy was poking fun at the rank and file of the British aristocracy and the monarchy.

funny.author: Paul Dano
funny.text: It's a funny thing. You sort of never figure it out with acting. You're always learning.

funny.author: Amanda Seales
funny.text: In music, you ain't really got to be able to sing. In comedy, you may be cute, you may be able to add a little extra to your routine, but if you're not funny, no one's really rocking with you - and if you're a black woman, you better be hilarious. As usual, we always have to do the most.

funny.author: Nancy Gibbs
funny.text: It's funny how things change slowly, until the day we realize they've changed completely.

funny.author: George M. Cohan
funny.text: Hurried and worried until we're buried, and there's no curtain call, Lifes a very funny proposition after all.

funny.author: Lena Dunham
funny.text: I mean, I - it's so funny, I am, you know, I am, you know, a working woman out in the world, but I still live with my parents half the time. I've been sort of taking this very long, stuttering period of moving out.

funny.author: Greg Davies
funny.text: If you're funny and working in education, I think the perception is that you're either inspirational or awful. So which was I? I suppose that depends on who you talk to.

funny.author: Amy Childs
funny.text: When I have had a long day at work, I want something to watch that is funny, lighthearted and easy to get into, and reality is that. I'm not really into serious programmes or documentaries.

funny.author: Letitia Baldrige
funny.text: Before the Kennedys were elected, there had been older Presidents. Then here was this devastatingly attractive young couple with two beautiful children. They were so intelligent, graceful, gracious and funny. They enjoyed life so much. That's what caught America's eye.

funny.author: Conchita Wurst
funny.text: I'd done drag since I was 14, for special occasions, and in 2010 a friend of mine with her own burlesque group was looking for a host. During a party I was just fooling around, taking the microphone, saying stupid, funny things, and she asked me afterward if I wanted to host her burlesque show every Saturday.

funny.author: Nikki Glaser
funny.text: A lot of being a woman in this business is about how you look... That's not why we're even in this business; that's not what people want from us. We're valuable because we're funny and because we have a voice and a point of view.

funny.author: John Petrucci
funny.text: When you reminisce, you don't say, 'Remember that time you got sued by so-and-so?' No, you say, 'Remember when we played here and it was unbelievable, and we went out for that incredible meal and that funny thing happened?' Those are the important moments.

funny.author: Esther Williams
funny.text: When you're out of sight for as long as I was, there's a funny feeling of betrayal that comes over people when they see you again.

funny.author: Florence Pugh
funny.text: Something that I've always been really keen on representing is some honesty with the way that we view ourselves. That's something I've always appreciated watching actors that I've looked up to, is when they look like you and me, or they have a funny elbow, or they have, you know, a hairy face.

funny.author: Samantha Ponder
funny.text: The funny thing that still cracks me up is when you get a grown man coming up to you shaking asking for a picture. I'm like 'Dude, you know I'm a scrub, right?'

funny.author: Colin Quinn
funny.text: Marie Antoinette was funny, I'm sure she was just misinterpreted. You know the 'Let them eat cake' line. She seems like she was kind of funny, like a Chelsea Handler or Kathy Griffin type.

funny.author: Brian Cox
funny.text: I actually went to see 'Rushmore,' and I came late, and I missed myself. It was great, that scene. I caught that scene the other day on TV, funny enough, the first scene that you see with Jason Schwartzman and myself, where we talk about his grades. That's a brilliant scene, and I have to say, we play it brilliantly.

funny.author: David Hewlett
funny.text: I always thought there were two kinds of males in the world: the ones who look good naked and the ones who look funny naked.

funny.author: Anthony Jeselnik
funny.text: I like seeing what the comedian thinks is funny, not just what they think I'll think is funny.

funny.author: Julia Michaels
funny.text: If I get writer's block - this is going to sound funny - I take a shower. Something about the water feels like I'm cleaning my brain as well as my body.

funny.author: Virat Kohli
funny.text: Unless someone wants to look funny, I'll not recommend anyone to copy my bowling action. But on a serious note, with the confidence that I have got from the amount of runs I have been scoring, when I'm thrown the ball to bowl, I am pretty sure of what I have to do. I may not be the most attractive to watch while bowling, but I can be effective.

funny.author: Chuck Norris
funny.text: I like Ben Stein. I think he's funny, creative, and an insightful commentator on a host of issues.

funny.author: ContraPoints
funny.text: I carry with me from my male upbringing a sense that femininity is forbidden. So when I appear on YouTube with forty butterflies glued to my body and glitter all over my face, I have a sense that I'm getting away with something I'm not supposed to. I'm being decadent. I'm enjoying a forbidden pleasure. And that's fun, and it's funny.

funny.author: Louis Theroux
funny.text: I feel like, if there's an elephant in the room, I'd really like to start off by introducing the elephant in the room. And sometimes it's funny.

funny.author: Peter Sellers
funny.text: I'm a classic example of all humorists - only funny when I'm working.

funny.author: Amanda Seyfried
funny.text: The funny thing is, the girls that I'm always up against for roles are pretty nice and cool, like Emma Watson. She's awesome.

funny.author: Elle King
funny.text: Sometimes I'm really funny, sometimes I'm quiet, sometimes I'm shy, but I'm constantly changing.

funny.author: Christopher Guest
funny.text: What's interesting about Laurel and Hardy is that in most comedy teams, there's a straight man, and then there's the funny guy. And with Laurel and Hardy, they're both the funny guy.

funny.author: Paul Mooney
funny.text: Robin Williams learned technique. He has the technique of being funny.

funny.author: Matthew Lillard
funny.text: Thing is, I'm a funny actor, but I'm not good at being funny. I'm going to ramble for a second: I'm an actor who can make things funny in the moment, like in stakes or in circumstances or out of character.

funny.author: Burna Boy
funny.text: Funny enough, you know who I used to really like in Lion King? It was Scar.

funny.author: John Hickenlooper
funny.text: I grew up a skinny kid with a funny last name and coke bottle glasses, so I experienced my fair share of bullies. But I learned, with the help of humor and resilience, to never give up.

funny.author: Leslie Jordan
funny.text: There isn't a lot I can do on this planet, but I can be funny.

funny.author: Jeff Dunham
funny.text: The magic in performing as an entertaining ventriloquist happens when the characters come to life and the interaction between the separate personalities on stage becomes 'real.' Then don't forget that the act has to be funny, and to me, being funny and entertaining any given audience is more important than anything.

funny.author: Daisy Lowe
funny.text: Raw parsley makes me gag. It's the same for my mum and my sister. Which is funny because apparently parsley was used to suffocate witches, back in the day.

funny.author: Carol Burnett
funny.text: Everybody I know who is funny, it's in them. You can teach timing, or some people are able to tell a joke, though I don't like to tell jokes. But I think you have to be born with a sense of humor and a sense of timing.

funny.author: Finn Wolfhard
funny.text: I think if I'm with a friend group, I try to be as funny as possible, and I don't always succeed, obviously.

funny.author: Nipsey Russell
funny.text: Real progress will have been made when people don't care or even notice the color of a comedian when they'll just be concerned with whether he's funny.

funny.author: Psy
funny.text: That's why 'Gangnam Style' works. If someone handsome uses that phrase it's just awkward. But if someone like me uses it, it's funny.

funny.author: Ruskin Bond
funny.text: I liked the old comic books, especially the funny ones like 'Popeye' and 'Beetle Bailey.'

funny.author: Stewart Lee
funny.text: I thought it would be a funny concept to publish a book about stand-up comedy with Faber, the poetry publisher, and to apply to stand-up the same sort of weight of annotation that you would to a classic work of literature, an epic poem. I thought that would be funny.

funny.author: Kevin Hart
funny.text: The funny thing is, all my friends are short. I wasn't aware of tall people till I got to high school. I didn't know they existed. I was sheltered.

funny.author: Daryl Hall
funny.text: Having a solo career is a funny thing.

funny.author: Peter Kay
funny.text: If my mum or my wife says that something isn't funny, I know I've struck gold.

funny.author: Dylan Moran
funny.text: Children are the most honest critics. They will say 'You're funny', but also 'You're pathetic - go away.'

funny.author: Phil Rudd
funny.text: I was just at home walking around at home, and I started feel, well, just funny. You know how you can feel funny? I had a strange pain in my chest. So my housekeeper took me to the hospital, when they hooked me up and did all these tests turned out I had a big heart attack.

funny.author: Grimes
funny.text: It's obviously funny to be a meme, so I could be down with it in that regard, but it also belittles one's art.

funny.author: Sean Hayes
funny.text: At the beginning of 'Will and Grace', I played Jack as the funny next-door-neighbor type, as we've seen in the past. And I thought that was my role.

funny.author: Lupita Nyong'o
funny.text: It's so funny, you go to acting school thinking you're going to learn how to be other people, but really it taught me how to be myself. Because it's in understanding yourself deeply that you can lend yourself to another person's circumstances and another person's experience.

funny.author: Eddie Van Halen
funny.text: It's funny, when bands or younger musicians ask me: 'So, what does it take to make it?' Well, first explain to me what you mean by 'making it': Do you want to be a rock star or do you want music to be your livelihood?

funny.author: Bill Gates
funny.text: Like almost everyone who uses e-mail, I receive a ton of spam every day. Much of it offers to help me get out of debt or get rich quick. It would be funny if it weren't so exciting.

funny.author: Adlai Stevenson II
funny.text: A funny thing happened to me on the way to the White House.

funny.author: Christopher Moore
funny.text: The fact that 'A Dirty Job' has comedy and supernatural horror in it, that both are woven in and out of it with a whimsical tone, despite the fact that it's about death, makes it hard to characterize with standard genre labels - but I have no problem with that. I'd call it a funny story about death, and leave it at that.

funny.author: Alain de Botton
funny.text: I was foreign and Jewish, with a funny name, and was very small and hated sport, a real problem at an English prep school. So the way to get round it was to become the school joker, which I did quite effectively - I was always fooling around to make the people who would otherwise dump me in the loo laugh.

funny.author: Tracy Morgan
funny.text: Cool is the enemy of funny. You can't be cool and be funny at the same time. Only Eddie Murphy could do that.

funny.author: Molly Ivins
funny.text: I've always found it easier to be funny than to be serious.

funny.author: Bruce Springsteen
funny.text: I've had an experience through music that has touched almost every part of me. It educated me in ways that I didn't get educated in school. So we try to lay on a bit of that, through being funny, being serious, playing hard.

funny.author: Ed Sheeran
funny.text: Try to find someone with a sense of humor. That's an important thing to have because when you get into an argument, one of the best ways to diffuse it is to be funny. You don't want to hide away from a point, because some points are serious, but you'd rather have a discussion that was a discussion, rather than an argument.

funny.author: Jerry Trainor
funny.text: I definitely knew I wanted to be an actor in high school. I was doing plays and musicals, and I loved 'Saturday Night Live' and thought that was what I wanted to do - funny sketches and comedies. So I knew then, but I didn't know how to go about it, but I found my way.

funny.author: Alison Brie
funny.text: I feel like any time John Oliver is added to something, the comedy is instantly there. He's so funny.

funny.author: Colin Cowherd
funny.text: I want to be funny and interesting and compelling.

funny.author: Teddy Thompson
funny.text: I love the sad songs with their maudlin, self-deprecating, almost funny lyrics. As an Englishman, they make a lot of sense.

funny.author: Maria Shriver
funny.text: I like to make jokes; I consider myself a funny person. I just think making jokes about people who are in a situation beyond their control is not funny to them or their families.

funny.author: Isaac Asimov
funny.text: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' but 'That's funny...'

funny.author: Jason Isbell
funny.text: When I hear somebody like Hayes Carll write a song that's touching and poignant and sad and funny all at the same time, it motivates me to step my game up and try to figure out a way to get more different emotions into one line or one song.

funny.author: Alex Morgan
funny.text: I really started to enjoy Instagram more recently because it's something that shows people what I'm doing and what I'm going through, but it's so simple. I don't have to come up with something witty; it's just a funny photo, and you can be as artistic or as plain Jane as you want.

funny.author: Phoebe Waller-Bridge
funny.text: I just find all that stuff incredibly funny. I love a fart. I'd do anything for a good poo story.

funny.author: Damon Dash
funny.text: Big shout out to Nas: if you want to scream my name out again and put my name in your rhyme, I think it's funny. Let's make some money from it. Just don't take it so serious, man.

funny.author: Geraldine Page
funny.text: I have played old ladies since I was 17 years old, and very convincingly. I've always looked funny and was too tall to play the leads and so had to play the grandmothers.

funny.author: St. Lucia
funny.text: It is funny to me that people think of St. Lucia as this, like, feel-good band.

funny.author: Chris Young
funny.text: My biggest ritual is writing at home more than on the road. I do very little writing on the road. Actually, it's funny to bring this into it, but one thing I always do is have a cup of coffee. I drink the most coffee when I'm writing songs.

funny.author: Angelina Jolie
funny.text: It is really funny when people say you'd be obvious for a great villain.

funny.author: Owen Wilson
funny.text: It's funny how it usually works out that I end up dying. It sort of works out, because by the time I die, I'm usually tired of working on that particular movie, so I look forward to it.

funny.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun
funny.text: I write about wounds, the eternal treasons of life. It's not very funny, but it's sincere. My commitment is to sincerity.

funny.author: Jeff Kinney
funny.text: I think if everyone would write down the funny stories from their own childhoods, the world would be a better place.

funny.author: Alex Wolff
funny.text: I'm crazy, funny, and good looking!

funny.author: Jacob Collier
funny.text: It's funny, I guess when I was growing up, I didn't really think about being an instrumentalist, per se. I didn't think, well, I want to be a piano player, or, I want to be a guitar player, or even, I want to be a singer. I just wanted to be a musician.

funny.author: Jim Dine
funny.text: I do not think that obsession is funny or that not being able to stop one's intensity is funny.

funny.author: Will Ferrell
funny.text: James Caan told me at the end of filming 'Elf' that he had been waiting through the whole film for me to be funny - and I never was.

funny.author: Caroline Winberg
funny.text: Everyone tells me I have a funny accent. It's because I copy people. I learned English at school but have best friends who are French, Australian, English and American; a very weird mix.

funny.author: Carroll Shelby
funny.text: The first time I walked by a crap table, I felt kind of funny.

funny.author: Ken Loach
funny.text: I don't think films about working class people are sad at all; I think they're funny and lively and invigorating and warm and generous and full of good things.

funny.author: Alexander Volkanovski
funny.text: I literally cringe every time I see someone trying to trash talk. Some people just don't have it and they try, and I find that funny.

funny.author: Joe Lycett
funny.text: Every hairstyle I have is funny because my barber is a standup comedian by the slightly unfortunate name of Paul Sweeney. His cuts are fantastic but the chats are even better.

funny.author: Yuval Noah Harari
funny.text: There is a saying that if you get something for free, you should know that you're the product. It was never more true than in the case of Facebook and Gmail and YouTube. You get free social-media services, and you get free funny cat videos. In exchange, you give up the most valuable asset you have, which is your personal data.

funny.author: Jez Butterworth
funny.text: Writing for 'Rooster' was a strange experience. It's funny, once you tap into a voice, words just start to flow. You know when you've hit a spirit or captured something.

funny.author: Olivia Wilde
funny.text: It's really kind of a luxury for an actor to have the opportunity to show such different types of characters. I actually left 'Cowboys & Aliens' and went straight into 'The Change-Up.' It was kind of a funny change of pace.

funny.author: Marsha Thomason
funny.text: There is definitely a pressure for funny people to be funny. People want them to perform all the time.

funny.author: George Clooney
funny.text: There's a funny thing about fame. The truth is you run as fast as you can towards it because it's everything you want. Not just the fame but what it represents, meaning work, meaning opportunity. And then you get there, and it's shocking how immediately you become enveloped in this world that is incredibly restricting.

funny.author: Tyler Joseph
funny.text: It's a funny thing. I'll be in my home town of Columbus at a restaurant or something, and the waiter maybe asks, 'What do you do?' and I say, 'Oh, I'm in a band... Twenty One Pilots,' and he'll say, 'Cool, I'll check it out. I never heard of them.' And then I say, 'In September we're playing the Schottenstein Center,' and it's like, 'What?!'

funny.author: Laura Bush
funny.text: They're great girls. They're very funny, they're very smart, they're fun to be with. They're very lively, as I think people can tell. And you know, they're very confident girls.

funny.author: Kate Bosworth
funny.text: It's so different when you change your hair color, you're treated so differently. It's a very funny experience. It's fun - I love changing up my hair.

funny.author: Andy Samberg
funny.text: I think I was the only person in my experimental film class doing comedy. But my sense of humor and a lot of comedy that I love is quite surreal and strange, you know? You could argue that 'Monty Python' is experimental film. It just happens to be really funny.

funny.author: Scarlett Johansson
funny.text: It's a required part of your film history to know who Woody is. His movies are so wonderful, and not just funny but so insightful about human behavior.

funny.author: Hannah Murray
funny.text: Turns out you have a really fun time if you go to work every day and focus on being silly and funny and happy!

funny.author: Sania Mirza
funny.text: Tennis is a funny game, and it takes a life-time of keeping one's eyes open on the circuit to have any chance of understanding the strange phenomena that exist in our exciting sport!

funny.author: Yvette Nicole Brown
funny.text: I think God has a sense of humor, and the way my lessons come from God is very funny. I have to laugh at myself even if it's a tough lesson.

funny.author: Rosemarie DeWitt
funny.text: It's funny: I feel like so many people say, 'Monogamy, it's not natural; we created that for a variety of reasons,' but I think a lot of people love being married and enjoy being married and want to be married to who they're married to.

funny.author: Edmund Hillary
funny.text: I was extremely lucky that I had two great wives. It sounds a bit funny to say that, but it's absolutely true.

funny.author: Lori Wilde
funny.text: 'A Tuna Christmas' is the second in a series of plays created by Joe Sears and Jaston Williams featuring the fictional town of Greater Tuna, the third-smallest town in Texas. What makes these plays so hysterically funny is the accurate portrayal of small-town life in the Lone Star State.

funny.author: Rick Wakeman
funny.text: Since the 1980s, I've been known more for my TV work, I used to host 'Live at Jongleurs' and of course 'Grumpy Old Men,' and so it's really all come from there. It's been a funny career really, there are people that know me now as a TV person, a comedian, an interviewer - I've had people genuinely gobsmacked to find out I am a musician.

funny.author: Michael Keaton
funny.text: Weirdly, for someone who wanted to be funny, I didn't like a lot of attention.

funny.author: Luvvie Ajayi
funny.text: People use the guise of art, and artistic expression, to do all kinds of hateful things. It's like Trump and everybody else using the guise of humor to say hateful things, the excuse being, 'I was just being funny.'

funny.author: Steven Wright
funny.text: When I was a kid, I never did funny things to get attention. I was never a funny person. I was never, like, 'Oh, wow. I could say this some day on stage.'

funny.author: Gene Mauch
funny.text: Losing streaks are funny. If you lose at the beginning you got off to a bad start. If you lose in the middle of the season, you're in a slump. If you lose at the end, you're choking.

funny.author: David Hepworth
funny.text: Some of the vintage comedy on Radio 4 Extra wasn't very funny to begin with, whereas some things just get funnier regardless of the changes in public attitudes over the years.

funny.author: Garry Marshall
funny.text: My mother was funnier than anybody I ever worked for. My father was as funny as this coat. Not a laugh a minute, my father.

funny.author: Gong Yoo
funny.text: I have been working as an actor for 16-17 years now. The funny thing is I still feel awkward in communicating with the public as a star. It hasn't been long since my drama 'Goblin' ended, and I'm looking forward for some time to rest.

funny.author: Louise Erdrich
funny.text: My parents' marriage is a gift to everyone around them - 60 years of making their kids laugh. How many parents are actually funny?

funny.author: Lucy Punch
funny.text: Someone told me I had funny facial expressions. I don't know whether I take that as a compliment or not, but.

funny.author: Meg Ryan
funny.text: I'm a sucker for a funny script. And then, as soon as I don't wanna be, one comes along and grabs me.

funny.author: Amy Adams
funny.text: When I was younger, my sister thought it was funny to pretend to punch me in the face because my mom was concerned about my teeth falling out. They were loose for a long time, and she knocked out my teeth.

funny.author: Bob Newhart
funny.text: Richard Pryor introduced me to the world of the inner city, and the urban world, and did it hysterically. My favorite comedian, even though we work 180 degrees differently, but funny is funny is funny.

funny.author: Alphonso Davies
funny.text: When I signed for Vancouver, it was funny because my mom didn't really want me to move away. She was concerned about all my schooling.

funny.author: Francois Truffaut
funny.text: When humor can be made to alternate with melancholy, one has a success, but when the same things are funny and melancholic at the same time, it's just wonderful.

funny.author: Dave Attell
funny.text: I'm not a movie guy, I'm not a TV sitcom guy, but whatever seems to fit and is funny is good for me.

funny.author: Steve Martin
funny.text: Chaos in the midst of chaos isn't funny, but chaos in the midst of order is.

funny.author: Trixie Mattel
funny.text: When I walked in on 'Drag Race' and saw Katya, I had no idea she was gonna be funny, because she was stunning. She had this perfect red lip, I remember looking into her eyes and being like, 'This is a woman!' Then she was really funny. She kind of presents normal, and it's a one-two punch with the comedy.

funny.author: Marion Barry
funny.text: I read a funny story about how the Republicans freed the slaves. The Republicans are the ones who created slavery by law in the 1600's. Abraham Lincoln freed the slaves and he was not a Republican.

funny.author: Salman Rushdie
funny.text: Stories in families are colossally important. Every family has stories: some funny, some proud, some embarrassing, some shameful. Knowing them is proof of belonging to the family.

funny.author: Hank Azaria
funny.text: Being funny with a funny voice is more my comfort zone, a broader character that I try to humanize, a kind of silly or wacky persona that I try to fill in.

funny.author: David Hyde Pierce
funny.text: On some level in acting, what you're trying to find is truth, because when it's true is when it's also funny.

funny.author: Ashley Jensen
funny.text: I do quite like sightseeing. I like churches, museums, galleries and all that stuff. I love the smell of a church in Italy or the smell of an old greasy spoon somewhere. I like markets and little funny shops in the backstreets of Florence.

funny.author: Chris Pratt
funny.text: The American audience has really opened up to women being A.) funny and B.) kinda crude. 'Bridesmaids' is R-rated, and I think it was a major coup for women to have an R-rated comedy that did really well. Same as 'Bad Teacher.'

funny.author: Lisa Kudrow
funny.text: I'm the youngest in my family, and everyone is very funny, and I was always trying to keep up with them. I just loved making people laugh.

funny.author: Gigi Hadid
funny.text: High school is when I started to get my sense of fashion together. My queen was Candice Swanepoel, who is a friend of mine now, which is kind of funny, but in high school, I was obsessed. I love her street style: she is always in cool boyfriend jeans, boots, and an awesome coat, which is very much like what I wear.

funny.author: David Grann
funny.text: It's funny: I don't know if she babysat, but I spent time with Judy Blume when I was little.

funny.author: Adrian McKinty
funny.text: I had gone to New York with no plan at all. I did a lot of jobs - barman, teacher, security guard, postman and construction worker - and I was meeting many eccentric characters, and they were saying funny things, which I always wrote down.

funny.author: Michael McIntyre
funny.text: It's such a lie that women go for funny men.

funny.author: Aml Ameen
funny.text: It's a funny thing: my name in Arabic means hope, so I suppose I have to live by that principle. Hope is desire, feeling, and investing in a projection of something that doesn't yet exist. At its best, you witness its alchemy in your life, turning something that was once in the mind into reality. At its worst, it's delusion.

funny.author: Ogden Nash
funny.text: Certainly there are things in life that money can't buy, but it's very funny - Did you ever try buying them without money?

funny.author: Steve Lukather
funny.text: Y'know, it's funny: I didn't think I'd be playing 'Hold The Line' at 60 years old. I was 19 when I first played that.

funny.author: Lewis Black
funny.text: Democrats are dumb and Republicans are stupid, but the difference between dumb and stupid is dumb isn't funny. Dumb is when you say something and the whole room goes, 'What did he say?'

funny.author: Kofi Kingston
funny.text: It's truly a new day ever since we graced the WWE Universe with our presence. Every time we come out there, you see us being funny, having fun, entertaining people and, of course, preaching the power of positivity. That's what New Day is all about.

funny.author: Steve Howey
funny.text: There is this idea in comedy that you don't want to look like you care about your appearance because that takes away from what's real, what's important. And the real stuff is what's funny.

funny.author: Jimi Hendrix
funny.text: It's funny the way most people love the dead. Once you are dead, you are made for life.

funny.author: Casey Stengel
funny.text: They say Yogi Berra is funny. Well, he has a lovely wife and family, a beautiful home, money in the bank, and he plays golf with millionaires. What's funny about that?

funny.author: David Bowie
funny.text: When it comes down to it, glam rock was all very amusing. At the time, it was funny, then a few years later it became sort of serious-looking and a bit foreboding.

funny.author: Chris Squire
funny.text: Being called a 'music legend' is a very funny thing. It's nice to know that my work has been appreciated and that people have given me that status. On a personal level, however, I can't think about it too much. It means a lot... but then it doesn't.

funny.author: J. D. Salinger
funny.text: What I like best is a book that's at least funny once in a while. What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though.

funny.author: Chris Pine
funny.text: I do like dating cynics - they tend to be incredibly funny.

funny.author: Anne Lamott
funny.text: I love readings and my readers, but the din of voices of the audience gives me stage fright, and the din of voices inside whisper that I am a fraud, and that the jig is up. Surely someone will rise up from the audience and say out loud that not only am I not funny and helpful, but I'm annoying, and a phony.

funny.author: David Hasselhoff
funny.text: When I play discos in Belfast or freshers' week in Oxford, there are 1,800 kids dressed as me. It's odd, it's funny, and it pays really well.

funny.author: J. K. Rowling
funny.text: The middle class is so funny, it's the class I know best, and it's the class where you find the most pretension, so that's what makes the middle classes so funny.

funny.author: Mick Ralphs
funny.text: The parrot's so funny. He imitates me and I don't even realize he's doing it. I'm walking around the house talking to myself and whistling and the next day he's said something I've said... it's scary you know?

funny.author: Awkwafina
funny.text: I remember watching Margaret Cho with my grandmother on TV. She was my hero, not only because she was funny, but because she showed me that it's okay to be yourself, that it's okay to be a brash yellow girl and to be a strong and brave woman.

funny.author: EJ Johnson
funny.text: I have a lot of personality and I'm funny.

funny.author: Robert Downey, Jr.
funny.text: I read the script for Wonder Boys, and I said that was almost perfect, it was so classy, cool and funny. It's a really specific thing. We stuck to it, it turned out good and a lot of people liked it.

funny.author: John Mulaney
funny.text: If something is very, very funny but possibly controversial, if it's truly funny, then it's worth doing. Things aren't worth doing for the sake of being controversial.

funny.author: Tom Ford
funny.text: Your name is a funny thing. It stands for what you're about, and everything I do is really about pride.

funny.author: Lesley Nicol
funny.text: I know it sounds funny, but every time I have a disaster in the kitchen, it knocks my confidence level a little bit more, and I feel annoyed with myself that I can't do better.

funny.author: Karren Brady
funny.text: Let's face it, when is it actually ever funny to joke about hitting someone? Never, right? The threat to give someone a slap, no matter how you look at it, is aggressive.

funny.author: Shaquille O'Neal
funny.text: I'm an unorthodox type of guy, a funny guy - at least I think I'm funny. And one of the things I like to do is come up with nicknames for myself.

funny.author: Carrie Fisher
funny.text: If my life wasn't funny, it would just be true, and that's unacceptable.

funny.author: Leslie Mann
funny.text: I've always surrounded myself with funny people.

funny.author: Jason Wiles
funny.text: I think on 'Third Watch' that I was the comic relief on a lot of that. I mean, I definitely had dark moments, but people tended to think he was funny even if the character himself wasn't having a fun time.

funny.author: Jason Sudeikis
funny.text: When somebody listens and laughs, you're always in better shape than when you're with those folks who just kind of look at you when you say something funny. You wonder if they're looking at you because they're mad that they didn't say it or something. It's hard to handle that.

funny.author: Colbie Caillat
funny.text: It's so funny because when you're working with an acquaintance or someone else, you're being more polite. I find that I'm a little bit more of a brat when I'm in the studio with my dad, so I feel bad.

funny.author: Lou Ferrigno
funny.text: It's funny how sometimes how the public some people think I was born like this. That I maybe I sleep and I do big muscle, but its a lot of work to look like this and to be in this kind of condition.

funny.author: Ted Lindsay
funny.text: But a funny thing happened four years later. I was invited to play for an alumni team against the Red Wings.

funny.author: Eileen Atkins
funny.text: One of the things I love about Helena Bonham Carter is that she is ravishing, but she does as much as she can to play it down and look funny. She doesn't let her looks get in the way. I hugely respect that.

funny.author: Patrick Ness
funny.text: I get tired of comedies where there are a bunch of funny guys and a beautiful woman who doesn't do anything funny. And I don't like books where there's a rough-and-tumble boy and a really clever, snotty girl. That's just not my experience with teenagers.

funny.author: Lana Del Rey
funny.text: I have kind of a funny relationship with movies. I don't have to see the whole movie to get an impression of it or to let it have an influence on me.

funny.author: Skai Jackson
funny.text: I woke up and I just saw all these things, like 'RIP Skai Jackson,' and I'm like, 'Why do people think I'm dead? Like, what happened? Where did this come from?' And then one of my fans told me it was some girl who started it. And for me, that's just like not funny at all.

funny.author: Abel Ferrara
funny.text: It's funny, the hardest thing to do is to make something look like it's fast, loose and improvised, and get somebody to laugh.

funny.author: Mitch Hedberg
funny.text: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8? That joke came off the top of my head, and the top of my head ain't funny!

funny.author: Kris Holden-Ried
funny.text: Fencing is a funny sport. Competitive fencing is not really very applicable to the stage world unless you're fighting with a rapier during the Renaissance, you know?

funny.author: Mary L. Trump
funny.text: My dad had a great sense of humor; he was a very funny guy and did know how to laugh.

funny.author: Milo Yiannopoulos
funny.text: Just telling the facts are no longer enough. You now have to be persuasive, charismatic, interesting, and funny. Just telling people things isn't enough anymore.

funny.author: Colin Hanks
funny.text: 'Lucky' is for laughs, and there's really nothing funny that I'm doing on 'Dexter.' I think more than anything, both comment on the fact that anybody is capable of anything. Just because they are the shy guy in the corner doesn't mean that they are a harmless little bunny.

funny.author: Twinkle Khanna
funny.text: 'Mrs Funnybones' is based and structured around my columns, and it's about how a modern woman looks at India and how India looks right back at her. Since I have a weakness for illustrations, there are also a few funny illustrations in there as well.

funny.author: Lorrie Moore
funny.text: You know, I'm just a very boring, not very funny person in person. I don't feel pressured to be otherwise.

funny.author: Parker Posey
funny.text: When my parents were dating, they were very poor, so my dad couldn't take my mom out. They would go to the grocery store and pick out funny looking vegetables. When I grew up, we'd still go and find the ones with personality.

funny.author: Joe Ingles
funny.text: It's funny, because not everyone can make the NBA, but timing and being in the right situation is something that can make or break someone or a team.

funny.author: Daveed Diggs
funny.text: It's funny because as a rapper, there is - and this is something that Clipping challenges all the time - there is this idea about authenticity as a rapper, in the fact that you rap things that are yours. That's not what doing a play is. You're interpreting somebody else's words.

funny.author: Adam Sandler
funny.text: Sixth grade was a big time, in my childhood, of hoops and friendship, and coming up with funny things.

funny.author: Amy Jo Johnson
funny.text: I can't imagine actually singing on this show like I did on 'Felicity', but it would be kind of funny.

funny.author: Kapil Sharma
funny.text: People think I am funny all the time. But I am not. I am serious, too. Also, I enjoy serious, dramatic films.

funny.author: Kim Wayans
funny.text: I enjoy doing comedy that is why I pursue it. I believe that life is hard enough already and full of drama so I find things that are funny to use as material.

funny.author: Steve Harvey
funny.text: There's a lot more to me than just funny.

funny.author: Vanessa Ferlito
funny.text: The funny thing is I'm not even Latin. I was constantly getting Latin roles, and I was like, I even was nominated for an award, and I was like, 'Let them know at the NAACP, the first white woman. Let them know I'm totally grateful, but I'm not Latin. I can't do that. I play Latin.'

funny.author: Amruta Khanvilkar
funny.text: The real challenge lies in maintaining dignity while being funny. I am in awe of Krushna Abhishek's energy and Bharti Singh's wit. They are infectious and selfless.

funny.author: Lil B
funny.text: I'm a funny guy. I want people to laugh. I laugh at myself, I make fun of myself. But at the end of the day everything that I say has a message in it.

funny.author: Morten Harket
funny.text: I am naturally prone to fun or to be funny, but when I talk about myself in interviews, then it's an intellectual exercise.

funny.author: Mila Kunis
funny.text: I think that certain things are funny and certain things are okay to make fun of - including myself.

funny.author: Michael Waltrip
funny.text: If you look up the definition of stand-up comedy, it's funny on purpose. A little bit of pressure there. It's basically acting. You're telling stories and acting them out for people. The more you make it seem real, really a person doing it, then it seems to me the better it works.

funny.author: Kailash Kher
funny.text: I don't follow anything blindly. I have to know the entire thing, if I have to get in to it. It might sound funny to you, but it's like using English language. I use an English word only when I know its meaning and understand its connotation. You won't hear me say, 'What's up, dude' or anything like that just for the heck of it.

funny.author: Dave Chappelle
funny.text: I was doing sketches that were funny but socially irresponsible. I felt I was deliberately being encouraged and I was overwhelmed.

funny.author: El-P
funny.text: Being stupid and compassionate are not conflicts. Being mean and being funny and having something to say are not a conflict.

funny.author: Julianna Guill
funny.text: My cheerleader part in 'Fired Up!' is really funny.

funny.author: Julian Casablancas
funny.text: I find it funny how people from Boston and New York hate each other because of pro teams. But, like, everyone on the Red Sox is a random millionaire athlete from somewhere else.

funny.author: David Heyman
funny.text: I think it's great to see how they've grown up, not just as actors but as people. They're still very much the same kids that I met many years ago. They've grown up and they are funny and wicked and naughty and bright, and I think as actors their work is just getting better and better. They've blossomed.

funny.author: Criss Angel
funny.text: It's so funny looking back, but my so-called overnight success actually took 15 years. I remember when I didn't have any money, and my only car was mom's Hyundai.

funny.author: Norm MacDonald
funny.text: When I was young, I'd watch guys on 'The Tonight Show', Buddy Hackett, guys like that, where all they'd be is funny. Later, I remember, on 'Late Night with Letterman', I remember he'd have Jay Leno and Richard Lewis as first guests and the entire point was to entertain and be funny, and I think talk shows have kind of lost that.

funny.author: Cameron Boyce
funny.text: Kevin Hart. He's the man! I like his style. He's short, so I can relate. All the stories he tells are real. I respect that, and he's just a really funny dude - great comedy instincts. To do stand-up on a stage for an hour and tell stories and make people laugh is incredible.

funny.author: Chris Rock
funny.text: Funny is only something that others know about you - you can't be funny by yourself.

funny.author: Candace Bushnell
funny.text: Well in the book Carrie was my alter ego. In real life, Sarah Jessica and I don't look anything alike. But people do say that we sound alike. Sarah Jessica is an adorable girl and she is very funny.

funny.author: Lil Dicky
funny.text: I was a business major at the University of Richmond, and after I graduated, I took a job at a corporate ad agency. I had comedic dreams, but I also had a realistic look at what I had to do when I left school: maybe I'm funny, but maybe I'm one of a hundred thousand funny people, you know?

funny.author: Andy Warhol
funny.text: I used to think that everything was just being funny but now I don't know. I mean, how can you tell?

funny.author: Kevin Hart
funny.text: Almost anything can be funny if said the right way - but it has to be said the right way.

funny.author: Alan Moore
funny.text: I like Jacques Derrida; I think he's funny. I like my philosophy with a few jokes and puns. I know that that offends other philosophers; they think he's not taking things seriously, but he comes up with some marvellous puns. Why shouldn't you have a bit of fun while dealing with the deepest issues of the mind?

funny.author: Larry Hagman
funny.text: Comedy is not funny. Comedy is hard work and timing and lots and lots of rehearsals.

funny.author: Amanda Seales
funny.text: 'Smart Funny and Black' is basically a live black pop culture game show that I created. We have a live band. We have two contestants that we call 'blacksperts.' They come on stage and compete in games that I've created that test their knowledge of black culture, black history, and the black experience.

funny.author: Larry David
funny.text: I gave a funny speech at my wife's birthday party, and I'm thinking, 'Hey, I've still got it.'

funny.author: Chris Isaak
funny.text: I remember listening to the radio as a kid and finding that the songs always made me feel more peaceful. Funny, but the more hurtin' the music was, the better it made me feel. I think of that now when I write my songs. I may not be feelin' the blues myself, but I'm writing them for other people who have a hard life.

funny.author: Steve Hackett
funny.text: It's funny, when people talk about the 70s I can tell you the year of every album but when it comes to the later efforts I can't remember the exact years, it's funny isn't it?

funny.author: Walter Kirn
funny.text: Literary dementia seems dated now, but there was a time when a month in the funny farm was as de rigueur for budding writers as an M.F.A. is now. To be sent away was a badge of honor; to undergo electroshock, a glorious martyrdom.

funny.author: Colin Jost
funny.text: Whatever I did, I always gravitated toward trying to be funny. If I was with friends, we were joking around. If I wrote for the newspaper, it would be a humor column. If I acted, I wanted to do comedy.

funny.author: Matt LeBlanc
funny.text: It's funny - nowadays people that are famous get chased by paparazzi. They have this fame, but they don't have the money to hide from it.

funny.author: Al Yankovic
funny.text: People never ask people doing serious music, 'Do you ever think about doing funny music?'

funny.author: Paul Lynde
funny.text: Politicians... talk in generalities and lies, and I think they've caused all our grief. They're so awful, they're really funny. I hate thinking this because my dad loved politics.

funny.author: Daryl Hall
funny.text: If you take a bunch of superstars and put them in a room where they don't have their assistants and entourage, it's funny to see what happens.

funny.author: George Bernard Shaw
funny.text: Life does not cease to be funny when people die any more than it ceases to be serious when people laugh.

funny.author: Tim Cahill
funny.text: There's a story everywhere. Being bored to death someplace is basically a funny proposition. What you have to watch out for is you don't write a boring story about a boring place.

funny.author: Juan Manuel Marquez
funny.text: Boxing is always serious. Nothing comical or funny about boxing.

funny.author: Kelly Ripa
funny.text: When you have an entire amphitheatre of people laughing that way, it makes you feel so funny and it frees you to go further than you probably would.

funny.author: Bill Engvall
funny.text: I dream of acting with Kevin Costner. I would love to do a movie with him. Not something funny, but a dramatic role.

funny.author: Michael Haneke
funny.text: 'Funny Games' was conceived as a provocation. My other films are different. If people feel my other films are, or respond to them as provocation, then that's quite different. 'Funny Games' is the only one of mine where my intention was to provoke the audience.

funny.author: Corey Harrison
funny.text: It's funny because from the time I was a kid, I knew what I was going to do. What's even funnier is that my dad and my grandfather didn't want me to work at the pawn shop, but I was deadset on it.

funny.author: Harold Ramis
funny.text: I'm not a believer in the pratfall. I don't think it's funny just to have someone fall down.

funny.author: Noel Fielding
funny.text: I was quite a shy kid, but I was quite funny at school, and I was really into art. In our class, there were two of us who were good at drawing, and my teacher was like, 'He's going to make a wonderful artist one day, and Noel can make everyone laugh.'

funny.author: Margaret Geller
funny.text: There are things done under the name of science which are ridiculous. But there is also stuff done which sounds funny but is really serious.

funny.author: Jonathan Bailey
funny.text: It's funny, because even though Bridgerton' is obviously a period drama, Anthony's story is quite modern in the sense that he's reached a point where he genuinely believes that love will never happen for him.

funny.author: Maya Lin
funny.text: It's funny, as you live through something you're not aware of it.

funny.author: Cliff Chiang
funny.text: One of the funny things about Wonder Woman is that everybody does love her. She does win everybody over at some point.

funny.author: Pamela Adlon
funny.text: I can't imagine bringing in somebody else to direct my show. Wouldn't that be funny, if next season I had, like, Michael Bay come in and direct 'Better Things'? I wonder what that would be like?

funny.author: Simon Sinek
funny.text: Leave America and you'll find that the consumers in many other countries enjoy watching advertising. Not because the products are better, but because the ads are produced to be entertaining. Sometimes they are funny. Sometimes they are dramatic. Sometimes they are just beautiful.

funny.author: Cody Rhodes
funny.text: I love politics. It could be that, or it could be that my dad was always really big on, 'This is your job. You are going to work...' You know, it's really funny cause he was such a cowboy, and he doesn't like the concept of guys coming in like cowboys - unshaved and wearing flip flops - and stuff like that would eat him alive.

funny.author: Celia Johnson
funny.text: Don't remember me as too nice or beautiful or funny, because then you'll be disappointed.

funny.author: Colin Trevorrow
funny.text: 'Jurassic Park' movies don't fit into a specific genre. They're sci-fi adventures that also have to be funny, emotional, and scary as hell. That takes a lot of construction, but it can't feel designed.

funny.author: David Lowery
funny.text: I love taking something that is understood to be funny or charming or sweet or naive and instilling it with some degree of gravity.

funny.author: Mike D
funny.text: Wine is similar to music in that it's a purely experiential realm, and it's a purely subjective practice. That's sort of the funny thing about wine criticism or, for that matter, music criticism. At times, those are useful guides, but ultimately it's all about how you react to that music or wine.

funny.author: Amanda Foreman
funny.text: For a country that makes such a fuss about love on the 14th of February, America has a funny way of showing it on the other 364 days of the year.

funny.author: Benee
funny.text: I'm not a naturally funny person, and I also can't dance, so I feel like I'm lacking the key things that you need to make a good Tik Tok video.

funny.author: Edward Albee
funny.text: The avant-garde theater is fun; it is free-swinging, bold, iconoclastic, and often wildly, wildly funny. If you will approach it with childlike innocence - putting your standard responses aside, for they do not apply - if you will approach it on its own terms, I think you will be in for a liberating surprise.

funny.author: James Herriot
