funny.text: For years I used to bore my wife over lunch with stories about funny incidents.

funny.author: David Jason
funny.text: Comedy is a funny business, which you have to take seriously.

funny.author: Joel Osteen
funny.text: Isn't it funny how babies laugh a lot? I read a toddler, a young child laughs 300 times a day. The average adult laughs, like, four times a day. God put it in them. He put the laugh in us, but I think sometimes we let life get us down, you know, have bad breaks, and we lose our breaks.

funny.author: Leslie Jordan
funny.text: What amazes me with 'Will & Grace' fans is how young they are and how straight they are. The guys always come up and go, 'You are so funny on that show. My girlfriend watches that show.'

funny.author: R. J. Cutler
funny.text: If I had to name my favorite media personality, it would be a tie between Jon Stewart and Trey Parker/Matt Stone. Honest, wise, funny, and right. Sam Sifton was right up there when he was writing food criticism for the 'New York Times.'

funny.author: Maximilian Schell
funny.text: Well, I did Marlene 15 years ago and that's in the style. It's somehow similar and not similar because Marlene was much more aggressive, funny and sad.

funny.author: Jerry Seinfeld
funny.text: I think it's funny to be delicate with subjects that are explosive.

funny.author: Abbey Clancy
funny.text: I love being a mum. Sophia is so funny and has a great personality.

funny.author: Howard Stern
funny.text: Yes, I believe blue material is funny, but if that's all you've got, you're dead in the water. It's not good.

funny.author: Robin Williams
funny.text: When Jonathan Winters died, it was like, 'Oh, man!' I knew he was frail, but I always thought he was going to last longer. I knew him as being really funny, but at the same time, he had a dark side.

funny.author: E-40
funny.text: I always stay humble. I don't act funny towards nobody.

funny.author: Jim Gaffigan
funny.text: Comics write to their point of view. If you're an exceedingly irreverent comedian, you've got to see where that point of view fits or produces the most funny.

funny.author: Matt Dillon
funny.text: I like doing comedy, I like doing drama. Naturally I like to do, I like doing dramas, I like conflict, and when I do a comedy, you know, I've found that, like, romantic comedy is the trickiest one, because often it's neither: it's not romantic and it's not funny. So, like, I like a comedy that's biting. It's biting humor or really quirky humor.

funny.author: Paul Krugman
funny.text: But Wall Street people are in fact very smart; they're funny, they're not company men who work their way up the chain.

funny.author: Jimmy Kimmel
funny.text: I don't really need to be dirty to be funny.

funny.author: Conan O'Brien
funny.text: The nightmare is you spend the rest of your life being funny at parties and then people say, 'Why didn't you do that when you were on television?'

funny.author: Peter Hitchens
funny.text: Our pious horror at the intolerant and repressive behaviour of Islamic State is bitterly funny, given that it is really not that different from the policies of our close ally, Saudi Arabia.

funny.author: Ian McShane
funny.text: When you're doing a medieval show like 'Pillars,' it starts off a bit like a school play. You're all in funny costumes; you've had your coffee, and you say, 'Good morning'. Then you go on set and, if you've got good actors and directors, it takes on a life of its own.

funny.author: Gertrude Stein
funny.text: It is funny the two things most men are proudest of is the thing that any man can do and doing does in the same way, that is being drunk and being the father of their son.

funny.author: Michael Carbonaro
funny.text: There's magic all around us: Our smartphones are magical, 3-D printers are magical. So I feel that as a magician, if I can pull off something that seems real and convincing enough that I can explain why it's happening and have people believe it, it really is fascinating. And funny.

funny.author: Eminem
funny.text: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.

funny.author: Michael Franti
funny.text: I went to the University of San Francisco on an athletic scholarship. I didn't study in high school. I was just there to get by and to play basketball. But a funny thing happened to me when I got to college. I got challenged by the work and the professors.

funny.author: Kurt Vonnegut
funny.text: I'm screamingly funny, you know, I really am in the books. And that helps because I'm funnier than a lot of people, I think, and that's appreciated by young people.

funny.author: Milton Berle
funny.text: Now a 'funnyman' can get a laugh before opening his mouth - looking funny. Lou Costello was one of your great funnymen. Harry Langdon, Larry Semon; they were all funnymen - they looked funny. W.C. Fields was never a comedian. Slim Summerville was a comedian, yet looked funny. Now if you have both attributes, you are in good shape.

funny.author: Steven Wright
funny.text: What I like about the jokes, to me it's a lot of logic, no matter how crazy they are. It has to make absolute sense, or it won't be funny.

funny.author: Calvin Trillin
funny.text: I actually think of being funny as an odd turn of mind, like a mild disability, some weird way of looking at the world that you can't get rid of.

funny.author: Bill Bailey
funny.text: I met Amy Winehouse a few times and she was always funny, charming and self-deprecating - just a delight to be around.

funny.author: Ron White
funny.text: My uncle was a preacher, and I used to go watch him preach. He was also funny, so I'm very 'preacher-ish' on stage, not by intent but because that's where I learned to talk in front of people.

funny.author: Steve Martin
funny.text: 'Dirty Rotten Scoundrels' is a good one because it not only turned out, I think, to be a really funny movie but it was also a delight to shoot. We were in the South of France, working with Glenne Headly and Michael Caine and Frank Oz the director - who were just fun.

funny.author: Allison Williams
funny.text: Sometimes fake laughing is hard once you've done a scene 18 times. I don't want to brag, but I have a reputation for being very, very good at that. It's funny finding what's challenging about acting as you go.

funny.author: Alain de Botton
funny.text: Le Corbusier is an outstanding writer. His ideas achieved their impact in large measure because he could write so convincingly. His style is utterly clear, brusque, funny and polemical in the best way.

funny.author: Brendon Urie
funny.text: The funny thing about the people I don't like - they're very self-centered.

funny.author: Mae West
funny.text: It's hard to be funny when you have to be clean.

funny.author: Gigi Hadid
funny.text: Twitter is the place where I try to be more funny. And then I use Instagram just as my diary. I pull some jokes on there, but I think people have a better sense of humor on Twitter.

funny.author: Issa Rae
funny.text: I'll stick to finding the funny in the ordinary because my life is pretty ordinary and so are the lives of my friends - and my friends are hilarious.

funny.author: Angelina Jolie
funny.text: I'm odd looking. Sometimes I think I look like a funny muppet.

funny.author: Amanda Seales
funny.text: 'Smart Funny & Black' came about because I felt that black comedians were being considered as only capable of a certain type of comedy - sort of physical, kind of silly - and I felt like we are not a monolith, and our comedy isn't, either.

funny.author: Hope Sandoval
funny.text: I mean, autographs are so funny. I don't think it's good to encourage that sort of thing. Why do people want to have an autograph? What does it do for you?

funny.author: Bill Gates
funny.text: The 'Billionaire' song is what my kids tease me with. They sing it to me. It's funny.

funny.author: Julia Roberts
funny.text: Light and funny has a more compelling quality when you're younger. But I haven't abandoned the genre: I love falling down; I love Lucille Ball. It's just that a lot of those stories revolve around problems that I can't convincingly portray at this age.

funny.author: Allison Jones
funny.text: Pretty people don't keep comedies on the air. Funny people keep comedies on the air.

funny.author: Lance Armstrong
funny.text: It's funny, because I have periods where I just kind of go dark. I don't tweet, I don't talk, I don't interview, and then I have times where I do.

funny.author: Yogi Berra
funny.text: I don't mean to be funny.

funny.author: Jerry Lewis
funny.text: God hadn't made me handsome, but he'd given me something, I always felt: funny bones.

funny.author: Anthony Burgess
funny.text: When I first began to write fiction, I didn't think I was a comic writer; I thought I was a serious writer. I was surprised when the first novel I wrote was regarded as a funny novel.

funny.author: Karan Johar
funny.text: I am always acting, be at a party, at work or in office. My attitude changes from meeting to meeting, from being serious to intense to funny, depending on who is in the room.

funny.author: Colin Quinn
funny.text: Everybody's funny in different ways.

funny.author: Christopher Guest
funny.text: I watch mostly documentaries and things that aren't remotely funny.

funny.author: Joe Rogan
funny.text: I wouldn't totally rule out doing Letterman or the Tonight Show if I had a set that I just happened to write that I thought was funny but was still appropriate for network censors. But I'm not going to go out of my way.

funny.author: Kevin Hart
funny.text: Believe it or not, I make myself laugh. Sometimes when I have thoughts or say some things that are funny, it just makes me laugh, and I don't mind laughing at it before you guys do.

funny.author: Johnny Depp
funny.text: It's such a funny thing when you see your daughter transitioning from your baby, your little girl, to suddenly being a young woman. If you're not really looking for it, you can miss it, and Lily-Rose is on that road already, and there's nothing I can do to stop it.

funny.author: Christen Press
funny.text: I've had chronic back pain since I was a preteen - like, 12. I have really funny posture. I developed this funny posture where I hunch my back a little bit when I'm playing, and I overuse my back muscles instead of my abs. My posture has put a lot of strain on my lower back.

funny.author: Adrienne C. Moore
funny.text: I am imperfect. I am funny. I am real.

funny.author: Don Rickles
funny.text: Some people say funny things, but I say things funny.

funny.author: Bo Burnham
funny.text: I became good friends with Jack Whitehall. I think he's great, such a great dude, and really funny.

funny.author: Diana Taurasi
funny.text: It's funny, there's all these slogans like 'you're never too old to keep dreaming.' You know it's funny how in the basketball world, and in the business world where you're just supposed to stop. In the sports world, I feel like at 35 you're just supposed to stop. If you do, that's great.

funny.author: Rowan Atkinson
funny.text: Funny things tend not to happen to me. I am not a natural comic. I need to think about things a lot before I can be even remotely amusing.

funny.author: Demetri Martin
funny.text: I do come across people who don't like me, don't like my comedy, don't think it's funny, it's too cutesy, or whatever they hate. And it's like, 'Okay. That's your opinion. Somebody liked it, so that's good.' Hopefully it balances out.

funny.author: Jerry Seinfeld
funny.text: Being a stand-up is my mission in life; it's my passion. My ongoing goal is to simply be funny, on my own, in front of a roomful of strangers.

funny.author: Flip Wilson
funny.text: Funny is an attitude.

funny.author: Justin Chon
funny.text: It's funny - when I started acting, I didn't know I was going to be talking about Asian-American issues so much. You know what, though? It just comes with the territory, being ethnic.

funny.author: Mitch Hedberg
funny.text: All these jokes have been pre-approved as funny by me.

funny.author: Bill Burr
funny.text: You know, it wasn't even that I'm a funny guy, I just loved stand-up comedy and I wanted to do it. It was one of the few things in my life that I knew I was going to be able to do, and I also felt as though I'd be able to do it the way I wanted to do it.

funny.author: Steven Wright
funny.text: When I'm on stage, it's really intense. My mind is going a million miles an hour, trying to remember my act, trying to say it all the right way. It's funny how different it looks and how it's happening. There are three Fellini circuses in my head, and outwardly it looks like I'm going to get a bagel.

funny.author: Amanda Seales
funny.text: I've always been funny, but I never considered it as a particular career path until my early 30s, when I realized that hip-hop wasn't going to be the long term.

funny.author: Woody Allen
funny.text: I think being funny is not anyone's first choice.

funny.author: Will Rogers
funny.text: If I studied all my life, I couldn't think up half the number of funny things passed in one session of congress.

funny.author: Christopher Meloni
funny.text: I think Chris Rock at the Oscars was a great example. I thought that was intellectually hilarious. The Gap starts a war with Banana Republic... That to me was funny.

funny.author: Milo Yiannopoulos
funny.text: The thing I most hate about the Left is that they want to stop us laughing - to prescribe which jokes are OK and which are not OK to make in public and to draw artificial lines around certain subjects. I find all sorts of inappropriate things funny.

funny.author: Daryl Hall
funny.text: I've got a sense of humor. I'm a funny guy.

funny.author: Peter Kay
funny.text: There's no great secret or plan, I just think I'm funny and I want to make people laugh.

funny.author: Amy Adams
funny.text: I think the kick to doing comedy is just to get in a film with really funny people and let them do their jobs. I find that in most comedies, I'm not the funny one, which works out great.

funny.author: P. J. O'Rourke
funny.text: Don't send funny greeting cards on birthdays or at Christmas. Save them for funerals, when their cheery effect is needed.

funny.author: Sheila Hancock
funny.text: My chin's too big. And my nose - my nose is funny.

funny.author: David Sedaris
funny.text: I love things made out of animals. It's just so funny to think of someone saying, 'I need a letter opener. I guess I'll have to kill a deer.

funny.author: Leslie Jordan
funny.text: I was always the class clown. I was always the funny one.

funny.author: Alison Brie
funny.text: I love Jason Bateman. He's so funny.

funny.author: Sebastian Stan
funny.text: Comedy is only funny when there's real pain.

funny.author: Judy Garland
funny.text: I wasn't close to my father, but I wanted to be all my life. He had a funny sense of humor, and he laughed all the time - good and loud, like I do. He was a gay Irish gentleman and very good-looking. And he wanted to be close to me, too, but we never had much time together.

funny.author: Limmy
funny.text: Why do I want to annoy people? Because annoying people is funny.

funny.author: Robin Williams
funny.text: I basically started performing for my mother, going, 'Love me!' What drives you to perform is the need for that primal connection. When I was little, my mother was funny with me, and I started to be charming and funny for her, and I learned that by being entertaining, you make a connection with another person.

funny.author: Ricky Gervais
funny.text: I wanted to be clever, but being funny came first. That's how you know someone is clever. They don't come out and tell you pi to 13 places - they tell you a joke.

funny.author: Garth Brooks
funny.text: It's funny how a chubby kid can just be having fun, and people call it entertainment!

funny.author: Sabrina Carpenter
funny.text: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say it at all. And if you do have to say it, make it really funny so I can screenshot it and save it for later.

funny.author: Will Ferrell
funny.text: The funny guy doesn't get the girl until later in life. High school, college, everyone still wants the brooding, dangerous guy you shouldn't have.

funny.author: Prince
funny.text: I'm thankful enough or blessed enough to be able to say that Miles Davis was a friend when he was alive, and he was a wonderful mentor and really, really funny, you know.

funny.author: Britney Spears
funny.text: Justin Timberlake is everything, and what more could you want in a person? He's funny. He's cute. He's great. He just understands. I get him and he gets me, and that's cool.

funny.author: Michael Morpurgo
funny.text: Animals are sentient, intelligent, perceptive, funny and entertaining. We owe them a duty of care as we do to children.

funny.author: Lily Tomlin
funny.text: I grew up in a time when women didn't really do comedy. You had to be homely, overweight, an old maid, all that. You had to play a stereotype, because very attractive women were not supposed to be funny - because it's powerful; it's a threat.

funny.author: Colin Quinn
funny.text: You can't make everybody laugh. You gotta just do what you think is funny. Just be obstreperous to everybody.

funny.author: Amanda Seales
funny.text: If I couldn't get to where I wanted to by being my organic self - which is a smart, funny, unapologetically black woman - then I felt like it's not worth doing it if I can't do it the most organic way possible. Which is why I left the music business.

funny.author: Mick Foley
funny.text: When people see my show, they may not laugh out loud as they do with some of the classic comedians, but they do enjoy it. I regret that I called it comedy to begin with; I should have called it 'An Evening With' or put it down as spoken word. But the emphasis is always on funny stories.

funny.author: Chris Rock
funny.text: Karaoke isn't fair when you're a comedian. The whole idea is to get people laughing and enjoying themselves, and I'm a professional funny guy.

funny.author: Katy Perry
funny.text: I wanted to be that quirky girl who writes funny songs that still have meaning.

funny.author: Lewis Black
funny.text: Harry Reid is not funny; he's creepy. Nancy Pelosi is creepy. Charles Schumer is sneaky and creepy.

funny.author: Steven Wright
funny.text: I don't feel that I'm explaining the world or teaching people anything. And I'm not trying to be a mirror, showing them what's really going on the world. All I'm trying to do is think of stuff that's funny, just like when I'm kidding around with my friends.

funny.author: Steve Martin
funny.text: I thought 'Borat' was a breakthrough comedy, because it was really funny. It wasn't some studio-produced script with 14 writers.

funny.author: Kevin Hart
funny.text: My mum passing away wasn't funny, but that funeral and what I went through, the things that happened, looking back at it, there were funny moments. You have to be strong enough to look back at it, to sit and assess the situation.

funny.author: Amanda Seales
funny.text: When I speak of diversity, I don't mean replacement of white comics. I don't mean acceptance by white comics. We comics who weren't born into the white guy paradigm of 'funny' don't need a handout. We don't need a PC push. We don't need 'a look.'

funny.author: Vir Das
funny.text: Alien Chutney is just what the name suggests it is. Its music that is so funny and quirky and weird that it feels entirely alien to the listener; yet, the content and the subject matter is so Indian and relatable, it's still chutney.

funny.author: Dav Pilkey
funny.text: I think my funny books are my favorites because I like to laugh so much.

funny.author: Joan Rivers
funny.text: Comedy is learning to be funny, and you learn to be funny in small rooms with young audiences.

funny.author: Sebastian Stan
funny.text: I specifically remember doing the musical 'Sweet Charity' at Stagedoor. I was playing Vittorio Vidal, which is a very funny part, and some other small roles. I couldn't really sing that well, but there were so many fun bits, and I just remember the tremendous adrenaline rush I felt from being onstage and hearing the audience enjoying it.

funny.author: Kevin Hart
funny.text: Is everything funny? For me, yes. There's a positive to every negative. Even my divorce? For me, yes. If you go back and look at it, why it happened or how it happened, there's something in there that'll make you laugh.

funny.author: Michael Keaton
funny.text: I read that John Hughes script for 'Mr. Mom,' and I thought, 'This guy is a funny writer.' I went: 'You ought to stick around and direct this thing.' But he didn't; he left, and look what he became. A really legendary comedy director.

funny.author: Carol Burnett
funny.text: Funny is funny. I dare anyone to look at Tim Conway and Harvey Korman doing the dentist sketch, which is more than 40 years old, and not scream with laughter.

funny.author: Aisha Tyler
funny.text: If you look at shows like 'Def Comedy Jam' in its heyday, there were so many really funny, talented black comics that never would have gotten on that show because they just weren't doing comedy that fit that mold.

funny.author: Ricardo Salinas Pliego
funny.text: To me, wealth is the peace of mind you have, your family, your friends, your colleagues. Everything else is just money, and it really is funny how people pay so much attention to that.

funny.author: Nick Lowe
funny.text: These days, rock 'n' roll is much more about rock than about roll. I don't do rock. But I'm interested in that roll part, because that's the funny little bit that makes it hip.

funny.author: Emma Stone
funny.text: I was just a ham since about the age of five. If I was performing at Medieval Times or something, I'd be the court jester. That was always my defense mechanism. I was never all that funny; I was just obnoxious and loud.

funny.author: Lorrie Moore
funny.text: If you record the world honestly, there's no way people can stop being funny. A lot of fiction writing doesn't get that idea, as if to acknowledge it would trivialize the story or trivialize human nature, when in fact human nature is reduced and falsified if the comic aspects are not included.

funny.author: Tamsin Greig
funny.text: I am interested in shows that are not out-and-out gag fests: you see the truth of a broken heart behind them. That is what life is like: it's really funny, you see funny things as soon as you step out of the room, but underneath that is a whole bag of broken hearts. It's that real pain and that real hilarity that makes life so intriguing.

funny.author: Allison Williams
funny.text: I've done so many funny jobs. I worked at a farmer's market through high school. I worked in the stock room of Ralph Lauren. I graduated to salesperson at Ralph Lauren, which was a big deal to me. I've been a P.A. I've been a stand-in. I've been an assistant's assistant.

funny.author: R. L. Stine
funny.text: I always just wanted to be funny. I never really planned to be scary.

funny.author: Natalie Merchant
funny.text: It's funny, I remember doing the Johnny Carson show, and, uh, I couldn't afford my rent.

funny.author: Andy Richter
funny.text: Since she got a cause and stopped being funny. I think she's real funny, but lately it's all been hearts and flowers and tears and saving teenagers and creating a role model. And that ain't funny. No giggles there.

funny.author: Claes Bang
funny.text: Everybody said that a film that funny can't win because normally your Cannes winner will be something more serious. It's not very often that a film that's bordering on comedy has won in Cannes.

funny.author: Sam Shepard
funny.text: The funny thing about having all this so-called success is that behind it is a certain horrible emptiness.

funny.author: Christopher Guest
funny.text: People want me to be funny all the time. They think I'm being funny no matter what I say or do and that's not the case.

funny.author: Jim Breuer
funny.text: I came from a blue-collar family where we busted each other's chops and found the funny in tragedies.

funny.author: Edward M. Lerner
funny.text: A funny thing about near-future stories: the future catches up to them. If the author is unlucky, the future catches up faster than the book can get out the door.

funny.author: Christina Milian
funny.text: Staring down the barrel of a gun is the scariest thing you could ever experience. It's not funny. It's not for the movies.

funny.author: Pierce Brosnan
funny.text: There are a lot of funny things that happen in one's life.

funny.author: David Spade
funny.text: It's funny because it's funny.

funny.author: Christopher Buckley
funny.text: I think I got a lot of my 'funny' DNA from my mother, who had a glorious sense of the ridiculous.

funny.author: Gordon Ramsay
funny.text: I grew up in a funny way.

funny.author: Jason Segel
funny.text: If you can find the line between sympathetic and creepy, you have reached a very funny area.

funny.author: Chrissy Teigen
funny.text: I tweet from bed. I love it because it's so quick. And it's funny. But it also leaves a lot of room for error because new people don't sense the sarcasm - there's no sarcasm font.

funny.author: John Prine
funny.text: I guess what I always found funny was the human condition.

funny.author: James Burrows
funny.text: I know what's funny, and I probably know the best way to deliver the joke. Whether it's walking out of a room, facing that way, facing this way. I just have a sense of that.

funny.author: Jon Pertwee
funny.text: In all my years as an actor, I had never been me - I had always hidden behind my glasses, mustaches and funny voices.

funny.author: David Zucker
funny.text: Chevy Chase and Bill Murray - we thought those guys were funny. We love Bill Murray, but we didn't think they were right for Airplane! because it would step on the joke if there was a known comedian.

funny.author: Liam Neeson
funny.text: It's funny, but you get to a time in your life when you think you have all the friends you will ever have.

funny.author: Christopher Walken
funny.text: Some people can do things and get away with it. Comics are famously like that. Why is it that some guys can say the most horrible things and it's not offensive, it's funny?

funny.author: Steve Carell
funny.text: I had a friend who, after 25 years of marriage, found himself trying to date again, and it was completely different. Everything had changed, and he had to reacquaint himself. It was funny even talking to him about it. For someone who has been out of the loop, it's a different world.

funny.author: David Cross
funny.text: I'll think of the idea and then I'll write something down, then within that there will be a joke or two which is the original thing which I thought was funny.

funny.author: David Bryan
funny.text: It's funny - Americans are the colonials who ran away from the royals, and yet we're fascinated by them.

funny.author: Christie Hefner
funny.text: I consider myself very fortunate to grow up in a time when my family, my friends don't look at me funny because I'm a 29-year-old single woman.

funny.author: Alex Pareene
funny.text: I love insults, devastating takedowns, things that could be described by Twitter hacks as 'shots fired,' and funny ad hominem attacks.

funny.author: Christine and the Queens
funny.text: I love funny women.

funny.author: Johnny Depp
funny.text: I detest jokes - when somebody tells me one, I feel my IQ dropping; the brain cells start to disappear. But something is funny when the person delivering the line doesn't know it's funny or doesn't treat it as a joke. Maybe it comes from a place of truth, or it's a sort of rage against society.

funny.author: Holly Marie Combs
funny.text: It's funny, because even though on a drama like 'Picket Fences' those long monologues would stress me out, doing special effects where there's a green screen and there's nobody there to to react to and you have to recite all this dialogue, it's so much more difficult.

funny.author: David Faustino
funny.text: When someone calls me up and wants me to do something, of course I am open to it. But I am not going to do it if there isn't anything interesting or funny about it.

funny.author: Gillian Jacobs
funny.text: It's funny shooting movies because you get to see clubs during daylight hours, which no one should ever see - it's not pretty; there's a reason the lighting is dim in there.

funny.author: David Canary
funny.text: To be able to make a good living in a challenging medium like soap operas is great. The best is that I get to act and am rewarded for it. And the people I work with are great. Funny, intelligent, hard working. They're all great to be around.

funny.author: Edward Zander
funny.text: Tech is a funny industry; I don't think there is any other industry on the planet that reinvents itself every 10-12 years.

funny.author: Pete Postlethwaite
funny.text: When I made a breakthrough as an actor, people started to say, 'Who's that bloke with the funny name?' They advised me to change it, saying it would never be put up in lights outside theaters because they couldn't afford the electricity. But I would never contemplate changing it. It's who I am.

funny.author: Tig Notaro
funny.text: My mother was a very, very funny, outrageous, outspoken person, and she never edited me. Her whole thing in my life was if anybody had a problem with me, tell them to go to hell.

funny.author: Billy Magnussen
funny.text: I want to be known for my performances and doing my craft well, not for funny stuff I post on Twitter or whatever.

funny.author: Prince Andrew
funny.text: Her friends say she is very funny. At a family dinner, she stood to go, and the footman very properly pulled her chair away. At that moment I asked her a question and she sat down again, except there was no chair. Everyone, including the Queen, laughed and laughed.

funny.author: Stephen Merchant
funny.text: John Cleese was a big hero of mine. He grew up in Weston Super Mare near Bristol where I grew up; he was always very tall and gangly, but he was smart and used his physicality in a very funny way. I used to think, 'Well he came from Weston and he did it, so there's a chance for me.'

funny.author: Edward Zwick
funny.text: The funny thing is, when you look at photos of Tuvia Bielski, he was fair, blue-eyed, and could pass for a Gentile.

funny.author: Clairo
funny.text: I make a point to tweet out really funny comments I get on YouTube videos. I have the most ridiculous ones.

funny.author: Trey Parker
funny.text: It's funny because I think a lot of it is simply... We've never considered ourselves satirists, but because we're on Comedy Central and because we're South Park on Comedy Central, we can do any topic we want.

funny.author: David Dobkin
funny.text: I'm not funny. Never have been and, as far as I can tell, I never will be.

funny.author: Uma Thurman
funny.text: I was not particularly bright, I wasn't very athletic, I was a little too tall, odd, funny looking, I was just really weird as a kid.

funny.author: Amy Schumer
funny.text: I just say what I think is the funniest thing I could say. I'm not trying to make headlines. I'm just trying to say the stuff that I think is funny and will make people laugh.

funny.author: Neneh Cherry
funny.text: There's been a lot of coming home in the early mornings after funny nights out, having bizarre sandwiches in bed.

funny.author: Sandra Bullock
funny.text: I will do comedy until the day I die: inappropriate comedy, funny comedy, gender-bending, twisting comedy, whatever comedy is out there.

funny.author: Erik Griffin
funny.text: People don't realize it's not just about being funny, and they don't know how perceptive a comedian needs to be about human nature. You have to really be able to read a situation and peoples' emotions.

funny.author: Eugene Lee Yang
funny.text: I would walk down the street and people would scream from their cars at me and, generally, I'd turn around and it's a 13-year-old girl. And it's funny because that is the audience that I think big studios are always trying to target.

funny.author: Alyson Hannigan
funny.text: I don't mind being the funny character rather than the glamorous one, although I'm happy to do both.

funny.author: Rachael Ray
funny.text: I wish I could be as thin as Jessica Simpson. I think she looks gorgeous! I have had Jessica on my show several times, and I can tell you that girl is genuine and funny with a great self-deprecating sense of humor.

funny.author: Logan Paul
funny.text: I'm an athlete, I'm funny, I'm creative, I can tell a story, I'm likable.

funny.author: Chris Sacca
funny.text: Funny enough, the person who is most bummed out to hear I won't be back is Mark Cuban. Despite what you might surmise from on screen, he and I are actually good friends - just really competitive good friends.

funny.author: Ainsley Earhardt
funny.text: Hands down, 'The Family Man' is one of my favorite movies with Nicolas Cage and Tea Leoni. I've always loved that movie... it's pretty special. I also love 'It's a Wonderful Life,' and 'Home Alone' - I think it's really funny.

funny.author: Choi Si-won
funny.text: People know me as just this handsome guy - a very handsome guy. But I can also be funny and fun.

funny.author: Gaby Hoffmann
funny.text: It's funny because I grew up with the T.V. on 24 hours a day. And the more money I made, the more T.V.s we had.

funny.author: David Carradine
funny.text: I don't need to convince anybody that I know kung fu, but maybe somebody needs to know that I really can act, without doing a Chinese accent or a funny walk.

funny.author: Billy Crystal
funny.text: That's still the greatest high, that feeling of being in control of 2,000 people. It's me and them, and I like the odds. It's not even so much the funny. It's getting them quiet. In the quiet moments in '700 Sundays,' I just really love that they're getting moved.

funny.author: Aaron Douglas
funny.text: I grew up playing hockey and some football, and I always think about the first time you walk into the locker room on a new team. The cliques are looking at you funny, and you make one friend, but then they're trying to stab you in the back.

funny.author: David Farr
funny.text: All comedy is funny because it tells us truths that we recognise through laughter, but that doesn't mean it can't be unnerving. Think of 'Fawlty Towers'; it can be very, very dark, but by God, it's funny. The two things are not in opposition.

funny.author: Garrett Hedlund
funny.text: It's funny - I read that women look to chiseled-faced guys for one-night stands, and to round-faced guys for marriage. When I'm rounder in the face, I like to say, 'This is my long-term look.' Or 'This is my wife-and-kids look right here.'

funny.author: Phil Elverum
funny.text: My first band was called Nubert Circus, a very embarrassing, dumb name. It means nothing. We were kind of grunge. I would say we were more funny punk, a lot of songs about food and stuff like that.

funny.author: Christopher McCulloch
funny.text: I think it's more fun to grow to love characters who are flawed than it is to present perfect characters. Perfect characters aren't very funny. Certainly my friends are a strange, intense bunch of people, and people's families drive them crazy, but challenging relationships are always more rewarding.

funny.author: Caroline Sunshine
funny.text: Our family's special holiday tradition is going over to my grandparent's house on Christmas morning. My grandma cooks a big breakfast, and I love hearing her tell old funny stories.

funny.author: Corey Stoll
funny.text: It's funny; I'm in some ways hopelessly masculine, but I don't fish, I don't hunt, I'm not that into sports. I can't fix a car. I think it's my point of view and the way I see the world.

funny.author: Kimberly Elise
funny.text: I can be dramatic. I can be funny. I can be sexy. I can be sad. I can be glad.

funny.author: Jonathan Davis
funny.text: I like reading Ball Tongue lyrics and all that stuff. And they published a book, and I wouldn't give my lyrics, and it's all wrong in the book, and I giggle. It's funny.

funny.author: Garrison Keillor
funny.text: God writes a lot of comedy... the trouble is, he's stuck with so many bad actors who don't know how to play funny.

funny.author: Gigi Hadid
funny.text: I usually stalk fans because I think they're really funny on Twitter. They don't know it, but I'll just go through their timelines, and if something is happening in the media, I always read fan accounts instead of the news because they have all the info and make the funniest jokes about it, so that's how I get my gossip - by stalking fans.

funny.author: Flip Wilson
funny.text: Funny is not a color. Being black is only good from the time you get from the curtain to the microphone.

funny.author: Christopher Moore
funny.text: The only thing that matters to me about my stories is that they're entertaining and they're funny. And I tend to get bored easily, so I generally throw something supernatural in. I would say they're humorous novels that have a supernatural bent, but that's as close as you're going to get to fitting them all in the same basket.

funny.author: Emma Stone
funny.text: I think 'Saturday Night Live', starting in the 1970s, really gave women an outlet to be funny. A lot of those women went on to have film careers, from Kristen Wiig now to Tina Fey and Gilda Radner.

funny.author: Christopher Plummer
funny.text: Simon Pegg is terribly talented, very funny, such a delicious sense of humour.

funny.author: Jerry Seinfeld
funny.text: Funny is the world I live in. You're funny, I'm interested. You're not funny, I'm not interested.

funny.author: Christina Milian
funny.text: I've always loved 'Umbrella.' Funny enough, my ex-husband wrote that, and I'm not saying it was meant for me or anything - people will start twisting this - it is Rihanna's song! But I've always loved it.

funny.author: Kapil Sharma
funny.text: My mother is very funny. She is from a village; she has a typical village kind of humour. Often she says a lot of things she herself isn't aware is a punch line.

funny.author: John Mulaney
funny.text: It's been very funny to try to act like an adult. Even getting dressed. Every day, I'm like, 'Should I wear a blazer and walk around with an umbrella? Do I carry a briefcase?' Because I'm trying to be some image of the adults I saw on TV growing up.

funny.author: Chrissy Teigen
funny.text: It's so funny because my mom is Thai and my dad is this big American guy - and our food tastes were so similar growing up. He was meat and potatoes, I was meat and potatoes.

funny.author: Parker Posey
funny.text: I can do comedy, so people want me to do that, but the other side of comedy is depression. Deep, deep depression is the flip side of comedy. Casting agents don't realize it but in order to be funny you have to have that other side.

funny.author: Gene Wilder
funny.text: I'm not so funny. Gilda was funny. I'm funny on camera sometimes. In life, once in a while. Once in a while. But she was funny. She spent more time worrying about being liked than anything else.

funny.author: Christopher Walken
funny.text: There's something dangerous about what's funny. Jarring and disconcerting. There is a connection between funny and scary.

funny.author: Joe Rogan
funny.text: The audience changes every night. You're the same person. You have to speak your mind and do the stuff that you think is funny and makes you laugh.

funny.author: Leslie Jordan
funny.text: My gift is to be funny.

funny.author: Woody Allen
funny.text: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.

funny.author: Charles M. Schulz
funny.text: I love mankind; it's people I can't stand.

funny.author: Brooke Shields
funny.text: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.

funny.author: Henry Kissinger
funny.text: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.

funny.author: Alexander Woollcott
funny.text: Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening.

funny.author: Herbert Hoover
funny.text: All men are equal before fish.

funny.author: Fran Lebowitz
funny.text: You're only as good as your last haircut.

funny.author: Thomas Szasz
funny.text: Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse.

funny.text: Funny enough, if you are looking at people these days who are putting Botox in their face and getting all sorts of plastic surgery, we look at them and go, I can tell you've had Botox. funny.author: Michael Haneke

funny.text: I'm a funny person, but I take my music seriously.

funny.text: Comedy and tragedy co-exist. You can't have one without the other. I'm of the school that anything can be funny if seen from a comedic point of view.

funny.author: Taika Waititi
funny.text: Maori get pigeonholed into the idea they're spiritual and telling stories like 'Whale Rider' and 'Once Were Warriors,' quite serious stuff, but we're pretty funny people, and we never really have had an opportunity to show that side of ourselves, the clumsy, nerdy side of ourselves, which is something I am.

funny.author: Ellen DeGeneres
funny.text: Most comedy is based on getting a laugh at somebody else's expense. And I find that that's just a form of bullying in a major way. So I want to be an example that you can be funny and be kind, and make people laugh without hurting somebody else's feelings.

funny.author: Fran Drescher
funny.text: And remember, it's also very funny, because side by side with grief lies joy.

funny.author: Glen Powell
funny.text: I'm not really a line type of guy. I mean, pick-up lines work for some guys. You gotta really sell that thing hard. I did try one pick-up line, and it failed miserably. I thought it was really funny, but the girl didn't find it very funny.

funny.author: Keanu Reeves
funny.text: I had the classic 40 meltdown. I did. It's embarrassing. It was pretty funny. But then I recovered. To me, it was like a second adolescence. Hormonally, my body was changing, my mind was changing, and so my relationship to myself and the world around me came to this assault of finiteness.

funny.author: David Sedaris
funny.text: What other people call dark and despairing, I call funny.

funny.author: Al Yankovic
funny.text: So that's why one of my rules of parody writing is that it's gotta be funny regardless of whether you know the source material. It has to work on its own merit.

funny.author: Billy Idol
funny.text: When I started out, everyone seemed to be adopting these names... Johnny Rotten, Sid Vicious. I wasn't really Rotten or Vicious or Nasty, so I wanted something a bit more funny - yet something that seemed real rock 'n' roll... something that acknowledged my ambition.

funny.author: Mike Leach
funny.text: Atlanta might have snow and Macon might have good weather, and they're not really far apart. But there's a period of time in the year where the gnats get all over your face and they bite you. And the Macon crowd, it's funny, but they can sit there like nothing's happening and there can be gnats just biting the hell out of your face.

funny.author: Dwayne Johnson
funny.text: The men I idolized built their bodies and became somebody - like Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger - and I thought, 'That can be me.' So I started working out. The funny thing is I didn't realize back then that I was having a defining moment.

funny.author: Malin Akerman
funny.text: The funny thing is that my husband couldn't be sweeter. He looks like this bad boy. He's got tattoos and earrings and a mohawk, but when you talk to him and he's around you, he's such a gentleman. He holds doors for ladies. He pulls out chairs. He cooks. He cleans.

funny.author: Liev Schreiber
funny.text: I have Slavic fat pads that make me look like a chipmunk and arched predatory eyebrows. With that, you're not going to get funny. That's why I play so many bad guys.

funny.author: Luke Evans
funny.text: One funny thing is, though, I wear my watch on my right hand and I'm actually right-handed. People always wonder why - I don't know myself, I've just always done it that way and I like it the way a good watch fits on my right wrist.

funny.author: Alex Borstein
funny.text: Animation is very similar to sketch comedy: you have a short amount of time to do something big and ridiculous and funny.

funny.author: Emma Watson
funny.text: Ignoring fame was my rebellion, in a funny way. I was insistent on being normal and doing normal things. It probably wasn't advisable to go to college in America and room with a complete stranger. And it probably wasn't wise to share a bathroom with eight other people in a coed dorm. Looking back, that was crazy.

funny.author: Ncuti Gatwa
funny.text: I think I have got quite a posh Scottish accent. It's funny because I grew up in Oxgangs and Fife.

funny.author: Kevin Hart
funny.text: The two things in the world we all share in this world are laughter and pain. We've all got problems. The levels of those problems vary, but we've all got problems. When you can take things that are painful and make them funny, that's a gift - to you and your audience.

funny.author: Brendon Urie
funny.text: My favorite type of pet has always been a dog. They're loyal, kind, and offer endless affection. My friend Eric says, 'The more people I meet, the more I like my dog.' Funny thought.

funny.author: Phil Everly
funny.text: In my old age, it's kind of funny - at night, what I like to do is watch TV when I go to sleep. And what I really like is to put on a Gene Autry film, because he sings really well. So he sings me to sleep.

funny.author: Adam DeVine
funny.text: Naked dudes are inherently funny.

funny.author: Paris Hilton
funny.text: I'm blonde and tanned and normal-sized! I'm sweet, shy, funny, have a big heart and I'm nice - and I like to eat.

funny.author: Katie Nolan
funny.text: You are not just a funny person or just a journalist. Most people are hybrids of having a smart opinion and a great sense of humor.

funny.author: Bebe Rexha
funny.text: I just want to be myself and be real and be funny.

funny.author: Gene Wilder
funny.text: I write funny. If I can make my wife laugh, I know I'm on the right track.

funny.author: Derek Jeter
funny.text: I try to sign for as many kids as possible. Kids come first, and I'll always sign for a kid before an adult. It's funny, because I was never big into autographs as a kid. The only player who I ever wanted an autograph from was Dave Winfield.

funny.author: Tex Avery
funny.text: Let's make some funny pictures.

funny.author: Tom Brady
funny.text: I'm attracted to women who are smart and funny and ambitious and have lives of their own and great families. Isn't that what attracts anyone?

funny.author: Cloris Leachman
funny.text: When something is truly funny, it's funny all the time.

funny.author: James McAvoy
funny.text: The funny thing is, I've never really hurt myself in an action movie. I've done 'Wanted,' 'X-Men,' 'Welcome To The Punch,' even 'Trance' to a certain extent has little bits of action and stuff, but I've never really hurt myself at all - not even like a sprained ankle.

funny.author: Harold Pinter
funny.text: As far as I'm concerned, 'The Caretaker' is funny up to a point. Beyond that, it ceases to be funny, and it was because of that point that I wrote it.

funny.author: Jimmy Kimmel
funny.text: It's funny how all of this has worked out - I wasn't popular in high school, but now every drunken guy in the United States wants to be my pal. They all want to buy me a shot, and pretty soon I'm throwing up.

funny.author: Terry Farrell
funny.text: My eyes are different sizes, my nose is too broad at the bridge and squishes up when I laugh, and my lips are sorta funny when I smile.

funny.author: Zadie Smith
funny.text: Novels are not about expressing yourself, they're about something beautiful, funny, clever and organic. Self-expression? Go and ring a bell in a yard if you want to express yourself.

funny.author: Samuel L. Jackson
funny.text: I tend to play characters that I can infuse with certain kinds of humour. Even the baddest guy can be funny in his own particular way. I want the audience to engage with the character on some deeper level so that they leave the cinema still thinking about him.

funny.author: Julie Newmar
funny.text: Tell me I'm beautiful, it's nothing. Tell me I'm intellectual - I know it. Tell me I'm funny, and it's the greatest compliment in the world anyone could give me.

funny.author: Dennis Farina
funny.text: One of the funny things in life to me is a guy who takes himself very seriously.

funny.author: Rohit Saraf
funny.text: I love funny Instagram filters. Where your face changes; your eyes become big, your mouth becomes protruded. I love all of that.

funny.author: Rosie Perez
funny.text: In my circle of friends, I've always been loud and funny and talkative. But as soon as I step out of that circle, I get very quiet and introspective. I don't want the spotlight on me.

funny.author: Jim Gaffigan
funny.text: There's something that's really fun about the challenge of making the mundane funny, too, I think.

funny.author: Paul Haggis
funny.text: 'Crash' came from personal experience. I saw things inside me from living in L.A. that made me uncomfortable. I saw horrible things in people and saw terrible things in myself. I saw a black director completely humiliated, but the three people around me just thought it was funny. 'No,' I said, 'that is selling your soul.'

funny.author: Edward Albee
funny.text: Careers are funny things. They begin mysteriously and, just as mysteriously, they can end; and I am at just the very beginning of what I hope will be a long and satisfying life in the theater. But, whatever happens, I am grateful to have had my novice work received so well, and so quickly.

funny.author: Gina Bellman
funny.text: I've never worked in my natural accent, having studied so hard to get rid of it when I moved to England as a child where I was bullied at school for 'talking funny.'

funny.author: Issa Rae
funny.text: I used to love being the class clown. I loved to make jokes and make people laugh. There was a set of students who would find it funny. But the cool students were like, 'Eeew!'

funny.author: Fanny Brice
funny.text: Being a funny person does an awful lot of things to you. You feel that you mustn't get serious with people. They don't expect it from you, and they don't want to see it. You're not entitled to be serious, you're a clown.

funny.author: Tobias Wolff
funny.text: Memory is funny. Once you hit a vein the problem is not how to remember but how to control the flow.

funny.author: Robert Vaughn
funny.text: 'Hustle' is wonderfully enjoyable because all my life, I've made an effort to be with people who can make me laugh. That original cast - Marc Warren, Jaime Murray, Robert Glenister and Adrian Lester - are all funny. So I know every day I'll have a few good laughs.

funny.author: Richard Herring
funny.text: Tim Minchin and Daniel Kitson are the two people that when I see them, I think I could never be that funny or that clever.

funny.author: Todd Phillips
funny.text: Comedy is so subjective. You could be in a room with 400 people laughing at a joke and you could just not think it's funny. You're just sitting there like, 'Am I in the twilight zone? Why is everyone laughing?' It's such a personal thing. People have such a personal visceral response to comedy.

funny.author: Olivia Munn
funny.text: I think it's always funny when somebody thinks you're going to do something super sexy and then you don't.

funny.author: Mike Rowe
funny.text: It's funny; it's a real balancing act. In TV, everybody's talking about authenticity. In order to make 'Dirty Jobs' authentic, I really can't be overly informed. The minute I am, I become a host... It's a very tricky business paying a tribute to work, because TV is very bad at it.

inspirational.author: Helen Keller
inspirational.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

inspirational.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
inspirational.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

inspirational.author: Francis of Assisi
inspirational.text: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.

inspirational.author: Walt Whitman
inspirational.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.

inspirational.author: John F. Kennedy
inspirational.text: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.

inspirational.author: Richard L. Evans
inspirational.text: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.

inspirational.author: Vince Lombardi
inspirational.text: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

inspirational.author: Octavia E. Butler
inspirational.text: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.

inspirational.author: Audrey Hepburn
inspirational.text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

inspirational.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
inspirational.text: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.

inspirational.author: Bear Bryant
inspirational.text: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.

inspirational.author: Jimmy Dean
inspirational.text: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

inspirational.author: Maya Angelou
inspirational.text: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.

inspirational.author: Milton Berle
inspirational.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.

inspirational.author: Aesop
inspirational.text: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.

inspirational.author: Theodore Roosevelt
inspirational.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

inspirational.author: Warren Buffett
inspirational.text: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

inspirational.author: Joseph Campbell
inspirational.text: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.

inspirational.author: George Eliot
inspirational.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

inspirational.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
inspirational.text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

inspirational.author: Steve Jobs
inspirational.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

inspirational.author: Jean de la Bruyere
inspirational.text: Out of difficulties grow miracles.

inspirational.author: Muhammad Ali
inspirational.text: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'

inspirational.author: Rabindranath Tagore
inspirational.text: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.

inspirational.author: Isaac Newton
inspirational.text: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.

inspirational.author: Henry David Thoreau
inspirational.text: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.

inspirational.author: Alexander the Great
inspirational.text: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.

inspirational.author: Lao Tzu
inspirational.text: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.

inspirational.author: Kevyn Aucoin
inspirational.text: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.

inspirational.author: Buddha
inspirational.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.

inspirational.author: Marcus Aurelius
inspirational.text: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.

inspirational.author: Martin Luther
inspirational.text: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.

inspirational.author: Aristotle Onassis
inspirational.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

inspirational.author: Robert Browning
inspirational.text: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?

inspirational.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
inspirational.text: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.

inspirational.author: Ronald Reagan
inspirational.text: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.

inspirational.author: Robert Frost
inspirational.text: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.

inspirational.author: Edith Wharton
inspirational.text: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.

inspirational.author: Desmond Tutu
inspirational.text: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.

inspirational.author: Norman Vincent Peale
inspirational.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

inspirational.author: William Shakespeare
inspirational.text: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.

inspirational.author: Mary Kay Ash
inspirational.text: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.

inspirational.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
inspirational.text: The only journey is the one within.

inspirational.author: Bruce Lee
inspirational.text: If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.

inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi
inspirational.text: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.

inspirational.author: Nido Qubein
inspirational.text: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

inspirational.author: Helen Hayes
inspirational.text: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.

inspirational.author: Carol Burnett
inspirational.text: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.

inspirational.author: Tony Robbins
inspirational.text: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.

inspirational.author: Robin Williams
inspirational.text: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.

inspirational.author: Ben Okri
inspirational.text: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.

inspirational.author: Swami Sivananda
inspirational.text: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

inspirational.author: Anne Frank
inspirational.text: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

inspirational.author: Thomas A. Edison
inspirational.text: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.

inspirational.author: Arthur C. Clarke
inspirational.text: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.

inspirational.author: Sharon Begley
inspirational.text: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

inspirational.author: Jack Dempsey
inspirational.text: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.

inspirational.author: Jim Rohn
inspirational.text: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

inspirational.author: Albert Camus
inspirational.text: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.

inspirational.author: Earl Nightingale
inspirational.text: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.

inspirational.author: Les Brown
inspirational.text: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.

inspirational.author: William Arthur Ward
inspirational.text: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.

inspirational.author: Georgia O'Keeffe
inspirational.text: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.

inspirational.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
inspirational.text: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.

inspirational.author: Jim Elliot
inspirational.text: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.

inspirational.author: John Wayne
inspirational.text: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.

inspirational.author: Og Mandino
inspirational.text: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.

inspirational.author: Lucy Larcom
inspirational.text: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.

inspirational.author: Plato
inspirational.text: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.

inspirational.author: Unknown
inspirational.text: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.

inspirational.author: Napoleon Hill
inspirational.text: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.

inspirational.author: John Muir
inspirational.text: The power of imagination makes us infinite.

inspirational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
inspirational.text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

inspirational.author: Morgan Freeman
inspirational.text: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.

inspirational.author: Democritus
inspirational.text: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.

inspirational.author: Paul J. Meyer
inspirational.text: Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon... must inevitably come to pass!

inspirational.author: Thomas Aquinas
inspirational.text: The things that we love tell us what we are.

inspirational.author: Bertrand Russell
inspirational.text: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.

inspirational.author: e. e. cummings
inspirational.text: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.

inspirational.author: Malala Yousafzai
inspirational.text: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.

inspirational.author: Ella Fitzgerald
inspirational.text: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

inspirational.author: James E. Faust
inspirational.text: If there were no night, we would not appreciate the day, nor could we see the stars and the vastness of the heavens. We must partake of the bitter with the sweet. There is a divine purpose in the adversities we encounter every day. They prepare, they purge, they purify, and thus they bless.

inspirational.author: Rosa Parks
inspirational.text: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.

inspirational.author: Neil Armstrong
inspirational.text: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.

inspirational.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
inspirational.text: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

inspirational.author: Michael Jackson
inspirational.text: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.

inspirational.author: Alan Watts
inspirational.text: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.

inspirational.author: Plutarch
inspirational.text: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.

inspirational.author: Aeschylus
inspirational.text: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.

inspirational.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
inspirational.text: Every day we should hear at least one little song, read one good poem, see one exquisite picture, and, if possible, speak a few sensible words.

inspirational.author: Benjamin Franklin
inspirational.text: A place for everything, everything in its place.

inspirational.author: Tommy Douglas
inspirational.text: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.

inspirational.author: Mother Teresa
inspirational.text: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.

inspirational.author: Michael Jordan
inspirational.text: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.

inspirational.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
inspirational.text: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.

inspirational.author: Desiderius Erasmus
inspirational.text: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.

inspirational.author: Bill Copeland
inspirational.text: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.

inspirational.author: Thomas Paine
inspirational.text: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.

inspirational.author: W. Clement Stone
inspirational.text: Prayer is man's greatest power!

inspirational.author: Mattie Stepanek
inspirational.text: Keep all special thoughts and memories for lifetimes to come. Share these keepsakes with others to inspire hope and build from the past, which can bridge to the future.

inspirational.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
inspirational.text: Light tomorrow with today!

inspirational.author: William James
inspirational.text: Belief creates the actual fact.

inspirational.author: Hermann Hesse
inspirational.text: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.

inspirational.author: William Allen White
inspirational.text: I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today!

inspirational.author: Anais Nin
inspirational.text: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

inspirational.author: Jules Renard
inspirational.text: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.

inspirational.author: Arthur Helps
inspirational.text: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.

inspirational.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
inspirational.text: Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over.

inspirational.author: Robert H. Schuller
inspirational.text: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?

inspirational.author: Richard Bach
inspirational.text: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.

inspirational.author: Augustus Hare
inspirational.text: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.

inspirational.author: Dale Carnegie
inspirational.text: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.

inspirational.author: William Blake
inspirational.text: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.

inspirational.author: Michelangelo
inspirational.text: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.

inspirational.author: Thomas Merton
inspirational.text: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.

inspirational.author: Arthur Ashe
inspirational.text: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.

inspirational.author: Khalil Gibran
inspirational.text: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.

inspirational.author: John Wooden
inspirational.text: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.

inspirational.author: Isaac Asimov
inspirational.text: And above all things, never think that you're not good enough yourself. A man should never think that. My belief is that in life people will take you at your own reckoning.

inspirational.author: Benjamin Disraeli
inspirational.text: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.

inspirational.author: Leo Buscaglia
inspirational.text: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.

inspirational.author: Nicolaus Copernicus
inspirational.text: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.

inspirational.author: Ella Baker
inspirational.text: Give light and people will find the way.

inspirational.author: Wilma Rudolph
inspirational.text: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.

inspirational.author: Andre Gide
inspirational.text: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.

inspirational.author: Sylvester Stallone
inspirational.text: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.

inspirational.author: Pablo Neruda

inspirational.text: Look at a football field. It looks like a big movie screen. This is theatre. Football combines the strategy of chess. It's part ballet. It's part battleground, part playground. inspirational.text: Apart from being motivation for themselves, I think big givers should also talk about their philanthropy so that their work and their success stories prove inspirational enough for many others to follow.

You have to be inspired. That's what I do. I inspire people, I inspire the public, I inspire my staff. I inspired the organizations I took over to want to succeed.

inspirational.author: Donnie Yen
inspirational.text: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.

inspirational.text: To me, the Seventies were very inspirational and very influential... With my whole persona as Snoop Dogg, as a person, as a rapper. inspirational.text: The upper middle class here still has options for entertainment. We have Internet, Hollywood and books. But for the majority and the masses, there is only TV. A lot of them sit at home and watch TV as they can't afford other forms of entertainment. So, we try to do shows which have inspirational value.

inspirational.author: Kat Timpf
inspirational.text: To be an Instagram model, you absolutely cannot just post pictures of yourself in a bikini for the sake of people seeing you in a bikini - even if that is exactly what you are doing. No, you need to caption these photos with an inspirational quote so that people will know that you are not just a butt, you're a gosh dang philosopher.

inspirational.author: Molly Ivins
inspirational.text: 'Get along, go along' is not an inspirational philosophy, and only God knows how much moral cowardice it has covered up over the years. Serve your time, collect your chits, and cash 'em in for your home state? No, I'd say we could ask for more than that from our senators.

inspirational.author: Shawn Mendes
inspirational.text: It was incredible being on tour with Taylor Swift: she was the epitome of a professional, and she works so hard. For someone as successful as her to work that hard every night - truly inspirational.
