inspirational.text: Northeastern folk music influenced me from a very young age. Sachin Dev Burman is one of the inspirational musicians in Indian film music. The way he fused folk music with his signature style is amazing. So, I am aware of the beauty of northeast folk music.

inspirational.author: Max Martin
inspirational.text: It's music. It's supposed to be fun and inspirational. You have to be inspired. If I did it because it was my 'job,' and I only did it to make money, I don't think I'd still be doing it.

inspirational.author: George Lucas
inspirational.text: 'Star Wars' is fun, its exciting, its inspirational, and people respond to that. It's what they want.

inspirational.author: John Cooper Clarke
inspirational.text: If you want to know why the coast is such an inspirational place, ask Herman Melville, Jack London, Nordhoff and Hall, Robert Louis Stevenson or Joseph Conrad. It's a glimpse of eternity. It invites rumination, the relentless whisper of the tide against the shore.

inspirational.author: Matthew Williamson
inspirational.text: I am shocked and deeply saddened by McQueen's death. He was a genius, and his talent was second to none. Like many others, I always cited him as a hugely inspirational leader of world fashion. He will be greatly missed.

inspirational.author: Howie Long
inspirational.text: Lack of enthusiasm in the stands tends to be less inspirational on the field. It doesn't send the chills down your spine. It's not that magic moment that you dream about growing up.

inspirational.author: Josh Blue
inspirational.text: I have to deal with people in weird ways. I was walking down the street and this woman walks up to me and she goes, 'You know, I think it's so inspirational that you're out.' I was like, 'I'm on my way to the liquor store. Are you inspired?'

inspirational.author: Andi Dorfman
inspirational.text: I love people who Instagram story themselves running and they'll tag me or they'll send me a message and they'll be like, 'Wow this is so motivational and so inspirational.'

inspirational.author: Lights
inspirational.text: You can't go with the intention of writing something inspirational. You just have to go with the right heart.

inspirational.author: Tony Evans
inspirational.text: Far too often, we have limited the definition of the Church. While not in all cases, in many cases, 'Church' has become an informational, inspirational weekly gathering rather than the group of people that God has ordained from Heaven to operate on his behalf on Earth in order to bring Heaven's viewpoint into history.

inspirational.author: Ban Ki-moon
inspirational.text: Like the United Nations, there is something inspirational about New York as a great melting pot of different cultures and traditions. And if this is the city that never sleeps, the United Nations works tirelessly, around the clock around the world.

inspirational.author: Kelli O'Hara
inspirational.text: It is such a luxury to open a new book that's highly recommended by friends - either an inspirational yet humorously self-deprecating memoir, or a page-turning piece of fiction.

inspirational.author: David Chipperfield
inspirational.text: If you look at a building by Mies van der Rohe, it might look very simple, but up close, the sheer quality of construction, materials and thought are inspirational.

inspirational.author: Jocelyn Bell Burnell
inspirational.text: I may not have got the Nobel Prize, but I've won countless other awards, including 'Most Inspirational Living Woman Scientist.'

inspirational.author: Stephen Colbert
inspirational.text: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?

inspirational.author: Marianne Vos
inspirational.text: I want to be motivational and inspirational for everybody: my big aim is more women on bicycles.

inspirational.author: John Caudwell
inspirational.text: Business gives you a massive high. Doing a great deal, coming up with an inspirational solution... It's very addictive. But it doesn't last long. In isolation, it's a bit sterile. It doesn't reward the soul.

inspirational.author: Candice Swanepoel
inspirational.text: I'd like to one day be featured on a list of inspirational people who have made a difference in the world, whether it be helping underprivileged people or putting an end to the poaching of wildlife in Africa.

inspirational.author: Montel Vontavious Porter
inspirational.text: I know that my life story is an inspirational one and one that can, hopefully, help others achieve goals in their own lives.

inspirational.author: Lydia Lunch
inspirational.text: If someone says 'grunge' or 'punk,' you know what the sound is, but if you say 'No Wave,' it's kind of mysterious. That was the most interesting part and should have been the most inspirational thing about it... here's this collective sonic insanity, and none of it sounds anything alike.

inspirational.author: Colin Morgan
inspirational.text: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.

inspirational.author: David L. Wolper
inspirational.text: My initial goal for the 1984 opening ceremonies was a show that would be majestic, inspirational, and emotional - a 20 goosebump experience.

inspirational.author: David Cameron
inspirational.text: Half a century ago, the amazing courage of Rosa Parks, the visionary leadership of Martin Luther King, and the inspirational actions of the civil rights movement led politicians to write equality into the law and make real the promise of America for all her citizens.

inspirational.author: Alexander McQueen
inspirational.text: Rap music's been around for too long now to be inspirational. The words are, but the music isn't.

inspirational.author: Adriana Trigiani
inspirational.text: You never know when some small thing will lead to a big idea. Travel is very inspirational - but it's in the ordinary that I find my themes of love and work and family.

inspirational.author: Damien Rice
inspirational.text: Inside, I've got a real purist desire and dream about the music. I like the idea of being able to carve out a kind of magical, colourful, artistic, inspirational life. And the reality just turns out to be quite different, working with the business to bring this thing you have created into the world.

inspirational.author: Chris Bosh
inspirational.text: I do kind of marvel at my journey. But at the same time, I look back at a lot of the steps, and maybe not every step, but a lot of the steps, and since I was 12 or 13, I look at the people who helped me and the moments that were inspirational to me, and you can recall what my mindset and what my make-up was at that time to try and be the best.

inspirational.author: Lee Pearson

inspirational.text: We're in a situation where talented, motivated school leavers and graduates can send off a hundred CVs and not get a reply, and where a trip to the Job Centre is depressing rather than inspirational. And you know what, that just feels wrong.

inspirational.author: Petra Collins
inspirational.text: We work to create a new wave of feminism that is more inclusive. I want others to feel equal. It's so great to see women in positions of power, which is why other artists, such as Marilyn Minter, are so inspirational to me.

inspirational.author: Andrew Lincoln
inspirational.text: When I see a friend play Hamlet or see an inspirational performance, I absolutely get excited by the idea of changing things up.

inspirational.author: Linda Johnson Rice
inspirational.text: 'Ebony' is very inspirational and aspirational to its readers.

inspirational.author: Ashley Graham
inspirational.text: I think women think I'm inspirational because I'm unapologetic. I have cellulite. I have back fat. I've got a thick stomach. But I work my body like I don't because I don't know any other body. I don't know how to feel thin. I just know how to feel like Ashley.

inspirational.author: Hannah John-Kamen
inspirational.text: I think it's great that you have inspirational female roles, that it's not just the pretty girl on the arm of a man.

inspirational.author: Mack Wilberg
inspirational.text: The MTC is known for singing music by great master composers, hymns, American music, Broadway numbers, popular songs, and inspirational music. If the audience doesn't like one genre, they need only wait for the next number.

inspirational.author: Jazz Jennings
inspirational.text: A lot of straight and transgender boys get in touch with me through my website and social media. They tell me I'm inspirational and beautiful. It boosts my self-esteem.

inspirational.author: Tim Matheson
inspirational.text: In my experience, I have learned that there is rarely the perfect man for the perfect job, but Reagan was born to play the role of president. He was an inspirational leader when the country really needed it.

inspirational.author: Syd
inspirational.text: I don't really watch too many movies, but I try to watch inspirational pieces about other musicians. Musical documentaries truly inspire me.

inspirational.author: Jennifer Hyman
inspirational.text: As women and men, we're not primed and taught to feel that women are as inspirational as men.

inspirational.author: Jennifer Hyman
inspirational.text: We learn about MLK's 'I Have a Dream' speech. Take that same speech and put it in the voice of a woman. Would it be as inspirational? Would it have as much gravitas to it?

inspirational.author: Rachel Hollis
inspirational.text: For years, I've worn my dainty gold bracelets with inspirational sayings and encouraging one-liners to motivate me in my career. I liked to look down at my wrist and be reminded of my goals.

inspirational.author: Lizz Wright
inspirational.text: My father was very strict, a very militant parent, because he wanted us to be very focused kids. He sold the televisions, so we didn't watch TV. And he didn't want any music playing that wasn't gospel or inspirational music. In fact, he didn't even like a lot of gospel because he thought it was too bluesy.

inspirational.author: Max Joseph
inspirational.text: I often wonder if I should adopt a cause to call my own or start tweeting inspirational messages. And when tragedy strikes and the world takes to social media, is it now my responsibility to respond with #RIPs and #prayfors?

inspirational.author: Hari Nef
inspirational.text: I used to think I was a gay man with this idea of a muse in my head, like a woman that I thought was inspirational or aspirational. But the woman was actually me.

inspirational.author: Juan Mata
inspirational.text: In Spain, they show many Premier League games on TV, and it is an inspirational league. Maybe I would like to play in the Premier League.

inspirational.author: Mario Gotze
inspirational.text: Peter Stoger is very, very inspirational, communicating a lot, being open and approachable for the players.

inspirational.author: Karthi
inspirational.text: A film like 'Dangal' is universal; though it narrates a story that happened in Punjab/Haryana, we like its inspirational story and its idea of celebrating the girl child.

inspirational.author: Tessa Blanchard
inspirational.text: Honestly, the All In women's locker room was such an inspirational group of women. What I love about all the women involved - Chelsea, Britt, Madison, Jordynne Grace, Brandi Rhodes, Tenille Dashwood, Penelope Ford, Mandy Leon - is we all bring something so different to the table for a common vision.

inspirational.author: Sara Davies
inspirational.text: We work very closely with HSN's buying team, to ensure that our products and demonstrations are as exciting, educational and as inspirational as possible.

inspirational.author: Max Boot
inspirational.text: My allegiance to the GOP was cemented during the 1980s, when I was in high school and college and Ronald Reagan was in the White House. For me, Reagan was what John F. Kennedy had been to an earlier generation: an inspirational figure who shaped my worldview.

inspirational.author: Anne Murray
inspirational.text: Late in my career, I was asked to do an inspirational record and a duets album and I didn't want to do either.

inspirational.author: Shangela
inspirational.text: Seeing RuPaul go out there and not only create music, but TV and film roles, and continue to go down so many creative avenues - that is inspirational. For a person of color like myself, I see RuPaul and I say, 'Oh, honey, I can do it too.'

inspirational.author: Kyle Carpenter
inspirational.text: As far as me being inspirational to other combat-wounded guys, I would say that it's the opposite. To see guys at Walter Reed that I recovered with every day and they were missing every single one of their limbs - that is what I would say is inspiring.

inspirational.author: James Haven
inspirational.text: Anytime you have the opportunity to do any kind of story that is based on a true story, I think those are the most inspirational.

inspirational.author: John Torode
inspirational.text: MasterChef's' about real people and for real people. It's aspirational and inspirational. There's nothing snobbish about it.

inspirational.author: Sudha Kongara
inspirational.text: Our country is one of the youngest in the world. Our youngsters need to be told inspirational stories.

inspirational.author: Ann Reinking
inspirational.text: It was sad to leave 'Pippin' because it was a kind of inspirational turning point in my life. But it was time to move on.

inspirational.author: Justin Kan
inspirational.text: Inspirational content really resonates, like how to raise venture capital.

inspirational.author: Justin Kan
inspirational.text: People like the feeling of access that is very raw, unedited, and inspirational.

inspirational.author: Monty Williams
inspirational.text: Craig Sager's amazing attitude was truly inspirational. He was a champion during his battle, fighting every day with grace and humor.

inspirational.author: Kirk Franklin
inspirational.text: The core of what we do is the Gospel of Jesus Christ, and my music is a reflection of the Gospel of Jesus Christ. It's not as much inspirational as it is spreading the Gospel.

inspirational.author: Jared Isaacman
inspirational.text: In fact, Mario Parisi and my father are probably the two most inspirational figures when it comes to my growth as a company leader.

inspirational.author: Brendan Hunt
inspirational.text: If we get out there trying to be inspirational, then we probably won't be.

inspirational.author: Cynthia Germanotta
inspirational.text: I always start my day with two things that really ground me. One is a book of daily inspirational readings called 'The Book of Awakening.' Basically, it talks about having the life you want and being present in the life you have. I also write three things I'm grateful for in a gratitude journal.

inspirational.author: Deon Cole
inspirational.text: I just like being able to voice my opinion. That's all comedy is. Comedy is just a different perspective. Perspective of what you think opposed to what other people think. I try to uphold it and make it educational as well as inspirational, as well as funny. All around, I think it's very important.

life.author: George Bernard Shaw
life.text: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

life.author: Buddha
life.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

life.author: Confucius
life.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

life.author: Dalai Lama
life.text: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.

life.author: Marie Curie
life.text: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.

life.author: Cesare Pavese
life.text: We do not remember days, we remember moments.

life.author: Lao Tzu
life.text: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.

life.author: Eminem
life.text: The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.

life.author: Elon Musk
life.text: Life is too short for long-term grudges.

life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
life.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

life.author: William Morris
life.text: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.

life.author: John Lennon
life.text: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.

life.author: Sai Baba
life.text: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.

life.author: Rabindranath Tagore
life.text: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.

life.author: Mark Twain
life.text: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.

life.author: William James
life.text: The greatest use of a life is to spend it on something that will outlast it.

life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
life.text: It is not length of life, but depth of life.

life.author: Henry David Thoreau
life.text: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.

life.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
life.text: Into each life some rain must fall.

life.author: Robert Byrne
life.text: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.

life.author: William Wallace
life.text: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.

life.author: Sholom Aleichem
life.text: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.

life.author: Hans Christian Andersen
life.text: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.

life.author: Audrey Hepburn
life.text: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.

life.author: Bertrand Russell
life.text: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.

life.author: Eric Butterworth
life.text: Don't go through life, grow through life.

life.author: Edmund Burke
life.text: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.

life.author: Erma Bombeck
life.text: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me'.

life.author: Harvey Fierstein
life.text: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.

life.author: E. M. Forster
life.text: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.

life.author: Walter Hagen
life.text: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.

life.author: Charles Darwin
life.text: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.

life.author: Henri Frederic Amiel
life.text: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.

life.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
life.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.

life.author: Socrates
life.text: Beware the barrenness of a busy life.

life.author: Max de Pree
life.text: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.

life.author: Jackie Robinson
life.text: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.

life.author: George Washington Carver
life.text: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.

life.author: Scott Hamilton
life.text: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.

life.author: Ernest Holmes
life.text: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.

life.author: John Henry Newman
life.text: Growth is the only evidence of life.

life.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
life.text: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'

life.author: William J. Clinton
life.text: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.

life.author: Josh Billings
life.text: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.

life.author: Rose Kennedy
life.text: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.

life.author: Paul Cezanne
life.text: We live in a rainbow of chaos.

life.author: James M. Barrie
life.text: Life is a long lesson in humility.

life.author: George Eliot
life.text: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?

life.author: Leonardo da Vinci
life.text: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.

life.author: Lou Holtz
life.text: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.

life.author: Jonathan Sacks
life.text: Make space in your life for the things that matter, for family and friends, love and generosity, fun and joy. Without this, you will burn out in mid-career and wonder where your life went.

life.author: Will Smith
life.text: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.

life.author: Philip Green
life.text: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.

life.author: Zhuangzi
life.text: Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.

life.author: Napoleon Hill
life.text: It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.

life.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
life.text: It's only when we truly know and understand that we have a limited time on earth - and that we have no way of knowing when our time is up, we will then begin to live each day to the fullest, as if it was the only one we had.

life.author: Havelock Ellis
life.text: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.

life.author: Charlie Chaplin
life.text: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.

life.author: Arthur Rubinstein
life.text: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.

life.author: George Gershwin
life.text: Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.

life.author: Woody Allen
life.text: Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon.

life.author: Virginia Woolf
life.text: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.

life.author: Mary Oliver
life.text: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal; to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it; and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.

life.author: Kallam Anji Reddy
life.text: Everyone has a purpose in life and a unique talent to give to others. And when we blend this unique talent with service to others, we experience the ecstasy and exultation of own spirit, which is the ultimate goal of all goals.

life.author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum
life.text: My theory on life is that life is beautiful. Life doesn't change. You have a day, and a night, and a month, and a year. We people change - we can be miserable or we can be happy. It's what you make of your life.

life.author: Joan of Arc
life.text: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.

life.author: John Milton
life.text: Gratitude bestows reverence, allowing us to encounter everyday epiphanies, those transcendent moments of awe that change forever how we experience life and the world.

life.author: Big Boi
life.text: Life moves so fast. You gotta document the good times, man.

life.author: Dale Carnegie
life.text: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.

life.author: William Wordsworth
life.text: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.

life.author: Miguel de Cervantes
life.text: Too much sanity may be madness and the maddest of all, to see life as it is and not as it should be.

life.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
life.text: For me life is continuously being hungry. The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.

life.author: L. Ron Hubbard
life.text: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today and you make your tomorrow.

life.author: Brian Tracy
life.text: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of evry part of your life.

life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
life.text: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.

life.author: Joanna Krupa
life.text: No one is the same, and we all have different life experiences. It's not my place to judge them or for them to judge me. We should all be accountable for our own lives.

life.author: Anais Nin
life.text: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.

life.author: Charlie Kaufman
life.text: There's theater in life, obviously, and there's life in theater.

life.author: Joan Lunden
life.text: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.

life.author: Ron White
life.text: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.

life.author: Josephine de La Baume
life.text: You can really only enjoy life when you're extremely busy.

life.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
life.text: Life is God's novel. Let him write it.

life.author: Lee Radziwill
life.text: I believe that without memories there is no life, and that our memories should be of happy times.

life.author: Pope Francis
life.text: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right.

life.author: Madame de Stael
life.text: One must choose in life between boredom and suffering.

life.author: Stevie Wonder
life.text: Time is long but life is short.

life.author: David Russell
life.text: The hardest thing in life to learn is which bridge to cross and which to burn.

life.author: Kyle Massey
life.text: You never know where life is going to take you. So everything I do, I just take it one day at a time, and it always leads you to the right place.

life.author: Chief Seattle
life.text: Humankind has not woven the web of life. We are but one thread within it. Whatever we do to the web, we do to ourselves. All things are bound together. All things connect.

life.author: Tyler Cowen
life.text: Economics is everywhere, and understanding economics can help you make better decisions and lead a happier life.

life.author: Stephen Curry
life.text: It doesn't matter where you come from, what you have or don't have, what you lack, or what you have too much of. But all you need to have is faith in God, an undying passion for what you do and what you choose to do in this life, and a relentless drive and the will to do whatever it takes to be successful in whatever you put your mind to.

life.author: Persis Khambatta
life.text: I just have beautiful memories of what has happened in my life.

life.author: Samuel Smiles
life.text: The battle of life is, in most cases, fought uphill; and to win it without a struggle were perhaps to win it without honor. If there were no difficulties there would be no success; if there were nothing to struggle for, there would be nothing to be achieved.

life.author: E. B. White
life.text: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.

life.author: Viggo Mortensen
life.text: Life is short and the older you get, the more you feel it. Indeed, the shorter it is. People lose their capacity to walk, run, travel, think, and experience life. I realise how important it is to use the time I have.

life.author: Lawrence Welk
life.text: Over and over I marvel at the blessings of my life: Each year has grown better than the last.

life.author: Pope John Paul II
life.text: The great danger for family life, in the midst of any society whose idols are pleasure, comfort and independence, lies in the fact that people close their hearts and become selfish.

life.author: John Key
life.text: You get out of life what you put into it. I think you need a bit of luck but you also make a bit of luck. I think that if you're a pretty decent person you'll get back what you put in.

life.author: Linda Thompson
life.text: Our uniqueness, our individuality, and our life experience molds us into fascinating beings. I hope we can embrace that. I pray we may all challenge ourselves to delve into the deepest resources of our hearts to cultivate an atmosphere of understanding, acceptance, tolerance, and compassion. We are all in this life together.

life.author: Karl Ove Knausgard
life.text: When I look back at that freedom of childhood, which is in a way infinite, and at all the joy and the intense happiness, now lost, I sometimes think that childhood is where the real meaning of life is located, and that we, adults, are its servants - that that's our purpose.

life.author: Ernest Hemingway
life.text: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

life.author: Emily Atack
life.text: Everyone is comparing lives on social media and wants the perfect body, perfect image, perfect outfit, perfect life - we're striving for this perfection, and it's so unhealthy because there's no such thing as perfection.

life.author: Gilda Radner
life.text: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.

life.author: Dick Gregory
life.text: People with high blood pressure, diabetes - those are conditions brought about by life style. If you change the life style, those conditions will leave.

life.author: Martin Buber
life.text: There are three principles in a man's being and life, the principle of thought, the principle of speech, and the principle of action. The origin of all conflict between me and my fellow-men is that I do not say what I mean and I don't do what I say.

life.author: Joseph Addison
life.text: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.

life.author: Jack London
life.text: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.

life.author: Miley Cyrus
life.text: Life is all about having a good time.

life.author: Pitbull
life.text: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.

life.author: Viktor E. Frankl
life.text: Everyone has his own specific vocation or mission in life; everyone must carry out a concrete assignment that demands fulfillment. Therein he cannot be replaced, nor can his life be repeated, thus, everyone's task is unique as his specific opportunity to implement it.

life.author: John Burroughs
life.text: It is the life of the crystal, the architect of the flake, the fire of the frost, the soul of the sunbeam. This crisp winter air is full of it.

life.author: Russell M. Nelson
life.text: The only way to take sorrow out of death is to take love out of life.

life.author: Keanu Reeves
life.text: Money doesn't mean anything to me. I've made a lot of money, but I want to enjoy life and not stress myself building my bank account. I give lots away and live simply, mostly out of a suitcase in hotels. We all know that good health is much more important.

life.author: Lionel Messi
life.text: I always thought I wanted to play professionally, and I always knew that to do that I'd have to make a lot of sacrifices. I made sacrifices by leaving Argentina, leaving my family to start a new life. I changed my friends, my people. Everything. But everything I did, I did for football, to achieve my dream.

life.author: Sigmund Freud
life.text: The goal of all life is death.

life.author: Ronald Reagan
life.text: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.

life.author: L. Lionel Kendrick
life.text: Life is not always easy to live, but the opportunity to do so is a blessing beyond comprehension. In the process of living, we will face struggles, many of which will cause us to suffer and to experience pain.

life.author: Louis Armstrong
life.text: Music is life itself. What would this world be without good music? No matter what kind it is.

life.author: Dan Pena
life.text: Life without dreams is like a bird with a broken wing - it can't fly.

life.author: Coolio
life.text: Life is too short to not have fun; we are only here for a short time compared to the sun and the moon and all that.

life.author: John Walters
life.text: Life is short, so enjoy it to the fullest.

life.author: Jack Canfield
life.text: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them. They stay focused on their past successes rather than their past failures, and on the next action steps they need to take to get them closer to the fulfillment of their goals rather than all the other distractions that life presents to them.

life.author: Clint Eastwood
life.text: What you put into life is what you get out of it.

life.author: Alexander Volkov
life.text: Your journey never ends. Life has a way of changing things in incredible ways.

life.author: Ilaiyaraaja
life.text: Life is not what you expect: it is made up of the most unexpected twists and turns.

life.author: Sonali Bendre
life.text: Life goes on, and one should look ahead and not backward.

life.author: Dizzee Rascal
life.text: Life is hard enough. Life is always going to be hard, so you need to push for what you want.

life.author: Abraham Lincoln
life.text: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.

life.author: Brian Greene
life.text: Science is a way of life. Science is a perspective. Science is the process that takes us from confusion to understanding in a manner that's precise, predictive and reliable - a transformation, for those lucky enough to experience it, that is empowering and emotional.

life.author: Katherine Jenkins
life.text: Children should be able to live a life free from bullying and harassment and it is time that we all took a stand against this.

life.author: John C. Maxwell
life.text: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.

life.author: Michel de Montaigne
life.text: My life has been full of terrible misfortunes most of which never happened.

life.author: Future
life.text: You got one life to live. So I'm living it the way I want to live it.

life.author: Mahira Khan
life.text: No matter how tough my life was, I was always looking up at the sky and wishing for good things.

life.author: Barack Obama
life.text: Focusing your life solely on making a buck shows a certain poverty of ambition. It asks too little of yourself. Because it's only when you hitch your wagon to something larger than yourself that you realize your true potential.

life.author: Robert Kiyosaki
life.text: If you're going to be a winner in life, you have to constantly go beyond your best.

life.author: Lauren Ash
life.text: At the end of the day, life is too short to worry.

life.author: Charles M. Schulz
life.text: Life is like a ten speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.

life.author: Thomas Hobbes
life.text: The right of nature... is the liberty each man hath to use his own power, as he will himself, for the preservation of his own nature; that is to say, of his own life.

life.author: Keith Thurman
life.text: I just enjoy life in a way where I like being my own person.

life.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne
life.text: From too much love of living, From hope and fear set free, We thank with brief thanksgiving Whatever gods may be That no life lives for ever; That dead men rise up never; That even the weariest river Winds somewhere safe to sea.

life.author: Gregory Peck
life.text: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.

life.author: Jennifer Aniston
life.text: There are no regrets in life, just lessons.

life.author: Floor Jansen
life.text: It's good to reflect on life and take a step back and sit and relax and do something else.

life.author: W. E. B. Du Bois
life.text: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life.

life.author: Muhammad Iqbal
life.text: Rise above sectional interests and private ambitions... Pass from matter to spirit. Matter is diversity; spirit is light, life and unity.

life.author: Martha Beck
life.text: Life is full of tough decisions, and nothing makes them easy. But the worst ones are really your personal koans, and tormenting ambivalence is just the sense of satori rising. Try, trust, try, and trust again, and eventually you'll feel your mind change its focus to a new level of understanding.

life.author: Justine Skye
life.text: Life is too short to be scared and not take risks. I'd rather be the person that's like, 'I messed up,' than, 'I wish I did that.'

life.author: Barbara Bush
life.text: At the end of your life, you will never regret not having passed one more test, not winning one more verdict or not closing one more deal. You will regret time not spent with a husband, a friend, a child, or a parent.

life.author: Betty White
life.text: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.

life.author: Heart Evangelista
life.text: Life is really not easy, we all have our personal battles, but it is important that you really treasure yourself, love yourself and have a sense of self-worth.

life.author: Aphra Behn
life.text: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.

life.author: Eric Nam
life.text: No matter what job or industry you're in, life is hard, but we're all going through a difficult time and the best thing we can do is pick each other up and move on together.

life.author: John Daly
life.text: In life, you have got to make the best of every situation; you have to keep going.

life.author: A. R. Rahman
life.text: Success comes to those who dedicate everything to their passion in life. To be successful, it is also very important to be humble and never let fame or money travel to your head.

life.author: Hugh Mackay
life.text: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.

life.author: Kurt Vonnegut
life.text: The arts are not a way to make a living. They are a very human way of making life more bearable. Practicing an art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow, for heaven's sake.

life.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
life.text: Even with all our technology and the inventions that make modern life so much easier than it once was, it takes just one big natural disaster to wipe all that away and remind us that, here on Earth, we're still at the mercy of nature.

life.author: John Morrison
life.text: Life is a pretty awesome ride.

life.author: Dan Gable
life.text: Once you've wrestled, everything else in life is easy.

life.author: Erik Erikson
life.text: Healthy children will not fear life if their elders have integrity enough not to fear death.

life.author: Cynthia Bailey
life.text: In life, it is important to not be afraid to put yourself out there, win or lose. It is all about the spirit of challenging yourself to be open to realizing your highest potential.

life.author: Jose Andres
life.text: I've been a cook all my life, but I am still learning to be a good chef. I'm always learning new techniques and improving beyond my own knowledge because there is always something new to learn and new horizons to discover.

life.author: Paul Walker
life.text: I don't care what it is in life: listen to your heart. If you do, no matter what, you win.

life.author: Morris West
life.text: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.

life.author: Rumi
life.text: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.

life.author: Gretchen Rubin
life.text: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.

life.author: Wayne Static
life.text: Nothing in life is free, you always pay in the end.

life.author: Huda Kattan
life.text: The minute you decide to do what you love to do, you have made a life plan for yourself and a career choice.

life.author: Teri Garr
life.text: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life.

life.author: Lil Yachty
life.text: I am happy every day, because life is moving in a very positive way.

life.author: Erich Fromm
life.text: Man's main task in life is to give birth to himself, to become what he potentially is. The most important product of his effort is his own personality.

life.author: Rekha
life.text: The bottom line is to have fun and enjoy life.

life.author: Evel Knievel
life.text: I decided to fly through the air and live in the sunlight and enjoy life as much as I could.

life.author: Don Miguel Ruiz
life.text: Don't Make Assumptions. Find the courage to ask questions and to express what you really want. Communicate with others as clearly as you can to avoid misunderstandings, sadness and drama. With just this one agreement, you can completely transform your life.

life.author: Saquon Barkley
life.text: Sometimes in life, you have to make a selfish decision and do what's best for you.

life.author: Benjamin Disraeli
life.text: Life is too short to be little. Man is never so manly as when he feels deeply, acts boldly, and expresses himself with frankness and with fervor.

life.author: Tallulah Bankhead
life.text: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.

life.author: John Sculley
life.text: Timing in life is everything.

life.author: Hope Solo
life.text: I've been through a lot of things in my personal and family life. That turned me into a fighter. I always strive to be the best I possibly can.

life.author: Ariana Grande
life.text: Don't ever doubt yourselves or waste a second of your life. It's too short, and you're too special.

life.author: Clint Smith
life.text: The death penalty not only takes away the life of the person strapped to the table - it takes away a little bit of the humanity in each of us.

life.author: Jerry Yang
life.text: Without rain, there is no life.

life.author: Lucretius
life.text: Life is one long struggle in the dark.

life.author: William Arthur Ward
life.text: A well-developed sense of humor is the pole that adds balance to your steps as you walk the tightrope of life.

life.author: Aaron Rodgers
life.text: Authenticity is everything! You have to wake up every day and look in the mirror, and you want to be proud of the person who's looking back at you. And you can only do that if you're being honest with yourself and being a person of high character. You have an opportunity every single day to write that story of your life.

life.author: Karen Salmansohn
life.text: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.

life.author: Robert De Niro
life.text: You learned the two greatest thing in life, never rat on your friends, and always keep your mouth shut.

life.author: Elizabeth Kenny
life.text: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.

life.author: Jim Carrey
life.text: Life opens up opportunities to you, and you either take them or you stay afraid of taking them.

life.author: Banksy
life.text: I don't know why people are so keen to put the details of their private life in public; they forget that invisibility is a superpower.

life.author: Alan Cohen
life.text: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.

life.author: Pedro Almodovar
life.text: Cinema can fill in the empty spaces of your life and your loneliness.

life.author: Tennessee Williams
life.text: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.

life.author: Shakuntala Devi
life.text: Education is not just about going to school and getting a degree. It's about widening your knowledge and absorbing the truth about life.

life.author: Julius Caesar
life.text: It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life.

life.author: Kelly Rowland
life.text: We all have different things that we go through in our everyday life, and it's really important to know just at the end of the day, it doesn't matter what you face, you know, that you're going to win at the end of the day. You got to believe in yourself. You got to believe in God, know that He's going to get you through it.

life.author: Lana
life.text: Life is not always going to be roses and rainbows. You are going to have uncomfortable moments. It's what we do with those moments that is going to count and determine our destiny.

life.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca
life.text: What is life? A madness. What is life? An illusion, a shadow, a story. And the greatest good is little enough; for all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.

life.author: Herschel Walker
life.text: I just think I'm blessed. I love the Lord Jesus Christ. I have a great grandmother that passed away at 104 and two grandparents that passed away at 97 and 95, and they never worried about protein. They just enjoyed life, and that's what I'm doing.

life.author: Desmond Tutu
life.text: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.

life.author: Hilaire Belloc
life.text: Loss and possession, death and life are one, There falls no shadow where there shines no sun.

life.author: Ziggy Marley
life.text: My dream is to live a good life and be loving, be close to God and be a good human being and bring peace to people.

life.author: Pilou Asbaek
life.text: Life is not black and white; there is some gray nuance to it.

life.author: Gary Allan
life.text: Life ain't always beautiful, but it's a beautiful ride.

life.author: Cara Delevingne
life.text: When you have balance in your life, work becomes an entirely different experience. There is a passion that moves you to a whole new level of fulfillment and gratitude, and that's when you can do your best... for yourself and for others.

life.author: Unknown
life.text: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.

life.author: Nathan Chen
life.text: Never give up. There are always tough times, regardless of what you do in anything in life. Be able to push through those times and maintain your ultimate goal.

life.author: Dwayne Johnson
life.text: Life is anything but predictable.

life.author: Tom Robbins
life.text: Our greatest human adventure is the evolution of consciousness. We are in this life to enlarge the soul, liberate the spirit, and light up the brain.

life.author: Nikki Giovanni
life.text: Mistakes are a fact of life. It is the response to the error that counts.

life.author: James Cromwell
life.text: Pets are humanizing. They remind us we have an obligation and responsibility to preserve and nurture and care for all life.

life.author: Martin Heidegger
life.text: If I take death into my life, acknowledge it, and face it squarely, I will free myself from the anxiety of death and the pettiness of life - and only then will I be free to become myself.

life.author: Drew Barrymore
life.text: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.

life.author: Tim Cook
life.text: Life is fragile. We're not guaranteed a tomorrow so give it everything you've got.

life.author: Walter Bagehot
life.text: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.

life.author: Frank Lowy
life.text: Life has its ups and downs, but you can only look forward.

life.author: Baz Luhrmann
life.text: A life lived in fear is a life half lived.

life.author: Butch Hartman
life.text: Life is full of challenges, but I always have the Three Ps: Passion, patience and persistence. And the fourth one is pizza.

life.author: RuPaul
life.text: The whole point is to live life and be - to use all the colors in the crayon box.

life.author: Arnold H. Glasow
life.text: In life, as in football, you won't go far unless you know where the goalposts are.

life.author: Iain Duncan Smith
life.text: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.

life.author: Geoffrey Rush
life.text: I always had a fantasy of being a chef, because I like kitchen life.

life.author: Charles Kettering
life.text: My interest is in the future because I am going to spend the rest of my life there.

life.author: Michael Johnson
life.text: Life is often compared to a marathon, but I think it is more like being a sprinter; long stretches of hard work punctuated by brief moments in which we are given the opportunity to perform at our best.

life.author: Peter A. Levine
life.text: Trauma is a fact of life. It does not, however, have to be a life sentence.

life.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
life.text: Life is the childhood of our immortality.

life.author: Malcolm Muggeridge
life.text: Every happening, great and small, is a parable whereby God speaks to us, and the art of life is to get the message.

life.author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
life.text: I don't think about art when I'm working. I try to think about life.

life.author: Pythagoras
life.text: Friends are as companions on a journey, who ought to aid each other to persevere in the road to a happier life.

life.author: B. R. Ambedkar
life.text: Life should be great rather than long.

life.author: Watkin Tudor Jones
life.text: The only real things in life is the unexpected things. Everything else is just an illusion.

life.author: Ken Shamrock
life.text: Don't let people make you afraid of taking chances in life. And if you fail, it's no big deal. Get back up and fight through it and be successful again. If you did it once, you can do it again.

life.author: Anderson Silva
life.text: Life is about how much you can take and keep fighting, how much you can suffer and keep moving forward.

life.author: Diane Sawyer
life.text: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.

life.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder
life.text: It is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all.

life.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
life.text: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.

life.author: Hippocrates
life.text: The life so short, the craft so long to learn.

life.author: Christopher Miller
life.text: Low expectations is the key to happiness in life.

life.author: Suga
life.text: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.

life.author: Edith Head
life.text: You can have anything you want in life if you dress for it.

life.author: Samuel Johnson
life.text: When a man is tired of London, he is tired of life; for there is in London all that life can afford.

life.author: Edwin Markham
life.text: To throw oneself to the side of the oppressed is the only dignified thing to do in life.

life.author: Francois Hougaard
life.text: It's never nice to lose someone close to you; unfortunately, life goes on, and we have to make peace with it and move on.

life.author: Julia Child
life.text: Drama is very important in life: You have to come on with a bang. You never want to go out with a whimper. Everything can have drama if it's done right. Even a pancake.

life.author: Marilu Henner
life.text: Being in control of your life and having realistic expectations about your day-to-day challenges are the keys to stress management, which is perhaps the most important ingredient to living a happy, healthy and rewarding life.

life.author: Jack Nicholson
life.text: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend.

life.author: Ella Woodward
life.text: When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.

life.author: Warren Buffett
life.text: You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don't do too many things wrong.

life.author: Jeanne Calment
life.text: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.

life.author: Jimmy Snuka
life.text: I've been a bad boy trying to be a good man my whole life.

life.author: Shikhar Dhawan
life.text: I am always looking forward to learn new things in my life.

life.author: David Lammy
life.text: A good life depends on the strength of our relationships with family, friends, neighbours, colleagues and strangers.

life.author: Kim Zolciak-Biermann
life.text: My motto in life has always been 'Everything happens for a reason.' No matter what, good or bad, there is a reason for it all.

life.author: Shakira
life.text: You can't achieve anything in life without a small amount of sacrifice.

life.author: Louis Tomlinson
life.text: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!

life.author: Dorothea Lange
life.text: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.

life.author: Virat Kohli
life.text: The bat is not a toy, it's a weapon. It gives me everything in life, which helps me to do everything on the field.

life.author: Albert Bandura
life.text: In order to succeed, people need a sense of self-efficacy, to struggle together with resilience to meet the inevitable obstacles and inequities of life.

life.author: Tracy McMillan
life.text: Caring - about people, about things, about life - is an act of maturity.

life.author: R. D. Laing
life.text: Life is a sexually transmitted disease and the mortality rate is one hundred percent.

life.author: Deepak Chopra
life.text: The way you think, the way you behave, the way you eat, can influence your life by 30 to 50 years.

life.author: Ace Frehley
life.text: My life has been a roller coaster ride, but somehow I've always been able to land on my feet and still play the guitar.

life.author: Jeff Bezos
life.text: Life's too short to hang out with people who aren't resourceful.

life.author: Angelina Jolie
life.text: Without pain, there would be no suffering, without suffering we would never learn from our mistakes. To make it right, pain and suffering is the key to all windows, without it, there is no way of life.

life.author: Princess Diana
life.text: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society. It is a goal and an essential part of my life - a kind of destiny. Whoever is in distress can call on me. I will come running wherever they are.

life.author: Danny Kaye
life.text: Life is a great big canvas; throw all the paint you can at it.

life.author: Chanakya
life.text: It is better to die than to preserve this life by incurring disgrace. The loss of life causes but a moment's grief, but disgrace brings grief every day of one's life.

life.author: Terry Pratchett
life.text: Build a man a fire, and he'll be warm for a day. Set a man on fire, and he'll be warm for the rest of his life.

life.author: Richard M. DeVos
life.text: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.

life.author: Shriya Saran
life.text: I am a very simple person in real life and I enjoy what I do.

life.author: Paracelsus
life.text: Medicine is not only a science; it is also an art. It does not consist of compounding pills and plasters; it deals with the very processes of life, which must be understood before they may be guided.

life.author: Anatole France
life.text: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.

life.author: Arthur Ashe
life.text: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.

life.author: Dante Alighieri
life.text: In the middle of the journey of our life I came to myself within a dark wood where the straight way was lost.

life.author: Rainer Maria Rilke
life.text: If your daily life seems poor, do not blame it; blame yourself that you are not poet enough to call forth its riches; for the Creator, there is no poverty.

life.author: Reba McEntire
life.text: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.

life.author: Kim Kardashian
life.text: At the end of the day, life is about being happy being who you are, and I feel like we are so blessed to have the support system and the best family to really just support each other no matter what we're going through.

life.author: D. H. Lawrence
life.text: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.

life.author: Amy Winehouse
life.text: Life's short. Anything could happen, and it usually does, so there is no point in sitting around thinking about all the ifs, ands and buts.

life.author: Michael Lee-Chin
life.text: Life is not linear; you have ups and downs. It's how you deal with the troughs that defines you.

life.author: Sophocles
life.text: One word frees us of all the weight and pain in life. That word is love.

life.author: Orhan Pamuk
life.text: Life is short, and we should respect every moment of it.

life.author: Sylvester Stallone
life.text: When life hits you pretty hard, you can go into a dark corner.

life.author: Anne Wilson Schaef
life.text: I realize that humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.

life.author: Wade Boggs
life.text: Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but how we react to what happens, not by what life brings us but the attitude we bring to life.

life.author: Tess Daly
life.text: Life is a mirror and you get back what you give out.

life.author: Hugh Hefner
life.text: Life is too short to be living somebody else's dream.

life.author: Darcey Bussell
life.text: Life is short, so go for things you enjoy.

life.author: Leonardo DiCaprio
life.text: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.

life.author: Kelly McGillis
life.text: Life is a journey and it's about growing and changing and coming to terms with who and what you are and loving who and what you are.

life.author: Matthew McConaughey
life.text: Life is a series of commas, not periods.

life.author: Emile Zola
life.text: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.

life.author: Phillips Brooks
life.text: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.

life.author: John Stuart Mill
life.text: Life has a certain flavor for those who have fought and risked all that the sheltered and protected can never experience.

life.author: Marcus Aurelius
life.text: The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane.

life.author: Nick Lampson
life.text: There is nothing nobler than risking your life for your country.

life.author: Aaron Carter
life.text: The main thing in life is not to be afraid of being human.

life.author: Henry David Thoreau
life.text: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.

life.author: Steve Jobs
life.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

life.author: Oscar Wilde
life.text: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.

life.author: Maya Angelou
life.text: Eating is so intimate. It's very sensual. When you invite someone to sit at your table and you want to cook for them, you're inviting a person into your life.

life.author: Mark Twain
life.text: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.

life.author: Albert Einstein
life.text: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.

life.author: Buddha
life.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.

life.author: Khalil Gibran
life.text: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.

life.author: William James
life.text: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.

life.author: Plato
life.text: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.

life.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
life.text: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life.

life.author: Henry David Thoreau
life.text: Our life is frittered away by detail... simplify, simplify.

life.author: Rabindranath Tagore
life.text: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.

life.author: Muhammad Ali
life.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.

life.author: Albert Schweitzer
life.text: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.

life.author: Aristotle
life.text: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.

life.author: Socrates
life.text: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.

life.author: Les Brown
life.text: You don't get what you want in life. You get who you are!

life.author: Anais Nin
life.text: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

life.author: Steve Jobs
life.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.

life.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
life.text: He only earns his freedom and his life Who takes them every day by storm.

life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
life.text: Without music, life would be a mistake.

life.author: Audrey Hepburn
life.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

life.author: Oscar Wilde
life.text: There are only two tragedies in life: one is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.

life.author: Joseph Campbell
life.text: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.

life.author: Voltaire
life.text: Life is thickly sown with thorns, and I know no other remedy than to pass quickly through them. The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.

life.author: Lord Byron
life.text: There are four questions of value in life, Don Octavio. What is sacred? Of what is the spirit made? What is worth living for and what is worth dying for? The answer to each is the same. Only love.

life.author: Maya Angelou
life.text: I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.

life.author: Paulo Coelho
life.text: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.

life.author: Confucius
life.text: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.

life.author: Wayne Dyer
life.text: The essential lesson I've learned in life is to just be yourself. Treasure the magnificent being that you are and recognize first and foremost you're not here as a human being only. You're a spiritual being having a human experience.

life.author: Helen Keller
life.text: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.

life.author: Bertrand Russell
life.text: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.

life.author: Eckhart Tolle
life.text: It is through gratitude for the present moment that the spiritual dimension of life opens up.

life.author: Vincent Van Gogh
life.text: The way to know life is to love many things.

life.author: Stephen Hawking
life.text: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.

life.author: Jordan Peterson
life.text: Adopt responsibility for your own well-being, try to put your family together, try to serve your community, try to seek for eternal truth... That's the sort of thing that can ground you in your life, enough so that you can withstand the difficulty of life.

life.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
life.text: Learn to get in touch with the silence within yourself, and know that everything in life has purpose. There are no mistakes, no coincidences, all events are blessings given to us to learn from.

life.author: John F. Kennedy
life.text: For time and the world do not stand still. Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or the present are certain to miss the future.

life.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
life.text: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.

life.author: Mark Twain
life.text: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.

life.author: Khalil Gibran
life.text: Life without liberty is like a body without spirit.

life.author: Kanye West
life.text: Nothing in life is promised except death.

life.author: Marie Curie
life.text: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.

life.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
life.text: Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.

life.author: Steve Jobs
life.text: For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.

life.author: William James
life.text: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.

life.author: Lao Tzu
life.text: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.

life.author: Marcus Aurelius
life.text: Nothing has such power to broaden the mind as the ability to investigate systematically and truly all that comes under thy observation in life.

life.author: Michael Jordan
life.text: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

life.author: Benjamin Franklin
life.text: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.

life.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
life.text: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.

life.author: Victor Hugo
life.text: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.

life.author: Buddha
life.text: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.

life.author: Plato
life.text: Justice in the life and conduct of the State is possible only as first it resides in the hearts and souls of the citizens.

life.author: Ralph Marston
life.text: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.

life.author: Myles Munroe
life.text: Our life is the sum total of all the decisions we make every day, and those decisions are determined by our priorities.

life.author: Leo Tolstoy
life.text: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.

life.author: Virginia Woolf
life.text: Someone has to die in order that the rest of us should value life more.

life.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
life.text: To be what we are, and to become what we are capable of becoming, is the only end of life.

life.author: John Wooden
life.text: Don't let making a living prevent you from making a life.

life.author: Joel Osteen
life.text: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.

life.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
life.text: Whatever your life's work is, do it well. A man should do his job so well that the living, the dead, and the unborn could do it no better.

life.author: Queen Elizabeth II
life.text: The lessons from the peace process are clear; whatever life throws at us, our individual responses will be all the stronger for working together and sharing the load.

life.author: Viktor E. Frankl
life.text: For the meaning of life differs from man to man, from day to day and from hour to hour. What matters, therefore, is not the meaning of life in general but rather the specific meaning of a person's life at a given moment.

life.author: Jean-Paul Sartre
life.text: Life begins on the other side of despair.

life.author: Woody Allen
life.text: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.

life.author: Arthur Schopenhauer
life.text: They tell us that suicide is the greatest piece of cowardice... that suicide is wrong; when it is quite obvious that there is nothing in the world to which every man has a more unassailable title than to his own life and person.

life.author: Herschel Walker
life.text: One thing I've done in my life is train year-round to compete at anything, anything. I've got an invitation now to maybe be on the karate team for the Barcelona Olympics. I'm debating whether I want to do that. I just love to compete, and I want to win.

life.author: Joyce Meyer
life.text: No matter what has happened to you in the past or what is going on in your life right now, it has no power to keep you from having an amazingly good future if you will walk by faith in God. God loves you! He wants you to live with victory over sin so you can possess His promises for your life today!

life.author: George Eliot
life.text: Life began with waking up and loving my mother's face.

life.author: Zig Ziglar
life.text: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.

life.author: Oscar Wilde
life.text: If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.

life.author: Joseph Campbell
life.text: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.

life.author: Maya Angelou
life.text: I am grateful to be a woman. I must have done something great in another life.

life.author: Albert Schweitzer
life.text: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.

life.author: Aristotle
life.text: The ultimate value of life depends upon awareness and the power of contemplation rather than upon mere survival.

life.author: Rabindranath Tagore
life.text: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.

life.author: Socrates
life.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.

life.author: Les Brown
life.text: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.

life.author: Muhammad Ali
life.text: A man who views the world the same at fifty as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.

life.author: Anais Nin
life.text: Life is a process of becoming, a combination of states we have to go through. Where people fail is that they wish to elect a state and remain in it. This is a kind of death.

life.author: Marcus Aurelius
life.text: Life is neither good or evil, but only a place for good and evil.

life.author: Mark Twain
life.text: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.

life.author: Henry David Thoreau
life.text: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.

life.author: Charles R. Swindoll
life.text: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.

life.author: Theodore Roosevelt
life.text: Never throughout history has a man who lived a life of ease left a name worth remembering.

life.author: Jesus Christ
life.text: For God so loved the World that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.

life.author: Walt Disney
life.text: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.

life.author: Lord Byron
life.text: Man's love is of man's life a part; it is a woman's whole existence. In her first passion, a woman loves her lover, in all the others all she loves is love.

life.author: Oprah Winfrey
life.text: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

life.author: Khalil Gibran
life.text: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.

life.author: Norman Cousins
life.text: The tragedy of life is in what dies inside a man while he lives - the death of genuine feeling, the death of inspired response, the awareness that makes it possible to feel the pain or the glory of other men in yourself.

life.author: Cesare Pavese
life.text: The richness of life lies in memories we have forgotten.

life.author: Dr. Seuss
life.text: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope, and that enables you to laugh at life's realities.

life.author: Voltaire
life.text: My life is a struggle.

life.author: Audrey Hepburn
life.text: Water is life, and clean water means health.

life.author: Jackie Robinson
life.text: Life is not a spectator sport. If you're going to spend your whole life in the grandstand just watching what goes on, in my opinion you're wasting your life.

life.author: Confucius
life.text: Death and life have their determined appointments; riches and honors depend upon heaven.

life.author: Isaac Asimov
life.text: The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.

life.author: Bertrand Russell
life.text: Life is nothing but a competition to be the criminal rather than the victim.

life.author: Elbert Hubbard
life.text: The greatest mistake you can make in life is continually fearing that you'll make one.

life.author: Simone de Beauvoir
life.text: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.

life.author: Immanuel Kant
life.text: Live your life as though your every act were to become a universal law.

life.author: William Shakespeare
life.text: We are such stuff as dreams are made on; and our little life is rounded with a sleep.

life.author: Buddha
life.text: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.

life.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
life.text: Help others and give something back. I guarantee you will discover that while public service improves the lives and the world around you, its greatest reward is the enrichment and new meaning it will bring your own life.

life.author: Zeenat Aman
life.text: Life's so unpredictable. You never know when the next high or low will strike you. The trick is just to flow with the tide.

life.author: Eckhart Tolle
life.text: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have. Make the Now the primary focus of your life.

life.author: Dale Carnegie
life.text: Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.

life.author: Helen Keller
life.text: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.

life.author: Paulo Coelho
life.text: You have to take risks. We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen.

life.author: Tony Robbins
life.text: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.

life.author: Vincent Van Gogh
life.text: As we advance in life it becomes more and more difficult, but in fighting the difficulties the inmost strength of the heart is developed.

life.author: Christopher McCandless
life.text: So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservation, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality, nothing is more damaging to the adventurous spirit.

life.author: Marcus Aurelius
life.text: The universe is transformation: life is opinion.

life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
life.text: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.

life.author: John Lennon
life.text: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.

life.author: William Wordsworth
